You truly made this process a little easier by putting this beautiful part of my life together in such a way for my family to remember her thank you

M McClure

provider_name: Pet Peeves Dog, Cat, Horse and Bird Training
review_text:
Wendy is a blessing. Very positive & professional & great with our dogs. She has a deep understanding and ability to know what each of our dogs needed. Happy to report we now have a pack (3dogs) that love one another, trained to sit, down, high five, stay, wait, come and leave it. Our puppy is completely potty trained even with our 6 lb dog still using potty pads, he knows not to go there. No pun intended ;)
Thank you Wendy!

provider_name: Pet Peeves Dog, Cat, Horse and Bird Training
review_text: We have a 1 1/2 year old Australian Cattle dog who is very smart but was very fearful of new people & dogs. Wendy Kelly came out to our home to meet with us & our dog, Mocha. It was clear from the beginning that Wendy has a true understanding of dogs, their behaviors, and the "why" behind these behaviors! Wendy was able to inform us why Mocha was acting the way she was, and offered a "train away" program where Mocha stayed with Wendy at Haines Road Animal Hospital for a week. During this time, Mocha trained daily 1x1 with Wendy. At the end of the program, Mocha came back to us a changed dog! And we are much more knowledgeable & armed with the tools to further her training. I would recommend Pet Peeves to anyone looking to see results in training their best friend!

provider_name: Pet Peeves Dog, Cat, Horse and Bird Training
review_text: Wendy and Pet Peeves are TERRIFIC.  Our dog had severe behavior issues - so sweet at home, but a terror to others.  Highly aggressive, to the point of posing a threat to our friends and family, and making it impossible to have visitors over.  We had tried several trainers before Pet Peeves, but nothing was working.  When Wendy came, she was able to diagnose the issues, educate us, and prepare a game plan.  Wendy is extremely knowledgeable, and an expert in pet behavior issues.  Further, she's so nice, and a pleasure to work with.  We have seen huge progress in our dog's behavior, all thanks to Wendy and Pet Peeves.  We would highly recommend them.

provider_name: Pet Peeves Dog, Cat, Horse and Bird Training
review_text: We are so happy to have been referred to Pet Peeves! We did a five day board and train program and could not be more pleased! Wendy Kelly is professional and master dog trainer! She came to our home and listened to our needs and went over everything she was going to train our cavapoo puppy. She sent video updates during the five days so we could view our puppy‚Äôs progress. When she brought our puppy back it could do all the commands and a trick! Our puppy was calmer and overall better behaved! Wendy also did two follow up meetings with our family to teach our family the training commands and make sure we were prepared to continue at home. We are so happy to have found Wendy and highly recommend her positive dog training program!

provider_name: Pet Peeves Dog, Cat, Horse and Bird Training
review_text: Out of the three opinions I got for behavior modification, Wendy was the only one who assured me that my dogs behavior was not uncommon. She was extremely knowledgeable and was always able to tell me the reasoning behind my dogs behaviors. Everything she did with him was positive and he responded very well. On top of that, once your training is done, she‚Äôs always there if you have any issues pop back up which is great!

I've always had really good experiences at Pet Street Vet. This past visit was no exception.  I was checked in promptly and in the cat room within just a few minutes of my arrival.

The vet tech,  sorry didn't get her name,  was professional,  friendly,  and obviously loved her job.  She got the history,  the reason for the visit,  and weighed my kitty all while making small talk.

Dr Jones was great, very knowledge. And answered any questions I had. There was a  follow up phone call with the results of the tests and she was personable as she was letting me know what the results meant. I appreciate that.

Pet street Vets are amazing. The staff always treats you kindly and they speak in baby voices to my 4-legged baby girl. They are patient explain everything in detail even my silly questions. Dr. Nina Jones (Armstrong) is sooo good w Bati. My insurance covers more at other vets but because of their service, I lleg√≥ going back to them. Happy puppy, happy mommie!

Great experience from scheduling an appointment to leaving. I believe it was Dr Beckner that we saw. One of my ball pythons had a whistle when breathing. The doctor was amazing with her, really seemed to care and made me feel comfortable with someone else handling my snake. One of the few places that treats reptiles so that‚Äôs already a plus. Can‚Äôt say enough how amazing the experience was!

Im the type of pet owner that can be overprotective of my pup and sometimes that can cause me to be a little stern when dealing with the care my pup receives. So when I give a 5 star review at a veterinary clinic I truly value there service and think that its worth a recommendation to others to visit them with there pets as well. Dr vandyke is a caring and compassionate individual. His goal is always to provide the best possible care for your pet and his efforts show. He is very professional and it is greatly appreciated. The rest of the staff is welcoming and friendly and does a great job as well. If you‚Äôre looking for a vet to bring your pets to i highly recommend you stop in at pet street. You will he in good hands
We love Pet Street. Great care for our Bella.  Wish they still did boarding.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Pet Urgent Response Emergency! I had to bring my dog in after he got into some brownies, and from the very first phone call, they were absolutely incredible. I was hysterical and crying when I called, but Gabby was so calm, kind, and patient ‚Äî she truly listened, reassured me, and walked me through every step of what to do. She even helped calm me down while making sure my dog got help as quickly as possible.

She got the main vet, Mr. Garcia, on the phone right away, and he guided me through what to do before I even arrived. When I got to the office, Mr. Garcia came running into the lobby the moment he heard someone walked in, It just shows how genuinely attentive and dedicated he is to helping pets in emergencies.

The whole team was compassionate, fast, and professional. They treated my dog with urgency and care, and their pricing was completely fair for the level of service I received. I left feeling beyond grateful and relieved. I would 100% recommend them to anyone, they truly care about both pets and their owners.

I am beyond grateful for the staff at PURE. Our girl had been seen at her primary vet and we had an X-ray scheduled. We ended up needing to take her for an emergency X-ray and found a place near our home. After sitting there for 20-30 minutes, we got online to find a different place. We found PURE and our girl was taken back and X-rays and ultrasounds were done almost immediately after getting there. We ended up moving forward to remove a large mass in her abdomen. We live about 40 minutes away so by the time we got home and just about situated, we got a call from Dr. Curro saying once they opened her up and assessed, they determined the mass was too large and other organs were too greatly involved. We made our way back to say our final goodbyes to our sweet Nova. All the staff were amazing, making sure they answered any question we had and repeating answers because it was an emotionally tough time for us so it was hard to retain some of what we had been told. They put us in a cozy room where we all gave loves to our sweet pup and spent her final moments with her. They supplied treats and water for our girl. They had snacks in the room for the families. I‚Äôm so glad we didn‚Äôt have to say goodbye in a sterile exam room. They gave us all the time we needed, they didn‚Äôt rush us at all. If and when the time comes that we have to say goodbye to our remaining fur babies, we will definitely be bringing them here. Thank you to everyone at PURE for making this hard time in our life a little bit easier on us.

Every pet and owner deserves professionalism and pure compassion of Dr. LeBlanc (unsure of spelling) and numerous vet techs, that I unfortunately didn't get the names of. My 14 year old dog had the best possible quality of life treatment and experience here. Every exam room is pretty spacious with 2-3 seats. The quality of life room had at least 6 seats and a lot of plants and open space for visitors to come. They never rushed me to make any decisions and slowly walked me through all our medical and financial options for my sweet senior pup. I cannot recommend this emergency veterinary clinic enough.

Your kindness and compassion to us is above and beyond! You all are a special kind of people. Keep up the wonderful, exceptional work. Dr. Garcia, Dr, Curro, Gabbi, Lexi, Donovan and Dakota were all so caring, honest, trusting, transparent and compassionate during our time of sadness. We are so thankful for the reference from our primary care San Pablo Animal Hospital that Dr. Owens recommended. Unfortunately after such excellent care from Dr. Garcia and Dr. Curro our furbaby Lucky crossed over the rainbow bridge on August 18th. I feel that they went above and beyond to try to give him the best care that they possibly could during his time of illness. The private room to say your final goodbyes is intimate for your family to be able to enjoy your final moments with your furbaby. We would highly recommend this as a top tier establishment. Thank you all so very much from the bottom of our hearts for such excellent service. We are so grateful for Everyone at this ER üíîüê©ü´∂üèæüôèüèΩ

So I‚Äôve been here twice for my cat Miko. He‚Äôs an orange tabby and he likes to get into things and eat stuff he‚Äôs not supposed to. I had to bring him in twice to induce vomiting, but the second time I had to leave him overnight because he ate chocolate, which he basically poisoned himself. My overall experience with this emergency vet being a first time, pet owner myself Is definitely good reviews only. Everyone in the vet is very nice and definitely emotionally understanding. I felt like I called other vet emergency rooms and they were just trying to have me rush my cat in there just to get checked Just to bring him in to do it. Meanwhile, here they were definitely more understanding of how I was feeling as well. Every vet in there is very informative and they do go above and beyond to make sure that  Your pet is OK. In addition, even though I did leave them over for one night, I was allowed to go visit him at any time.  They even gave  me advice as a first time pet owner as to certain reasons as to why my cat eats ravenously. And they took the time to put me in the right direction And even told me some things, I didn‚Äôt know about cats that I thought I knew.  Both times I took him to the vet ER he came back home And that‚Äôs all that matters. As far as the vet bill I felt like their prices are decently reasonable Although it could get expensive They have a payment plan and I feel like that alone should help a lot of people because not everyone can get approved for a care credit. Miko is home now and thriving and still being badüíïüíïüíïüíï

Our dog was diagnosed with spindle cell sarcoma 5 months ago and conventional veterinary medicine recommended removing the tumor and subjecting him to multiple radiation therapy treatments by a veterinarian oncologist under general anesthesia. The recommended treatment was simply too aggressive for our almost 12 year old dog, a valued family member. Dr. Iris has not only extended his life but her treatments have given him the ability to jump up onto his sofa again after being unable to do so for months.

We highly recommend Dr. Iris. She has saved our dog‚Äôs life and he hasn‚Äôt experienced  pain or discomfort using her treatment program.

Dr. Iris Ramirez has helped us for many years to maintain vibrant health in our pets.  She is very caring and addresses our concerns at each wellness exam.  Great care is given with treatment plans both holistic and traditional for our pets.  We highly recommend Pet Wellness Center, LLC.

Dr. Iris Ramirez & team are amazing! I have been taking my Maltese to Pet Wellness Center weekly for 4 months now to get Ozone/Cancer treatments. Dr. Iris & Kim are amazing they treat my fur baby like it‚Äôs their own. They are the most caring veterinarian I have ever meet. I‚Äôm so glad I have found them. üíó
I love Doc Iris and Kim- what a great team to help our fur babies. She is so diligent on what we feed our babies and their overall health. Thank you!!

I recently visited Pet Wellness Center, LLC in Fort Myers with my 10-year-old Persian cat, Jigglypuff, and had an experience that truly exceeded all expectations. As an NP student studying holistic medicine, I have grown increasingly disillusioned with traditional Western medicine for both humans and animals. Discovering a holistic veterinary practice just 12 minutes from my home felt like a blessing.

Dr. Ramirez's warmth and compassion were evident from the moment we walked in. She was genuinely moved by Jigglypuff, even shedding tears as she called him a "human in cat form." Her words resonated deeply with me, as Jigglypuff is my soulmate and means the world to me. Dr. Ramirez observed that Jigglypuff had the lowest heart rate she had ever encountered in her practice, describing him as "zen." It was wonderful to see someone else appreciate his unique spirit and calm nature as much as I do.

Dr. Ramirez's approach was the epitome of holistic care. She focused on Jigglypuff as a whole being rather than just a set of symptoms, which is what I believe medicine should be. Her examination was thorough, and her calming energy was evident in every word and action. Unlike traditional vets who often rush to invasive treatments, she emphasized understanding and treating the entire body. Instead of recommending x-rays, vaccinations, or invasive treatments, she suggested a homeopathic remedy, a vial of Thuja, for Jigglypuff's occasional itchy skin.

Jigglypuff adored Dr. Ramirez, offering her eye kisses and allowing her to hold him throughout our visit. I was once told by a pet psychic to watch how Jigglypuff reacts to new people, and his immediate affection for Dr. Ramirez speaks volumes about her loving energy. I wholeheartedly recommend Pet Wellness Center, LLC to anyone considering a shift from traditional to holistic medicine, whether for their pets or themselves. Dr. Ramirez is a rare gem, radiating spiritual and loving energy that is hard to find, and I feel incredibly fortunate to have found her.

The best team working together to care for your family fur babies. I love that it‚Äôs first come first serve. I don‚Äôt have to wait to get an appointment if my dog is having an issue.
Wish you would open more wellness clinics. IT IS IMPORTANT TO HAVE ACCESS TO AFFORDABLE HEALTH CARE FOR OUR ANIMALS. Especially in this economy. I love my dogs and they are Family to us. I never want them to be in pain with an ear infection or a UTI. We have options now thanks to PetVet Wellness centers.

The Vet at the wellness center, is great. She takes time, making my cat comfortable. She gave my cat a shot, weight, checked teeth, claws, ears for mites, tummy, his fur for fleas, she was thorough. We talked a little about his breed and what his favorite things are. We left happy.

I was very pleased when the vet said we should wait on the shots until my feral cat was in better health. Some places will vacinate regardless, and that can make a bad situation worse.  These vets care!
Waited in line over 1 hour and couldn‚Äôt stand in 1 spot any longer asked for a chair‚Ä¶sat another 30 minutes‚Ä¶Seating should be provided without being asked for.

I brought my 2 dogs in for their annual checkup and shots. The entire staff at PetVet WC was professional and caring. My dogs were so calm and relaxed like I've never seen. My fur babies are healthy and happy. Thank you guys for such a great experience.

I highly recommend Phynix Physical Therapy to anyone who is in need of PT. They are amazing. Everyone there is so friendly and they  go out of their way to help you in anyway they can. Thank you again to the whole team you made the healing process an exceptional experience.

Shawn‚Äôs support, enthusiasm and positive attitude left me feeling motivated and optimistic after every session, and importantly, the treatment plan was effective!  I‚Äôm no longer in excruciating pain, and have gained strength and mobility.   If I ever need further PT I will absolutely go back to Phynix Physical Therapy.

NOT RECOMMENDED. My wife scheduled an appointment and verified all of the insurance information over the phone as well as confirming all of the details. I rest confident that no matter what I ask, I‚Äôll recieve a precise answer that isn‚Äôt over my head or an attack on why I have the question in the first place. I have found THE Doctor for me!

Fantastic provider: Staff, Dr. Correa, Techs are all timely, efficient and most importantly,  listen to your concerns. Highly recommend!

Dr. Oquendo saw me today due to a bad fall. I called the front desk person yesterday and she fit me in on an emergency basis for today -and it was just great. His treatments and suggestions have helped me greatly, and I've discovered ways to help prevent further issues.  I highly recommend my fellow yogis (and others with physical issues) take advantage of the great physical therapy treatment here by Jonathan and his colleagues.

After tearing my Achilles, I had to do some physical therapy for my post-op rehab. I was referred to the PT&C Miami facility by a family friend who visited their Miami Beach location. Thankfully, they had a location closer to me, in Wynwood. The facility was spotless, and there was no waiting time. I really appreciated the time Dr. Soto took with me. I've been to other PT offices (in Miami Beach), and it felt like it was a fast food joint, constantly having patients on rotation. I got the therapy I needed, and the follow-up was like no other. I recommend if you need an excellent physical therapist who knows what they are doing and cares.

Jonathan at PTC Miami Wynwood gave me the best therapeutic massage ever to help with my back pain. He is skilled with deep tissue massage, stretching, physical therapy, and he even did cupping therapy, which I had never tried before. His combination approach made my back feel great. I‚Äôll be booking again very soon.

review_text: Except therapists and the environment at the  facility is relaxed. The staff are friendly and very helpful and have  listening ears. review_text: My son's first day here was memorable. While waiting to see the doctor we met a patient who assured us that the doctor and staff were super awesome.  That proved true. review_text:

I definitely will recommend  this place for any physical therapy or Chiropractic services you might need, if I ever in need of this type of services I will definitely be back here. THANK YOU all for your services.üëçüèºüòä

Physical Therapy Group of Florida is amazing!

I recently relocated to the U.S. after extensive shoulder surgery, and the PT Group of Florida was my first physical therapy experience here ‚Äî there‚Äôs no looking back! They are truly outstanding at what they do.

I‚Äôve had many injuries throughout my life, so I know how important good PT is. The team takes time to listen, guide, and push ‚Äî all in a balanced and supportive way. They also have a great app that reminds you to do your exercises and includes videos for each one, so you never forget the proper form.

Angie, Ariel, and Anthony are amazing physical therapists ‚Äî knowledgeable, caring, and motivating. I‚Äôd recommend any of them without hesitation!  Joan, who handles scheduling, insurance, and billing, is a pleasure to work with ‚Äî efficient, kind, and always helpful.

I drive 20‚Äì30 minutes to see them, and it‚Äôs absolutely worth it. They‚Äôre simply the best!

I had a great experience at Physical Therapy group of Florida. I came in with knee pain that was really affecting my daily life, and the therapists here made such a difference. They took the time to understand my situation, explained everything clearly, and guided me through a personalized program that actually worked.
The staff is professional, friendly, and encouraging, I always felt supported during my sessions. Thanks to their care, my knee feels stronger and I‚Äôm able to move with much more confidence.
Highly recommend this place to anyone needing physical therapy!

Best PT! First, I love that they take insurance. It makes it so affordable for me now that I‚Äôve met my deductible plus the office staff makes it super easy. You can also text them to make appointments which I love. They‚Äôre super quick to respond and always so kind.
Second, Ariel is my PT and he is an absolute joy to work with. He caters the exercises to me and challenges me while always making sure I‚Äôm never in pain. They also have an app and he is super on top of updating my exercises. What k also love about PT with him and that he somehow manages to remember what we did the last time I came in and shows me every single exercises so I feel like I‚Äôm getting one on one attention even if there are other patients there too. He‚Äôs amazing and I highly recommend him. He‚Äôs also hilarious so it makes going to PT entertaining as well. Could not recommend more. They are also in Coral Springs so if you go to that location, make sure you ask for Chris. He‚Äôs super knowledgeable.

My son recently finished physical therapy here for a growth related knee/leg issue. I‚Äôm so glad I found them online and called to schedule. Ana scheduled him within a short amount of time and he was fortunate to work with Anthony and Ariel. My son is completely better now and gained a lot of strength and knowledge. Everyone in this practice is so welcoming and nice and they always answer the phone and/or call you back. I highly recommend them for anyone who needs physical therapy! And if we ever need therapy again I will definitely go back.

I have been coming to this PT Group since 2023 for a couple different conditions and highly recommend them! I have worked with a couple different providers like Angela, Ariel and Anthony! All staff are professional and knowledgeable! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! 50X + Great crew

provider_name: Physical Therapy Group of Florida - Coral Springs
review_text:
July 9th, 2025, 72 years old and in severe chronic pain from sacroiliac joint injury, began PT here after a joint injection had given partial temporary relief. From Chris, received personalized care here customized to my injury, which reset my pain processing. Sep 22nd, graduated pain-free with an ongoing exercise-at-home program and a supportive App to sustain my recovery. Care here is like having your own personal trainer; plus, the location has all the equipment of a full gym. Taylor (my trainer) was kind, encouraging and gentle, fitting my exercises to what I could handle at any given time. Denisse at the front was warm, friendly and always freely accommodated my frequent schedule changes.  In summary, here you'll find the support to give you the best chance of full recovery, no matter your age.
... Michael Peterson

provider_name: Physical Therapy Group of Florida - Coral Springs
review_text:

review_text: I never leave reviews, but I'm very satisfied with the service provided. They've helped me a lot with my neck pain. Chris is very professional and compassionate with his patients. I'm very grateful for his help.

provider_name: Physical Therapy Group of Florida - Coral Springs
review_text: I had a stroke and needed physical therapy. This place was on my insurance plan.  I was very happy when I went because this is a great physical therapy place. I have only had two sessions but already feel like I‚Äôm getting somewhere.  I recommend them highly.  Update: have now been there a month and already my strength is improving.  They are great and I am happy that I found them.

Kindly accept this as my show of gratitude for the services provided by your therapy staff at Physical Therapy Now. I visited this center number of times and each visit I was met with courtesy and respect and the treatment was outstanding, efficient and thorough.

First, maps lists an 800 number which disconnected my call, left a call hanging, routed my call to an unknown location -- it was messy. I found a Tallahassee number by accident, that seemed great, until I actually spoke to a person.
"Are you located in Tallahassee?"
"Our phone number starts with 850." (silence)
The short, unhelpful and obvious contempt for my Anglo-Saxon accent left me wondering exactly who is rating this group of oafish, antagonistic, inverts with five stars.

Over the years I've been to quite a few different physical therapy centers in the area. This is my second time going to the Physical Therapy Now Cooper City location. The physical therapy assistants I work with for the therapy are both licensed by the Florida DOH. They are very skilled, personable, take extra efforts to watch for patients' safety, and they are always keeping an eye on you to make sure you're performing the exercises correctly (this is something I did not find it the other centers I had been to in the past). I had been a health provider myself with a private practice for 41 years and can easily recognize the efforts they make that have been beyond my expectations.

Supper clean and supper friendly. Everyone gave me great attention and great  customer service. The therapist really help with my neck and shoulder pain after my accident the whole team is very well educate in the newest and most advance technologies avialbe to get you back to 100%  quick.

I highly recommend Physical Therapy Now in Fort Lauderdale. Amarilys is super nice, very professional, and was extremely accommodating with my schedule. She was nice enough to reserve the times I needed for all 18 of my appointments from the first day I walked in. I had partial tears in my right ankle and sprained acl in my right knee. Mark and Nat knew exactly how to get me back into normal sneakers again after being in a walking boot for 5 weeks. They took the time to analyze my body‚Äôs strengths and weaknesses to push me to the appropriate limit each week so I could heal as quickly and as close to 100% as possible. Mark and Nat both have a great sense of humor and truly made it an enjoyable experience going to each session. I actually looked forward to going to each session because of how much improvement I felt each week thanks to them. They both never rushed me in and out of there. They always said hi and asked how I was feeling each session and always said bye before I would leave. They truly care for their patients and are willing to take the extra time needed to make sure you are on the right track to getting healthy again. It is important to remember the therapy does not stop at the sessions. You need to do your part and put in the extra time and effort at home as well to see continuous improvement. Mark and Nat were able to help me avoid surgery and help me get back to chasing my 2 year old around the house. I am forever grateful I chose Physical Therapy Now in Fort Lauderdale over the long list of other options. I truly recommend putting your trust in Amarilys, Mark, and Nat‚Äôs hands for the positive results you are looking for.

review_text:

review_text: I had such a fantastic experience with everyone at the Physical Therapy Now office at Palm Pointe. My pain levels have significantly decreased and my mobility has drastically improved. review_text: I recently underwent Shoulder manipulation under anesthesia and my doctor sent me to Physical Therapy Now for my recovery exercise.
