Justin and Andy were responsible for helping my recovery from both right and left shoulder labrum surgeries. They are both highly educated and extremely knowledgeable. The newly expanded facility on Malabar Road in Palm Bay is excellent. They are extremely accommodating, including later appointments on weekdays after work for me, as well as on Saturday mornings. I will always be appreciative of the entire PT Professionals family for their dedication, support and caring. If you are considering a physical therapy facility, I highly recommend PT Professionals!

I went to PT Professionals in Palm Bay for lower back pain. Honestly, I didn‚Äôt think they could help me but they did. I can move and workout without lower back pain now. I worked with 3 different therapists but mostly with Justin. He was very patient and very knowledgeable. I will be forever grateful.

I‚Äôve had a truly positive experience with Physical Therapy Services. From the moment I walked in, I was met with professionalism and care. The staff (Hermi y Zuhe) are exceptionally well-prepared and knowledgeable, always taking the time to explain each step of the process and tailor treatment to individual needs. What stood out most was the respectful and compassionate way they treat every patient‚Äîcreating a welcoming, supportive environment that makes a real difference in the healing process. They will create a hopeful environment and give high positive expectations to patients that feel lost in pain.  I‚Äôm very grateful for the high-quality care I received and would highly recommend them to anyone in need of physical therapy. With no doubt, I would return if I would need it.

Dr Jara and his assistant Nadia are extremely helpful and go out of their way to help you and make you feel comfortable. I have had numerous injuries while playing sports and an unfortunate cycling accident where I researched a reliable and attentive physical therapist. Based on their outstanding reviews, I decided to make an appointment. The Physical Therapy practice schedules their patients where there are only two or three at a time. Unlike other locations where you are one of many (12+) and you are waiting for the therapist to attend you. I strongly recommend this practice for their knowledge and professionalism.

I have been going to Physical therapy services for years.  From wrist injury, plantar fasciitis and now at middle age vertigo.  Therapist is very knowledgeable and the patient attention is superb.  Therapist even recommended supplement to better my health and weight loss.   Exceptional therapist.  Highly recommend!

I am very happy with the physical therapy treatment I received at Physical Therapy Services, I have been at different physical therapies in the past and this is the best as far as the exercises, treatments and the personal approach that Herminsul Lopez gives to his patients, he is very flexible with the schedule which is great.
Overall I had a great experience and improvement of my condition. I highly recommend this Physical Therapist

This physical therapy is the best I have been and I have been in many. The staff is super nice and professional. The owner itself, Hermi, is always present at the business and has a lot of experience and knowledge, and really care for you. I went to this place with a lot of pain after a meniscus repair surgery and I was fine within a few days, I was improving by day a lot every time I was going to the therapy. I never saw such great results and such good treatment in the past in other places. I will be back to this place without thinking twice if I ever need therapy again.

The staff here is fantastic! What really sets them apart is the one-on-one attention. Unlike other PT places in the area where therapists juggle multiple patients at once, here they work directly with you the entire session. They were very thorough, listened to my individual needs, and even helped troubleshoot challenges I was facing at home. They created exercises tailored to build my strength and endurance so I can keep up with the demands of my job. I‚Äôve never felt rushed or overlooked‚Äîjust supported every step of the way. I can‚Äôt recommend them enough!

Penny and Rose are absolutely amazing. I‚Äôve been coming here for a few months and it has been nothing but a great experience. I love that it‚Äôs a more personal setting and not a huge business with multiple therapists and clients at once. Penny will challenge you but NEVER pushes! I feel heard and most importantly, helped! Your specific needs are heard and always taken into account. She tries different tactics to see what best works and makes sure that you‚Äôre always comfortable. It‚Äôs very rare to have a medical professional that actually listens to you. There‚Äôs always a warm welcome when you walk in the door to see Rose, and a pleasant goodbye as well.

Very professional and courteous staff. A really insightful experience,  I learned so much helpful information.  The staff were very knowledgeable and helpful in my speedy recovery.  I would recommend this facility to anyone needing physical therapy.  Front desk receptionist was very patient and helpful.

From the moment I entered the facility I felt my well-being was important.   The owner /therapist was hands on not just dictating.

They provided specific and detailed home instructions.  They also made sure I practice proper posture.

Thank you very much for my care.

Throughout my experience at Physical Therapy Services with Emanuel, Penne, and Rose, it was evident that they were highly skilled, knowledgeable, and adaptable in their field. Their expertise in various physical therapy techniques instilled confidence in me that I was receiving top-notch care. Moreover, they created a supportive and encouraging atmosphere that motivated me to push myself and achieve my rehabilitation goals. Their positive attitude and belief in my abilities significantly contributed to my progress. Additionally, they were always accessible and responsive outside of my scheduled appointments, providing clear instructions for at-home exercises or self-care practices. Their prompt and thorough communication greatly contributed to my overall satisfaction. Overall, I am grateful for their dedication and exceptional care, and would highly recommend their services to anyone in need of physical therapy.

provider_name: Physical Therapy Specialists of Dr. Phillips
review_text: I first started going to this practice for one issue in 2023, and when I needed treatment for something else in 2024 it was an easy choice to go back! I have always been treated with kindness and felt welcome here. They are very flexible and work with you as best they can. I have never been to a more understanding provider. I have also seen progress with both of my issues when I visit consistently and follow their instructions. I would never recommend going anywhere else! I‚Äôm so grateful to them for all they have done for me.

provider_name: Physical Therapy Specialists of Dr. Phillips
review_text:
Just after several sessions with Carl I experienced  significant  improvement !
Carl is very knowledgeable and experienced therapist, explain in a detail  problems, analyze it  and provide  customized  exercises to tackle the best the  problematic area! I would strongly recommend  this faciliy!

provider_name: Physical Therapy Specialists of Dr. Phillips
review_text:
I was a patient at Physical Theraphy Specialists
Melissa the physical therapist is great. She has a lot a knowledge. She listens to the patient,she has emphaty, friendly and very professional. She really help me a lot. And my hip pain went away. Melissa did a great job.

provider_name: Physical Therapy Specialists of Dr. Phillips
review_text: Person at the front desk let me know the first day since I had met my deductible I had zero copay for the rest of 2024. I went November of 2024.  Because the front desk let me know I had zero copay I figured why not go as many times as my doctor prescribed. So I tried going 2 to 3 times a week. I made sure to ask each and every time if I had anything due to make sure I was good.  After the 8th visit the front desk person called me at hime and asked me to call the insurance provider that there is something going on that I would need to call them.  Normally I never call my own insurance company so I was confused.  He said just said call them, they will let you know whats going on.  And now they said yeah you had a copay each time.  I asked every time and the front desk said I didn't owe him anything.  Had I known this I wouldn't have gone more then the first time.  So now the Physical therapy place wants to charge me everything from the beginning.  I feel like they deliberately kept me waiting to accumulate charges.  When I go to any doctors office they always tell me my copay before I even go inside and have me pay.  I feel like I was scammed and this is an awful practice.  Imagine if someone said you are good you owe nothing because it is taken care of and then they go opps my bad you owe 200 dollars for fun.

provider_name: Physical Therapy Specialists of Dr. Phillips
review_text:
I am absolutely delighted with the exemplary level of service provided by Carl and his team at their physical therapy clinic. Right from my first session, I was taken by the warm welcome, genuine care, and thorough professionalism that seemed to pervade the whole office.

Carl, as a physical therapist, is a class apart. His vast knowledge of the human body and physical rehabilitation, combined with his comforting and kind demeanour, makes every appointment a truly beneficial and pleasant experience. He goes above and beyond to ensure that every treatment is personalized and effective, taking the time to understand my specific needs and progress.

The whole team is evidently attuned to the ethos of providing top-notch service. They are always ready to lend a hand, answer questions, and provide encouragement. Their collaborative approach to care is heartening, and it certainly contributes to the positive atmosphere and significant improvements in my condition.

Moreover, the clinic is impeccably clean, well-organized, and equipped with state-of-the-art tools to aid the recovery process. Every visit is an absolute pleasure, filled with progress and positivity.

In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend Carl's Physical Therapy to anyone seeking a nurturing environment to heal and thrive. Their unwavering commitment to patient well-being, coupled with their hands-on, empathetic approach, makes them stand out in the realm of physical therapy. Thank you, Carl and team, for setting the bar incredibly high!

provider_name: Physical Therapy Specialists of Winter Park
review_text:
I recently finished physical therapy at Physical Therapy Specialists after foot surgery, and I‚Äôm so thankful for the care I received from my PT, Dylan. He was professional, very knowledgeable, kind and great to work with. Thanks to him, I‚Äôm now walking correctly and back to 100%.

The clinic is clean and in a convenient location, and I really enjoyed getting to know both Dylan and Julie during my appointments. Every time I drove there, I felt grateful that my doctor chose PT Specialists for my recovery. I highly recommend!

provider_name: Physical Therapy Specialists of Winter Park
review_text: The staff and therapists are wonderful. My 16yo son primarily worked with Dylan and he was great with him. After a serious ankle break Dylan got him back on the basketball court and feeling confident. Dylan worked with our doctor and communicated his progress regularly so it was seamless upon follow-ups. Dylan also worked with me for a knee issue and tennis elbow. All around great PT practice and specifically for athletes who want to get back to their sport. Staff is kind and helpful and scheduling is convenient. I would highly recommend this practice!

provider_name: Physical Therapy Specialists of Winter Park
review_text: 5 stars for this PT practice.  Dylan DeFeo and his team are excellent clinicians who are friendly, kind, compassionate, encouraging and dedicated to helping their patients get better and reach their goals. Each PT session was well organized, efficient and increasingly challenging, all the while attuned to pain level and limitations.  The therapists are in constant contact with the prescribing physician, so the two-way communication is excellent.  Really impressed with this practice! They know what they are doing and the results speak for themselves!

provider_name: Physical Therapy Specialists of Winter Park
review_text: I had the best experience working with Dylan. Everyone is super kind and carrying. I really felt like they listened to me and continued to come up with new exercises to help me continue to heal.

provider_name: Physical Therapy Specialists of Winter Park
review_text: I have been a patient at this office for rehabilitation before my L4, L5 to S1 lumbar fusion, and my journey began post surgery. There are not enough good things to say about this office. The team at this location are exceptional in how they care for patients. The 2 PTs Dylan and Yuliana are outstanding! They have helped me learn how to move to avoid further injury and allow me to regain mobility. The best part is that they provide homework that resembles things you have access to at home, so you can continue strengthening you body and recovering. I have worked well with both PTs and feel that I have reached my goals in a timely manner. The office staff, Damaris is very responsive and professional. My experience with this office has been very positive. I was anxious about PT and having to go through the surgery, but they made my recovery fun and worthwhile. If you're looking for a PT office - go here! You will not regret it. Thanks to you all, I have achieved my goals and have been able to graduate from PT. Thanks for believing in me and supporting me for the past year!

I had such a great experience at Physical Therapy Time! I came in with severe back and neck pain and could barely move. From the start, I felt cared for‚Äîeverything was explained clearly, from the cupping to the cream and TENS unit, along with the benefits of each step. It was my first time trying cupping, and I really appreciated how kind, thorough, and attentive Made was in making sure I was comfortable throughout the process.

By the next day, I already started to feel relief. I‚Äôm so thankful for the care and the personal touch‚Äîit made all the difference. Highly recommend!

I recently had the pleasure of visiting Physical Therapy Time and I must say, it was a fantastic experience. From start to finish, the staff was incredibly friendly, professional, and knowledgeable.

The facilities were top-notch, with all the latest equipment and technology, and everything was kept impeccably clean and tidy. The therapists were all highly trained and skilled, and they took the time to listen to my concerns and answer any questions I had.

Throughout my sessions, I could feel myself making steady progress and I truly believe that I wouldn't have made such great strides without the help of the amazing team at Physical Therapy Time.

Overall, I would highly recommend Physical Therapy Time to anyone in need of physical therapy. With their exceptional staff, state-of-the-art facilities, and personalized approach to care, they truly go above and beyond to help their patients achieve their goals. 5 stars!

This is the best place ever.
Amazing professionals and they are all really kind.
I went with horrible back pain And i couldn‚Äôt even move, after the consultation they started the treatment right away!the progress has been amazing. They are very professional and truly cares about their  patients. They takes the time to answer all of my questions and has taught me so much about proper stretching and posture. I highly recommend
I feel loads better just after the first session.

Awesome service! I came here after having knee surgery and their treatment helped me recover promptly. Since I don‚Äôt have insurance and was paying out of pocket, I was pleased with their self pay rate! Thank you Madelin, will come again!

‚ÄúI would like to thank the therapists of physical Therapy Time for the wonderful therapy they provided to me, after injured my low back and being in pain for so long, Dr. Susana and Madeline helped me to achieve my goals, they also used the Haguihara method which made such difference in my recovery. Not only they treated my low back pain but they also gave me exercises and instructions on what to do at home. I now feel so much better.‚Äù

I came to see Dr. Girgis for two orthopedic issues.  I was very impressed with how comfortable I felt in his office.  It was open, spacious, and light filled.  He sees one patient at time, so I received focused and individualized attention.  The outstanding feature of the office was just how pleasant it was to go to therapy.  Conversation and humor was fluid and relaxing.  I never felt self-conscious, making my recovery a very affirming process.  When both of my issues were expertly resolved, I felt as if I had made a friend and put his number on "speed dial" for any other issues.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Physical Therapy of Winter Springs! From the moment you walk in, the office feels warm and welcoming, with a level of personal attention that‚Äôs truly exceptional. I achieved my therapy goals in record time thanks to the superior competence and deep knowledge of Dr. Gergis. He‚Äôs not only skilled but also incredibly attentive and encouraging throughout the process.

A special shoutout to Lizzie, his amazing assistant‚Äîher warm personality brightens every visit, and she keeps the office running smoothly and efficiently.

If you're looking for a PT practice that delivers results with heart, professionalism, and a personal touch, look no further. I highly recommend them!

Dr. Girgis provides personalized care and focuses on your treatment throughout the session, unlike larger hospital-associated facilities. He answers all of my questions and explains the benefits of the exercises and treatments. The staff is pleasant, and appointment times are accommodating. Physical Therapy of Winter Springs is a valuable resource for our community. Highly recommended.

I found Physical Therapy of Winter Springs while dealing with 4 bulging disc and severe sciatic pain. I've have been working with Dr Girgis for a few weeks now and have had tremendous improvement with mobility and overall pain levels. I'm not out of the woods yet, but I know I'm in good hands!

Dr. Girlish has been fantastic.  You can tell he's very passionate about helping others. The office is always spotless and his office staff is top notch. I'd refer anyone to physical there's of Winter Springs if there looking for a quality service and a Dr that is looking out for your best interests in your recovery.

Physical One is a cut above any other PT center that has been my experience of trying. My therapist Allie was very patient with me and so helpful and knowledgeable to demo and help me throughout the various exercises. Their entire team of physical therapists are excellent. If you are considering Physical One for your PT, I highly recommend them.

Instead of treating my disk hernia with a steroid injection, I went to Physical One and they teach me how to stretch and exercise my muscles, in less than a week I start to feel much better I was able to get up from bed and chairs with out any pain. They take care or every person with lots of love and care. They are super professionals.
God Bless the team at Physical One.

I love this place. I recently got into a big car accident, and afterward I needed help getting back to normal. I had gone to a ciropractor for 10 visits and found some relief. But after starting treatment at physical one i had more progress in 2 visits than all the times at the ciro.

Long story short. The staff is attentive, kind, but are not going to let u slack off on ur therapy amd training. They safely motivate you to push yourself and I could tell after a week of treatments and at home work outs I have a new found respect for physical therapy as a whole.

I was referred to this team and location by my primary doctor, and I am beyond thrilled at the results I have gotten. I went in with knee, and back pain, and they showed me the necessary steps to greatly lessen, and prevent worsening pain.Everyone at this location is super friendly, and knowledgable about any problem I came to them with. For my last appointment I was supposed to go to a different location, and the team at Tamarac let me see them anyway. I highly recommend this place to anyone that is seeking a physical therapist.

Wish I could give 10 stars. The staff is very welcoming, I‚Äôve been doing therapy here for neck pain and my therapist Allie, she has magic hands,  she‚Äôs very patient & extremely knowledgeable. The place is very clean & inviting. I highly recommend Physical One in Tamarac.

Office staff is so friendly, good environment and most of all they care about your health.The doctor their listen, answers your questions and explain every detail. I will recommend anybody who needs a chiropractor to go to them.

Very professional and understanding. Everyone in the office is incredibly kind and helpful. They are considerate of my schedule, and I never need to wait more than 5 minutes before being seen. Both Bethany and Scott are very patient and encouraging with me during therapy, and they make the entire experience an enjoyable one. Dr. McCane and Dr. Bronner are both very nice as well. They do an excellent job of explaining everything and helping me better understand and pinpoint any pain.

Their quick and accurate diagnosis put me on the path to feeling like myself again. The doctor I saw utilized the results of my digital motion X-Ray to the best of my advantage. I feel like I might not have met with his experience elsewhere.

Slow,, !! performance is perfectional  ,has trouble with patient understanding, I came from 12 weeks of rehab to continue & it was like starting all over again. Went right back where I didn't want to go 20minutes away.

They are very nice and understanding .Scott is my therapy person he is very nice respectful and understanding love doing therapy with him he is very patient. Everyone is very professional very nice also dr. McCain is  a awesome doctor they all make me feel very  comfortable there

After my car accident my partner and I have been receiving our care in their hands honestly from front desk Thalia to the PT Miladys and Yolanda has been amazing they even gave me a hand with my two year when I had no one else, not only a doctors office but a family they become not even to mention the doctor played with my little guy never felt uncomfortable great place to go for your care. They helped with every info and have been very informative the whole process.

You feel amazing with them my words are very short by how great they are.

I absolutely look forward to coming, despite the reason of pain. Physiohealing is a great place. They actually care, sometimes I wish I had a reason to stay longer. Coffee‚Äôs great and the smell is so inviting. Everything is always clean. The attention is so top notch that even when it‚Äôs busy you feel like you‚Äôre the only one there. The people here were truly meant for this ; making a difference and healing body and mind for me . Thank you is not enough ‚ù§Ô∏è
Amazing staff and facility. Everyone was very nice and professional. Doctor explains everything and I leave feeling better. Would recommend this office to anyone!
The place is in an immaculate condition. The staffs are friendly and easy to get along with. I will recommend this facility to any and everyone because of the great treatment that I received. Bless
Feeling great after being treated amazing!!! This place treats you like family,highly recommendable I can‚Äôt even express how satisfied I am!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about working with Jesse. After my hip replacement, he not only helped me recover but guided me through a complete transformation in strength, mobility, and overall fitness.

I‚Äôve been training for over 20 years and have worked with no fewer than a dozen physical therapists during that time. Jesse stands out as the most creative, knowledgeable, and effective PT I‚Äôve ever worked with.

He seamlessly blends traditional therapy with advanced techniques like Graston, cupping, dry needling, and adjustments‚Äîalways knowing exactly how to address pain so it never slowed down our progress. His ability to tailor the program to my needs while pushing me further than I thought possible has been life-changing.

Simply put, Jesse is the best physical therapist in Tampa. If you‚Äôre serious about recovery and long-term results, he‚Äôs the one you want in your corner.

I drove from St Pete to see Jesse every month. I came in with lower back pain to the point where I could not exercise regularly without hurting myself to the point that i couldn't stand up straight.

Since starting with Jesse over a year ago i haven't had an issue. I highly recommend checking him out.

For me, Jesse‚Äôs training in physical therapy and weight lifting is the secret sauce. He is my fourth physical therapist over many years. I have seen the most success with his treatment plan.

He is a great resource for addressing your physical challenges.

Dr. Jesse  is by far the best physical therapist I have ever worked with!! His knowledge and expertise are amazing!! He listened, looked and carefully diagnosed me. I had been suffering with frozen shoulder for almost a year before I found Dr. Jesse who was at a posing clinic that I attended at my gym. He clearly explained everything, and created a successful program for rehabilitation, with the goal of getting me rehabilitated, so that I could graduate from PT with success.

He very literally saved me. Without him I never would have been able to continue training for my fitness show, nor continued prep for another as I am now. The sky is the limit thanks to him!  I had gone to physical therapy two separate tries in that year with no relief or success and I felt like iI was in a cue working on my own while they worked with many other clients at the same time and so after weeks without progress I gave up.

Dr. Jesse works one on one with me each session and focuses fully on our progress each time. He explqins everything,  asks questions and always utilizes the full sessions, & sometimes beyond if it was beneficial to progress made during the session. He is extremely knowledgeable, genuinely cares and wants to get you all possible recovery both for maximum range of motion and relief from any pain its causing. He truly is brilliant, friendly, and patient. Thanks to Dr. Jesse I've gained back range of motion that most don't regain and I am no longer suffering through the days and nights with unbearable discomfort.  He is the very best and I can't highly reccomend him enough if you're serious about recovery, whatever your ailment!

Started with Dr Jesse at PhysioCare about 6 months ago with significant discomfort from my scoliosis, along with a laundry list of joint issues and instability. He has helped me repair my body through strength training, mobility work, and soft tissue treatment. Thanks to Dr Jesse, I have gone from my weakest to my strongest overall functionality in all areas of my body.

I had a great PT experience here. I worked with 3 of their therapists, and they were all excellent. I had a frozen shoulder, and they helped me get full movement back (over two months of twice-weekly sessions). If you don't have insurance, they are very affordable. They also have a very affordable full-time massage therapist.

I was recommended Physiotherapy Works by my Chiropractor after I suffered a really bad pinched nerve. The team at Physiotherapy Works really took great care in helping me get back to work and my daily routine. I had the opportunity to connect with Alex, Mary, and Christina and all were fantastic! They take the time to go through what your symptoms are, and there‚Äôs many different spaces in their office that you can work on your therapy. Each visit may be a different therapist but it‚Äôs a seamless transition between every one. I would definitely recommend this practice for any of your PT Needs. They also specialize in dry needling and there is a massage therapist as well that you can inquire about. Thank you for a great experience!

Had nothing but a positive experience with the team at Physiotherapy Works.  They treat you like family which made it enjoyable to go.  I have been here for two separate needs: one a few years ago for neck and shoulder and  this year for my knee.  There are several services offered to help you heal.  Each therapist I worked with had a friendly disposition and really cared about the progress I made.  They supported and encouraged me through the ups and down of healing.  I will also say, as a patient, you have to do the exercises they tell you on your own as well to get the best results.  I am grateful that they worked with my personal trainer so that I could still workout with modifications that would allow me to keep on the road to recovery.  I also have done several dry needling sessions and I believe it helped me get to the next level.  It may not work for everyone but it really was a game changer.  Eric explains it all to help you make the best decision for you.  Thank you amazing team of therapists!!!
Eric was professional and attentive. The dry needling was a 1/10 for discomfort and i had no soreness afterwards. I‚Äôll be back next week.

I've unfortunately needed physical therapy several times in the past 14 years due to a accident I was in. Physiotherapy works never failed me. They are professional, they explain everything to you about your specific problems. Put together a vigorous workout for what area you need and there is ALWAYS a difference after a few weeks of therapy. I highly recommend them if you are looking for a great small but complete physical therapy source.

I had a wonderful experience with Taylor during my pelvic floor physical therapy. She was very welcoming and made me feel comfortable right away. Taylor took the time to educate me and explain everything clearly, which really helped me understand how to strengthen my core properly. The techniques she taught me not only supported my pelvic floor recovery but also gave me noticeable relief from back pain. I truly appreciate her kindness, professionalism, and the amount of knowledge she shared with me throughout my sessions. Highly recommend her to anyone in need of pelvic floor therapy!

After two back surgeries and struggling with minor neuromuscular symptoms, I was nervous about exercising at the large gyms.  I needed to get back in shape, but I felt like trainers I went to didn‚Äôt understand building an exercise program for someone that had my issues.  I started coming to Physique Physical Therapy because I wanted to work with a trainer who was experienced with dealing with injuries and was willing to let me slowly build strength and balance.  It was one of the best decisions I‚Äôve ever made for my health. I‚Äôve gained muscle and I‚Äôm able to do exercises that I haven‚Äôt done in 15+ years (without getting hurt).  I feel healthy again and my neurological symptoms seem to have faded to minor hindrances.  I can‚Äôt thank them enough for giving me back my health and confidence.

I've been fortunate to work with Becky & Nico over the last two years, across three different referrals, and every time, they have been nothing short of exceptional. Their expertise, compassion, and dedication to my recovery have made a tremendous difference in my healing journey. Whether it's tailoring exercises to my needs or offering unwavering encouragement, Becky & Nico go above and beyond.
And I can‚Äôt forget Pam at the front desk‚Äîher warm welcomes, efficiency, and kindness make every visit seamless and stress-free. From scheduling appointments to answering questions with patience, she truly enhances the experience. If you're looking for a skilled and caring team that genuinely wants the best for their patients, I can't recommend them enough!

After giving birth I was having some abdomanal weakness and overall just wasn't feeling like myself. But working with Taylor completely changed that. From the very first session, she created a safe, supportive space where I felt seen, heard, and never judged. She didn‚Äôt just treat symptoms, she helped me understand what was happening and why, and gave me the tools to heal and feel normal again. I‚Äôm so grateful for her knowledge, kindness, and encouragement throughout my PT sessions.

Pelvic Floor Therapy with Taylor was so beneficial. I learned how to break years of bad habits and many ways to strengthen my pelvic floor and core. She is the easiest person to work with! So knowledgeable and very kind. I felt comfortable every step of the way. Go see her. You won‚Äôt regret it.

The staff at Pieces  Behavioral group are phenomenal. They have did wonders with my son we have been with them for about 2-3 years . I wanna say that Andres is a phenomenal RBT very compassionate never back down from any challenge my kid may have given him. I must say Andres has become part of my family he is awesome . I know that my son is in good and caring hands for sure ‚ÄºÔ∏è üòä

My daughter has been in the group since she was 2 and a half and it was very difficult for me, but thanks to Mrs.Farah,Mrs. Angie, Sarah and Selena I can say that my daughter is completely out of diapers. Thank you for always taking care of her skin since she has eczema and needs a lot of hydration. They always take time out of their days to put on her creams, brush her teeth and teach her personal skills. Thank you Hector and to all the RBT who work for the love of their profession and are very attentive to every need of their students.

Pieces Behavioral Group has been an absolute blessing for our family. Since starting services, my daughter has made amazing progress ‚Äî and a huge part of that is thanks to her incredible RBT, Ms. Sara M.

Ms. Sara has such a natural gift when it comes to working with children. She was patient, caring, and knew exactly how to support my daughter in a way that helped her grow. She made a real difference in helping with behavior, listening skills, and just building a strong, trusting connection.

One of the things that touched me most was how excited my daughter was every morning to see Ms. Sara ‚Äî and how hard it was to get her to leave in the afternoons! As a parent of a child with special needs, there‚Äôs no better feeling than knowing your child is truly happy, safe, and cared for.

We‚Äôre so thankful for Ms. Sara and the entire team at Pieces Behavioral Group. They‚Äôve had such a positive impact on our lives, and we‚Äôll always be grateful for the love and support they‚Äôve shown our daughter. Thank you!

Andres at Pieces Behavioral Group has been amazing with my niece. He‚Äôs patient, caring, and really dedicated to her progress. We‚Äôve seen real improvement in her communication and behavior since working with him. Grateful for the positive impact he‚Äôs made!

My daughter attends ABA therapy here and she has grown by leaps and bounds! The staff are friendly and knowledgeable, with Mr. Andres being exceptionally cheerful and helpful. We love the group and have been welcomed in like family!

I had an absolutely fantastic experience with Pinecrest Performance! I brought my wife for some therapy for her lower back From start to finish, their service was exceptional. What truly set them apart was the outstanding customer service provided by Richy. He went above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of my experience was smooth and hassle-free. Richy was extremely knowledgeable, patient, and genuinely cared about addressing my needs. It's rare to come across customer service like this, and it's clear that Pinecrest Performance values their clients. Highly recommend them for anyone looking for top-tier service and expertise!

Pinecrest Performance is definitely where you want to be. I am impressed with the customer service and care the whole team has. From the moment you walk in, June greets you with a smile, respect, and professionalism.  He knows the answers to all your questions and makes sure you are taken care of quickly. The vibe is positive and energetic. All the clients are welcoming as well. Everyone makes you feel like friends and family.
When you see Gabe Pardo, the incredible physical therapist, you see a big smile and are addressed by your name. He has a magical personal touch, literally and figuratively, that makes you feel great. He listens and caters his manual therapy and exercises to your particular pain/need. He creates a personal program and takes notes to best help you as you heal and reach your goals. He adjusts according to your needs.
There is a well-equipped gym at the facility which helps with strengthening and conditioning. Brandon is another PT there that assists with therapy as well as exercises. He watches you, corrects your form and explains the reasoning behind the why. Brandon is great. They all work amazingly together, supporting each other to help all of their clients get the attention and help they need. No wonder every client is happy and excited to go there.
I am blessed to have found Pinecrest Performance. The attention and expertise is hands down the BEST!

My rehab experience at Pinecrest Performance has been nothing short of excellent. Gabe Pardo, DPT, did an outstanding job of assessing my injury, which was totally different than what I thought was going on, and put together multiple plans of action for my recovery. With his expertise and that of his very helpful and friendly team, I have made steady progress. I would not hesitate to recommend them.

I came here in connection with a shoulder surgery. Gabe Pardo, DPT has been unbelievable. Even my surgeon who didn‚Äôt have a recommended his own P/T place has been impressed.

The staff here is very approachable and knowledgeable. I decided to stay for additional training last year and highly recommend this place for everything from healing a sports injury to optimizing your form and technique.

It‚Äôs important to note the owner, Ron, and many of the staff here have been here a long time and demonstrate a commitment to excellence every day.

Here are my top reasons for someone to come here:

1. You‚Äôve trained for years and can‚Äôt seem to make significant improvements.

2. You are coming back to training after rehab and are fearful of reinjuring yourself.

3. You or your children want to learn a healthy approach to working out for physique, health, etc‚Ä¶ without the risk of injury or ego driven decisions.

4. You don‚Äôt like retail gyms because you‚Äôre seeking professionalism and better attention.

5. You‚Äôre sick of working out at other places for any reason.

I came in with a shoulder pain that hasn‚Äôt gone away for months. It wouldn‚Äôt hurt during training, Olympic Weightlifting, but it would throughout day to day activities. After my first session, Gabe assessed I had muscle weakness and since performing the exercises he prescribed my pain has reduced dramatically. I also have had much more stability receiving the barbell overhead, would definitely recommend and looking forward to continuing the work toward being pain free.

Just finished PT at Pinecrest Physical Therapy and couldn‚Äôt be more grateful. Julian went above and beyond in my recovery, and Ali and Frank were amazing too. Everyone was friendly, professional, and supportive. I hope I never need PT again, but if I do, this is where I‚Äôm coming back!

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Nikki Perez and the entire team at this amazing facility. From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted with a clean, well organized, and welcoming environment that immediately puts you at ease. The facility is top notch, and you can tell they take pride in maintaining a professional and comfortable space for their patients. Nikki is an incredible physical therapist knowledgeable, attentive, and truly dedicated to helping her patients achieve the best results. She takes the time to understand your needs, explains everything clearly, and ensures you‚Äôre on the right path to recovery. The entire staff is just as wonderful. Friendly, helpful, and always willing to go the extra mile to make sure you‚Äôre comfortable and progressing in your therapy. If you‚Äôre looking for real results and a team that genuinely cares about your well being, I highly recommend Pinecrest Physical Therapy, Nikki Perez and the rest of the staff. They make the therapy process not only effective but also a positive experience!

Awesome team approach experience with Gabe, Blake Nick and the whole crew really. Professional outfit with therapists focused on your rapid improvement. I felt noticeable results in my ROM by the end of my second week and the improvement continues weekly. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for more. .

Nikki and her team at Pinecrest Physical Therapy are fantastic. A great experience for my rehab due to a knee injury.  Joseph and Miranda at the front desk were always on top of getting my appointments booked and the care and camaraderie of the team of PT‚Äôs throughout the facility was felt from my first day. What a wonderful experience.  This will be my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù if I am ever in need of PT again.  Thank you Nikki!  Amazing!

I‚Äôve had an excellent experience at Pincrest physical therapy. The faculty is clean and up to date and the staff has treated me great through the whole process. Julian and  Ali have been nothing short of amazing. They are very knowledgeable and have quickly helped me return to my career. Great vibes in this location. Highly recommend

I HIGHLY recommend Pick Flamingo Stables! If you care about the health, love, and care of the animals, this is the place for you. The horses are healthy, well groomed, and so responsive. Anyone who has spent time around horses will immediately pick up that their owners really put their hearts into them. Alicia and Kim are absolutely fantastic, professional, and fun! We did the 1 hour ride for 2 adult riders on our birthday, and it was so enjoyable. The pics don't do it justice. Come out and horse around!!! Thank you Alicia and Kim! üêéüåüüèá

I‚Äôve been riding at Pink Flamingo for just about a year, and my 4 year old daughter has been taking lessons for about 3 months now. For both adults and children, this is a real instructional school. The team makes sure everyone is always safe, comfortable, having fun and learning with each lesson and that‚Äôs what sets them apart. I‚Äôd be remiss if I didn‚Äôt mention that they do actually have unicorns at Pink Flamingo Stables!

It was my first time on a horse, from start to finish it was a great,seamless experience. Shiloh and Cinnabon were the most precious, gentle and kind horses EVER. I would rate this place a 12 out of 10.
Hands down I would do it again because of this memorable ANNIVERSARY experience. THANK YOU PINK FLAMINGO!

From the time we pulled in, to the time we left the experience was very pleasant! The staff greeted us as we exited the car and directed us where to go. The grounds are so clean, the horses are so beautiful and so well kept! It really just exceeded my expectations. We were a family of 5 and the kids loved it and so did we. It was my kiddos and husband's first time riding and they all felt really safe and confident with the staff  and horses! Highly recommend riding here. Thank you for an amazing experience while visiting Florida!!

Alicia and everyone at Pink Flamingo is so friendly and knowledgeable! My nephew enjoyed a ride on Princess Buttercup and it totally made his whole trip! Beautiful facility & awesome people-can't recommend it

Pivotal Achievements has been amazing for my child! The staff is caring, professional, and truly dedicated to helping kids grow. We‚Äôve seen great progress in communication and social skills, and the clean, structured environment makes it feel safe and welcoming. Highly recommend to any family looking for ABA therapy in Coral Springs!

My 4-year-old daughter has been attending Pivotal Achievements for a while now, and the progress she‚Äôs made is truly amazing! She went from making no eye contact at all to now looking us in the eyes and responding to her name. She‚Äôs also starting to say a few words and make some vocalizations! I highly recommend this place if you‚Äôre looking for quality ABA therapy for your child. You can really tell that Virginia and Alexie are passionate about what they do. My daughter is always so excited to go to her therapy sessions every day!

Amazing!!! We absolutely love Pivotal Achievements- ABA Therapy. The staff there is absolutely top notch. They are very knowledgeable and incredibly attentive to each child's needs. The director Virginia has been¬†amazing and incredible in communicating with us on our son Nico's therapy and his improvement. Everyone there has been incredible; Alexie, Catherine, Suan, all the therapists are incredible and any child will be lucky to have any of their¬†staff members as their therapist. We are beyond grateful for the program they have¬†in place for our son Nico and have seen such incredible improvement. He was eloping, not playing with other¬†children, amongst other things. He is no longer that child. It's like they have unlocked his mind and he is now a social butterfly, no longer elopes, and is able to participate in a group¬†environment and focus and stay on task. They are literally getting him ready for Kindergarten.¬† Funny thing is that since he is now a social butterfly they call him the mayor because¬†he greets everyone. hahaha.¬†Just within a couple of weeks of starting his program there, we saw a huge improvement.¬† We can't say enough good things about this place and the work they do there with these kids is remarkable.¬† We are beyond¬†blessed, very grateful, and appreciative of the Pivotal Achievement establishment and their incredible staff.

I can‚Äôt say enough about Pivotal Achievements and the growth my son has already experienced in 8 months since he's been attending. Virginia made the whole process such a breeze for me to sign him up and get approved. I‚Äôm thankful for her. Alexie has been an absolute master at giving my son new ways to communicate, along with his 1x1 therapists. The communication from all the therapists every single day is so refreshing. Everyone always has a smile on their face. In the beginning of this journey, I felt lost and didn‚Äôt know where to start and I‚Äôm so happy I found them. I would recommend this facility 100x over without hesitation. Best thing I could‚Äôve done for my son!

My son has grown so much in the short time he has been at Pivotal Achievements. You can tell how much Alexie and Virginia really care about the kids and they are extremely knowledgeable in their field. It makes you feel safe and comfortable knowing that they are developing treatment plans that are catered to your individual child. We have had previous experiences at other ABA facilities where my son hated going and seemed uncomfortable with some of the staff members. At Pivotal Achievements, he asks to go every day and he loves his ABA therapist Karina. I highly recommend Pivotal Achievements if you are looking for a center with people who truly care and want the best for your child.  I am so glad we found this place!

Beautiful facility. Nice stalls, good warm up ring with three show rings.... Wash racks at both end of the barns. There's a great trail around the South perimeter of the Equestrian Center although there's a house with three dogs that tend to run at the fence so watch out if you're on the trail back there (wish property owners who owned homes right on an equestrian trail would at least fence in their property so their dogs cannot throw themselves at the fence and terrorize horses that are regularly on the trail right next to their backyard).
Came here for an event, We have never ever witnessed something so unorganized, no time frames, no information on when riders will be, absolutely horrendous experience

Plantation Equestrian Center came through for us when the June storms took place, helped Happy Pony World therapeutic riding center and their 13 horses, and helped any way they were able.

Special thanks to Mayor Diane Veltri Bendeckovic and Jeff Cannon!

Yours Truly,

Happy Pony World
Horses states !!  Broward it's the nicest place in South Florida !!!
What a great park to visit & shop at every 3rd Sunday of the month. Quality people & a fun atmosphere!

We're immensely grateful for Play Pals in West Palm Beach; there's simply no other school that compares. The staff's expertise is astounding. It brings me peace knowing my child benefits from premier education and care provided by some of the kindest and most devoted professionals. Since joining Play Pals, our son's progress has been remarkable. Tailored therapy, personalized academics, and social engagement opportunities are all under one roof. We can't thank Play Pals enough.

This is the best preschool ever, producing happy kids and extra assistance for kids with developmental delays. Every day my two year old becomes more aware, communicative, social, happy, and makes better eye contact. My son has somewhat severe autism and the teachers and staff are literal angels in helping him. Best early intervention yet! So incredibly glad I put him in this school. He goes full time and gets expert one on one speech and occupational therapy in addition to the enriching and nurturing curriculum. Highly recommend! I suggest applying early to parents interested in having their child attend this school.

At the age of 3 my son first starting attending Palm Beach Speech Specialist and was diagnosed with speech apraxia. They recommended he attend Play Pals. We were so lucky to have this option. He has been there three days a week for 8 months, and he is so happy. Having the small class sizes and peer interaction in a safe environment has increased his confidence and brought both him and his parents so much joy and growth. It is neat to see the staff cater to each child and their individual needs. It is truly a special place.

My little boy loves going into this school. I was lucky to find this place for him. This is probably the best place that I could have found for him to start school at 3 years old.  All the staff is excellent! My little boy gets so excited every morning to go to school.

He‚Äôs been going there now for 3 months and I‚Äôve seen many improvements on him. He used to have separation anxiety and this was gone in 1-2 weeks. The staff takes so much care for him. He has language developmental delays and I can see a lot of improvement on him going everyday for half day. He started saying words and that makes me so Happy!

Thank you thank you thank you for everyone‚Ä¶ Alyssa, Morgan and Angelina are my angels‚Ä¶ along all the staff in there!

This is absolutely the best preschool around!! The environment is loving, professional, warm and inviting! My son runs in the door and can‚Äôt wait to see everyone. The curriculum is educational, yet play-based. I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Play Pals. It‚Äôs evident that the entire staff goes above and beyond to make sure each child reaches their full potential in a fun, happy environment!! We LOVE Play Pals..thank you, thank you!!

Summer is THE BEST. She is so creative. My daughter gets so excited when she comes over to do OT with her - she doesn‚Äôt even realize how much she is working. She is always doing new trainings to know the best techniques to help. She is so great at helping me understand how her brain is working and what we can be working on at home to help. We give her the highest recommendation and SO appreciate her.

Summer is a godsend! Seriously from the moment I met her I knew she was awesome! I didn't even know my kids could benefit from OT and then learning that Summer focused on incorporating primitive reflexes was an even cooler experience. My kids ADORE her and count down the days until they get to work with her. Summer truly has become someone I go to for so many things plainly because she is so likeminded and tells it like it is. 5 stars again and again!!!

I can‚Äôt say enough wonderful things about Ms. Summer!! She has been with my son for approximately a year and has shown an incredible level of skill, patience, and genuine care. She takes the time to truly listen, explain, and tailor therapy to my sons individual needs. Her encouragement has made the challenges feel achievable, and her compassion has made the journey so much easier. Summer feels like family! Truly an exceptional occupational therapist who goes above and beyond! She is in this field for all the right reasons! I could write a book! She‚Äôs irreplaceable! Our family is so thankful for you!

It's hard to find people who love what they do. She loves what she does and it shows in her work. She actually cares about her clients and goes above and beyond. We've seen a noticeable difference in our daughters after working with Summer. She will take care of you.

Summer is the epitome of being kind and meeting your child where they're at. She's always learning new techniques to to help your child. she has the most up-to-date training. she's able to handle the most spicy of children and isn't afraid of their quirks. I am thankful for her

Our two year old has been working with Playful Paths for the past 2 months and we‚Äôve seen an amazing improvement in his speech & language. Both Lauren and McKenzi have been wonderful to work with. We‚Äôre very happy with our experience and will continue to recommend Playful Paths Speech Therapy.

Lauren is truly unique in the world of speech therapy! She has been working with my sons, and the progress we‚Äôve seen has been nothing short of amazing. From day one, Lauren has shown incredible patience, knowledge, and genuine care for each of their individual needs. She creates a warm, engaging, and supportive environment that makes my kids look forward to their sessions, which is a huge win!

What really sets Lauren apart is how well she understands not just speech and language development, but how to connect with children on their level. She takes the time to get to know them, builds on their strengths, and tailors her approach to what works best for them. We've seen improvements in communication, confidence, and even social interactions thanks to her guidance.

As a parent, I couldn‚Äôt ask for a better therapist. Lauren is always professional, compassionate, and collaborative. She communicates clearly, keeps us informed, and celebrates every step of progress right alongside us. If you're looking for a speech therapist who goes above and beyond, Lauren is it. We are so thankful for her!
Playful Paths has been so amazing to our family. Lauren has worked with both of my boys. She is so knowledgeable, kind, and patient. The time she provides in service is the highest quality.

Lauren has been my son's therapist for a few years now and he has improved immensely under her care. His school and daycare have made comments about how much more vocal he has become. She has also provided me with materials to help him at home so that he can keep improving. She is very friendly and kind and very patient with him so he follows her directions well. She always makes her lessons fun for my son so he can keep focused. He is always happy to see her and sees her as a family  friend.

We had a great experience with Lauren for a speech eval, she was kind and patient with my four-year-old twins and offered very competitive rates. We ended up using a company that took our insurance but would certainly recommend Lauren based upon her eval, availability, professionalism and communication.
Dr. Pohlman is a wonderful physician.  He listens and answers all concerns. His staff is always helpful. Very pleased and consider Dr. Pohman has a top notch doctor.

8/20/25:
After posting my initial review, I was able to get a call and schedule not just one, but two injection procedures. Dr. Pohlman has been incredibly kind, attentive, and genuinely listened to my concerns. He‚Äôs actively helping me find the best path forward with my back issues, which I deeply appreciate.

I‚Äôve now visited both the Pompano and Delray offices, and each time I was pleasantly surprised by how smooth the communication and scheduling process was. At the Coral Springs office, Stef, one of the front desk assistants, has been consistently kind and communicative, which has made a huge difference in my experience.

I‚Äôm thankful that the communication issues I experienced before have been resolved, and I‚Äôm glad to now feel heard, respected, and properly cared for. Would definitely recommend Dr. Pohlman and the clinic for future treatment!

7/26/2025: My first visit at this place was nice, Dr. McGuire listened to my concerns, and I was told to schedule an injection procedure. However, it has been over a month since then, and I‚Äôve tried calling the clinic multiple times, left several voicemails, and even texted them with no response. They don‚Äôt respond to you, nor do they seem to care that a person is in need of a procedure to manage pain or improve their health. It‚Äôs extremely frustrating and disappointing to be completely ignored when you‚Äôre seeking medical help.

Had multiple appointments at the office was checking in by the front desk every time and was never informed I had a copay. Got a call saying they have send bills to my house (never received them) and am being threatened to be sent into collections. Woman on the phone was very rude and hung up while I was asking questions about the bill.
Wha a great place and a great Dr. I saw Dr Pohlman who was very kind and explained everything in detail about what could be done to help me. Staff was also great

Very knowledgeable Dr.
You can feel Safe with.
Great staff, they even watched
My service dog when I was having
A procedure.

Absolutely wonderful‚Ä¶
Sweet Dr. Mel & her awesome husband came to our home here in Kingsland, Georgia and gently guided our sweet 14 year old Alice bug over the rainbow bridge today. They came and treated us like family with warm hugs, and talked us through the process. Polly Tails is so warm and compassionate.
Alice‚Äôs passing was beautiful and dignified.
Thank you so much for guiding our sweet girl along today and being so supportive, and kind. I‚Äôd give them infinitive stars‚Ä¶ ‚≠êÔ∏è

Thank y‚Äôall so much
Love, The Cooney Family üåà‚ù§Ô∏èüêæ

Thank you for being so amazing, kind, and gentle. Dr. Mel explained every step and was very mindful of the kids with her explanations. She made them feel like a part of the process while at the same time letting them know it was okay to take a break and leave the room. The process was loving and very patient.  It take a special person to be able to go into the situation and help the grieving family  get through the hard part of saying goodbye.

After almost 10 years with my best friend, I had to make a really hard decision for my family's safety and I am blessed to have found Dr. Mel's service. In addition to my dog's occasional problems at home, he is also vet aggressive and dislikes injections and sedatives very much. I knew that going to the vets office would be an anxiety filled experience for him the whole way through and that it would be a miserable way for him to have to leave us. Dr Mel did amazing with him and was willing to trust in my experience with him. I wouldn't blame her for taking every precaution. Despite the precautions we did have to take and despite his typical behavior, she was able to work with us to make an exceedingly peaceful and sentimental final afternoon with our boy. He lulled to sleep beside us looking at a beautiful sunset in our front yard, his favorite place to be. Dr Mel is very kind and has a genuine passion for helping and I thank God that we chose her service for my family and my best friend. Thank you Dr Mel and James.

I can not say enough about this company!! Amy, helped us get started and was so kind and compassionate! Dr. Mel and her husband were absolutely amazing.  Dr. Mel walked us through every step and made this sad, heart wrenching process so much easier. They were so kind,  comforting, heart warming and loving.   I can't thank them enough. They treated us like family.  God put these wonderful people in our life and I'm so greatful!!!

We had the difficult decision on July 1st to have our 11 year old companion and best friend taken home. Dr Mel as hard as everything was made our pup comfortable in are home and made sure she was relaxed and comfortable in her last times.  I never realized how hard it could be but she made us and our pup feel loved.  I can't say enough good things about her.  I would personally like to thank you for everything you have done for my family and me in this hard time.  You are a true blessing.   God bless you and thank you for going out of your way to check on us.You are greatly appreciated. Sincerely David and Susanne

provider_name: Pompano Beach Sand and Spurs Equestrian Park
review_text: Pompano Beach Sand and Spurs Equestrian Park is such a calm and peaceful spot. Even though it‚Äôs privately owned, you can still visit, enjoy the horses, and take a relaxing walk. Horses are my favorite animal, and the welcoming owners make the experience even more enjoyable. Definitely worth checking out for a serene retreat!

provider_name: Pompano Beach Sand and Spurs Equestrian Park
review_text: The people at the ranch are the sweetest loving and caring set of people that you would wanna meet My clients from jones unique group home would visit every Thursday and always left happy let‚Äôs give up for SAND AND SPURS

provider_name: Pompano Beach Sand and Spurs Equestrian Park
review_text:
This park-barn has privately owned horses.
The owners take care of their own horses.
There are no trails . Good place to have lunch and
see horses for the public !

provider_name: Pompano Beach Sand and Spurs Equestrian Park
review_text: It's a great place. Pompano Beach City commission used to work together to keep this Park open and bring it back to where it was. For the pass conditions that did not notice it or bring it up like they should have shame on them hopefully we can straighten this mess take time go out there enjoy the horses.

provider_name: Pompano Beach Sand and Spurs Equestrian Park
review_text:
The park is a beautiful welcoming place to spend a few hours with your family or by yourself. The bathroom is clean and the grounds are well maintained by the City of Pompano Beach.
Miss Karen's Riding Academy is featured in photos giving technical riding lessons to children and adults. There are benches for sitting and lovely flowering plants to enjoy. The trees by the office are magnificent with a memorial which has the American flag flying in the gentle breezes. Several picnic tables are also sitting under the many large banyan trees near the office .
Take care to DRIVE NO MORE than FIVE MILES PER HOUR inside the gate so as not to upset the horses. MOTORCYCLES must park OUTSIDE the entrance gate by the Goodyear blimp base.
Feeding the horses apples or carrots should be approved by an owner or someone who has a horse at the park.

provider_name: Ponte Vedra Speech, Language, and Learning
review_text:
A Life-Changing Gift to Our Family!

Words cannot express the deep gratitude we have for Sonya Olsen, who has worked with our son for the past 2 years and helped him overcome childhood apraxia of speech. From the very beginning, Sonya brought not only unmatched expertise and dedication, but also warmth, patience, and encouragement when we needed it most.

Watching our son struggle to form words was heartbreaking, but Sonya gave us hope and a clear path forward. Through personalized strategies, consistent support, and tireless commitment, she helped our son find his voice‚Äîliterally. The transformation we have witnessed is nothing short of extraordinary. Today, our son speaks with confidence, clarity, and joy, and it is thanks to Sonya‚Äôs relentless belief in his potential.

She didn‚Äôt just treat our child‚ÄîSonya empowered our entire family. We always felt heard, supported, and guided through every step of the journey. If you‚Äôre looking for a speech therapist who is compassionate, skilled, and truly devoted to changing lives, look no further than Sonya Olsen.

We are forever grateful. Sonya, you will always hold a special place in our family‚Äôs story.

provider_name: Ponte Vedra Speech, Language, and Learning
review_text:
We have known Sonya for about 3 years now. We were so lucky to find Sony when she was working at another practice. She is a very caring professional who deeply believes in her work and is very experienced and among the best in her field. She is detail oriented and is an excellent observer in children behavior. Her accurate observation led to diagnosis of unrelated health problems in care of our son.
Our son loves working with Sonya and we have never had an issue with her or her office. She waited three months for our insurance authorization while having sessions with our son on a daily basis. Even after our suggestion to run the cost of the sessions through our credit card, she insisted on waiting for the insurance situation to clear. She helped us get familiar with multiple state programs, includid Step-Up Foundation.
I cannot say enough about Sonya and the support center that she has founded for children. If your child needs any support with speech therapy or occupational therapy, do not hesitate to visit Sonya and her practice.

provider_name: Ponte Vedra Speech, Language, and Learning
review_text: My older son has apraxia of speech while my younger has speech delays, we‚Äôve tried different therapists and no one has helped like the therapists in this practice. It seems like such a short amount of time for them to show such improvement! Sonya and Amy are angels along with everyone else there. Highly recommend! We love it hereüòä

provider_name: Ponte Vedra Speech, Language, and Learning
review_text: I inquired about an appointment and received a call from Sonya a few hours later. I can't say enough about Sonya. My son is only a month in and excelling in his speech! I am so grateful I started him on this journey, and I can not wait to see how far he will go!

provider_name: Ponte Vedra Speech, Language, and Learning
review_text: Highly disappointed in Sonya. She only cares about money. We had an INCOMPLETE speech exam (she is not neuroaffirming she does better with young toddlers 2-3 or neurotyoical kids)  and we had a thorough OT exam that went fine.  Front desk was poor. We waited months until they accepted our insurance and then they billed incorrectly and collected $800 and then are now saying they aren't even contracted with our insurance. As someone who used to manage a medical clinic there are a lot of red flags. Instead of re-billing Sonya told me to apply for a scholarship to help with funds... we have the scholarship that is besides the point this should have been 100% paid by insurance not my son's educational funds. I am following through with my complaint to the board and BBB. Also, do not recommend for autistic kids.. Lot's of other amazing OT and Speech clinics in the area. HIGHLY HIGHLY disappointed.

Instructors are excellent and attentive. Beautiful course to learn how to ride. Students learn all about caring for horses and they partake in each step of that. Highly recommend this place.üëçüëè‚ù§
Molly is an incredible trainer- patient, kind and always adapting to her rider. The facilities are excellent. Pony Paddock offers a family-like atmosphere for riders. Absolutely love this place.
It is a great place. Quiet and beautiful.   Great set up for lessons and training.

Molly did a wonderful job teaching our daughter horsemanship. The lessons that she provides extend far beyond riding. She reinforces responsibility, discipline and accountability with all of her students. Molly is extremely consistent with her expectations which is especially important with younger children. Our daughter is not only a better rider because of Molly but she also has more confidence and a broader skill set that she will continue to carry with her through life.
Love Molly's teaching style.  My daughter can't wait for her lesson each week.

I recently had a dental cleaning done for my dog, Joy, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the results! The procedure was quick and very professional. The unpleasant odor is completely gone, and all the tartar was removed thoroughly ‚Äî the difference is amazing.

It‚Äôs clear that the specialist has great expertise and a lot of experience. The prices are very reasonable as well. Joy is happy and feeling great ‚Äî I‚Äôm very satisfied and highly recommend this place! üê∂‚ú®
Victoria is amazing! I took my lion head rabbit for a grooming session and she took care of him in the most amazing way! We will definitely be back! üòä

Victoriia is amazing at her craft. She spent 4 hours with our ‚Äúnever been to a groomer‚Äù aussie.  She treated our Bailey with gentle hands and gave us helpful   grooming advice.  We absolutely recommend Posh Paws Parlor and  we will be returning customers.

Words cannot describe how happy I am with this place. First time and definitely won‚Äôt be the last. I‚Äôve been trying to find the right groomer for some time; I just moved to the area a few weeks ago, and I took a chance with this place for my baby. I‚Äôm definitely going to come back. Zephyr felt comfortable the moment we walked in - that‚Äôs all I needed to know she was in good hands. Thank you guys so much for welcoming her with open arms.

I brought my dog Lou to get groomed and couldn‚Äôt be happier with the experience! The groomer was incredibly kind, patient, and attentive to every detail.
