Dr. Haley and Dr. Logan have worked with both of my boys who are athletes. One had recent surgery and they were able to work with him to get him back on the field in a safe fashion - working with him on strength and balance not just focusing on the surgical area. They both have the knowledge, expertise, and love what they do! No doubt we will be using them for years to come. They also respond promptly through their app. Love love love Real Recovery!

10/10. The ladies are awesome and very professional and knowledgeable. Had a muscle injury 2 weeks out from a marathon. On a short notice, the team  diagnosed and treated the issue as I was able to get back to %100 in time for my race. I am extremely grateful. Thank you Dr. Haley & Nicole!!!!!

I have had tennis elbow for about 7 years. I had a cortisone shot, physical therapy, modifiers at the gym and nothing helped. I have had pain the entire time. Someone recommended giving Real Recovery a try to address the root cause of the injury.
I was cautiously optimistic about results. After evaluation and establishing a treatment plan with Dr. Haley I have experienced reduced pain each week. I continue to improve after each session and am working on strengthening my arm to prevent further injury.

Dr. Haley is thorough in her evaluation and treatment. Her team is always great when I go for treatment. You can tell it is an office and team that love helping people recover and heal.

I recently had a massage with Mel, and let me let you, her hands were blessed by the gods. She could turn water to wine with those bad boys. She found tightness and knots in muscles I didn‚Äôt know I had. If you don‚Äôt get a massage with Mel, you‚Äôre doing it wrong!

I cannot recommend Real Recovery and Dr. Haley enough. I was dealing with chronic SI dysfunction, or so I thought, for 2 years that began during pregnancy. I went to numerous PTs, chiropractors, and orthopedists with no lasting or even significant relief. I was thankfully referred to Dr. Haley and it‚Äôs been the best money I‚Äôve ever spent. She got me from daily pain to pain free within 6 weeks. She then helped me deal with chronic tension in my neck & shoulders that I‚Äôve struggled with my whole life. This in turn has treated my daily headaches and helped my overall posture. I‚Äôm back in the gym and feeling like a much better version of myself. If you‚Äôre questioning it, just go see her team. You will not regret it.

I love that I found this therapy center for my son.  Once I started the process for my son, he started therapy within a week.  They are very professional, friendly, caring and have great communication making appointments and reminding me of all appointments the day before. It is easy to reach them via phone and text message.  My son is always happy to come and I already see some improvements. Definitely recommend it for any therapy services.

I called by phone and they treated me excellently, but I found it strange that they did not give me an email to send the necessary documentation, but instead told me that I had to come in person. And thank goodness I went personally, because although it is not bad at all, I was surprised that the therapies are within a private Christian educational center and in fact they share a name, the center is Reborn Christian Academy.
I think they should inform callers of this information, because it can be uncomfortable.
I gave it two stars because the person who answered me on the phone was friendly.

I am extremely pleased with the service my son received at this center. Yamary and Natalia are very professional. I have seen 100% progress in my son. I recommend Reborn Therapy Center to all parents seeking help for their little angels.

Great front office staff! Very professional and friendly.
Joan PT was great. She was very knowledgeable and attentive to your PT needs
My experience was great with the entire visit there.  Thanks for the home PT app as well. Highly recommend this location for your needs

My Physical Therapist has been amazing and very patient with me while recovering from rotator cuff surgery.  I am already feeling like my recovery process is in the best care possible.  I would highly recommend Rebound Rehabilitation for your therapy needs.

I‚Äôm getting a good workout but not sure how much, if any,  my balance has improved (I have neuropathy in my feet).  My legs are certainly feeling stronger and I get around at home without my cane now‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs an improvement.  Although I‚Äôve finished PT I‚Äôm still doing many of the exercises at home.  Also, they are good people who worked with me.

Joan is wonderful and very attentive! She paid close attention to every detail and worked hard to get me back to the gym so I could resume my normal life activities. I highly recommend Rebound Rehabilitation at Point Meadows.

My therapist sat with me and discussed my needs. She laid out a plan and we stepped through it and received the plan for home. Each visit we visit changes in my shoulder. During each visit we add new exercises to help range of motion.
I have been very satisfied with my therapist and Rebound and would recommend it to anyone needing physical therapy.

Rebound has been great! I‚Äôve been going for two weeks and have noticed an improvement already! All of their PT‚Äôs have been super caring and supportive on helping me find exercises and stretches that work best for me.
The staff, especially my physical therapist, was wonder. The office was clean. What I am very happy about my appointment was they reminded me of my appointment both through text message and by phone.

I have had a fabulous experience at this location, but they do have many other locations to choose from as well.  The staff was very friendly and helpful with my physical therapy and overall recovery from my injuries.  My favorite parts were the side treatments of massage, dry needling, adjustments, and the heat and electrical stimulation.  I fully recommend the Riverside location!
These guys actually listen to your needs/issues while being both patient and courteous. Looking forward to our arranged sessions.
They are doing a great job by helping me with my pain, very nice and kind when you not feeling well and at your best, But I'm hopeful that I can be pain free I am going to take one day at a time.

The Staff at Rebound are absolutely fantastic!! They make sure everyone is comfortable & don‚Äôt push you too hard.Very knowledgeable about their work! They are a great bunch to work with !! Very Satisfied with my workouts!

So Far i have went 3 times. I like the Team so far, friendly and helpful. As of now with only 3 visits. I will give a partial review since you keep sending me emails for a survey/review. You should let the client get some Physical Therapy sessions in a few times then check back&  ask for a review!

I was referred to rebound rehab by another patient who had extremely good experience working with their physical therapist Neha.I am so glad I found them as I have been extremely happy with the services I have received from Neha at their
Phillips highway location. Neha always listens to my problems and tailors the exercise and physical therapy to meet my needs.Their location is easily accessible bright and clean. Neha Chelsea and all the staff working there are extremely helpful.I would recommend Rebound Rehab to anyone in need of Physical therapy.

The best experience i had ! This amazing team made me healthier. My mobility and flexibility grown and I am happy. High qualified team made this period easier. Beth Chelsea Layton and all ! Love you guys.

Very good employees, Excellency, very courteous. Kind intelligence we're willing to go to the distance to make the customers happy. And we appreciate what they do. They are the best.. I will always come back.Never mind, eat physical therapy.Cause I think they're one of the best injects of god

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this place. Every therapist is excellent. My doctor referred me and my mom here saying they were the best and she was absolutely right. The staff is outstanding. My mom worked with Pri  and my mom is working with Zach for her exercises. They‚Äôre both compassionate attentive and followed a routine that was encouraging and makes me want to continue. After 6 visits the results are noticeable and our quality of life is improving. Pt is never easy, but we always leave feeling better than when I came in.

The pt therapist has helped me so much . I have been 2 times the treatment was extremely useful,the therapist is extremely focused on helping me with my issues.
I highly recommend this place for people like myself that is battling pain.She has also sent me a video of what to do at home to help .
Im trying to stay away from pain pills and surgery .Give it a try I hope you receive the results that I have .
I have scheduled 12 appointments and plan on going to all to improve the pain..

Hitendra is Awesome!! very detailed with my rehab plan. He listened to my complaints and did a incredible job making sure I was comfortable with every exercise. Office staff was great too! I'm definitely happy that I was referred to them. Awesome experience hands down...

It makes you feel so good when every staff member greets you by name and is upbeat and positive. The therapists and office staff interact with each other and patients in a friendly manner creating a welcoming atmosphere at a time when you‚Äôre putting stress on your body!  The most important thing, though, is that the therapists were positive and paid attention to my exercises.  I felt seen and heard as a patient.  After a TKR and 12 weeks of PT, my knee feels 100% improved from when I started and I know what to do on my own now. Excellent experience!!

I‚Äôve been coming to Rebound for over 3 weeks and I feel I am finally starting to get stronger and finding that mind-body connection I have lost over time due to my back. I‚Äôm excited about the journey and getting to the point of no pain with their amazing assistance through exercises, but also help with stretching (post-session care). Most places I have been to rely on one or the other, not both which are essential. Also everyone is nice and helpful.

I was referred to RRPT by my insurance company for an old sports injury that hit aggravated again. Everyone there made me feel comfortable and welcomed from the receptionist, to all of the girls who train us, to the owner, and all were present and hands on to ensure I had a successful experience! Feeling better! Thank you to you all! Def would  come back if I need rehab was necessary for any injuries! And I got a sweet gym shirt on the way out!

I really enjoy the staff, they are fun and encouraging. The facility is clean and well maintained. They can always manage to work around my always changing schedule. I‚Äôm confident with the therapy I am receiving.
Very knowledgeable Therapists that helped me reach my goal of no pain. Art Collier and all the staff were very professional and also personable. I will use them again if I need PT.

Today was my first appt with Rebound Rehabilitation and I must say from the moment I walked in I was greeted with great energy. Everyone was kind . My therapy was very informative and helpful. I look forward to my next session. I appreciate the punctual and professional manner in how things were  handled as well.

Amazing place, I was in pain for the longest and in the first day of been there was unbelievable healing, people is very nice, I was assisted by different person every time with the same kind of professionalism and knowledge ,they are the best team I very pleased with service and I sure recommend 100%.
Reclamation center is a good place that provides many services, Miss Phara is a good person,very wise and kind,I like reclamation and all the employees.
Miss Phara is amazing! She‚Äôs professional, kind, patient with everyone, and truly passionate about what she does.
Phara is such a loving person. She's always there for me whenever I come to reclamation and reminds me how I'm enough and she taught me a lot in PSR group.

OUTSTANDING! I've NEVER had better services. The staff is so friendly and just nice and helpful. Dr. Dewar is by far the best psychiatrist I've ever worked with as a patient. I say work with because she goes above and beyond to make sure I'm feeling well. She actually talks to me and patiently listens. She cares! She has brought me back to life and I am so grateful to her for how she has gone out of her way to help me. The service I receive at the Reclamation Center has set a new bar for my other doctors and their staff, although I don't believe I will find the same professionalism and care anywhere else. I have met the owner Patricia Denis at the center and I see that she is hiring her staff to match her personality, which is genuinely nice and caring. I want to thank you all so much for helping me, I'm so grateful and feel blessed to have been recommended to your Center!! I wish I could give you more stars!
Elizabeth "Nicole" Smith.

The office staff was very informative helpful and friendly. I like how the arnp spent an ample amount of time with me and was very compassionate. I look forward to going there again and would definitely recommend this office location to others who are in need of psychiatric help.

provider_name: Recovery Unplugged Florida Drug & Alcohol Rehab Fort Lauderdale
review_text:
I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Recovery Unplugged!!! My stay there,
Especially at PHP , was amazing! I want to give a shout out to all the techs,  especially Kyle and John ,the OM Tyler Diaz, and the Alumni team for being there for me for all my needs. They really do care about their clients and their recovery!!! I would recommend RU to anyone who needs help with addiction!!! Thank you so much! You are amazing!!

provider_name: Recovery Unplugged Florida Drug & Alcohol Rehab Fort Lauderdale
review_text:
I cannot say enough about my experience with Recovery Unplugged PHP and the incredible Alumni coordinators, Tonya, Mitch, and Cowboy. From day one, they have gone above and beyond to make me feel supported, understood, and motivated in my recovery journey. Their compassion and dedication are unmatched. They don‚Äôt just show up for the job, they show up for us as people.

I am beyond grateful for all they do. The support, love, and accountability they provide make recovery feel possible, even on the hardest days. Thank you, Tonya, Mitch, and Cowboy
you are truly appreciated more than words can express.

provider_name: Recovery Unplugged Florida Drug & Alcohol Rehab Fort Lauderdale
review_text: Recovery Unplugged became my family when I moved to Fort Lauderdale and started their IOP program and they still are. Alumni coordinators Tonya, Mitch, and Cowboy are people I now call my friends and would be there for me with no questions asked. They also put on the best alumni events which I attend monthly. This program was a blessing!! Most of the staff are great and also in recovery! Highly recommend Recovery Unplugged to anyone searching for help!

provider_name: Recovery Unplugged Florida Drug & Alcohol Rehab Fort Lauderdale
review_text:
I stayed at Recovery Unplugged and had a truly life-changing experience. From the moment I arrived, I felt supported and safe. The staff were not only professional, but also genuinely compassionate‚Äîthey really care about the people they‚Äôre helping.

The groups were meaningful, the structure was exactly what I needed, and the environment helped me focus on my recovery without outside distractions. LOVE MY RU family!

provider_name: Recovery Unplugged Florida Drug & Alcohol Rehab Fort Lauderdale
review_text: From the moment I walked in, I felt respected and cared for. The therapists, medical team, and support staff were all well‚Äëtrained, knowledgeable, and genuinely invested in my recovery. They didn‚Äôt just go through the motions‚Äîthey listened to me and tailored care to my background, including my mental health needs.

I would like to thank this amazing woman for taking time out of her busy schedule to work with me today. I have been experiencing frustration after surgery due to the lack of progress with my current rehabilitation. Our meeting today involved an in-depth discussion of the challenges and setbacks I have been experiencing. She designed a customized plan to help me get back on track, one that I can seamlessly transition into my daily life.
For anyone seeking an outstanding physical therapist you can find her here.

Marissa was very informative about the recovery process she will have me follow as well as the severity of the injury. She even took extra time to care for the sports I enjoy and how I can get back to the as quickly as possible. I will highly recommend her company and services to other athletes and anyone who experiences an injury looking for personal care.

I worked with Freddie and Marissa recovering from a partial ACL tear and my experience was top notch from the start. They help me get moving again and range of motion back then progressed me onto strength training quicker than i ever would have thought possible. Now i am feeling strong and confident in spite of my injury, i highly recommend Freddie and Marissa!

Highly recommend Marissa at Redemption! I suffered a lower back injury while training and visited Marissa for help. She was able to provide dry needling & scraping to improve blood flow and reduce discomfort, along with mobility and glute activation exercises to address my hip pain and promote symmetry. It has been two weeks and I am already back on the training floor and still going thru the PT exercises to maintain!!
Thanks for being amazing and giving me the confidence and ability to move, pain-free!

Todd

Marissa was awesome, she was super informative and knowledgeable. She helped me identify specific issues with my knee and helped me build a plan to get it back to where I need it to be to be able to compete again. I highly recommend her services!
A safe place full of love ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

I had the pleasure of meeting Deb Mouw in person yesterday for the first time after several virtual sessions. I visited her office at Reflections Creative Therapy Group in Boynton Beach, and I was truly impressed by the quality of service and the environment. The space is beautifully designed and thoughtfully arranged to make clients feel comfortable and at ease. The variety of methods they use really helps open up the conversation in a gentle and welcoming way. I felt completely at ease talking with Deb and appreciated how comfortable the entire experience was. This is truly one of the best therapeutic experiences I‚Äôve had. Highly recommend!
* Deb, you are truly fantastic! I feel so blessed to have you in my life.
Sincerely,
Sam

Thankful we have Maria at Reflections.Maria has given our family member confidence to be a happy teenager.From our first meeting we felt we were in good hands. Her warmth, compassion and availability for a quick call is outstanding.She has taught us exercises and breathing techniques to overcome daily challenges like anger , and sadness .We now see confidence as well  as healthy eating and sleeping habits in our teen.They are now back to honor roll grades and good relationships with their peers.
With Maria on your team your can be sure your family will reach their goals and we couldn't be more impressed with our experience.

During my first session with Deborah, she demonstrated a deep understanding of me and genuine care. She made me feel comfortable right away and her calm demeanor created a space where I could share openly. I‚Äôm excited to continue this process with Deb.

Highly recommended! I will return with a full review, but I just wanted to park this here because WOW! The breakthroughs I‚Äôve had have simply transformed my mental health and my capacity for growth.

For the last 2,5 years my kids and I have been going through a nightmare of high conflict divorce. The kids experienced a serious emotional trauma. It was a blessing to find Ms. Patricia and her practice. I highly appreciate that Ms.Patricia accepted my kids and was taking care of them for the last 6 months. In fact, she was healing their emotional wounds. Ms. Patricia spent all the time needed to listen and provide help. She has a great, well equipped  practice and my kids love going to the sessions. I highly recommend her services and can not thank her enough for all her care and attention.

Wonderful place!
The entire staff is caring and knowledgeable.
I want to especially thank Kyle, for working with my child.
He took the time to connect and understand my child's needs. He is encouraging and genuinely compassionate about helping his patients improve.

I did physical therapy here a few months ago after spine and hip injections. The owner evaluated me and then I was given a physical therapist to work with twice a week at first and then once a week for a couple of months. The majority of the time that I was there I had Tamara who was extremely kind and professional, giving me exercises to do at home as well, along with printouts showing me duration and sets of each exercise, always answering my questions patiently. She gave me the tools to become stronger so I can carry out every day essential tasks with little to no pain.
I‚Äôve been to probably three or four physical therapy places in my area, if I should need physical therapy again in the future Regional Rehab is the place I will be going. Tamara is the bomb!
I have been going there off and on for serious rehab issues since 2011 They are amazing and cutting edge and attentive. I walk, use all 4 extremities, and talk thanks to them.

I have been to several physical therapist places  and this is by far the BEST!  Everyone is so friendly  and full of smiles  right down from the office  to the therapists etc.   I went in with lower back issues and  with  I am absolutely Amazed at how much better I feel. They even improved my balance issues!.  Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

Have had therapy on my shoulder for years. I believe the Lazer therapy provides relief and the staff is incredibly nice, and helpful. I see a lot of satisfied people in the waiting room. It is a very conservative way to treat injuries.

Thank you, Jonathan for helping me.  My therapy sessions have been extremely helpful.  Since starting with you, I‚Äôve been able to return back to my Zumba classes. I appreciate the time, care and attention to my quality of life functions.  God Bless!

My son had a hip strain and saw Dr. Jonathan for rehab and he was great. He is professional, friendly and gave us exercises to do at home to help in his recovery. I would highly recommend Dr. Jonathan.

I honestly cannot say enough about Jonathan! My initial meeting with him, he took his time to understand me as a person, my activity level, what my ‚Äúnormal‚Äù was, and then built a program specific to those needs. He continues to shift and adapt my programs in order to get me back to my 100% while making sure it‚Äôs done safely and effectively! He listens and ensures I‚Äôm being heard and then challenges me to continue making progress and for that I‚Äôm so grateful! It‚Äôs not every day you‚Äôll meet a PT who is willing to go the extra mile to ensure you get back to your best as soon as possible. He continues to go above and beyond to make sure I stay dancing and performing in my roles while continuing to make progress and heal from my injury! I would recommend him to anyone, especially athletes, looking for a physical therapist who will truly listen and guide you through the whole process!
Jonathan‚Äôs rehab program has been a great help! Within a few weeks I started feeling the improvements from his therapy! I strongly recommend The Rehab Spot!!

My 16 year old high school athlete was having hip & knee pain from an intense training schedule. We were referred to Jonathan for PT by the moov Lab, both which are located inside our fitness building, Xymogym. Jonathan was highly knowledgeable & thorough in creating a personalized plan to help my son. Through in person sessions & at home extension exercises, my son was back to himself sooner than expected. 10/10 recommend & we will definitely be going back, as I‚Äôm sure my son will need him sooner than later.
My husband, Fred has made significant improvement, since he started with Rehability.  The staff is great.  He will be starting another 12  sessions soon , and getting the referral.  5 stars.

Melissa Masons was outstanding in every way.  She was very professional and knowledgeable knowing exactly how to treat my back injury.  She was up front in explaining what she could do to treat my pain.  I was given exercises to do at home which helped me recover from my injury.  She went above and beyond to insure that after my session I was feeling better than before I came.  She is very talented at what she does and truly cares for my recovery.

I highly recommend Rehability Group for physical therapy.  The front office staff, Britney and Donna always greeted me with a smile and asked how I was feeling.  All of the staff was outstanding.

When we needed orthotics for a nagging foot issue, Rehability was highly recommended as the place to go. So we made the hour drive. Andrew did not disappoint! He is very knowledgeable and experienced. We are very happy with the orthotics he made for us and will definitely be back! And Donna was so helpful in scheduling us around our not so flexible schedules. Friendly service and expert care. I would definitely recommend Andrew and Rehability!

Had an 8am appointment today for some much needed knee braces for running. They had my size in stock and I was able to leave with my braces without having to schedule a follow-up appointment. This is a excellent spot for veterans to regain their active lifestyles.

Melissa Masone is really fantastic with setting up a program with exercises to help you getting back to normal way of doing things after surgery!  The staff greets you every day with a smile and ask how are you doing.  In the past, I have been sent to other places for therapy and was highly disappointed.  This is my second time with Rehability and Melissa, and they are the best.  I highly recommend them!!!

If you have back pain, you should go see Dr. Ross.  I like that no insurance is necessary so I can plan the number of visits based on my budget but I should be going more often.  The pressures and techniques he uses are priceless and provide extensive pain relief everytime I go.  This is not your typical PT, Dr. Ross is hands on using Manual techniques to provide relief and where necessary will recommend exercises you can do at home to help between visits.  This review has been a long time coming as I have been going to Dr. Ross well over a year.

Ross has been my Physical Therapist for many years. He has an amazing way of evaluating the strengths and weaknesses of the body to help deal with inflammation. I highly recommend you book a consultation session with him.

Dr. Ross is the real deal. I had excruciating back pain and Dr. Ross taught me how to manage my specific back issues with stretching and individualized expertise. He literally changed my life with his wisdom and medical
Knowledge of how the body is interconnected and how to make it better. Wholeheartedly recommend!!

A couple months ago, my husband went to see Dr. Price and got so much relief in his back. From not being able to move or get out of bed to being completely pain free and mobile the next day, Ross was the blessing we needed. So when I started to have issues and pain in my lower back, Dr. Price was the first person I thought of to go to for help! He was able to fit me into his busy schedule very quickly (same day actually) and provided relief and exercises to help rejuvenate and relieve the stiffness that I had in my back and entire right side of my body. Very thankful for his mission, talent and mindset and would highly recommend him to anyone that needs any sort of relief physically!

Hands down the best physical therapy I have experienced. Ross is the easiest person to talk to regarding your issues and develops the treatments that are necessary to get you moving again. To say I appreciate his care and professionalism is an understatement.
The manual approach, stretches, and exercises are the way to go. You won‚Äôt be disappointed! Thanks Ross.

This plaza is outside of where I live. It is alright nothing to get excited about.  The recently updated the building signage and it looks nice. I have lived here 13 years and know this is not a busy plaza. It has McDonald's , MS food store which is convenient, a beauty and nail salon. I used to go to beauty salon but it kept changing hands and after 2 horrible haircuts  I was done. It has a dentist that was ok. I think it has a State Farm and maybe a karate place? Not a very exciting place
Oh but the Resteraunt Firegrills has good food but I always forget about it as it's in back .This place needs better signage at the entrance and from the road. I never knew there was a farmers market, again no sign but I will have to check it out sometime.
Beautiful Townhomes beautiful homes condominiums are great recreational area a nice place to bring up a family very secure very well manicured a nice place to reside beautiful winding roads!
Corner store great Joey did not miss a beat knew people's names orders n was pleasant n felt appreciated by visitors....
They need to get rid of McDonald's,  absolutely the worst micky D's on the planet. Only time I would eat here is at 4am......when they are closed !
Low-key neighborhood mall. Got M&S food Store and McDonald's as OGs in that place

I attended a wellness pop-up with Dr. Luc, and he was incredibly engaging and attentive. He gave me helpful advice for my strained calf and even did some scraping and massage, which felt great. I really appreciated the genuine care he showed in helping me, even knowing we might not see each other again.

I was introduced to this group at a wellness event, where they were giving out introductory sessions. From the beginning, it was obvious that they are extremely good at what they do. Dr. Luc was able to help me tackle the tightness in my traps (which is a consistent issue for me) with a combination of cupping, massage, and stretching. The cupping was a smart system, which I had never seen before, and the combination of the three techniques left me feeling rejuvenated and pain/tightness free. I look forward to going and visiting them in-office soon!
I went in with some neck discomfort and left feeling brand new. The massage was exactly what I needed. Very professional and attentive. Highly recommend!

Met Dr. O at A wellness event in Fort Lauderdale. He took the time to get to know me and my pain points. Then he proceeded to provide me with a targeted and very thorough therapeutic experience. I felt instant relief and will definitely consider going back again! Thank you, Dr. O!

I came to Dr. Luc Riche after six months of severe back, hip, and leg pain that left me unable to walk, work, cycle, or take care of my son. Other doctors and therapists hadn‚Äôt helped, but after my very first session with Dr. Luc, the numbness and vibration in my leg disappeared.
Within two weeks I was back to working 12-hour shifts as a nurse, and within three weeks I was cycling again. After about eight sessions, I felt am fully functional!
Dr. Luc is patient, professional, and truly gifted at what he does. He gave me my life back, and I‚Äôm beyond grateful. Highly recommend!

I want to shout out all of the techs at remedy, I highly recommend this place to anyone looking to get clean and stay clean. The techs are amazing & super helpful thank you to Cesar, Andrew, Mike, Queen, Tina, Leo, Victoria and Malecia!! These people have helped me change my way of thinking and given me the advice & encouragement I needed to change my life. Overall just a great detox/rehab.

So, I feel like my review should really hold some weight, since I've been to treatment centers all over the country. If you REALLY want to get clean and sober, this place is the oneüôèüèº The staff is phenomenal, from the director Cindy, to the counseling staff (Lexi is the best) to the behavioral techs (give Leo a raise) they are ALL willing to help you ANY WAY they can seriously. So if you've made up your mind that you want to change your life, come hereüôèüèº

I wanted to show my gratitude and appreciation for Josh from Remedy. He made such a huge impact on me during my stay with Remedy. Josh always went way above and beyond, so personable and made me feel so welcome. Always with a smile. His vast wealth of knowledge and information has been indispensable for my recovery. Thank you guys from helping change my life for the better.

When I first got here I did not want to stay at all. After about 1 hour of trying to get me to stay i decided to stay. That was the best decision I could have made. This place is great. The staff here is the  best staff I came across. I been in at least 7 treatment centers before. This place by far has the best staff. From the techs all the way up to the best clinical director. Every body cares about you here and makes sure you are comfortable. Spoil alert they also have a great swimming pool. My therapist  set me up so well for the next  chapther of my life. So if you are looking for a great treatment center to go to. I recommend you come here.  Every staff member here treated me so well. You will see what I what I'm am talking about when you get here. The clinical team is awesome üëå.  Josh is the best he keeps you busy and is serious about recovery and alway smiling.  Mrs Cindy has to be clinical director of the year. I could go on on for hours.  Give it shot you will not regret it.

This is hands-down, the best treatment facility in the area and the credit goes to the staff staff here is incredible. One of the staff members Josh who always seem to be busy doing so much around there always had time to see how everyone was doing individually. He even went out of his way so that we could get a guitar at the facility, which was so awesome because music helps me so much my recovery. It might seem minor, but it‚Äôs small things like that  That makes the biggest difference. If you were someone that‚Äôs is looking for help. I would recommend this place over anywhere in South Florida and it‚Äôs because of the staff,especially Josh. Thanks to everyone at Remedy Therapy

This office  has an amazing team. Everyone I interacted with was kind, patient, and professional. They explained everything clearly and truthfully, and treated me with so much patience and respect. I truly appreciate the care and support from the entire office.

Best ABA agency in town! I can recommend this place with my eyes closed. Both the therapists and staff are extremely knowledgeable and professional. Very professional, they take care of the clients as well as their parents. Very reliable people.

They are amazing! One of my family members has been going here for a few months and her learning improvement has been outstanding! There are no words for how marvelous the work that they are doing is.

Renewal Rehabilitation exceeded all my expectations. After shoulder surgery, I worked with Issac, Nicole, and Mike‚Äîeach of them was knowledgeable, professional, and truly supportive throughout my recovery.

They created a focused, effective plan that helped me regain strength and mobility much faster than I expected. The facility is clean, welcoming, and runs smoothly thanks to a great team.

I‚Äôm so grateful for their care and highly recommend them to anyone needing rehab!

Renewal Rehabilitation is incredible!  Nicole, Mike and Stelios are all very dedicated to helping you in a kind, professional and respectful manner. Their expertise on knowing what therapy/exercises will help your particular issue is amazing.  I had a partial tear in my rotator cup and a partial tear in my bicep.
My orthopedic sent me to Renewal Rehabilitation prior to any surgery.  When I started, I was in such pain I was waking up every 2 hours.  After my rehab at Renewal Rehabilitation, I am almost pain free and even cancelled my surgery.
From the minute you walk in the first time, everyone makes you feel very comfortable.  They are always checking to make sure you are good.  I highly recommend Renewal Rehabilitation!

Wonderful group of therapists! Such a fun environment where you become friends with other patients while working your butt off. Nicole, Mike and Stelios sincerely want to make you stronger and get you back to your normal life. I couldn‚Äôt recommend them more!

These guys are great people and know what they are doing.  Their work with him sped up his recovery after knee surgery. Unlike other PT experiences he has had, he always looked forward to going in to Renewal.

The staff are first rate- knowledgeable, professional and inspiring. Mike, Nicole and Stelios are patient, encouraging and instill confidence. I‚Äôm stronger and pain free thanks to their expertise. I‚Äôve been to 4-5 physical therapy practices in the past. These folks are the best! Thanks Renewal!

I had an absolutely wonderful experience today! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism. Renewed Wellness provided life changing information regarding my health. I am forever grateful for this wonderful experience and can‚Äôt wait to start this wellness journey. Drs. Karina and Joseph Taylor were exceptional, informative and most importantly excited to begin this journey with me. You can tell they truly care about their patients!!

This has been a great and rewarding experience for me. I had the amazing opportunity to learn more about health and wellness while discovering my healthcare goals. The customer service was very outgoing, motivated and informative as a whole. Thanks for a positive outcome.

I am truly thankful to have been referred to Renewed Wellness! Dr. Joseph Taylor, Dr. Karina Taylor, Dr. Isabella Borras and their entire staff are tremendously professional, knowledgeable, courteous, caring, and seriously committed to each patient's total health and overall well-being! Through consistent advertising I decided to investigate this company so I could RENEW my health and reduce inches to areas on my body.
