The PRICE raised my eyebrows, BUT the 6 week time frame and SALE helped me make the decision to officially sign up. They do offer in house financing for those who want to keep half the costs in your bank like myself (accumulating 3.8% savings). My program starts tomorrow on June 21, 2025. I will keep you all posted. I do recommend that you check out their services.

I had the pleasure of seeing Deanna for pelvic floor therapy after experiencing postpartum issues, and I cannot recommend her enough. From the moment I walked into her office, she made me feel comfortable and heard. She took the time to thoroughly assess my concerns and explain everything in a way that was easy to understand.

Deanna‚Äôs approach is both professional and compassionate. She tailored my treatment plan to my specific needs, and I appreciated how she made sure I felt supported throughout the process. Not only did she help address the physical symptoms I was experiencing, but she also provided valuable education on how to take care of my pelvic health moving forward.

The progress I‚Äôve made since working with Deanna has been incredible. I feel so much stronger, and my confidence in my body has returned. If you're dealing with postpartum pelvic floor issues, Deanna is the person you want to see. She‚Äôs knowledgeable, caring, and truly dedicated to helping her patients heal.

I am so happy I have found Deanna and Restorative Solutions! I have dealt with pelvic pain and low back pain since having kids, and I have struggled to find relief. Deanna expertly provides the tools and education necessary to help with these conditions, and she is kind and puts you at ease. Highly recommend!

Thank you so much for helping me overcome my pelvic pain post having my kids. Very grateful to feel like myself again and be back to my activities without annoying symptoms. Such a warm, inviting clinic and great team!

I highly recommend Deanna for perimenopausal and healthy aging support. Her drive and passion to ensure people live their best lives is admirable! She's a well of knowledge and gentle in how she addresses others.
If you're looking for some awesome pelvic health services, I highly recommend Restorative Solutions! Deanna is amazing and will help you to reach all of your goals!

Grateful to Kylie and Restorative Speech Services.  Noticeable results in a few sessions.  Remediation of speech issues. My daughter sounds great now and we‚Äôre very thankful. Natalia is a superb therapist.  They know their stuff

Kylie and Carolyn have been absolutely amazing to my daughter and my family. From working around our schedules, to making sure my daughter gets the therapy and time she needs, it has truly been a pleasure working with them. My daughter‚Äôs speech has improved so much and she‚Äôs just starting to learn how to read as well. It has been a blessing working with this amazing duo!

This place is amazing! My son's speech and fine motor skills have improved significantly thanks to the incredible support from their speech therapist and occupational therapist. The staff is so friendly, attentive, and genuinely caring. I couldn‚Äôt be more pleased with the services we‚Äôve received. Highly recommend!

Our little one did so well with Ms Kelsey, she is amazing and is very patient. We had a positive overall experience and would highly recommend using Restorative Speech Services! Also, they had knowledge of working with the AAC device we use everyday.

My son just graduated from speech therapy and we had an amazing experience. Kylie and Heather are both wonderful, caring, and knowledgeable speech therapists. They are both easy to reach with any questions or help you may need and so supportive with sending additional resources for my son to practice with. They truly care about their patients. Highly recommend this practice!

The clinic offers exceptional service, standing out for the professional and friendly care provided by its doctors and staff. From the moment you walk in, you can feel a welcoming and well-organized environment that inspires confidence in patients.
One of the most notable aspects is the cleanliness and organization throughout the facility. The waiting room is spacious, allowing patients to feel comfortable while they wait. Additionally, the restrooms are spotless, demonstrating the clinic‚Äôs commitment to hygiene and patient well being.
The staff is highly trained and dedicated to providing quality care, ensuring that every patient receives the attention and information they need. The clinic‚Äôs organization also helps keep waiting times reasonable, which enhances the overall experience.
This clinic is an excellent choice for those seeking reliable healthcare in a clean and well-managed environment. The combination of great service, well-maintained facilities, and an efficient medical team makes it highly recommended.

From the time that I made the appointment to the time I arrived, checked in and saw a provider didn‚Äôt take long at all. The assistant took my vitals, reason of my visit and came back with the swaps right the way. Waited about 15 minutes or so for the results and the ARNP open the door and gave the results and told me what I needed to do. However she stayed by the door and did not do an assessment on me despite of given my history prior. She missed to check my ears and lymph nodes to see if I have any infection. I forgot to ask to do it and I remembered on my way back home since I was not feeling well I didn‚Äôt go back . As provider and regardless she failed on doing an assessment which is basic.

The woman at the front desk was so amazing!!
She treated me with so much kindness and help. She does an amazing job of answering all your questions! She‚Äôs so nice and polite. She was very patient with me and my concerns. I was in a lot of pain and she was very quick and efficient. My doctor was very straightforward which I liked because she didn‚Äôt keep me there long which was great. She addressed my concerns and got me in and out with no problems. She did a great job! received my medicine and a great experience with this urgent care. I know where to go next time!

The staff was courteous and service was timely, but the follow-up was severely lacking. After a fall, I got an X-ray of my leg, and the on-duty physician provided an immediate interpretation. However, my primary care doctor also requested a copy. Despite multiple calls and messages over five days, I‚Äôve received no response or the requested X-ray. This poor follow-through is unacceptable.

I had a great experience at this location. They are quick and efficient and we‚Äôre on time with the appointment. The staff was very nice and courteous. I hope to never see you again but if I have to, I will definitely go here lol

This place was God-send to me! I had not been able to eat or drink anything for 3 days after waking up with sharp pain in my throat on Friday morning. It was impossible for me to even swallow water, open my mouth wide or even speak clearly. My right lymph node was swollen‚Ä¶. I was concerned about dehydration and was given the impression that my issues were viral. I called Restore Hyper wellness on Sunday morning; they were able to get me in. Everyone was caring and genuinely seemed concerned. I saw an NP virtually who cleared me for treatment but also strongly advised me to get a second opinion. The nurse who started my IV was clearly an ER nurse‚Ä¶she used the flashlight of her phone to look into my mouth. She also recommended that I get checked out because my symptoms were in line with a peritonsilar abscess. I received a liter of fluids with Zinc, Vitamin C and Toradol, which helped tremendously with the pain and swelling. I immediately felt less fatigued, and I was able to eat and drink pain free when I got home. I thank God for leading me to this place!
Anastasia is amazing!  It was great to stop in today.  She is the reason why I‚Äôm renewing my membership and starting back up.  I‚Äôm excited to come back.
Great experience! The RN who took care of me was amazing! Super genuine, made the process easy, and she was a golfer!

The staff here is not only professional but extremely friendly! They make you feel as if you‚Äôve know them forever. They got me ready for my last bodybuilding show! The recovery time was amazingly fast. Thank you all so much!!

Multiple areas to review. Sadly the encounter is had with the girl at the desk weighs so heavily i have to remove a few stars. The initial welcoming was great. The nursing staff in the back-stellar! The pricing-eh. It seems almost like a pyramid scheme. While other places have a straight price per IV bag, this has a more confusing and "membership" level pricing. When asked about the pricing the younger blonde girl got very "valley girl/woke" acting. She is NOT suited for the front desk. I stated such and was leaving. The manager (i assume. She never introduced herself) got off a call and asked the others to leave the desk. She and I spoke and she agreed the other staff didnt handle things or speak properly. Anyway, $700 later, I feel trapped in a pyramid scheme.

Tried out Restore Hyper Wellness in Pembroke for the first time and had a great experience. The space is super clean, modern, and calming. The check-in process was smooth and the staff was really friendly and helpful. Isabella walked me through everything and made sure I felt comfortable the entire time, which I really appreciated.

I tried the compression boots and red light therapy, and both were amazing. The compression felt great on my legs, especially after a long day, and the red light session was surprisingly relaxing. It gave off a nice gentle warmth without being too intense. I left feeling refreshed and recharged. Definitely recommend this place if you're looking to add something new to your wellness routine or just want a quick reset.

I didn't ever know this place existed! Great for recovery and wellness. I am the head of a cycling club that enjoys endurance riding, and this is our new pre and post ride spot for performance and recovery!

I‚Äôve only been here twice, and I can‚Äôt say enough about how inviting and well-organized it is. The facility is impeccably clean and exudes a welcoming, family-oriented energy. Whether you‚Äôre there to recover or just reset, there‚Äôs something for everyone.

The team here is extremely informative and passionate about their effective services. Isabella went through all the options with me in detail, explaining how each therapy works and what benefits I could expect. Vincent, the manager, personally welcomed me. That level of thoughtful, personable care just makes the whole experience feel like a community.

As someone who works out regularly, I can especially see how integrating these services‚Äîlike starting with compression or IV drip after a tough session‚Äîcould greatly enhance recovery. But honestly, whether you‚Äôre an athlete, dealing with fatigue, or just aiming to improve your health, I believe you‚Äôd find these offerings beneficial.

This place is absolutely a must-visit! The upper management (Steven) was on site, personally overseeing everything, and he even adjusted the TV for my 5-month-old so I could fully relax during my IV drip. Juan customized my IV to support my autoimmune condition, and it was exactly what I needed‚Äîso refreshing! Fabiana checked in often to make sure I was comfortable‚Äîsuch a sweetheart. And Kristen gave me the most incredible HydraFacial‚Äîtruly life-changing! Her hands were made for this. I‚Äôm definitely signing up for her packages. I‚Äôll be back for sure and will be recommending this spot to all my friends!

The place is very clean with a friendly staff. Their LED light therapy is legit. The leg compression really helped after my long run. You will feel rejuvenated after your session at Restore Hyper Wellness! Highly Recommend!

provider_name: Retirement Home for Horses Inc Alachua Fla
review_text: This place is AMAZING!   If you like horses, then this is the place for you. Free parking and free admission.  It gets crowded quickly, so be sure to arrive when they open at 11 because there's so much to see and a lot of ground to cover. Don't forget to bring lots of carrots and apples and bananas. Each horse has a name and a story. There are also some resident cats. Morris is awesome! Bring along sunscreen and a hat and wear comfortable shoes. They do sell carrots for a donation but will accept $$ donations. They have other items for sale to raise funds such as t-shirts and jewelry; great souvenirs! These horses are so lucky to have such a wonderful place to live out the rest of their years. This place is definitely worth a visit.

provider_name: Retirement Home for Horses Inc Alachua Fla
review_text:
This was THE MOST therapeutic, beautiful, happiest place on earth. When we first arrived, we were asked if we‚Äôve ever been to this property before. We said no & the kindest gentleman informed us about ALL the amazing services they do for these beautiful horses; what to feed them, which ones cannot be fed, the volunteer work, the learning opportunities for UF students, the passion behind opening this, and more. We arrived there about 15 minutes after opening their doors & it was already packed!
Tips: plan ahead! Bring carrots, apples and bananas. Wear clothes toes shoes (a lot of acres to walk), bring sunblock, water & of course a camera! Bring cash to make donations. Enjoy yourself and take your time! They do close at 3:00 PM though.
This was such an amazing experience I had on my vacation & would absolutely love to go back

provider_name: Retirement Home for Horses Inc Alachua Fla
review_text: This is such a nice place. It‚Äôs definitely sad when you read some of the horses‚Äô backstories but then you feel good when you see how well they are taken care of here. Be sure to save some carrots and apples for the horses toward the end of the loop.

provider_name: Retirement Home for Horses Inc Alachua Fla
review_text: Absolutely amazing! Bring your own apples, carrots, and bananas so you can feed the lovely horses. There‚Äôs plenty of horses and the staff is super friendly. This is a great activity to do with kids, family, and friends. The horses are very well taken care of and have a beautiful energy. Come with plenty of time so you can explore the huge area. Will come again.

provider_name: Retirement Home for Horses Inc Alachua Fla
review_text: This is great. We will be back. It was very therapeutic.  The horses are large and small. The volunteers were so informative and helpful. You must check this place out. We took apples, bananas and carrots. Some horses you can feed and some you not. Some you cannot give carrots. We did not know horses eat bananas.  They loved them.

My husband was just released today after 2 weeks of intensive therapy. This is the third rehabilitation hospital we have used in Jacksonville, and by far, this is the best! The CEO Curtis Whetzel has created a culture of service among the staff and everybody is ready to help with the best attitude. The physician Dr. Maninder Sethi is excellent and on top of the patients' needs. The therapy staff is the BEST! Thanks to Mattie (PT), Elyse (OT) and Kasey (SP) for all the hours spent with my husband. Thanks to the nurse Al and the supervisor Ranita for all your help.
Overall this was a very good experience. We wholeheartedly recommend this rehabilitation center

The Reunion Rehabilitation Hospital of Jacksonville, Florida is a great place to receive medical treatment and physical therapy while transitioning between hospital and home.

This facility is clean, the food is good and the environment is restful and very pleasant. The administration, therapist and medical care team developed a plan catered to my specific needs to ensure I made a speedy recovery.

My many thanks to all staff members employed at the Reunion Rehabilitation Hospital with special thanks to nurses, Sharmel, Kristina, Emma, Kim, and therapist Brian and Beth.

They went over and beyond their normal routine to provide me with the best possible care. All the while wearing a smile showing much compassion, respect and with heartfelt empathy. They are truly an asset to your organization. Because of this, they deserve open recognition and a possible raise.
Ann Donaldson

I have been to the other well known Rehabilitation centers here in Jacksonville Florida and I must say Reunion Rehabilitation Hospital is the best by far.. Curtis the CEO has put together a dynamic team and atmosphere here, I must commend him on his leadership at Reunion.  Brian in dietary does an excellent job in food preparation and presentation I can't praise him enough. The therapy team is top notch, not only do they lead you through exercises, but explain why your doing them and the muscle group your addressing to speed your recovery. They inspire you everyday to be the best you can be, not only do they make each session productive but also enjoyable so you look forward to therapy.  Beth my Occupational Therapist has been a blessing and always makes our sessions enjoyable (LRC) , Kasey my Speach Therapist, keeps me on track, Liz my Physical Therapist and Izzy my #1 go to guy, he is always in motion and is a great motivator, have all been a motivation to my recovery and my goal to walk on my own again, I can't thank them enough from the bottom of my heart. Liz in particular has been a blessing in trying to help me reach my goal, she is my Super Star, caring and compassionate, she goes over and beyond and has exceeded all of my expectations in my recovery.  Brooke, Tina and my entire Nursing staff, CeCe and all the CNAs that have been caring for me and have been more than I could have ever dreamed of, from administration of medication, to keeping me comfortable, they are all a bright spot to my days here. The Doctors, Doctor Chalhoub, Doctor Stilwell, Latoya and Doctor Young especially are wonderful and very knowledgeable in managing my many medical needs, along with my NP Latoya, she is a bright p
Spot in my day. They listen to and address my all of my concerns.  I will certainly miss them after my time here is complete. Jermila in Respiratory has made my breathing issues almost nonexistent since my admission, she always has a smile on her face that brightens the room.  My Case Manager has kept me informed of my progress and discharge date. She has helped me plan for my discharge and my future care. I can't say enough good things about Reunion Rehabilitation Hospital and the entire staff from Management, to the Medical, Therapists, CNAs and the Environmental Staff. I would recommend Reunion to anyone needing In House Rehabilitation with excellent Medical Care.. I'm sure I have left someone out but everyone on the Reunion team has my deepest thanks... Enclosed are photos of one of the gym areas and typical meals here.

The level of care and attention my dad has received at Reunion is exceptional. The doctors, nurses, therapists, nurse assistants, and staff are gold. While no one wants to be in rehab, the people here have made it a positive experience  not only for my dad but for me as well. I rest well at night knowing the quality of care given to my dad. I extend my appreciation to each and every person I‚Äôve met here.

just got discharged yesterday and all the nurses and staff were stellar and nice and knew me by name. Liz and Elise were both great pt and ot respectively. they were so joyful and knew how to put a smile on my face every day they came in. i was able to walk out on my own by the time i was done with my time here

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Jose and Revibe. From the very first session, I felt genuinely welcomed and supported. He has a warm, friendly presence that immediately puts you at ease, and his compassion is evident in everything he does. You can tell they truly care‚Äînot just about your progress, but about you as a whole person. Every session feels thoughtful and tailored to what I need in that moment, and I always walk away feeling lighter, clearer, and more empowered. I feel lucky to be working with them and would recommend them without hesitation to anyone looking for meaningful, supportive therapy.

I can‚Äôt recommend Jose enough. From our very first session, I felt an immediate sense of trust, safety, and support. His approach to therapy is both compassionate and insightful, offering the perfect balance of listening and guidance.
I have tried conventional therapy over the years and I did not find them helpful for me. I was tired of just talking, I wanted something different for me. I came across Revibe therapy during my research. Initially I was skeptical, but I was ready to try anything to help me with my anxiety, depression and resentment. Hypnotherapy has turned out to be one of the most transformative therapy I have ever encountered. Under Jose‚Äôs guidance, I was able to tap into-deep seated patterns and began to release blocks I didn‚Äôt even fully realized.
Each session left me with a greater sense of clarity , calmness and  confidence. This has been a life-changing experience for me.

My experience with Revibe Therapy has been amazing. Dealing with stress and anxiety is not something that everybody can manage on their own. At first I had my doubt about to start the therapy but now has been  around three months and I feel like a new person. It‚Äôs very peaceful to feel that you are in the right track. Thank you Jose and I‚Äôll really recommend this type of therapy for people who are dealing with anxiety and don‚Äôt understand how? Or why?. Thank you again Revibe Therapy!!!!

The best results you can wish for. I struggle with the hush hush urge and the silly idea that every woman enjoys extended horse riding lessons. I‚Äôm trying to drop the organ rearranging internal bruising life of 25 years in the hm hm business. I learned that with the right woman in my life, all will connect together nicely.

As a holistic health coach, I‚Äôve explored countless healing modalities, but nothing has compared to the profound shifts I experienced through hypnotherapy with Revibe. From the very first session with Jose De La Cruz, I felt deeply supported, safe, and guided toward uncovering subconscious patterns that had been holding me back.

What truly set this experience apart was the way hypnotherapy seamlessly integrated with my existing wellness practices. It allowed me to bypass the conscious mind‚Äôs resistance and tap into a deep well of inner wisdom, facilitating breakthroughs that traditional methods never quite reached. I released emotional weight I had carried for years, rewired limiting beliefs, and emerged with a sense of clarity, confidence, and peace that felt completely organic and lasting.

The results were nothing short of immeasurable. Not only did I notice shifts in my mindset and emotional well-being, but my physical body responded as well‚Äîbetter sleep, reduced stress, and an overall sense of balance. I now recommend hypnotherapy to my clients as a powerful complement to their healing journeys.

If you‚Äôre considering hypnotherapy, I wholeheartedly encourage you to take the leap. It‚Äôs an investment in yourself that will ripple into every area of your life. Healing is possible, and this work is truly life-changing.

Honestly, Dr Hannah at REVIVE physiotherapy has shifted the way I view Care. It‚Äôs made me a more proactive athlete, focusing on making sure my muscles and body are ready for whatever I wanna be doing. I‚Äôm so grateful for meeting this team. My body and mind are so much more confident because of it. She‚Äôs helped me through numerous injuries, but also is a great preventative care option. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for a personalized and customized plan for you.

Hannah was absolutely fantastic! I had been dealing with elbow pain for a long time and Hannah knew exactly what the issue was and how to treat it. Before doing the needle therapy she explained to me how it works and how my body would react to it, which I loved. The needle therapy was absolutely painless and actually felt kind of cool. Her office was clean and neat. Very nice equipment. And the friendliest staff I‚Äôve ever met. I would highly recommend Revive Physiotherapy to anyone!

Highly recommend Revive Physiotherapy whether you‚Äôre dealing with chronic pain, a new injury, or wanting to address/improve your overall health and wellness. Brian is so thorough and professional with taking time for his assessment to really get to the root of the problem before diving into treatment. There is a focus on individualized treatment here which is unmatched compared to other clinics and rehab gyms in south Florida. 10/10 recommend Brian and Hannah at Revive for all physio needs!

I have had 3 surgeries on the same shoulder throughout the years. Most recently, August 2024 and February 2025.  I went to the run of the mill physical therapy places out in town, as well as the VA as I used to be in the military.  Even after all of this, my range of motion was still very poor until May of this year when I started seeing Brian.

After seven sessions with him, I‚Äôm coming around and making great progress.  I‚Äôm actually able to ride my motocross bike again at the track which is a huge plus!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this place and Brian‚Äôs knowledge.  If you‚Äôre second-guessing yourself or on the edge, just try it.  The sessions are very patient focused and he knows what he‚Äôs talking about.  Dry needling, cupping, etc

Thumbs up!  Highly recommend!

I really can‚Äôt say enough good things about Revive. A few months ago I injured both shoulders doing behind-the-head military press and was experiencing a lot of pain and limited mobility.

Since then I‚Äôve had the opportunity to work with all three PTs at Revive and every one of them has been excellent.

Hannah figured out what was going on right away, started me on dry needling, and gave me PT exercises to do a few times a week. I noticed major improvement within a couple of weeks.

Brian built on that by designing an advanced shoulder workout for me. He also explained the difference between ‚Äúgood pain‚Äù and ‚Äúbad pain‚Äù which was a major turning point for me. I had been too cautious out of fear of re-injury but he helped me push through in the right way.

Erika is also extremely skilled. She‚Äôs an expert in dry needling and explains everything very clearly. She took the time to help me understand what was happening at an anatomical level and also how to maintain and build on the improvement I‚Äôve made so far.

I‚Äôm very grateful to this team and can‚Äôt recommend them highly enough.

I am so thankful for Revive Rehab! I have never had any migraine relief with other therapies or medications I have tried. With Andrew, one of the therapists, I actually have some relief! I look forward to my appointments with Revive Rehab!

I arrived to the practice with pain and limited movement. Three months later I am 90 percent better. I love the one on one therapy and learning to help myself dtay well. I highly recommend this practice.

I am so grateful for Darly and her wonderful staff. I have multiple physical issues including scoliosis and have experienced relief from this practice that I was unable to get through medication, massage or chiropractic care. I have also been relieved of some psychic pain as trauma lives on in the body.  Highly recommend a visit.

Darly has helped save my career and body! I‚Äôm a massage therapist who needs hyper focused and detailed work and that‚Äôs exactly what I get when I come in. I was in extreme pain and can‚Äôt imagine my life with out the help of Darly! Highly recommend, and if I could give 100 stars, I would!
Every treatment from Tara is a great experience. I have less pain and numbness is going away. I look forward to my session all the time. Thanks Tara and revive staff.

Truly wonderful massage!!! This was my first time to Reviving Waters, and I feel incredible! Kathy has an undeniable talent for massage therapy. She is especially talented at finding tight areas, relieving tension, and restoring balance. This is all in addition to her beautiful spirit, clean and relaxing studio, and The noticeable effort she puts into making sure you feel comfortable, cared for, and rejuvenated. I recommend Kathy 100%! You will not be disappointed!

Kathy has hands down been the best massage therapist I‚Äôve ever been to. She really listens to what is bothering you and accommodates each session specifically for you. I have seen her multiple times now and I am always impressed and walk out feeling 10x better. She‚Äôs also a genuinely sweet person with great professionalism and I‚Äôm so grateful I found her.

First and foremost Kathy is amazing at her profession!!! She has magic hands. I was very nervous to get a deep tissue massage and Kathy put me right at ease. Kathy is such a sweet person easy to talk with. You feel like you‚Äôre old friends.
She‚Äôs very professional, hears everything you tell her about your condition. Where it hurts the most. I highly recommend you call and book an appointment. I refer her to everyone that needs a massage. Whether it‚Äôs a deep tissue or just need a relaxing one. She‚Äôs your girl!! üíï
Sally

Kathy is awesome! The set up is very relaxing and quiet in a nice small space, which I prefer over some big office with lots of people around . She makes you feel right at home and is very fun to talk to. She is very intuitive and knows right where the muscle knots are! She will also ask and take note of problem spots.  After you are all done, she will even pray over you. Kathy was meant to heal and she is gifted. Going to her was one of the best decisions I've ever made for my health and well being ü•∞

Kathy is So good that we drove from West Virginia to Ormond Beach to get a massage when our final destination in Florida is hours away. Don‚Äôt miss an opportunity for her amazing hands and her amazing prayers. She will help your body soul and spirit. She is anointed.  I had a hot stone massage
And my friend had a deep tissue. Both were extraordinary as usual

I can‚Äôt recommend Revolution Dog Training enough.
Erica, Bri, and the rest of the team have been amazing with my dog, Spencer. He did their 10-day board and train, and the difference it made was huge. He had some reactivity‚Äîespecially around golf carts and people moving quickly‚Äîand their work really helped me manage those moments and his anxiety. Our evening walks are so much more relaxed now.

He‚Äôs also, more generally well-rounded. His recall is super reliable, and he seems happier and more confident overall. I‚Äôve continued boarding him with them when I travel because I know he‚Äôs in good hands and actually enjoys being there.

It‚Äôs clear they care a lot about the dogs they work with, and I‚Äôm really grateful for everything they‚Äôve done for Spencer.

I have been working with and using the services from Revolution Dog Training since August of 2024. I have utilized every single offering they have, 10 day Board and Train, Pack Walks, Private Lessons, Day Boarding and Board and Tunes. Erica, Luke and Bri are all amazing. Neptune, my now year and half old Great Dane, and I have worked with all of them and found them all to be absolute professionals who were able to educate the both of us to be better. Luke has been our constant, Neptune did his initial 10 day B&T with Luke. During his time with Luke he became a changed dog, the e-collar training was a game changer for me. When Neptune had some regression (the joys of an adolescent dog) Luke spent time during a Board and Tune to bring Neptune back up to speed on proper behaviors. The continued support of Pack Walks and Board & Tunes have been game changers for us.

Owners, please know that these trainings are just the beginning if you have a bull-headed dog like mine, we spend 2 hrs a day to continue building and reinforcing proper behaviors. The Pack Walks have been great for Neptune and I as an owner to continue refreshing our skills and working on proper socialization, so go to any and all you are able to!

I adopted a 14yo deaf and toothless 5.6lbs dog with stage 1 kidney disease. The first 3 months he was recovering from influenza. As he became healthier, he began displaying unhealthy behaviors. Demand barking, separation anxiety, and he had no clue what commands were.
I began looking for dog trainers that would work with him, of 7 companies only 2 said yes, of those 2 I selected Revolution. Erica is a GODESS! Seriously, we had my deaf and toothless elderly doggo learning! She even identified potential trauma responses and helped me navigate through those issues. In fact on the last training day, I was particularly stressed and she smoothly got us through some particularly difficult behavior hurdles!
So the thing I loved most is that her advice is customized to the needs of the dog and she teaches the humans to integrate the behaviors that correct the dogs and really truly helping humans be autonomous. If you are willing to put the work in, you will SEE results! There are massive changed in my Winston after in home training with Erica! She trained with me, took him to restaurants, we worked at different places, with different dogs, and different times of day!
Revolution and Erica are spectacular... we love her working dogs Aria and Poison Ivy!! Truly if you have that fur baby that is just difficult to train... or has disabilities like my Winston... Erica is a genius with dogs with disabilities... She problem solves on the spot and her experience is undeniable! The last training day she had Winston twirling for treats!  I just am overjoyed at the progress he's made and the gentle but firm guidance she gave BOTH of us. Believe me, you as the human have to be willing to put in the work- But the guidance from Erica is GOLD!

Erica and her team of trainers are amazing at what the can do in a short amount of time. It was a pleasure to deal with all of them. Our Roxi went to them as a Tasmanian devil and came back as an absolute different dog. She is a Belgian malinois x GSD very high energy and anxiety. They were able to calm her down and give was the tools to work with her and turn her into an amazing dog. Thank you so much and we will definitely be sending her back for more advanced training when the time comes.

We adopted a five-month-old mixed breed puppy (Conga) with a ton of energy. We always wanted to work with a trainer for general puppy obedience, but we quickly realized that we needed more help. She was tearing up our house and, more seriously, starting to act overly dominant and territorial towards our small senior dog. It got to the point where we could not have them in the same room together and she would even charge the baby gate that we had separating them. I didn't know if we were going to be able to keep her.

After a wonderful consultation with Erica, we decided to do a 7-day board and train with Luke and then follow up with 1:1 sessions. Luke was awesome to work with. He took Conga everywhere and she came back much improved - she was crate trained (she used to scream for 30 minutes if we put her in the crate, now she voluntarily goes in). She no longer chewed up our couch, or our base boards, or other furniture. She went from peeing and pooping in the house several times a day to only having one accident in the two weeks she has been back. And she is a dream to walk on the leash now.

After a day of having her back, Conga started to target our small senior dog again. We did one session in our home with Erica and it made a HUGE difference. That very day, they fell asleep on the couch together. Now we can have them loose in the same room together, in the back yard together, and they do love going on walks together. In fact, they are both sleeping next to me as I write this.

It's my responsibility to keep these good behaviors going and I feel confident in the knowledge that both Luke and Erica gave me. Conga just needed structure and to be shown that I set the boundaries and we can all still have fun that way. I am beyond grateful to Erica and Luke for helping me help her.

I went to Dr. Charlie for an impact knee injury I had gotten in BJJ and had had for 3 weeks; he got it better in one session of dry-needling and with some exercises he gave me! Before that, it seemed that the healing had plateaud. He had come highly recommended, and I 1,000% see why. I'm already back to rolling with no pain within 3 days of the session. I will definitely be going back for any injuries or as needed

I am a professional grappler and a MMA gym owner that needs my body to be at peak performance levels in order to perform at my job. Coach Charlie has kept in in a position to perform. Over the course of the last 4 years not only is my strength, mobility, and over athleticism dramatically improved, but many of the injuries I have suffered over the years are now corrected after our work together. Long story short, at 48 years old I feel better than ever and my regular sessions with Dr Charlie is the main reason why!!!

Shoulder pain ailed me for months when I was referred to Dr. Charlie. Desperate for relief I was willing to try anything. Dry needling was the answer and it was a game changer. It released the tension and I felt instantly better. Afterwards, Charlie led me through a series of specific exercises that targeted my problem area. He identified the issues and provided solutions. Over a week later with the implementation of daily exercises provided by Charlie, I am feeling remarkably better. Best of all, my shoulder mobility is almost back to normal. Dr. Charlie is a life saver!

Charlie was referred to me by my physician who knew I was seeking an out of the box approach to rehabilitation. I quickly learned that while Charlie has all of the knowledge of a traditional physical therapist, he tailored his approach to my level and needs, acting like a coach, trainer and PT all in one. Charlie pushes me physically and mentally toward a program that I would never have done without him, yet is sustainable at my gym. He is a great person and gives 100% to his clients. I recommend him to any client looking towards improved function, sport and fitness.

Charlie has truly changed my life and helped me get back to my older happy self. I hurt my knee after playing in college and couldn‚Äôt seem to get the weight off. I wasn‚Äôt able to play my sports anymore either so I was MISERABLE all around. I wasn‚Äôt given a good prognosis at 30 by some doctors but kept seekin an alternative opinion and found Charlie! I was willing to try ANYTHING and I‚Äôm so thankful I did! Charlie has worked with me, through ups and downs and been by my side the whole time. 70 lbs down and feelin better than I have in years. Please go see Charlie if you feel all hope is lost, HE WILL HELP!! Pics attached for proof of success!

From the moment you make the appointment, you already feel like you made the right decision. The staff is excellent and very welcoming. The doctor guides the experience in a very professional way, and at all times you feel safe. The doctor makes sure you get the most out of the experience, and you leave feeling renewed, more positive, and with more tools to deal with the problems you have now or those that come from your childhood. 100% recommended. It will change your life for the better!

I‚Äôve had such a wonderful experience here. The staff is incredibly friendly, quick to respond, and always so attentive. The rooms are spotless, cozy, and comfortable, which makes each session feel safe and relaxing. Dr. Silverstone immediately put me at ease - his calm and supportive presence makes a huge difference. Every session has been positive and meaningful, and I truly look forward to a long-term relationship with him and this practice.

Dr. Silverstone is the a absolut best!  The whole process from beginning to end is calming and comfortable. He and his staff are the most compassionate and attentive we have ever met.  I wish I could add more than 5 stars to this review.  Truly an impressive and top notch experience and facility.  I am beyond thankful to have found them.

Was very skeptical of trying Ketamine so I spoke to many places first.  Hands down best place out there and super informative and the treatment is working way beyond expectations.  Went from extreme struggle to felling better than I have in years.   Highly Recommend.

Hands down the best team.  There are not enough adjectives to describe the experience, the support, the love, the safety, the follow-through in care, the emotional support during and after. The doctor has found his calling with this practice. I found him at the lowest point of my life And today 100% I equate my success, mental health and well-being on my experience and treatments at REWIRED.  don‚Äôt wait any longer, don‚Äôt look anywhere else. If you are on this page, make an appointment and take back your life.

Dr Kristie Deblasio is a consummate professional. She knows her stuff. As a professional in the space I highly recommend her services. She‚Äôll shoot you straight and give you the tools you are looking for. Having worked with her in the past I can attest to her quality standards and reassuring presence.

Jonathan Rios, Licensed Psychotherapist, Jupiter FL

I've known Dr. Kristie DeBlasio for over a decade and have worked with her in a clinical setting. She is both knowledgeable and compassionate. She truly cares about her clients and doesn't hesitate to collaborate with family and/or other providers as necessary and appropriate. I highly recommend her for your mental health needs.

I am someone who is hesitant to open up about private mental health matters because of how it may be perceived by others. I must say, Dr. Holly LaSalle-Ricci is tremendous at making you feel comfortable and paying attention to the fine details that make you assured there is nothing to worry about. It is always a delight coming in to chat and discuss well-being. I know hearing the personal and over-dramatic intricacies that make life difficult to cope with, but Dr. Ricci maintains positive attitude while being firm. I definitely recommend.
Best psychologist and psychiatric team put together by incredibly competent and concerned women who really care about the welfare of their patients.
I would highly recommend Dr DeBlasio (and Sienna) to anyone who needs help or support. I am so grateful to have found them.

I‚Äôve been training at RIFT since Feb. - on the hybrid training program. The coaches are attentive and actually track progress‚Äîit‚Äôs not a cookie-cutter workout. Beyond the training, the extras set this place apart: the cold plunge, sauna and red light. The community is very supportive and motivating. If you‚Äôre searching for personal training, or a gym with recovery options - RIFT delivers faster results than anything I‚Äôve tried.

Never thought I‚Äôd say that my happy place would look like this but Rift is not just any other gym. The coaches, the vibe, the workouts, the equipment, it all makes it a genuinely awesome experience to come work out and recover. The hubby loves his sauna and cold plunge recovery time while I indulge in the massage chairs. Can‚Äôt say enough good things :)

Been working out here a while and doing personal training with Ben.  I absolutely love it and use the cold plunge and sauna daily after my workouts for the best recovery also.  Their hybrid membership is a no brainer to come with all of the recovery stuff.

Joining Rift Fitness Clearwater has been one of the best decisions I‚Äôve made for my health and wellness. My workouts have been going great, and I truly look forward to every session. The trainers are incredibly knowledgeable, supportive, and genuinely invested in helping you reach your goals. What really stands out is how individualized the workouts are‚Äîthey tailor each session to match your fitness level and personal goals, which makes a huge difference in progress and motivation.

The gym itself is amazing‚Äîclean, well-maintained, and stocked with top-notch equipment. The layout is smart, the atmosphere is positive, and it‚Äôs clear that every detail is designed to help you succeed. Since joining, I‚Äôve noticed a significant boost in both my mental health and overall energy levels. Rift Fitness isn‚Äôt just a gym‚Äîit‚Äôs a space that empowers you to show up as your best self. Highly recommend to anyone serious about improving their fitness and well-being.
Nice, clean gym with a spacious layout and high-end equipment. The access to amenities is a huge perk as well. We particularly enjoyed the outdoor cold plunge and sauna. Highly recommend!

Bill is really a talented and gifted body worker.  He says many issues are resolved in one session, and I believe it - my muscles and trigger points got VERY activated after a whiplash injury, and after one session, I am thanking my lucky stars for the injury - because it led me to find Bill.  He resolved most of my injury trigger points and found a whole lot more that I've been chronically accumulating for the past 25 years.  My muscles feel more relaxed than they have in YEARS... Do not hesitate, book a session with Bill.

Bill has been a lifesaver numerous times.  There simply needs to be many more with his knowledge and skills as an alternative to traditional health care.  If you are experiencing any number of neuromuscular and other related issues, please consider Rio Vista Wellness.  I am forever grateful.

Blown away, it‚Äôs safe to say‚Ä¶Bill is the truth!! If you want to stop going from therapist to therapist (like I was), searching for a solution to significantly alleviate your pain & regain the mobility you once had, Rio Vista Wellness Center will be your final stop‚Ä¶for sure!

Finding Bill has been life-changing for me. He is one of the most dedicated and profound individuals I've ever met. In this contemporary world where everybody is always in a rush, Bill really takes his time and focuses on you, your pain... and believe me, he can really listen to it, don't ask me how. He has magic hands, and so much wisdom and experience in them; they are full of patience, and is amazing how they can interpret what your muscles express without you even knowing about it, or understanding about it. He really works on some other level of knowledge, and even language, in regards to the neuromuscular field. I have no words to describe what is receiving a therapy from him. It's like nothing I've experienced before; there is so much beauty and respect in being so specific and detail-oriented. When I open that door, is the moment of healing, peace and communication with oneself. Entering into his space, is giving yourself a second chance. I'm extremely thankful for what he has done for me and my muscle pain. I'm in this journey of recovery one step at a time, and I feel so lucky to have him helping me out with perseverance, education and care. I really believe he goes beyond the "four walls" of medicine, and he enters into this realm full of individuality, where each person is different; therefore, each treatment is about you and only you. In every session, he reads you like a book, and he is able to find where the root of the problem is. He is then able to release, "squeezing out" everything that is trapped in your points that cause the pain, and every place else that is affected by it. His techniques are mesmerizing. He also sees the complexity of the body as a whole, and you can really get surprised about how things that seem disconnected, are really linked at the end. Everything is related, and that is an unbelievable discovery in the path of getting better. He also expands your healing by advising you on how to modify everyday habits that will lead you to a better care of your body. Thank you Bill for your incredible talent, professionalism and all the time you take with each of the people you help; and overall, for making that time, so valuable, rich and important for me. I'm infinitely thankful for all your lessons and all your healing. You are a very special human being. The work you do is simply poetic.

Bill is a GOD. Once you experience his bodywork services you will never want to go anywhere else, nor will you need to. He helped put my pelvis back into alignment which was causing severe debilitating pain. Thank you Bill. You are truly amazing!
Kristina is very caring and full of positive energy.

From the very first meeting, I was immediately comfortable receiving counsel from Delitra.  Her knowledge, sensitivity, empathy and intuitiveness makes it easy to not only open up, but to also receive guidance. Delitra is an exceptional counselor because she is a great listener. I've had other counselors, but I connected with Delitra because she truly heard me.  She gave me sound advice, based on my needs not some rote reply learned in school or pulled off some website.

I am thankful to have her working with me as I grow and heal.

Delitra Harrigan is a person of remarkable emotional intelligence and discernment. One of her most defining qualities I have the pleasure of consistently engaging her in is her natural ability to empathize with others on a deep and genuine level. She doesn‚Äôt simply hear what someone is saying ‚Äî she truly listens, creating a safe space where I always feel seen, understood, and valued. Her presence alone has a calming and reassuring effect, allowing me and others to open up without fear of judgment.

What sets her apart even further is her insightful perception. While many focus on the surface-level symptoms of a problem, Delitra has the rare ability to see beneath the layers, identifying the real root causes that often go unnoticed. This skill enables her to navigate complex situations with clarity and wisdom. Whether in personal relationships, work environments, or community settings, which I have the pleasure of seeing in person, Delitra consistently brings a perspective that fosters true resolution and lasting growth, rather than quick fixes.

Bjorn James is an excellent counselor and I highly, highly recommend him for your services! He is a great listener and is truly a genuine soul. He created a safe, supportive space where I felt heard and understood. His guidance has helped me gain new tools to manage my issues of concern. I appreciate his compassion, professionalism, and consistency, and I would highly recommend him to anyone seeking support.

Bijourn James is an excellent therapist! I‚Äôve had the privilege of receiving therapy services from Me James and I cannot say enough about his level of commitment and professionalism. Mr James is incredibly insightful and patient during therapy and asks the right questions to truly meet his client‚Äôs needs. What I especially admire about Mr. James is his ability to meet the patient where they are while developing cultural understanding and empathy for each client . I can honestly say each session with Me James was a refreshing learning experience, and I‚Äôd highly recommend for you to schedule a session with him as well!

Delitra‚Äôs  approach is deeply compassionate and holistic‚Äîshe not only supports people therapeutically but also spiritually, walking with them on their journey of healing. Her ultimate goal is to see people experience true liberation: emotionally, mentally, and spiritually.

What sets Delitra apart is her ability to connect with others in a way that fosters trust and safety. She listens without judgment, speaks with wisdom, and offers encouragement that uplifts.

Bruna is a terrific dog trainer. She started training our English Cream Golden Retriever when she was 5 months old. Molly responded to the training immediately.  She‚Äôs now 10 months old and is very well behaved.  She walks on the leash without pulling, comes when called and almost always listens to us. If she doesn‚Äôt, we tell her to go to her ‚Äúplace‚Äù and she stays there until we release her.  We recommend Rise K9 Dog Training without reservation.

Bruna is an amazing dog trainer, I'm so amazed on how she conducts the training with my Lilica (lhasa-apso), not only is my Lilica learning but also having fun while doing it. I've learned so many training techniques and love practicing them. I highly recommend her!! Looking forward for my next in-home session. :)

We reached out to Bruna after we adopted our second dog. Bringing him into our home was very stressful on our current dog. She has helped us so much with training both our dogs Doc and Ellie. She is professional and extremely easy to work with! We can not thank her enough for what she has done for us and our dogs.

Bruna was absolutely amazing with our rescue pup. She was very attentive during evaluation sessions and set a plan for us to reach all our goals! Whenever I have a question, she is very responsive to texts which is a huge help whenever I have training questions pop up between sessions. She took our energetic pup and guided me through training him every step of the way. Would highly recommend to anyone with a dog regardless if you are having behavioral issues or not!

Bruna is an incredible trainer. Not only did my puppy LOVE her, but she had great suggestion, strategies, and really helped me understand my lil furry family member. She gives great explanations to her suggestions and is very understanding. We have such a great puppy and a large part of it has been working with Rise K9 + Bruna!

I have been working with Eric, from Rising Calm Therapy for over a year now, and I cannot recommend him highly enough. From our very first session, I felt heard, understood and supported in a way that was both professional and compassionate.

Eric has been incredibly helpful in guiding me to manage my anxiety during the most stressful time of my life. Over the course of our work together, I‚Äôve learned many practical techniques for stress-management which have proved to be tremendously valuable.

In addition to the work we‚Äôve done around anxiety, he has helped me make remarkable progress in organizing my thoughts. Eric has taught me tools to break down overwhelming situations and regain clarity. This has allowed me to focus more effectively and feel less mentally scattered.

One of the most powerful aspects of our work together is that Eric has helped me reconnect with my faith and rediscover who I am in Christ. I‚Äôve been able to see myself through God‚Äôs eyes once again, which has been incredibly healing. The process has allowed me to rebuild self-worth and embrace the truth of my identity in Christ.

I feel that Eric has gone above and beyond in supporting me. His professionalism, empathy, and spiritual guidance,  have made all the difference in my journey. I am incredibly grateful for his help.

I have been working with Isabel from Rising Calm for 3 years. She has helped me navigate through difficult life changes and equipped me with the tools I need to move forward. She has been very patient, understanding, and supportive throughout the years and I am so grateful for her expertise. Rising Calm was a Godsend and I am so glad Eric has Isabel on his team.

I was seeking Life coaching and was so happy to come across Rising Calm. I was a little hesitant at first because I‚Äôm a spiritual person but not religious. Eric was very respectful of that and really helped me work through some fears, anxiety and had some amazing visualization exercises. What I achieved in 2 months has been incredible! Highly recommend Eric and his team.

Eric Gilbert has been a fantastic coach! He is never without a resource to offer and always leading me back to Jesus. I have developed as a husband, a father and as a human being. I am grateful that God has placed him in my life and I highly recommend him to anyone that is either lost or looking for the next steps in their season of life!

I started working with Eric Gilbert as my life in 2020, and I cannot recommend him highly enough. From the very first session, Eric‚Äôs compassion and understanding made me feel immediately comfortable. He leads with love, and it‚Äôs clear that he genuinely cares about your growth and well-being.

What stands out most is his openness. Eric shares insights about his own family and experiences, which creates a safe and relatable environment for you to open up about your own challenges. He has a way of making difficult conversations feel easy and non-judgmental.

Communication with Eric is seamless‚Äîhe‚Äôs always available when you need him, whether it‚Äôs for a quick check-in or a deeper conversation. He makes sure you feel heard and supported every step of the way. If you're looking for a life coach who combines spirituality, empathy, and availability, Eric is the one you want by your side.

My 7-year-old has been working with Ms. Patricia and we couldn‚Äôt be happier with the progress he has made! Her sessions are engaging, fun, and perfectly tailored to keep him motivated and learning. She has an incredible way of working with kids, making them feel comfortable while also helping them to improve. Ms. Patricia also provides helpful tips and strategies for at-home practice.  Highly recommend Ms. Patricia with Rising Communicators to any parent looking for an amazing speech therapist!

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Tara McDonnell and her team at Rising Lotus! As a trauma therapist, I‚Äôm very intentional about where I refer families, and she is always my first recommendation. She has a rare combination of warmth, skill, and deep experience that puts both kids and parents at ease. Her trauma-informed approach and EMDR training make such a difference for families navigating difficult experiences, and every single one I‚Äôve sent her way has had nothing but wonderful things to say. I feel so grateful to have her as a trusted colleague.

Tara and her team at Rising Lotus are incredible to collaborate with. As a school counselor, I can always trust in the referrals we make and know that our students and their families are in good hands. It is an amazing feeling to have people in the community you can partner with and trust our students with - it takes a village!

Tara and the staff at Rising Lotus have a keen sense of understanding, compassion, and commitment to their clients and families.  I have personally shared clients with her for several years, and she strives to maintain quality care and interdisciplinary teamwork. I would recommend her ten times over! If you are looking for the best, look no further!

Tara McDonnell has been one of the most compassionate, giving people I have ever met.  Her research and practice have added immeasurably to her natural openness and generosity.  I have long seen her success with adolescents, and as someone currently seeking support for mine, I appreciate that DBT (dialectical behavioral therapy) is available.  My teen is articulate and feels things intensely.  They need to talk about their sense of nonconformity, including their gender fluidity but also many other factors in their life.  My child works through problems the most effectively in conversation, and this is something Rising Lotus provides without judgment and with sensitivity and commitment.  Recommend!

Tara is an amazing therapist who genuinely cares! She is knowledgeable in helping her clients with mental health and social/ emotional health. She is trustworthy, empathetic, hard working and non judgmental. If you‚Äôre looking for a top notch therapy practice, I recommend Rising Lotus.

provider_name: River Mill Animal Hospital - Dr. Tammie Hodge
review_text:
Good veterinary care, but avoid purchasing prescriptions here

We‚Äôve had positive experiences with the veterinary care itself. However, I strongly advise against buying your pet‚Äôs prescriptions through this office. We were previously ordering through Chewy when the clinic called us directly, promising better pricing if we switched to their service. Unfortunately, their outsourced pharmacy was delayed, and in the meantime, they charged us for a partial supply of pills at a much higher per-pill rate when we picked them up at the clinic. The price for these pills was several times higher than what we usually pay.

When I inquired about the price difference, the delay, and why we were charged so much more for a reduced quantity, the staff simply stated that they charge different rates for pills picked up at the clinic versus those ordered through their pharmacy partner. There was no effort to address or resolve the issue.

Bottom line: while I don‚Äôt believe they intentionally misled us, they showed little concern for our situation and took no responsibility for the inconvenience. I recommend getting prescriptions elsewhere.

This was a 1 star customer experience but our other experiences were generally positive.

provider_name: River Mill Animal Hospital - Dr. Tammie Hodge
review_text: We took our special girl Delilah here this morning for a wellness visit as a new patient. We got the best service. All the staff were super friendly and very knowledgeable. They made recommendations and let us know that we could wait on testing if we wanted. Dr. Hodges was so friendly and informed us of the best options for our fur baby. We felt so welcomed as well.

provider_name: River Mill Animal Hospital - Dr. Tammie Hodge
review_text: one day in July when my baby was really sick and my regular vet was closed, I called to see if she could fit Sammy in.  Her office said yes and they were very welcoming. Her office is open most days, and I love how we can take our babies inside with us instead of having to wait in a bit car worrying about our munchkins.  Today we had his vaccines and physical.  As you walk in there's a cute sign showing all the names of our kids. Then she we went to a room they have a nice sign with your baby's name on it - what a sweet personal touch! Her staff is warm and congenial. She takes her time with all her patients. I especially enjoyed speaking with her about how she will fit in emergency patients  as she  knows that it's very difficult to get in to VEG or Blue Pearl This warmed my heart. She is truly a vet that cares about our precious babies. I'm so glad I met her and her staff and look forward to continuing my baby's care at her practice.  Dr. Hodge you're an amazing woman doing heartfelt things for us. Thank you for all you do.

provider_name: River Mill Animal Hospital - Dr. Tammie Hodge
review_text: Dr. Hodge is fantastic with my best friend.  I never feel rushed, she takes her time and explains everything that is going on.  I drive 30 minutes past 6 other Vets just to go to her.

provider_name: River Mill Animal Hospital - Dr. Tammie Hodge
review_text:
I am absolutely in shock how SWEET these professionals are.  My puppy had a pretty bad ear infection, he of coarse didn't present any major symptoms until late Friday night into Saturday.  I came upon opening time, to see if they would squeeze him in, and thankfully it worked out they were able too.  I have no regrets waiting to have him seen here.  They were so booked but still agreed to see him regardless, which speaks volumes to me.

Cain is a hyper puppy, and is not acclimated to "being still" yet, hopefully that will come.  But they were so good about handling and sweet.  Dr. Hodge is very thorough and shows great professionalism.

As far as price point, I'm not sure if pricing is competitive.  This is right across from me, so that alone is worth paying a little more than I might.  This place is also top quality.  Thank you River Mills

provider_name: Riverbend Equestrian Center - Horse Boarding Jupiter, FL
review_text: Riverbend is the best facility to board your horse not only the quality of the facilities is perfection but the quality of care your horse as well I‚Äôm so happy that my horse jet can call this place home and I can call this facility my happy place at my old barn I would have anxiety about the care of my horse and what was being done when I was not there but now that‚Äôs all in the past and that‚Äôs an amazing feeling Penny and all the other staff have been very welcoming and helpful! Andrea the barn owner I can‚Äôt thank her enough me being a dressage rider and them jumpers I was nervous about not having a trainer but she took the time to find me one before we made the move so I could we didn‚Äôt have to worry about training just tells you know how much they care and welcome all riding  disciplines Jet is the happiest and best looking he‚Äôs ever been and it can only get better!! So Riverbend 10 out of 10 on Quality and care for your horse!

provider_name: Riverbend Equestrian Center - Horse Boarding Jupiter, FL
review_text: Riverbend Equestrian Center is one of the greatest places I have ever boarded. They are very accommodating, knowledgeable and care deeply for the horses as if they are their own. Both Andrea, the owner, and Penny, the barn manager, are wonderful, kindhearted horsewomen who always put the horses safety and comfort first. They have gone above and beyond for me and my horse, even when they didn't have to. I travel a lot for work and I always knew he was in the best hands and care. The property and riding rings are beautifully manicured- fresh drag every morning, what a treat! The team that helps care for the horses makes sure to go the extra mile because they care about the horses. It's a special place and always a waiting list to join in the fun.

provider_name: Riverbend Equestrian Center - Horse Boarding Jupiter, FL
review_text:
I can't praise this barn and facility highly enough. It's truly top-notch, the cream of the crop in the area. The arena sets the standard, boasting impeccable footing. Plus, with its hurricane-proof barn and backup generator, Riverbend ensures the safety and security of all its equine residents year-round.

But it's not just about the facilities--it's the exceptional care and the fantastic team. From management to staff to trainers, everyone is outstanding. They go above and beyond to accommodate every request and treat every horse and animal as if they were their own. Riverbend fosters a warm, family-like atmosphere that welcomes all.

provider_name: Riverbend Equestrian Center - Horse Boarding Jupiter, FL
review_text: No review will ever do Riverbend Equestrian Center justice! I recently moved my horse here from Virginia, sight-unseen, and it‚Äôs the best decision I‚Äôve ever made. Andrea and the staff and boarders immediately took me in and became my family. I did my own care for my TB for almost all 10 years that I‚Äôve owned him, and after just 3 days I trusted them with him completely. Only a month in and he is happier, fatter, and feels better than ever! The ring is always drug and watered and he loves to hack out on the sandy roads through Jupiter Farms. Beautiful facility and beautiful people - I‚Äôll never move my horse again!

provider_name: Riverbend Equestrian Center - Horse Boarding Jupiter, FL
review_text: I could truly never say enough about this farm. Between the staff, and Andrea, Penny, Sonya and all the incredible boarders, it is such a positive and friendly environment. Everyone makes you feel like family. The ring is always dry and if it rains ( which it does like everyday) the arena is dried out Within a few hours. The stalls are always immaculate with fresh shavings every day, and Penny is the BEST at taking care of each horse, has them on the best food, and she has amazing skills to cure any horse! She does awesome red light therapy and I‚Äôve seen first hand it does incredible work. This is the only barn in the 14 years I‚Äôve boarded my horse that I can fully say that I can leave for months and not have to ever worry about my horse. They get turned out In their own separate paddocks and when they come in they get bathed, and any cuts or scrapes are always looked at an taken care of right away (like they are always looked at so closely!) ALSO 2 awesome things they recently just added which is so hard to find in florida is a Hurricane proof Barn Which Andreas barn can stand up to a cat 5 and it has fans in the walls of the barn that blow all the hot air out of the barn so it stays cooler in the hotter months. I highly recommend this barn to everyone and anyone who loves their horse!

Hands down, one of the best deep tissue massage I've ever had. Raul was amazing from his personality to his skillset, just an overall great experience! I spent a lot of time researching and looking up different massage therapists around Miami but settled on Raul due to his reviews and location. I am so glad that I did! You will have client for life! Will be referring everyone I know your way. Thank you for such a wonderful service!

Raul is built like a tank yet has the touch of a healer. At first, his gentle approach had me worried it might turn into one of those light, generic Swedish massages‚Äîbut once I asked for firmer pressure, he absolutely delivered. You can instantly tell the difference between a masseuse going through a template of strokes and one who truly understands the body.

I have scoliosis, which makes each side of my back completely different, and Raul immediately recognized the imbalances without me even needing to explain. He customized every technique and stroke to match what my body actually needed. He found and released tight spots I haven‚Äôt been able to get to with stretches or massage tools‚Äîespecially around the pec area.

That area can feel a little anxiety-inducing as a woman when a male therapist works on it, but Raul was respectful and professional. His focus was entirely on the work, and thanks to him, those stubborn knots are finally gone.

The only downside is I don‚Äôt live in Florida. I wish I can take a pocket size version of him back to California

I had some serious back pain that was holding me back from my daily activities, but Raul completely fixed me up. He‚Äôs professional, knowledgeable, and really took the time to understand my issues. Thanks to his treatment, I‚Äôm feeling so much stronger and pain-free. Highly recommend if you want real results and someone who truly cares

Raul is a blessing bestowed upon us from the heavens above. He actually cares about providing quality service. Before just laying me down he asked numerous questions about my pain point and what doctors have said. He took his time to actually listen to my concerns so he could provide me with the best service. He even recommended what he felt would be best for follow up. He took his time to discover the problem and the massage was more than amazing. Knowing how knots up I get he went deep in the tissue to release the tension without causing me more pain or discomfort. The ideal massage we‚Äôve all dreamed of is here. Thank you Raul. I will definitely be back.

I feel really lucky to have found Raul. I came in with lower back discomfort that I could not pinpoint. Not only was he able to work through it, but he was able to identify other areas of need in my body. I walked out feeling loose and relaxed. He is knowledgeable, respectful, and kind. I will be back and recommend him 100%!
It has made a big impact on me and my horses life, kind people, good horses, lovely barn. Horses are well taken care of, and the people thier are so kind!

Krista and her family are amazing,best ranch around for learning equestrian üêé . Unmatched,one on one personal training ,Really grateful for  the experience for my daughter to learn from the best . Fantastic pricing don't miss out.Robertson Ranch THANK YOU !!!
My horse just loves this farm. Haven't seen him this happy. Great people.
Great place especially for kids interested in horses.
We have been boarding at RR for a year and a half and love it here. Great care for my horse and wonderful, friendly people. They also provide lessons.

provider_name: Robin Best, CCC PA Speech Language Pathologist
review_text:
We‚Äôve had the absolute pleasure of working with Robin Best, a truly exceptional speech pathologist, for the past four months, and I cannot express enough how grateful we are for her. She has been working with our almost 3-year-old son, and the growth we‚Äôve seen in such a short time is nothing short of amazing.

Robin is elite at what she does‚Äîher passion for helping children communicate more confidently shines through in every session. She brings not only deep knowledge and expertise, but also an incredible warmth and energy that immediately puts both parents and children at ease.

Every week, she provides us with thoughtful, detailed progress updates and helpful tips for what we can do at home to support our son‚Äôs progress. Her communication is top-notch‚Äîshe makes us feel like true partners in the process, and that means the world to us.

What sets Robin apart is that she‚Äôs not just doing a job‚Äîshe‚Äôs fulfilling a calling. Her heart is fully in this work, and it shows. We truly believe she is a gift, and we feel so lucky to have her as part of our son‚Äôs early development journey.

If you are looking for someone who is knowledgeable, passionate, dedicated, and genuinely invested in your child‚Äôs success, Robin Best is the one. We can‚Äôt recommend her enough!!

provider_name: Robin Best, CCC PA Speech Language Pathologist
review_text:
Our son's speech pathologist Robin Best really lives up to her name, she is the absolute BEST in every way!  We were recommended to her by a family friend who insisted she is the only one who could get her son to talk.

She is a rare gem who does the job because she loves it and she genuinely cares about her clients and their progress.  She goes out of her way to connect with our son and constantly is buying and trying new things to keep him engaged and try to get him to speak.

She is also always willing to discuss anything you are concerned about and gets so excited at all of his progress, in and outside of her sessions.  She has worked with our son's difficult schedule and while she is always beyond professional, she really feels more like a member of our family with a very personal interest in our son's success.  If you need a speech pathologist for anything, look no further.  She is getting words out of our son that no one else can (even us) and we just love her!

provider_name: Robin Best, CCC PA Speech Language Pathologist
review_text: Ms. Robin is excellent! She is great with kids in that she builds adequate rapport, connects with them, but at the same time she established great instructional control. She is always available to train parents outside of the session and truly cares about what she does.

provider_name: Robin Best, CCC PA Speech Language Pathologist
review_text: We have seen great improvements in John‚Äôs speech working with Robin. She is patient, engaging, and creative with her approach to speech therapy.

provider_name: Robin Best, CCC PA Speech Language Pathologist
review_text: She helped me to speak better.

Still remember the day I talked to Robin on a phone for the first time to discuss my dogs‚Äô issues on leash and if she‚Äôs the right fit. I instantly knew Robin isn‚Äôt one of those and she truly cares about providing what my dogs need. We took her lesson once a month for three months. I continued to do what she taught us during the lesson between each lesson. Also, she was always available via texts- I sent her videos of us doing the training at home, and she gave me feedback, which was extremely helpful! She recognized and understood differences in personalities and issues between two of my dogs, so she utilized different approaches (again she really provides your dog with what THEY need!!!) Walking used to be not enjoyable due to their poor behavior, but now I take my dogs on a walk twice a day, and each walk reminds me of the impact Robin‚Äôs training has made on all three of us, not just the dogs. Robin has helped several of my clients with their dogs‚Äô behavior issues. She even saved one from being euthanized by teaching the owner how to better understand and manage their dog‚Äôs resource-guarding tendencies. Robin is truly gifted at helping both humans and animals! :)

I've taken both of my dogs to Robin and they've come back very well behaved. She's easy to work with, the cost is reasonable and she's great at what she does. I would highly recommend Robin for all of your dog training needs.

Robin helped me understand my dog's...and my own...behavior. She is kind, perceptive, and the tools she gave me work well. She also took very good care of him when I left him for boarding. So grateful to Robin. Almost forgot...she's a lot of fun to work with. Thank you, Robin.

Thank you so much!! üòä I had a lot of pain from my sciatica last year and since I‚Äôve been going to Robinson Chiropractic ‚Ä¶ I am feeling much better!! Everyone is so helpful and wonderful!!  I can‚Äôt thank you enough !

I have been going to Dr Sam Robinson for several years now. I have on-going spine and SI joint issues, plantar fasciitis, and, more recently, median nerve compression in my right arm. provider_name: Rocky's Retreat Canine Health & Fitness Center
review_text:
Loved Rocky's from the get-go.
We ended up having to board our pup here for a very last-minute trip. We are sort of helicopter parents and were very worried, and thus very selective, about sending her someplace, particularly as she is quite sensitive and needy.

Rocky's got back to me very quickly regarding my inquiry and I was able to tour the facility the very same day! I was very relieved to see the quality of their boarding facilities (i.e. how many different rooms you can choose from, the separation of groups of dogs so they're not all overstimulated in a single room, how SECURE the facility itself and the accommodations for the dogs are) as well as the great outdoor space.
The backyard area is huge and with PLENTY of shade (very important for Florida lol)! So many different areas as well to accommodate your dogs' needs, for example, if they need to be alone and/or with a smaller group of dogs.

Along with that, Rocky's provides a THOROUGH form to fill out so they can get to know every little thing about your pup! Again, it made me feel so much better to know that they will and do pay attention to each individual dog's needs and personality.

On top of that, every staff member I interacted with was so lovely. Bailey gave us the tour and started us off with the process and her kind energy set the tone. I communicated with Angela regularly leading up to and throughout our pup's time at Rocky's and she was just as lovely! The photos and videos Rocky's provide you for each dog's "post card" only further reinforce my trust in all the staff here.

Really, I am truly super protective of my pup. She is my whole world, I fret over her no matter what! But Rocky's 100% put me at ease the whole time. Great place. :)

review_text: Took our Oreo while the whole family went to HHN at Universal. The place looks and smells clean. A big plus! Oreo felt right at home! review_text: Rocky‚Äôs Retreat is great! I‚Äôve been taking my dogs here for years, and wouldn‚Äôt go anywhere else. She really knows her stuff. I did the 10 sessions and with each session, I could see the difference in my body and posture.
