I have been seeing Holly at Saltwater speech therapy for almost a year now and she is incredible and has made such a positive impact in my life an has helped me tremendously. She offers flexible hours and always has great communication with me. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for speech therapy services.

I love Samson! Dr Delilah and her team are so wonderful and amazing to work with! I just finished my last PT session yesterday and feel so proud of what we accomplished together. I started PT with Samson back in October 2024. I had two separate issues I wanted to address - a knee injury from skiing and wear/tear on my shoulder from my sport. Now, my knee is back to 100% for the first time since my injury- which I didn‚Äôt think was possible- and my shoulder is remarkably better. Samson gave me the tools to get to this point and the best part is that I get to take those tools and use them going forward on my own. I feel so much more strength and stability in body compared to when I first started physical therapy. Samson was so amazing guiding me through this process, and I know I couldn‚Äôt have gotten these results without them. They are so professional and responsive - they stick with you every step of the way. If you are thinking about trying PT or strength training, definitely go to Samson!

Dr. Isabella at Samson is incredible! She truly brought me back to life postpartum. Her care is attentive, professional, and full of compassion. She is so knowledgeable and takes the time to explain everything, making me feel comfortable and confident throughout the process. I couldn‚Äôt recommend her more highly‚Äîif you‚Äôre looking for pelvic floor physical therapy, she‚Äôs the absolute best!

Dr Isabella is the best!  I thought I was too old and too far gone to be helped.  How could my pelvic floor be weak when I lift
Weights and workout very consistently.  Dr Isabella showed me the exercises specific for pelvic floor weakness. I put in the work and I have no more worries.  I do not have to wear only black leggings ! I run, jump and lift worry free.  3 x a week I am committed to doing the exercises Dr Isabella gave me ! üí™üëä  üí¶üö´

Samson Strength and Performance PT has given me my life back. After an injury, I was uncertain whether I'd be able to return to the active lifestyle I previously enjoyed. Dr. Isabella listened and tailored a plan to help me meet my goals. She partnered with me, offering support and expertise, to empower me to succeed. I highly recommend Samson Strength and Performance PT. Their commitment to physical health and wellness is unmatched.

Dr Isabella is an outstanding Pelvic Health and Performance Doctor of Physical Therapy.   I went to her to address long term stress incontinence issues.   She is very knowledgeable, created a program just for me - and adjusted it over time based on my goals and progress.   I felt heard, and not only do I feel stronger and more confident, but the results are measurable - physically - and with less pads needed‚Ä¶and headed to zero pads.
Thank you Dr Isabella and Samson Therapy!!

I‚Äôve used San Juan Animal hospital for over 20 years and continue to be impressed with their wonderful  customer service and their dedication to provide  excellent medical treatment.

The doctors and staff are kind, thorough, knowledgeable, trustworthy, compassionate, helpful and have always gone the extra mile, giving my animals the best care possible.

While a bit more expensive than other vet hospitals; when I go to them, I know my pets will get excellent medical treatment and they can generally see me quickly. That is worth every penny and I always breathe a sigh of relief, knowing my beloved pets are in wonderful, caring, educated hands.

Becoming an overpriced Vet. Let me start by saying that San Juan Animal hospital has been an amazing Vet clinic. I've had many great experiences with them. They have provided amazing service at a fair price for years of which I'm grateful, until now. We had a certain treatment that our dogs get. When we got the bill our bill was unusually higher than normal. We paid. We called other Vets and found the same treatment was half price. It wouldnt have bothered me if it weren't for the fact that we weren't being charged that much prior to the latest charge. When I inquired about why is it so expensive now they couldn't give me an answer to why they raised the price. I let them know that the first 2 vets I called in the same area were literally half price. They had no response. I'm not sure if they got bought out by a private equity firm but my recent experience has me curious. Will San Juan give you great service? I believe they will. Will San Juan overcharge you? Now I believe they will.

I have been taking my dogs to San Juan for the last 15-20 years and I absolutely love the doctors that I entrust with their care. When I had to put my dog Bailey down due to age and health issues, Dr. Fulton and staff were so compassionate and caring. They take such good care of my youngest dog Maggie. But the excellent care that Dr. Fulton and the SJAH staff have given to Bella, my 13 year old girl with hind-end paralysis and Cushings disease has been phenomenal. She truly cares about the animals in her care. From acupuncture to routine care to tests and medications to treat the medical issues that arise from a wheelie dog, I could not ask for a better doctor. She takes the time to personally call me with test results, to discuss treatment options, and to check on how Bella is doing after a visit. I tell anyone who asks for a vet recommendation about Dr. Fulton and SJAH!
Our sweet hound mix puppy was a little wild at his first visit and the staff was friendly and accommodating. I appreciate their kindness and dedication to the well being of animals.

I want to say this hospital is by far the best experience I've ever had with my fur babies. The ENTIRE staff is awesome!! I've had my puppy Nyla for a little over a year and recently her abdomen began swelling. Dr. Vinyard has taken a top priority on her health. I would give Million stars if I could. If you're looking for a place to take your fur babies THIS is it. Thank you San Juan Animal Hospital Family üòä

Moved from DC area, quickly got an appointment with San Pablo. Doctors are great,  nurses and front staff are always willing to help me out. I highly recommend their services. Marley and Charley approved!

We have been going to San Pablo Animal Hospital for many years. We made the switch from a smaller place that was bought out by a big Corporation many years back. The Dr.'s and techs are very friendly and knowledgeable. I recommend them to all my dog loving friends. We have a Lab and Staff/ Pharoah mix, they love them too.

The entire team at San Pablo Animal Hospital is absolutely fantastic!! From the friendly receptionists who always greet us with a smile to the knowledgeable vet techs. They always make my dog Lucky feel very special and loved. Everyone is committed to providing the best possible experience. We particularly appreciate  their clear communication and the way they always take the time to answer our questions and address our concerns. Dr. Owens is incredibly compassionate and skilled. We are so grateful for her expertise.
We highly recommend this amazing animal hospital‚ù§Ô∏èüê©‚ù§Ô∏èüêæ‚ù§Ô∏è

I always have such a wonderful experience with San Pablo Animal Hospital. They have been my go to vet office for over 20 years. Don't let those sad eyes fool you... Rosie the basset hound is always happy to see the doctors and staff!

My dog was constantly trying to lick her butt.   I couldn't  see anything. No scooting.  Then I found a swelling.  They saw me that day.  My dog was shaking entering the clinic.  She was seen on time.  I could not believe that when they walked her back to me, she was energetic and wagging her tail.  First time ever happy at the vets!!  I liked the vet too.  I was surprised since this was our first visit there that the vet did not insist on a complete exam etc.$$.  I will make all my vet visits here!  Highly recommend

provider_name: Sanctuary Healthcare - Ketamine Therapy in Boca Raton
review_text:
Sanctuary Healthcare provided exceptional care for a family member who was struggling with PTSD and medication-resistant depression. After completing their treatment program, we saw a noticeable improvement in both areas‚Äîsomething we had been hoping for after trying multiple other approaches without success.

The staff at Sanctuary are not only knowledgeable and professional but also genuinely compassionate. They prioritize patient care and comfort at every step, creating an environment that feels supportive and safe. The facility itself is modern, clean, and incredibly calming‚Äîexactly the kind of setting you‚Äôd want for healing and recovery.

I have complete trust in the doctors and staff here. Their expertise and dedication made a real difference in our lives. I would highly recommend Sanctuary Healthcare to anyone dealing with medication-resistant depression, anxiety, or PTSD. They truly offer hope and healing when it‚Äôs needed most.

provider_name: Sanctuary Healthcare - Ketamine Therapy in Boca Raton
review_text: The experience there was personalized and just amazing. The office is communicative and friendly. I‚Äôm so grateful I found Sanctuary because it is such an improvement over other places I‚Äôd been to. Dr. Peskin and Dr Doreen are really special. I will definitely continue treatments there.

provider_name: Sanctuary Healthcare - Ketamine Therapy in Boca Raton
review_text: Dr. Peskin and his staff at Sanctuary Healthcare have changed our world for the better in every way.  There is nothing like knowing that when you come here that they have your best interest in mind. We are greeted every time with love and reassurance and asked about our current journey. If you have a problem and cant find a solution, Dr Peskin and his staff can help guide you in the right direction.

provider_name: Sanctuary Healthcare - Ketamine Therapy in Boca Raton
review_text: Sanctuary Healthcare is 100% the best IV ketamine clinic in Boca. I cannot thank Dr. Peskin and his medical staff enough for curing my anxiety and treatment resistant depression. No more SSRIs!!! I feel (am!!) a brand new person. Thank you a million times over. ü©∑ü©∑ü©∑

provider_name: Sanctuary Healthcare - Ketamine Therapy in Boca Raton
review_text:
I‚Äôve been a patient at Sanctuary Healthcare under Doctors Peskin care, and I can't express enough how much this place has changed my life. I've suffered from mental health disorders for years and tried countless treatments, but the personalized care I received here made all the difference.

Dr. Peskin performed a thorough assessment and developed a treatment plan tailored to my needs. The center itself is top-notch, with state-of-the-art facilities and an incredibly professional and compassionate staff. They ensure that every step of the treatment is safe and effective. Thanks to their care, I experienced a rapid reduction in symptoms and sustained improvement in my overall well-being.

The caring environment and dedication from the entire team have truly given me a new chance at life. I now feel hopeful and optimistic about my future. Sanctuary Healthcare is a crucial part of the program that helps me manage and improve my life.
My daughter has been riding here for years and she loves it. The staff is fantastic A++++++

My granddaughter will be 10 years old and has wanted to ride horses for years and finally got the chance at Sand Spur farm.  She absolutely loved it.  The horses are well cared for with awesome temperaments.  She can't wait to go again.
Great instruction and atmosphere for learning. Everyone is very friendly. Alicia couldn't be more outstanding.
Love the horses and get along great with the owners.  A great place for kids to learn how to treat, care for and ride horses.
You have to see it to experience such a grand place for all who Love everything outdoor's!!! Horse's & so many things to do!

We did a tour of the place and we were not impressed. There were plenty of cars in the parking lot, but not one single therapist on site.  The manager was knowledgeable and answered our questions, but she said‚Äô ‚ÄúIt was a HIPAA violation‚Äù to have cameras in the rooms, which is not true. There is nothing to hold the therapists accountable or nobody or nothing to watch over your children since parents are not allowed in the rooms as well.  The toys were all old and torn and falling apart, as well as broken pieces left in the rooms. The tint on the windows were all peeling off. The walls and floors were all dirty. I wish I had taken pictures.

Erica is absolutely fantastic as an SLP. She cares about my son. He is a Gestalt Language Processor and she knows just how to approach him. He is very engaged with her. Erica prepares individualized activities for my son , and then goes into child-led activities. She is both structured and follows the child. I feel like he makes tons of progress with her!

Erica worked with my son when he was 2.5 on his speech delay. In just 2 months with her, he had progressed more than 4 months with others. She really helped him get started and it was a snowball effect from there. Each session he was so excited to see her and didn‚Äôt want to leave at the end. He‚Äôs more hyper, and she was incredibly patient and kind with him. She was so sincere and amazing. You can really tell how much she cares and wants to help just talking to her. She‚Äôs the person I tell all my mom friends to check out.

Erica has been amazing while working with our 2 year old son. He is consistently showing growth and gaining new words and phrases. She is able to make learning fun for him and incorporate play into their lessons and time together.
I know Erica from her time spent in a school setting. She is very passionate about what she does and works very well with the children. I'm excited to see she is making her dream come true!

I had worked with Christine before at a prior location, but now that she her own practice, she can really shine. She is always professional and really knows what she is doing. The PT she brought in for my first session was wonderful. Christine is not afraid to teach you stretches and exercises so that you don't need to come back (even if you may want to) and always takes her time with you. I feel seen, heard and understood at all times. It can be hard for a guy to find a PT who does pelvic floor stuff, but I'm really glad she's here.

Christine has been amazing with me over these past few weeks I went in because of a prolapse and I feel like I have better control of my pelvis as well as my breathing and strength overall. I highly recommend Christine she is patient. She listens and understands her subject very well.

I have had chronic hip pain for almost 30 years, and Christine has already helped that be less (and some days I have no pain at all) in just a month! She is kind, gentle, knowledgeable, and explains everything she is doing very well.

If you‚Äôre looking for a pelvic floor physical therapist who is not only incredibly knowledgeable but also deeply compassionate, Christine is truly outstanding. She has a remarkable ability to make complex topics easy to understand, empowering people with the information they need to take charge of their health. Her expertise in pelvic health is evident in the way she educates and supports those she works with, always prioritizing patient comfort and well-being. Christine‚Äôs dedication to her field and her genuine care for others make her a standout professional. Anyone seeking guidance in pelvic health would be lucky to learn from her!

I saw Christine a couple of months ago. As a 75 year old it has been decades since I gave birth 3 times and had a partial hysterectomy as a result of uterine cancer. I felt comfortable discussing POP (pelvic organ prolapse) with Christine as she was  knowledgeable and professional. With her direction and advice I have experienced good improvement and don't feel any longer that I have to give up running altogether. Instead, I am hoping to work towards another 5k in the not so distant future.

I cannot say enough good things about this clinic! The staff is kind, professional, and truly care about every animal that comes through their doors. From the front desk to the techs and vets, everyone took the time to answer my questions and make sure my pet felt comfortable. The clinic is clean, welcoming, and efficient, yet they never make you feel rushed. It‚Äôs clear they go above and beyond for both pets and owners. I feel so grateful to have found a place I can trust with my fur baby‚Äôs health. Highly recommend!

I have been taking my pets for care at Santa Cruz animal clinic since 2011. I have always been very happy with the care that they have received. Recently one of my beloved pets had to be gently assisted to the Rainbow Bridge. Dr Buscigllio and the rest of the staff were very compassionate and gently helped me through the process as well and assisted me with cremation plans.
I trust this clinic to take care of my fur babies like their own. They don't take advantage or over price. They simply provide the perfect care from doctor to staff. They're all delightful!!

We just had our American Bulldog‚Äôs 5 year annual checkup at Santa Cruz Vet, and once again, we couldn‚Äôt be happier. He has been going to them since he was a puppy, and they‚Äôve taken amazing care of him every step of the way.

The entire staff is always so kind, gentle, and patient with him. They clearly love what they do, and it shows in how they handle him with calm, confidence, and lots of affection. The vet took time to answer all our questions, explained everything thoroughly, and made sure he was comfortable throughout the visit.

It‚Äôs such a relief knowing he‚Äôs in good hands with a team we trust. We‚Äôre so grateful for the consistent, high-quality care over the years. Highly recommend Santa Cruz Vet to anyone who wants top-notch care for their furry family member!
SANTA CRUZ is amazing.   DR Stanton and her staff  are always so helpful and take great care of our dog and 3 cats!

Santiso is a extremely talented therapist..! This is my second time here and my pain go away just in a one session ! First time was a very strong pain at the rear area of my right leg and he treated it with awesome skills and the pain go away. Second time a hard knee pain from a bad movement playing Pickleball I almost can walk but after visit him I play back that same night‚Ä¶ I am impress and recommend 100% visit this professional place!!üòÄ

Dr Santiso did it again.  The dry needling has prevented me from having to get surgery that three orthopedic surgeons have recommended. I highly recommend not only Dr. Santiso, but the treatment as well. We flew in from out of state for this treatment !!!

Being a competitive triathlete for years (lots), I did several different types of healing and recovery treatments but Dr. Santiso made a difference and shorten my recovery time in weeks to days. A place I will visit not only for recover but also for maintaining my endurance level.

I‚Äôve been suffering from migraines for the past 3 years, and my doctor referred me to Santiso Physical Therapy. Dr. Aaron Santiso performed dry needle therapy on my neck, and unbelievably, my migraines disappeared after just the very first treatment. I‚Äôm not exaggerating, Dr. Santiso is truly gifted, and I highly recommend this clinic to anyone struggling with pain or migraines. Thank you so much, Dr. Santiso!

I cannot recommend Aaron Santizo and his team at Santiso Physical Therapy highly enough. Aaron is soft-spoken, highly skilled, and clearly very experienced in his field. I was referred to Santizo Physical Therapy by my family doctor after an MRI confirmed I had a torn meniscus. Through consultations and further research, I concluded that surgery wouldn‚Äôt truly resolve my issue, so I sought alternative treatment.

From my first visit, Aaron quickly assessed my situation with precision. He performed a minor acupuncture-like procedure and then entrusted my care to one of his team members. This young professional was incredibly knowledgeable, well-trained, and handled my treatment with utmost professionalism.

Although I haven‚Äôt been as consistent with their prescribed regimen due to living abroad, I am deeply impressed by the organization and their approach. I‚Äôm even considering flying in weekly just to continue this process, as I firmly believe they can significantly improve my condition without surgery. At 68, that means everything to me.

Thank you, Santiso Physical Therapy, for your expertise and dedication to patient care.

I would not recommend this practice or Megan Cutter specifically. Stay away! I saw Megan Cutter at Sarkis from approximately 2017 - 2025. I was an excellent patient for almost a decade and had an amazing relationship with Megan throughout my treatment at Sarkis. I never had any issues with billing or any of the staff. I last saw Megan about a month ago. During that time she did not once mention that I had a past due balance at her office. Today I called my pharmacy to find that she never called in my prescriptions after the last visit. I called her office to settle my account and was treated so poorly by the office staff. I was also told that Megan was aware of the situation and had directed this person and her actions. I immediately paid my bill, had them call in the medications that they were supposed to and told them to cancel my future appointments with their office. I was offered no apologies, so kindness, nothing. After a decade-long relationship. I am hurt personally and I am appalled at the unprofessional behavior of Megan Cutter and Sarkis Family Psychiatry. You are working with people who have severe anxiety and other mental health problems. Be kind. (Obviously I have hired a new psychiatrist - here‚Äôs to hoping I can find kind care for my medication needs).

Sarkis is not practice where new advances in medicine, mental health practice and knowledge are welcome. In addition, they are happy to make their own policies on what they will and will not share with patients and other practitioners regarding your medical records. NOTE-that is illegal!!! You are entitled to review and obtain a copy of all your medical records, including notes.

This was the best experience I ever had with doctors. I was skeptical because when I called to make the appointment they guided me to a nurse practitioner, as opposed to a doctor. I was also worried because it is a private pay only facility that they were going to take my money and not help me (as has happened so many times in the past). Once I got there I just felt like they actually cared, the front desk staff immediately asked me who I was and what time my appointment was, and when they looked in the file they had from filling out the initial appointment review they immediately gave me the packet I needed to fill out (only a few pages) then as soon as I sat down to fill it out Ashley called me (by the correct pronunciation of my name) to get my vitals and weight. After that I returned to the nice waiting area, which had a place for children to play, and finished filling out my 3 page of form.

My appointment was at 2:15, I got there at 1:45, and after I had finished everything the nurse practitioner called me in. This is where I thought I was going to be evaluated for 10 minutes and sent on my way with the same meds I‚Äôve always taken...

Heather spent close to an hour and a half with me... talking about everything going on in my life, getting to know me, and evaluating me as every doctor should do with a new patient. She was the kindest sweetest doctor, and I really felt like she actually cared about me. At the end she did continue me on the medication I regularly take, but she also went out of her way to put me on a new medicine to help with some other issues I‚Äôve been dealing with. She was the best.

Let me reiterate, Heather was the best mental health professional I‚Äôve ever spoken to.

They didn‚Äôt ask for money until after I finished my hour and a half evaluation, and only after they prescribed me my normal medication and a new medication to help with my current issues. So for anyone worried about wasting money on them, please don‚Äôt be scared. This is a real doctors office with professionals at every level from the front desk to the doctors that evaluate you.

I can‚Äôt sing the praises of Ms. Heather enough. What a wonderful woman that actually cares. I was literally blown away by how amazing this doctor was. I can‚Äôt thank her enough for how good of an experience I had.

I honestly look forward to my next appointment.

Bad experience here. Tried 2 different doctors and had the same situations occur. Major lack of transparency in the patient/doctor relationship. First of all, I was never told what my diagnosis was. I had to drag it out of my doctor 6 months into treatment. Secondly, I was prescribed medicine without being told what it was for. Later I found out they gave me an off label prescription for a medicine that had no connection to my diagnosis. After 7 months of being on one certain medicine (with absolutely no effect) the doctor just increased the dosage and prescribed more medicine on top of it instead of admitting that the medication wasn‚Äôt right for me. Both doctors were condescending and treated me as if I was a kid. Definitely not what I‚Äôm looking for in a doctor. Front staff are really nice, so I‚Äôm giving the review an extra star. Other than that, definitely wouldn‚Äôt reccomend this practice to anyone looking for true help.

My provider, Kathy Noffsinger is wonderful. Only 2 stars because it‚Äôs very expesnsive and they don‚Äôt  take insurance.still charging $100 at Clinical Trials for a rapid Covid test. TMS which works DURING the 6 weeks really helped me with depression for $6,000 plus. But 0ne week later, the happiness vanishes along with a large chunk of money. Mental health is a very serious problem, and it should be available, affordable, and take all major insurance to better serve the community. I want to reiterate that Dr. Kathy Noffsinger is excellent.

In most facilities It's rare to see the same physical therapist at each visit and even more uncommon to spend a full hour working one on one with them. Justin evaluated me thoroughly at the start and created both a hands-on and therapeutic exercise program specifically designed to address my needs. He successfully got me back to pain-free activity. He was extremely knowledgeable, always professional and very kind. I can't speak highly enough about my experience at Saylor Physical Therapy and highly recommend them.

My first appointment with Saylor for my evaluation was a wonderful experience. I am excited and look forward to my therapy sessions so I can get back to normal activities and life. I am 12 weeks post surgery and ready for outpatient therapy. Dr Kaitlyn Geddes is friendly, compassionate and made a plan to continue my recovery.

That was very nice and that was my first time being in the place. I think I‚Äôm going to love being there. I ain‚Äôt going nowhere else cause it‚Äôs very hard finding other places to do physical therapy and on top of it I have no co-pay. I was so happy. My first time being in that place and I live because the smell in that place is very beautiful. It smells very good. I don‚Äôt know what the smell is, but it smells very good. You feel comfortable relaxing. You can watch TV when they call you.
Justin is a well qualified physical therapist. He has helped me strengthen my weak spots and stretches that help my back pain. Very easy to work with but pushes you. Very pleased with the service.

I love coming to Saylor PT. The entire staff is extremely professional and kind! I have been here twice for different injuries with positive results. I had the pleasure of working with Karline my first time and requested her the second time.  Karline has tremendously improved my health and for that I am grateful.

I have been to a number of Physical Therapy establishments in the Northern Palm Beaches.  Some have been somewhat helpful others have not.  FINALLY I have found a really great place. Saylor at Palm Beach Gardens, From a friendly front desk to my two therapists, Christopher Hoff and Veranda Riccardi.  They have really helped this old lady recover from knee replacement surgery.  They work with their patients one on one for the entire hour.   All the therapists are friendly and while I am partial to my two therapists, Chris and Veranda, I would not hesitate to recommend any of the others.   Look no further for physical therapy  than Saylor in Palm Beach Gardens.

Kind of nasty at the front desk very off putting and not helpful. Will not see you and charge you even though there‚Äôs 45 minutes left as appointments are 1 hour. Forced to pay out of pocket‚Ä¶wonder if charging medicare. Not flexible or friendly at all compared to other PT that ive experienced post surgery. Also hard to get consistent appointments. Too commercial.

I‚Äôve had the best experience at Saylor Physical Therapy, from the front desk to my therapist Lindsay. Front desk is kind, welcoming and are extremely helpful! With Saylor being on-on-one therapy, Lindsay was just the absolute BEST therapist to work with! She helped with my sciatica almost immediately and was kind, intelligent and compassionate. Highly recommend them!!

Saylor Physical Therapy has been the best physical therapy experience I've had. Having done PT at several local places, Saylor is different all around.

The facility itself is clean, calming, and filled with new, well-kept equipment. Each therapist has their own private office for stretches, exercises, and massages depending on your needs. Even when you are utilizing the main space and equipment, it is never too crowded or feeling like people are in your space.

Chris and Jake were awesome to work with and helped me get my life back after a handful of bulging discs and degeneration in my lower spine, making it impossible to do daily tasks or care for my baby. The truly listen to your concerns and pain points and then alter your treatment plan accordingly and explaining the science behind every exercise along the way. Everyone is so friendly and easy to work with. Even the front desk ladies are friendly and know you by name. At Saylor, you truly feel like a person and not just a patient.

I have been fortunate in working with Saylor PBG for several years for different problems. The most recent was for preparation and recovery from my complete knee replacement, Lindsey Moretz has coached me through that with humor and compassion. She has perceptively recognized health problems I didn‚Äôt know myself and encouraged me to follow up with my doctors. I have continued to work with her after being discharged from PT with a fully functional knee because her support is terrific.

My husband had excellent care while at Scott Lake. The facility is kept sparkling clean, the nurses and cna‚Äôs are very pleasant and extremely dedicated. There are many activities for patients. Christmas decorations went above and beyond festive which made the holidays more palatable. The PT/OT/Speech staff care deeply about their patients and the results speak for themselves. The receptionists are all super friendly and welcoming üòä Our social services director Michelle made sure everything was in order upon discharge for a smooth transition to home. ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

A beautiful and very clean facility.  Everyone was so nice during our visit.  I especially want to commend our CNA Shawanda. Shawanda had 12 patients to keep up with and our sister was one of them.  Unfortunately our sister had two episodes back to back.  Shawanda took care of things with a smile on her face even though it was a large mess and she was extremely busy since you were short staffed.
Thank you Shawanda!

I went to visit a family friend. The place had a very open floor plan, it was clean, the decor was beautiful, the community spaces were very home like, and the staff was very welcoming. The resident we visited was happy with their care and had the same witty,  humorous, personality we remembered.

Every place has it's pros and cons. No place is perfect. My wife was here for 6 weeks, and I can say, she was pleased with her stay, and my wife is not someone who is easy to please. Certain employees were terrific such as the CNA Linda, Nurse Kim, PT's & OT's Sonya, Con, and Alex who went above and beyond with their expertise. The facility was always spotless. The patient's meals were adequate and that's all I can say on that subject. One word of advice I can give is to make it easier for a visitor to get water without looking for an employee to ask for it. Overall, I would highly recommend this facility to anybody needing rehab.

Alvin the nursed is very very nice and professional
A beautiful person.
And know hes in the management position so we are happy he was promoted.
My friend got sick again and she decided to go back to scott lake .
Because of Alvin I recommend Scott lake

If you've never ridden a horse, have very little education about horses, want a down to earth spot, need some one on one, or simply a nice place to visit with family, go horseback riding, have a true knowledgeable  respectful and patient instructor who loves to share his passion of horses, then scotty foundation hands down is the best horseback riding non profit place is where to go. Not needed but it'll be very helpful to the foundation for the horses to bring a couple bags of carrots and apples to feed the horses, it's a neat strategy to use to feed the animals and help overcome any fears with big strong animals and gain confidence into sharing space with such great horses, mr scotty is an awesome gentleman his experience with horses show brightly as he instructs throughout your day. It's totally free and donations on your free will are accepted. Scotty foundation is a place you'll never forget or regret. Thankyou mr. Scotty for your passion in horses, you've helped my wife overcome her fears with horses and know totally loves them. May this review help others choose this horse back riding foundation the place to go. And those who may feel like they cant be on a horse for whatever reason my advice is give scotty a call, he is totally honest, respectful and will guide you into the best direction.

I love coming here to help with the horses. Murphy is my favorite horse here. What these people are doing is amazing. Special thanks to the owners for always letting me come out to hang with these beauties.

This was the best experience, its a non profit organization that rescues animals, even though they were closed when we got here: one of the owners Abby was kind to show us the animals and show us what they do there. They treat animals with respect and love. I would recommend anybody in the area to visit them. They also host birthday parties for kids, work with special need people, book photoshoots. Dont force animals to do anything they dont want to. Bring them donations and support this organization!!
Amazing place to go with the kids and family. Great folks,free horse riding lessons great with autistic non profit

Sweet owners, beautiful horses, amazing purpose. Take treats for the horses, donate what you can or what your heart feels, ride and interact with the horses for free. 501c3 foundation. Keep up with them on FB!

My experience with Select Physical Therapy team was simply outstanding. I came to this facility after been in few places. My total recuperation involved almost a year of therapy. It must sound ridiculous, but I can say I have some experience! I can assure you this is a top of the line place; the difference is the human quality that you find here.
Firstly, you feel that you are not a number but rather an individual in need of support and help with physical injuries - discomfort-pain and so on.
Everyone in this facility makes you feel that you are not alone dealing with challenges. There's always a sense of happiness, nice music, some laughs, and compassion.  From the moment you arrive at the front office, Oscar will greet you with a big smile. You feel welcome. Excellent customer service. You can feel safe here; there is constant cleaning and disinfecting before and after using any equipment.
My physical therapist was Jonathan Torres, charismatic, professional, knowledgeable, always willing to go above and beyond to help you improve.
Occasionally, I work with another team member ( Ana, Stanley). Each of them will design an individualized plan of care that aligns with your specific goals in mind, motivating you to keep going. They are all outstanding, friendly, and a pleasure to work with.
I highly recommend this place, that promotes healing and recovery in a safe, compassionate environment.
David is the best physical therapist ever. He is a professional, kind, and caring one. I recommend David to everyone.

Terrible place. Bad doctors and bad customer service.
I went for a simple tendinitis in my elbow and Dr. Thomas was so bad that in 17 sessions there was zero improvement. Worst of all, he gave me exercises at the end that made the problem worse. I went for a tendinitis and I left with a teat in the tendon after seeing the result of the MRI I took 2 weeks after my last session in this place. Definitely not recommended.

Also Bad customer service. The people in the front desk are very rude (most but not all). They sent the wrong requests to my insurance twice.

Definitely not looking to come back ever

I have had physical therapy over the years and I have found Select Physical Therapy the best.  The therapists are knowledgeable about what they do.  Most importantly I always get better.  A little pain but a big gain.

If you feel like being rushed and reminded by your therapist that each therapist sees 2 patients at a time and that he isn‚Äôt allowed to go past the hour because the next patient is waiting then choose this place. After spending 40 min talking, my therapist proceeded to do a manual massage which lasted maybe 5 min and made no difference. If you can‚Äôt see a patient and don‚Äôt have the time to treat a patient please just have them reschedule. It was a very uncomfortable experience and the therapist did not have any time to treat me. I felt rushed the entire time and paid a full amount for my visit. It was very disappointing. I‚Äôll give it another try because the location is convenient to my home but not a good first impression. When I asked if I can know which stretches to do I was told there is no time and wasn‚Äôt even given a printout of exercises.

Julia, OT Specialist, is absolutely amazing! Her attributes makes you feel confident and safe.  She's knowledgeable, considerate, and consistent in your treatment.  Julia listens to your concerns, explains your treatment plans, and allows you to ask questions about your treatment.  I definitely would recommend her and the rest of the staff at this location.  Thank you so much Julia for everything you did for me during my road of recovery.

Ms Failla was very kind, very professional, and informative. I learned a few things about my shoulder‚Äôs condition that she was focused on. She had plenty of helpful info on how my rehab would proceed, and provided a lot of help in setting up the appointments as well as the home rehab work I needed to start.

*posting for a friend* I had a scheduled appointment at 8am and showed up bright and early to get checked in. There was nobody at the front desk so I sat in the waiting room for 20+ minutes. Still nobody came to check me in and I had to leave without speaking to a single soul. I tried to reschedule three times but nobody answered the phone or returned my voicemails. Would not recommend!
Julia is a gifted OT. She is professional, talented and personable. I am fortunate to have her as my therapist. Best therapist I've ever had.

This facility may be 16 miles from my home, yet my therapist, Sidney, is very conscious of my treatments and my progress.
I have been to other facilities for care and this one is equipped almost the same.
I travel this far because the service that I require was not offered anywhere else closer to my home.
Everyone there is very personable and friendly, and each of them use different exercises to gently strengthen you and help you to get back up to speed. This place is great; Highly recommended.

I can't say enough good things about my experience at Select Physical Therapy - Cay West. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism. The staff here are not only highly skilled and knowledgeable, but they are also genuinely caring and friendly. They always take the time to understand my specific needs and create a personalized therapy plan that truly makes a difference.

The environment is comfortable, welcoming, and always spotless - which immediately puts you at ease and shows the high standards they maintain.

If you are looking for top quality physical therapy in a place where you'll feel supported and cared for, I highly recommend Select Physical Therapy - Cay West.

Cathy Busch, the receptionist, is a real inspiration.  Patient and professional and kind.  Excellent helper.
Penny, one of these things would be a good thing but she has all three amazing!!!
The whole staff has been welcoming, caring and friendly. With the knowledge and help from the therapists my range of motion is getting better. This office is clean and organized.  Thank you!
I had a very good experience at therapy with Becca. She is knowledgeable and very personable. I look forward to my therapy sessions.

Select Therapy is amazing. From the minute you enter and are greeted by Kathy and Leslie you feel welcomed. I‚Äôve been working with PTAs David Cosher and Luis Ferrer, as well as PT Becca Sabogal and PT Allison Akers and have found them all to be extremely competent.  I always leave there feeling better, both physically and mentally.  The entire staff makes recovery a team effort and the positive atmosphere they project works wonders for their clients. Personally, when I am there I feel they genuinely care about me and are encouraging me every step of the way.  This is making my PT journey  easier because I know they are cheering me along!

Clara has been great to work with. She is patient with me, and she explains how each exercise strengthens which muscle. The facility is clean, and Carol, in the office, is caring. I recommend Select Physical Therapy on .Missouri Ave.

My experience at this facility was very positive. The facility is well equipped & clean. The receptionist Carol was very kind and helpful. My therapist Dustin Green explained how the exercises would help my muscle weakness in my back. He helped me learn to do the exercises in the proper way for the best outcome. Clara the manager & therapist helped also. I would recommend  Select Physical Therapy to my friends & family. I was given a detailed copy of exercises to do at home, along with an elastic band to use.   Many Thanks!  Linda Robles.

They are very professional, caring and helpful.  I've only seen Clara so far and really really like and appreciate her professionalism.  I handled a problem last fall with my jaw, and am now addressing a hip problem.  Best thing is having tools to fix it if it comes up again.

Can't say enough good about these folks. They care about each client,  they are very professional and keep you on track. Also fun to be around. I would not be as far along as I am without them. Thank you for all you do for me and everyone!
I enjoy working with Clara. She knows exactly what my shoulder needs to heal and I'm already regaining some range of motion after just one week. Thanks Clara.

This place is amazing. I had an ankle injury and spent 24 sessions here. Haley, the manager and therapist, was fantastic helping me every step of the way through my therapy. She was very hands on making sure to ask me on every visit how I have been, how my symptoms have been, asking me what I thought of my recovery, and asking what areas I think I need work on. She brought a very warm and caring energy everyday I came which truly helped my recovery that much more. She not only worked me inside the office but gave me tips and exercises I can do outside the office so even when my time there came to an end I could keep working on my injury to ensure it not only got better, but stayed better. Laura, the receptionist, was also just as caring. She greeted everyone who came in with a welcoming energy and a smile. Laura also made sure to make small talk with the guests while they waited to be seen, taking interests in their lives so they didn't just feel like customers. Overall this place is very homely and you can tell the staff cares deeply about everyone who walks through their doors

Haley and her team are absolutely AMAZING! In a time when some healthcare workers may seem indifferent, it is so refreshing to find a place where you feel truly heard and cared for. From the moment I walked in, I felt safe and supported. I came in scared and overwhelmed, dealing with the aftermath of a traumatic brain injury and a recent hit to the head. On top of that, persistent post-concussion syndrome, cervical instability, and bulging discs made every day feel like a struggle. But Haley showed true compassion and empathy, listening to every concern with patience and understanding. She is a true blessing, someone who not only cares deeply about her patients but is passionate about her career and helping others heal.

I cannot thank Select Physical Therapy enough for treating me like a human being, not just another patient . The staff takes the time to understand where you're at emotionally and physically, and they work with you to build your strength and recovery, step by step. They understand there are good days and bad days, and they adapt accordingly, always pushing you just the right amount. I have been making steady progress, and while it hasn‚Äôt always been easy, I‚Äôm so grateful to have them by my side. What sets Select apart is that they don‚Äôt rush you. They provide personalized care, and you can tell they are deeply invested in your well-being. They‚Äôve made such a difference in my recovery journey, and I‚Äôm always telling my friends and family about how incredible this place is.

The text message reminders are a lifesaver, too, especially since I juggle so many appointments! It‚Äôs the little things like this that show just how thoughtful and dedicated they are.

I wholeheartedly recommend Select Physical Therapy over so many other places I‚Äôve tried. Here, you are treated as a person, not a number, and you receive care from professionals who are passionate about what they do. Thank you, Select Physical Therapy, and to your entire staff for being a part of my healing process. You‚Äôve truly changed my life, and I will always be grateful.

I spent 2 yrs with the   Most knowledgeable therapist in Florida. Haley Bell is  highly educated along with the rest of her staff.  I had two shoulder surgeries recovery went very well.  I went from ground 0 not moving at all the first time...to doing my job as a stock clerk.  The second  Surgery was rough but Haley and her staff made me feel as if I could do anything.  I have a 2% permanent injury my shoulder was torn in 6 places and my labrum had to be reattach..I fail on ice I am lucky I can move at all.  It was very painful but when I walked in and out of  Select therapy..I felt like I could conquer the world.  Haley, Sean, Kim,  Bria and Patty I thank you all for being there for me.
Patty
Knowledgeable, friendly and caring!  They know exactly what to do to ease your pain & help you get back to normal.  Thank you Haley!   üôÇ

Select Physical therapy PT is the best hands down, these ladies are angels from heaven. And their work as physical therapist are a blessing. I had zero confidence once I entered, my ankle has been broken since April and it‚Äôs been hard all the way around and still is even with my recovery phase. These girls had helped me EVERY STEP OF THE WAY!!!!!! and have gone above and beyond to help me through my healing. I am walking more little by little and my confidence level has definitely increased tremendously! I will definitely recommend this place 1000 percent to anyone that needs the help to heal and get back to their life duties. To me these ladies are more than just physical therapist, they are my friends!!! Thank you Hayley and Kim!!! You both are definitely a blessing!!!

Select Physical Therapy has been a godsend for me. I love all of my therapists, especially Alex, who has been with me since I started over six months ago. He is always smiling, professional, supportive, and mindful, and he really knows how to work with each of his patients. The office staff is also wonderful and easy to work with. If you‚Äôre in need of physical therapy, this is most definitely the place to go. Thank you so much for everything you‚Äôve been doing for me!

I highly recommend Select Physical Therapy (Coconut Grove location). I started coming here a few weeks ago when I began to experience sciatica during my pregnancy. Worried it would only get worse throughout each trimester, I made an appointment and have enjoyed coming back every week. The clinic is very welcoming and everyone is very friendly. Alex has been the PT I've been seeing and he has been incredibly knowledgeable, thorough, and kind. He has been great at explaining the exercises, correcting my form, and then providing exercises and stretches to do at home. I never feel rushed during my sessions despite how busy the clinic is, so I am grateful for the thought and care Alex has put into my treatment plan.

Select physical therapy is the,real deal. Extremely professional and the therapists are amazing and talented.  They will help you achieve your goals and success.  Thank you Patrick and all the,staff for your support during this difficult time.

Extremely professional staff.
Starting from the ladies at the desk always very precise and reliable.
Lio my therapist since my first session showed me deep knowledge and sofisticated skills.I went there to elevate the tolerance of my upper back muscles and he did an amazing job.
Thank you very much to the entire staff.
Basso.

I had surgery on my left arm and was sent by my medical insurance to do physical therapy to Select Physical Therapy.
I am amazed by the speed of my recovery, which is ahead of my schedule, due to the dedication and professionalism of the Team.
First you receive a call the day before the appt to remind you and is very helpful.
Their staff is well prepared, they speak English and Spanish.
Also I noticed a bday experience since they have worked with professional athletes.

They monitor your progress with computers on every session, they used very advanced therapy equipment.
I haven't had any pain during the treatment. It has been a true pleasure getting my therapy here.
Also this place is in a great location, on US1, and has ample parking. Very easy to get here from most places in Miami.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Coral Springs - The Walk
review_text:
After suffering from a serious fall down 14 concrete steps, life has been difficult. I became immobile, lost muscle, and gained weight. I went from a fast walker to excruciating pain, simply trying to get my legs off of my bed! My orthopedic doctor, Dr. Nathaniel Thomas wrote me a script for PT and highly recommended Select Physical Therapy! Oh my God, was he RIGHT!! From Soy at the front who greets everyone with a huge smile and great energy to Joy, who helped schedule my first appointment, and Kiara, who sadly works at the other location but was helping at Coral Springs, the staff is wonderful!
I didn't know what to expect with my first appointment as I've never been in PT before, and currently, it's to focus on my right knee that suffered severe damage from the fall. I was called back by Eric, who is truly one genuinely wonderful human!! Not only did he assure me that we would get me back on track, but he also implemented breathing techniques when I got overstimulated! I suffer from quite a few mental health issues, and it's rare that I find  people in the medical field who seem sensitive to neurodivergent patients.
I truly look forward to physical therapy, especially with Eric. He's quite popular, so booking him ahead of time is essential. However, everyone I've met thus far has been empathetic, knowledgeable, and professional.
My therapist, when she needed PT, went here as well! üòÖ That's how great they are!! If you need PT, look no further than Select Physical Therapy- Coral Springs!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Coral Springs - The Walk
review_text:
I attempted to make an appointment for my mother-in-law today, after she was turned away previously for not having a referral in person. She reached out to her primary doctor, who confirmed that the referral had been prepared and faxed to your facility. When I called to schedule the appointment, the receptionist was not only rude but also dismissive. She immediately asked for insurance and said that a referral was required. I explained that her primary doctor had assured us the referral was sent, yet her response was simply ‚Äúwell, it‚Äôs not here,‚Äù without even asking for any patient details.

I requested to speak with a manager, and after being put on hold for 32 minutes, the call was ended. I tried to call back, but there was no answer. This experience has left me feeling extremely frustrated. My mother-in-law had hand surgery a month ago and urgently needs therapy. This level of service is unacceptable.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Coral Springs - The Walk
review_text: I am extremely grateful to Eric Schneider as my physical therapist at Select Physical Therapy in Coral Springs. He is an incredible therapist who has been helping me regain strength in my lower extremities. He has a calm soothing way about him and is extremely knowledgeable about his art. I would highly recommend him to anyone who needs therapy.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Coral Springs - The Walk
review_text:
Alex Goldin my neck PT is amazing!  I drive an hour to this location because Dr. Goldin is one of the few physical therapists that specializes in anterior neck/TMJ and he is excellent.
The only bad experience is the front desk and check in and out system.
They are understaffed and the new front person doesn‚Äôt have a clue what a medical order looks like unfortunately. During the last visit I had to wait to check in for another person to be checked out and that took a long time, making me late for my own appointment. This is just constructive criticism. As a physician myself, my advice- I truly hope they can correct that soon. 5 starts to the physical therapists, 1 to administration.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Coral Springs - The Walk
review_text: Pamela G is very knowledgeable, friendly, prompt and caring. The rehab center is small, but has a lot of equipment. They keep to your schedule.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Coral Springs Sample Road
review_text: These guys know what they are doing. They will listen to you and will take care of your needs. They are courteous and very professional. I feel very well treated every time I do PT with them. Way to go team!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Coral Springs Sample Road
review_text: The staff is super friendly, and the facility is always clean. Dr. Libby and Elaine are excellent therapists who work closely with me throughout my treatment. They have great personalities, are vibrant and humorous, and they clearly explain movements to help with mind-muscle connection! I also appreciate their flexibility in accommodating my schedule with after-work appointments. One of the best parts is that the place is 15 minutes away from my home.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Coral Springs Sample Road
review_text: I really liked it, it was very good for me. My evaluation with James was accurate and my sessions with Marco were very efficient. Thank you very much.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Coral Springs Sample Road
review_text: All staff is amazing but Elaine by far is a gem. She knew exactly what I needed to do with explanation that I really understood. She listens, she hears your needs and concerns and gives you the confidence to improve which helped so much. So thankful to you Elaine!!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Coral Springs Sample Road
review_text: I would like to thank Eleine S. very much for her therapies, the way she explains to me how to do my exercises, why they are good, and always cleaning everything. This says a lot about how dedicated she is to caring for her patients, and she also likes her job. Thank you, Elaine, for your patience with me.ü´Ç

My experience here was short, but very pleasant. The staff here are very friendly and offer great motivation for a speedy, safe recovery. There with you step by step during your whole recovery process. They take care to greet their patients by name, striking up conversations about your daily life and how your injury may be affecting you. A very human experience. This is my first time having PT and it was a great experience.

I am very pleased with the care I have been given so far and have no complaints. I just started therapy for my back.
I was there before for my arm and I got a lot of help. Glad I chose them!

My experience at Select Physical Therapy in Doral although short, was very positive. I will definitely recommend this facility to family members or friends in need of physical therapy. I would like to thank Anthony Rodriguez-DPT, CSCS and Robert Narvaez- PTA for their kindness and the excellent care I received.
They only give you one day a week of therapy and tell your employer that it was the patient who wasn‚Äôt coming to the appointments. The lady in charge is a fabricator!
Excellent atmosphere and attention to the patients,Great team of professionals helping to achieve my goals. I appreciate üôè. thanks

I was referred by my neurologist after receiving two debilitating back surgeries within 30 days of each other. I scheduled an appointment for Monday (1/27) at 9AM. Upon arrival, the receptionist, Rosalina, informed me that I needed my prescription to be seen by a therapist. I responded that I wasn't aware I need this, but she claimed she called me the prior Friday and left me a VM explaining it was needed. I never received any message, and she proceeded to quote, with a sarcastic attitude, an incorrect phone number where she left this VM. She then told me my appointment was cancelled, so I responded by saying I would go elsewhere, and it seemed she could care less. I called yesterday afternoon to speak with the manager, and she told me she would send an email to make that happen. I called again today, and they are no longer answering my phone calls, so I left them a VM. No call from anyone in management yet, and I am assuming I won't get one at all. If you don't value your time, this is a good spot to go to. If you took time from work like I did, then stay away. There are plenty of other options for physical therapy. Bad attitude from this woman, all because she left a VM on someone else's cell phone instead of mine.

The whole team is amazing but Matt was my primary therapist and he is fantastic!

I worked with him before my knee surgery to strengthen and after for recovery.  Very personable, pushed me gently when needed and while homework is never fun, it really helped me to recover much better and quicker than expected.

Thank you so much Matt!

Select was recommended to me from my surgeons office and I have found their facility to be very useful and helpful to me in my hip replacement surgery recovery - the staff has been helpful, professional and knowledgeable. The location is very close to my home making it easy to get there and access the facility - thank you in advance for all your help in my recovery

ELDA Martinez one of the therapists at Aeledt Physical Therapy, Fort Lauuderdale is the best therapist I ever experience. Her caring personality and her PT skills are wonderful. I can‚Äôt say enough positive things about Elda.she is wy,

Stephen and Brenda have been AMAZING in making sure I recover from my knee injury. I went in with no mobility after an accident and they continue to make sure I make progress after every treatment. They challenge me in a way that pushes me and thanks to them I have been able to walk a LOT sooner than expected. They‚Äôre knowledgeable and constantly educate me with all the questions I have (which are many!).  They‚Äôre honest, caring and always find ways to motive you when you‚Äôre feeling depressed and frustrated. Special thanks to everyone at this location, even their 2 front desks girls are incredible! They‚Äôre attentive and also notice your progress which is really sweet. Thank you Select Physical Therapy!!!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Fort Lauderdale
review_text: I‚Äôm really glad I found Luis Camacho. I feel comfortable and supported in every session, and it‚Äôs clear Luis really care and know what he is doing. Therapy has been a big help for me, and I feel like I‚Äôm making real progress. It‚Äôs a relief to be in good hands

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Fort Lauderdale
review_text: Logan is a great at his job he is very informative and knowledgeable. I‚Äôve had the pleasure of seeing a couple of times now for my therapy and I feel very confident that he is looking out for my best interest and health. I‚Äôve been to a few other places before for therapy on other issues and didn‚Äôt get the type of care and attention as with Logan. He is definitely an asset to your business. Keep up the great work Logan! I‚Äôll keep carrying my suitcases back and forth. lol! Thank you.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Fort Lauderdale
review_text: Karina is an exceptional physical therapist who has helped me far beyond just my hand. Her expertise and compassion have guided me through a traumatic experience, and I‚Äôve seen a huge improvement thanks to her care. I‚Äôm truly grateful for her support and highly recommend her!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Fort Lauderdale
review_text:
Karina is excellent for hand and wrist therapy!
I'd recommend her to all my family and friends.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Fort Lauderdale
review_text: My therapist, Karina Souza, is excellent, knowledgeable, patient and spends time with me to explain the procedures. Select is a small, calm facility where the therapists are able to work one on one with their  patients. I recommend it without reservation.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Lake Road
review_text:
Excellent Care & Compassion at Select Physical Therapy ‚Äì Palm Harbor

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Select Physical Therapy in Palm Harbor! From the moment I walked in, I felt cared for and supported through every step of my recovery.

Brooke is absolutely amazing ‚Äî not only is she incredibly knowledgeable, but she‚Äôs also super sweet, patient, and truly committed to helping her patients feel better. She made a huge difference in my healing process, and I always felt like I was in the best hands.

They‚Äôve helped me work through both spinal and cervical issues, and supported me after my platelet therapy as well. Their approach is professional, personalized, and always encouraging. The entire staff is warm, welcoming, and clearly passionate about what they do.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place that will treat you like more than just a patient ‚Äî a place where you‚Äôll be motivated, guided, and genuinely cared for ‚Äî I highly recommend Select Physical Therapy in Palm Harbor. They‚Äôre the best!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Lake Road
review_text: My first visit was a very great experience. Preston was very thorough and he made me feel very comfortable. He explained everything to me and I know I will succeed and I will get my balancing back and I know he's very well trained. Thank you select physical therapy can't wait to continue with you guys.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Lake Road
review_text: I cannot speak highly enough of this physical therapy location. I had multiple surgeries on my finger due to a dog bite which left me with tons of painful scar tissue and I lost the ability to use my finger. My surgeon specifically recommended this location for OT as they have hand specialists. From the moment I walked in I knew I‚Äôd hit the jackpot. The space was clean, all the staff is friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. My therapist, Brianna, is phenomenal! I noticed a decrease in pain in my finger after the first appt!! I have continued to go and have so much more use of my hand and now have peace of mind that I will fully heal. Thank you for providing such wonderful service and care!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Lake Road
review_text:
David Heuberger was knowledgeable, patient and attentive, and made sure I understood the treatment plan. His professional manner put me at ease, and I felt genuinely cared for throughout the visit. The therapy he suggested was effective and the results were noticeable within a short time.
The clinic itself is clean and the staff are friendly. From check-in to the consultation, everything ran smoothly. I highly recommend David Heuberger to anyone seeking thoughtful, expert care.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Lake Road
review_text: Brook L. At Eastlake select therapy is so sweet and ask all the time if I had pain or ok with my workout .. always ask if I had any problems at home doing on my own everyday .. I can feel getting stronger with this therapy program which  is my goal for a pre surgery to heal faster .. she has a beautiful soul

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Pembroke Pines
review_text: I get a bill for sessions that my insurance paid for over a year later. I missed the notice so they send it to collections a month later.  Way too many issues between this company and my insurance... and my insurance always paid the bill.  If I have to do therapy again I'll go somewhere else. Christine at the front desk is helpful.  They have a few good therapist there.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Pembroke Pines
review_text: I had a complete evaluation and a very productive first session with Lindsay.She was very understanding of my needs and for sure my Physical Therapy will be a success

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Pembroke Pines
review_text: Alejandra is an amazing hand specialist. I‚Äôve just started with her and I already feel like I have more mobility.   They‚Äôre also very accommodating with appointments. Helpful and friendly staff.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Pembroke Pines
review_text:
Alahandra does a great job with her clients and is an excellent trainer of up and coming physical therapists.
I feel safe and secure in her care and look forward to a full recovery under her watchful eye.
Peggy Craft

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - East Pembroke Pines
review_text: I was there in 2016 and when I came back January 2025 it was so wonderful to see a couple of the gals were still there. I‚Äôm back now after full hip replacement and I‚Äôm getting the best therapy!

My therapy center offered a welcoming and safe athmosphere for me to work on getting back to walking. Daniel Oberton was kind respectful and knew how to treat me with care and also supported me through exercises I didn‚Äôt even know I could do yet! Great place and would highly recommend.

Michelle is wonderful. Highly skilled pt. She listens carefully and provides the best treatment specifically designed for you. She very professional and personable.
Mg

Rachelle Rhodes is incredible. Her ability to feel and scan the issues with my back, exercise selection, specific instructions given for exercises, etc, have all exceeded my expectations.
I was about to spend thousands for Private rehab (not covered by insurance) with brand new high tech machines, but once I checked out Select PT Hallandale I was relieved that I had a Professional in Rochelle that knew exactly what exercises and treatment I needed. I started feeling better within 2 visits, and I'm super optimistic I can get my disc back into place with her so that I can avoid surgery (or Huge rehab bills).
Also, other therapists at this location look really great there as well. I had one visit with Scotty and had another great experience.
& to top it off, the office staff is a pleasure to work with, honestly.

I went to them for counseling. Before the service, they confirmed that everything would be covered by my insurance. I made a co-payment of $21.50. I never went back to them again. This is a useless treatment. It is just regular physical exercises that you can do on your own in front of the TV. No special equipment. Just a few gym machines that are in every house. But on top of that, a few months later I received a bill from them for $205 that was supposedly not covered by insurance. This is simply a scam network that exploits not only the American health insurance system, but also encroaches on the wallets of ordinary Americans. Fortunately, I have a law degree and will take this case to court. And you don't need to write me polite replies here with regrets. You have my contact (my acc. # 141637959). I would never advise anyone to visit this establishment!
Excellent physical therapy at this location. I have received treatment from Michelle and Lana. Everyone at location very professional !!

Select Physical Therapy
Please beware of this business. My care was very poor and I was promised by Lisa on 3/21/25 that because of the rudeness by my therapist that my $30 copay would be waved and here it is 5/14/25 and she will not return my phone calls and i am still receiving bills.The last call I was told the manager Michelle would call me but of course she has not bothered. If I don't hear from her soon I will tell in the review exactly what Elizabeth Del Valle is claiming was just her bad day.
The therapist's name is Elizabeth Del Valle, she has called me to say she was upset about her daughter being ill. I have been a RN over 30 years and i know what professional patient care is and the rude comments she said to me were far from appropriate.
Larry Green RN

In 2022 my primary doctor referred me to Select Physical Therapy and I was so very satisfied with the care that I received there that I took the time to write a thank you letter upon the completion of my therapy. Recently, when I needed physical therapy services again, I requested my new primary doctor to refer me to Select Physical Therapy instead of any of the other PT providers that they typically referred their patients to. Although I have only had the initial evaluation and 3 physical therapy sessions so far, I know that I am in good hands and I have every expectation of reaching my recovery goals just as I did 3 years prior.
Andreas Monroe is an excellent physical therapist. He is attuned to his patients needs as well as their abilities. I definitely recommend him as a physical therapist.

I just wrapped up four months of physical therapy with Andreas Monroe, and I can‚Äôt say enough about the incredible job he did throughout my rehab journey. Andreas is not only extremely knowledgeable, but he also has a fantastic way of encouraging and reinforcing progress every step of the way. His positivity, attention to detail, and genuine care made a huge difference in my recovery.
The environment at the clinic is equally impressive. Everyone is wonderful‚Äîfriendly, polite, respectful, and truly dedicated to your well-being. It‚Äôs clear that their goal is to help you get better each and every week, and they do it with heart.
I also want to give a special shoutout to Lauren, Yordan, and Daniel. Even though Andreas was my primary therapist, they never missed a beat when stepping in. Their teamwork, communication, and consistency made the whole experience feel seamless.
This team is top-notch, and I‚Äôm beyond grateful for the support, professionalism, and encouragement they gave me through every session.

My therapist Dr Alexa Smith is really exceptional. I actually look forward to my sessions.
She is professional, kind, knowledgeable and takes the time and patience to answer all my questions and concerns, explains everything in detail which makes it easier for me to follow through on my own at home.
I would most highly recommend Alexa if you ever find yourself in need of a hand specialist.

Heather is an awesome therapist,  she's very professional and polite, everyone working there is friendly and professional.
I highly recommend Select Therapy @ Jax Bch

Eric Pickett is the best!  I have been going to him for about a year and he has really made an impact on my neck issues.  He is caring and determined to get you to a point of comfort even when you feel it's not possible.  He is very dedicated and also makes the visit pleasant as he is very funny and likes to make you laugh.  Sometimes these visits can be painful to get through depending on your situation but he always does his best to make you laugh through it all.  Highly recommend Select Physical Therapy!

If you need PT, go here.  Eric and his team supported my wife with issues for a number of years and on her recommendation, I went to Eric for PT following my total knee replacement.  Best call I could have made.  Eric and the whole team at Select have greatly sped up and enhanced my recovery!!  Eric is super knowledgable and runs an awesome crew.   I live down in Nocatee and it is 100% worth the drive to go to see Eric and team.  Most strongly recommend Eric and this location.  It is absolutely worth the time/transport commit to see him!!!

Highly recommend Select Physical Therapy with Eric Pickett. I have been going to chiropractors for 20 years + and saw Eric a few times and my body is finally anatomically correct. Pain free and knots are almost all gone. He is amazing and owe my overall health improvement to Eric. He really fixed me. My life is finally going back to normal again after 25 years. Thanks Eric and staff at Select Physical Therapy, you changed my life for the better and owe it all to you. God Bless this staff for their healing compassion with their patients.
Thanks for reading and I hope you make the right decision because I'm so blessed my doctor referred me to Eric. Have a Happy Day! I am now.
Eric Pickett is the best physical therapist I have ever been to.

Wow‚Äîwhat a game changer! I had been struggling with neck pain for what felt like forever, and nothing seemed to help. Then I found Jillian Chong at Select Physical Therapy @ Kendall, and honestly, I wish I had gone sooner.

From day one, she made me feel comfortable and really listened to what I was going through. She explained everything clearly, tailored the treatment to me, and even gave me easy exercises I could do at home. Within just a few visits, I felt a huge difference‚Äîand now the pain is completely gone!

What I love most is that Jillian genuinely cares about her patients. You can tell she's not just going through the motions‚Äî she is truly invested in helping you feel better. The whole office has such a welcoming vibe too, which makes the experience even better. The music they have on is perfect!!

If you‚Äôre dealing with any kind of pain, don‚Äôt wait like I did‚Äîgo see Jillian. She is amazing and I can‚Äôt recommend her enough!

This clinic is incredible. The staff is knowledgeable and compassionate. Jorge is a great physical therapist, always keeping his patient‚Äôs best interest at heart. I wouldn‚Äôt want to go anywhere else for therapy!

I went to about 13 rehab sessions with Dr. Jorge Porter-Wolf for my knee and elbow. His knowlegge, rehab plan and attention to details resulted in a very successful result. Very friendly staff, nice facility and convenient location. I would recommend his office to anyone neding rehab.
This place is great. Satinder is the best. She has helped me immensely in my rehab. She works me hard and helps me get better. If you shoulder rehab, this the place to go.

I am just starting physical therapy at Select Physical Therapy.  The person mentioned in a email to me to give a satisfaction survey isn't familiar to me.  I used Select Physical Therapy in the past and was a very satfied patient then.  That's why I am using them once again.
She is a well skilled Physical Therapist. I feel I'm in good hands, and on .y way to healing!

As a 71 Y/O having had a hip labrum repair, I wanted the most knowledgeable and helpful Physical Therapist. Zach Martin DPT is the best fit for my recovery plan. He is friendly and professional. Nothing beats a pro.
Follow up y'all! After 2 months of PT I can walk 5 miles without pain. The hip and labrum have responded very well to the process. Zach did a great job.

My experience as a patience with Select Physical Therapy still great! Specially, Matthew Leonard (Physical Therapist). This provider allows me to feel hope with the plan establish based on my physical needs. Respectful and dedication are two adjectives I can use to describe staff customer service. I am very satisfy with Select Physical Therapy. Nonetheless, my only concern is the space available to provide therapies. There should be more space to promote privacy.

I just want to say THANK YOU to my therapist Nicole for being so AWESOME!!! This was my first time going to therapy for any injury so I was really nervous and didn‚Äôt know what to expect. Nicole made a huge impression by being so friendly, listening to my needs,  made me feel comfortable, and most of very exceptional at her job. With a couple of sessions I was able to bend my finger and on my way to recovery. You‚Äôre simply the best at what you do... The Select PT staff are super FRIENDLY from the moment you walk in and greeted by Ms. Carol and the other therapist just ready to assist. On top of that they take everyones health safety seriously from required face covering, temperature checks, hand washing, and sanitation. Yes, I strongly recommend this place to my friends, family, and everyone.

Outstanding physical therapy provider recommended by some of the best Dr's in FL. Nicole Hudson is "outstanding" and a consummate professional and "subject matter expert" on upper extremity fractures, tendon repair, and sprains. She is also skilled with customize splinting to facilitate quicker healing. No doubt the best in Central Florida.

Christine helped me through a series of exercises and explained what they should accomplish.  She made certain the exercises were within my range of comfort, while challenging me to work a little beyond that.

This place is very easy to get into and they are very accommodating. The staff is very friendly, welcoming, and knowledgeable.  They go above and beyond to make you comfortable. While i am only accompanying someone to these appointments,  i have been in many physical therapy facilities.  This is not the atheistically nicest facility i have been too and it is quite small but the staff make up for that significantly. Other facilities leave you for long periods of time without instructions on what to do next and basically are over booked so they barely interact with you.
