While this place could use an upgrade inside that is not at all a reflection of the care you'll recieve. The care is superior and personal. Chapman is the PT we work with and he has been nothing short of amazing with my special needs child. He actively engages her and can get her to participate without any problems. We will use this place for any future PT needs that come up.

I can‚Äôt say enough about Select Physical Therapy!  From the first time I walked in the door I felt very comfortable with the staff there. The lady at the front desk was very helpful from the beginning and continues to be not only helpful but friendly and sweet. Drew, my therapist, is so good at his job. It was apparent from the beginning that he is intent on helping me get the use of my hand back after my surgery. Drew not only follows the plan my doctor has set but will not hesitate to contact my doctor while we are working together if there is a question. I know my doctor is impressed with Select P T because we have discussed it. I am very glad I wound up working with Select P T!

Walking into Select PT I was a bit apprehensive as I had been to other PT facilities in the past without a lot of success. Walking in I was greeted with a friendly smile from the receptionist an asked to fill out some paperwork for my visit.
After completing my paperwork, Christine greeted me with a pleasant smile and brought me back into the PT area. She took the time to ask me very pointed questions about my surgery and the pain I am experiencing. upon completing the question-and-answer interview, Christine spent the time to manually examine those areas that were giving me the most pain.
Christine had me do basic exercises to check my range of motion. After two sessions with Christine, I noticed remarkable improvement even my wife noticed the improvement. The improvement continues each and every time I have another PT session.
I cannot say enough positive things about the professionalism, caring, and concern for her patients she shows every day. I am so impressed with Christine that my wife who will be having knee surgery in the near future will be going to Select PT and requesting Christine.
Sincerely,
Joe Baker

Christine shows the epitome of Physical Therapy knowledge and professionalism. She is courteous, cordial, a firm instructor and effective at explaining any questions you might have. The office is neat, clean and warm and welcoming. The front desk is quite pleasant. I highly recommend a visit here when needed.

As a nurse with pretty high standards for healthcare experiences, I don‚Äôt hand out medically related 5-star reviews lightly. Select Therapy has absolutely earned every star and more.

After struggling with sometimes debilitating hip pain for over a year, I‚Äôve already seen improvement in my mobility in just two sessions. Michael has been kind, thoughtful, and attentive. He truly listened to my concerns and built a care plan that feels personalized and tailored to my needs.

He has a great ability to explain the why behind everything we‚Äôre doing. It‚Äôs clear he cares not just about my exercise outcomes, but about making sure I understand and am educated every step of the way. Sessions are fun and productive.

If you‚Äôre looking for a therapy group that actually listens to your input and knows how to get results, I highly recommend Select Therapy. You‚Äôre in good hands here.

I would like to add that Julie Hobbs, my therapist, has been a major reason why I'm happy to return each session.  She engages you to challenge yourself and explains everything so well.  She also rewards good work with encouraging comments.  She is definitely supportive and I've learned a lot from her.  Thanks Julie!

Michael Bonner and his team were the best during my recovery. They made sure I got the best care and recommendations for healing. The crew was friendly, inviting and encouraging which made for a relaxed atmosphere. Thank you everyone..Tonyü´∂üèø

I am six weeks post op from knee replacement surgery. I have found Michael to be an excellent therapist. He has kept the exercises varied and challenging. Today I was able to bend my knee 120 degrees. He has also been very honest about the time it will take for full recovery. I am extremely pleased with my progress after just five sessions.

I've been going here for about two months and let me say at first I was very skeptical reason being I was going somewhere else for therapy from 2016 till the beginning of 2024 my previous therapist did not go the lengths these guy went. I honestly thought going here would be no different than where I went previously to be honest I was wrong. They show real concern regarding your recovery they are kind, caring and genuinely nice people. My leg was pretty messed up and have always been swollen I was told by previous doctor and therapist that this is as good as I'm going to get regarding pain swelling and limited mobility they were all wrong thanks to the guys here a select physical therapy. I'm generally a healthy guy who likes to be active run/jog play soccer ect.. since my accident I've been depressed üòî and has had a lack of energy because I don't feel like myself and can't do the things I want to even with my kids. Putting on underwear,  pants, sock and shoes were challenging for me i Normally would have to sit to get those things done now select physical has put me in a different mind space as far as healing since going here I've seen and felt a dramatic change in range of motion muscle weakness bone and joint pain and I'm beginning to feel certain sensation that I haven't felt for almost a decade I am extremely happy with my treatment because now I'm making real progress due to the excellent care I'm receiving from these wonderful people. I would like to thank Mike, Jen, megan and julie you are all amazing and I'm glad I came to you guys for treatment.
I'm so grateful to everyone for their kindness, care, and advice on how to improve my therapy. Thanks to my therapists, I've improved a lot and to the routines they've given me to follow at home.

After just one visit. I started having spasms in my neck, headaches, unbearable back pain. I called and ask someone to speak with me about what happened. I was told there was no one there qualified to talk to me. They said my therapist would call -that never happened. I am going to the hospital to get MRIs on my back, neck and head and see if I can have a doctor figure out what was done to me., I can‚Äôt walk nor take care of myself at all. I suggest if you care about your health, don‚Äôt risk a company who harms you and doesn‚Äôt even call you to check on you.
Never received a call to scheduled my appointments. Received a bill. Poor communication.

Staff is very friendly and make you feel at ease. Also they are very good at answering questions and helping to move beyond your current issues. I highly recommend them if you are in need of physical therapy!

Chapman, Taylor, and all the Physical Therapists at Select are friendly, knowledgeable, and attentive. This is a small facility with lower patient to PT ratios in comparison to large facilities allowing for improved quality of care. I‚Äôd recommend this Select of your individualized recovery needs.

I‚Äôve had a truly outstanding experience working with Koenraad. He is knowledgeable, attentive, and takes the time to understand my issue but also how it was impacting my day-to-day life. His personalized approach, combined with clear explanations and hands-on support, made a real difference in my recovery. I felt heard, supported, and genuinely cared for throughout the process. I highly recommend Koenraad to anyone looking for a physical therapist who is both skilled and compassionate.

Was skeptical about physical therapy for my lower back and sciatica pain in both legs...however Koenraad listened and worked with me for 3 visits and relieved my pain.  He gave me the tools I needed to work at home to continue on my recovery and stay pain free.  Wonderful experience!!!  Thank you so much!!

Select PT was the right choice for me when I needed help with pain my right shoulder. The PT was able to explain why I was feeling pain and provide exercises and treatment. The staff is friendly and understanding.

Having had a stroke, one year ago.I've experienced p.t. on a on-going basis. I can say with certainty that select p.t. has been a very positive and encouraging experience, working with my assigned therapist. The degree of professionalism was apparent the day I walked into the facility. I would encourage anyone needing p.t to request their services.

I was on vacation and hurt my shoulder.i was referred to  Select Physical Therapy and saw Koenraad there.  He is so attentive and thorough and has helped me so much! I would highly recommend his expertise!

MICHAEL OSCARSON is the best therapist. He has strong technical skills with effective communication with his patients. He developed a personalized treatment plan based on my needs and goals. He explained my treatment plan and progress in a way I understood clearly.  He always maintain a positive and encouraging attitude. MICHAEL OSCARSON  is the best!!!!!
Meghan has been a godsend. Not only is she tough on me when she needs to be, but she‚Äôs fun to be around and makes the hour go by fast  can‚Äôt recommend her enough

The Physical Therapy team is very knowledgeable.  My therapist, Harrison Johnson spends the extra time getting to know the client and the progress the patient is making, and updates the care plan accordingly.  The staff at Select Physical Therapy is excellent as well.  Highly recommended!

Wish I could give Megan Boudreaux SIX stars!  She is the absolute best.  Very knowledgeable, conscientious, tailors the therapy each session to the progress of the patient, devises ways to make it interesting and fun, as well as effective.  I have been to other physical therapy institutions.  Megan Boudreaux and Select Therapy is the head and shoulders above anywhere else.  Highly recommend!

My 85 year old mother is seeing Harrison for shoulder surgery recovery. He is caring, personable and compassionate. Highly recommend! Front Desk staff is friendly and cheerful . Overall a welcoming , friend atmosphere.

Select Physical Therapy has a great team of professionals the facilities are always clean and organized. Therapist Catalina Flores is an outstanding member of the team  likes to work with the patients and explains all exercises clearly
The team at this location is top notch. I have found them to be caring and experts in physical therapy and advice. I would recommend them every time for their professional services.

I have had much success with my treatment at the Miami Lakes Select facility.  this team is supportive, patient, understanding,, incredibly knowledgeable and they are serious when it comes to your health and improvement.  10 stars
Every one there is extremely friendly and helpful.    They will do everything they can to help you attain your goals.  Great therapists and staff.

This is my second time to receive therapy for a different problem at Select Physical Therapy. The staff is very nice, professional and knowledgeable and personable. I have always received great service. Roy is wonderful and has helped me tremendously and my symptoms have improved. I have recommended Select Physical Therapy to other people and will continue to do so. Thank you for enjoying what you do and it shows!

Staff displayed caring respectful attitude.
Some delays in registration as well as in initiation of needs assessment. The assessment was however thorough and respectful. Care plan was created based on needs assessment. Overall satisfaction with process.

Front desk staff and is very pleasant and professional.
The therapists are very knowledgeable and patient. The manager stays in full engagement and awareness all the time.

The professionalism and integrity of the practice's staff, as well as their kindness, willingness, and warmth towards patients are unsurpassed.
Excellent physical environment, facilities, and equipment.
Punctuality, with virtually no wait time for care.

Franz is a knowledgeable, patient, caring and respectful therapist. He provides top care on every visit. A true professional.
Definitely worth 5 stars! I highly recommend him. Thank you Franz!
I tore my rotator cuff, so far I have completed three sessions and the staff have been professional and my appointments have been on time.  I will update my progress in the future.

I had an outstanding experience at Select Physical Therapy. thanks to the exceptional care provided by my physiotherapist Halley Larmon. From the very first session, her professionalism, dedication, and deep knowledge stood out.

Her ability to explain the ‚Äúwhy‚Äù behind each exercise helped me feel more engaged in my recovery, and her attention to detail ensured that I was progressing safely and steadily.

I‚Äôm genuinely grateful and would highly recommend Halley Larmon to anyone in need of a skilled and compassionate physiotherapist.

When my doctor first prescribed physical therapy for my hip tendinitis and bursitis I was not looking forward to the treatment and time commitment.  I was happily surprised when I started working with Halley at Select.  She‚Äôs very knowledgeable, and took the time to explain my condition, and what physical therapy could do for me.  I‚Äôve been so pleased with the exercises and stretches tailored for my needs.  So here‚Äôs a shoutout to Halley, Micaela, and the friendly staff at Select!

Halley has been so amazing in treating my daughter‚Äôs issue. Even after just three sessions my daughter has noticed a difference. She‚Äôs very knowledgeable! This is actually the second place we have been to for PT with this issue. I‚Äôm so glad we picked Select and Halley!

Therapist was well versed in diagnosing my issues and needs. She listened and communicated well with her plan of action. Facility was clean and well kept and employees friendly and caring. Felt welcomed and valued. An excellent local option for PT.

Five Stars to Select Physical Therapy.  My wife has received physical therapy from Milton and the result has been remarkable. We truly appreciate not only Milton's excellent skill but also his true compassion for his patients.  The Facility and equipment are excellent. A shout out to Yvette and Tiffany in the front office who are very friendly and efficient.

Jonathan provided exceptional physical therapy care. He demonstrated a remarkable ability to clearly explain each step of the treatment process, ensuring I understood the rationale behind his recommendations. While his approach was meticulous and thorough, he consistently offered reassurance about my eventual recovery. Beyond his professional expertise, Jonathan's genuinely kind and personable demeanor significantly enhanced my experience. His natural warmth, while likely not a formal component of his training, was a notable and appreciated aspect of his care.

Select PT is run extremely professional with the highest level of compassion and courtesy I've experienced in years...you get in and your therapist listens to your every word to come up with the appropriate plan just for you and out with all the information you need until the next session. The staff is warm and caring and tend to your personal needs quickly and efficiently....I would highly recommend Select PT for whatever physical therapy you might need...My therapist, Harrison with his warmth and sincerity were far above what I had expected...I leave the office confident that I was getting the help I desperately needed
Johnny, Shirley and Janine were my therapists. They educated me to  improve my condition and also do some exercises at home.  Very professional and courteous staff. Appointments are on time.

Mr. Derion Pittman is experienced, knowledgeable, effective and kind. I highly recommend any of the physical therapists that work in the evenings. They are a great team. Shirley is a professional and very helpful and patient.
Mia is an outstanding practitioner. She has excellent bedside manner and has helped me improve my health condition with the utmost care and attention.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - North Palm Beach
review_text: Elisha front desk person  Cara my therapist is amazing ! Cara.really cares about her clients and does a great job with exercises to strengthen areas needing attention. Last time I had hip surgery and the exercises and varied routine focused on my weaknesses She helped me gain strength and balance and confidence that I would walk again. Cara Garcia Thank you for being so awesome

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - North Palm Beach
review_text: My PT Cara Garcia, is great,. She has positive vibes, very caring and supportive and knowledgeable. I love going to Selective Physical Therapy.. Everyone is very friendly. From the front desk on. üëçüèæ ‚úÖüíØüíú

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - North Palm Beach
review_text: Christopher evaluated my ability very quickly (30 years experience shows) and tailored a home routine that I have attacked and done diligently allowing me to gain flexibility stability.  I value the collaborative effort at home and on-site that he provides.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - North Palm Beach
review_text:
This is a great place for PT as they give FULL attention and don‚Äôt wander away while I‚Äùm exercising. I worry a bit about that since my heart and foot operation.
The equipment is new and CLEAN, very important !
I‚Äôm glad Google wanted to know about this, 5 stars to the staff,(Cara and Chris) for their patience and care. Great location too!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - North Palm Beach
review_text: Dr. Marlee is a Physical Therapy Rock Star. She is knowledgeable, caring and very organized. In six weeks her expertise has reduced pain for a pinched nerve in one shoulder and a complete tear in the other. My pain has been reduced from 8-9 to 2-3 level. I highly recommend. Thank you Select Therapy for Dr. Marlee.

I have been going to Select Therapy for over 15 years. I always work with Kelli Cash. She has to be one of the best therapist in Tampa. The facility is clean and the personnel is professional and courteous. But the results that I get from the therapy and the knowledge that she has is fantastic üëçüèª

I am working with Kellie Cash at Select Physical Therapy and I am quite pleased.  Kellie focuses on me the entire time I am with her - she is very open to questions and she explains every step of my treatment.  I feel like I am in very good hands and that she will be able to get me through the therapy with positive results.

They are all great, and I mean all. Not one of the staff members, let me down. They are personable. Very professional and warm. Would definitely go back. You have to experience it for yourself. From Christopher at the front desk to the back staff Troy, Jarrett, and I don‚Äôt remember the ladies name ( maybe Sandy). Took good care of me.

Great front office staff very informative ,making a appointment is very easy. I had a total knee replacement in December, my physical therapist is Jarrett Stark he's doing wonders with my therapy, I would highly recommend Jarrett and this facility to anyone needing physical therapy
Robert H

I STRONGLY DISCOURAGE anyone from considering pursuing pelvic floor physical therapy at this location. I cannot speak to the quality of their other physical therapy services.

I came to this location a week ago for a  pelvic floor physical therapy intake. I was referred here by my doctor. I am very dissatisfied with my experience and have discontinued treatment here.

The pelvic floor physical therapist was visibly nervous, uncomfortable (especially during the diagnostic test), and perhaps even desperate. This of course made me feel nervous and uncomfortable. She spoke very fast and did not adequately explain her rationale for proposed treatments ‚Äî worse still, the only exercise she proposed for me to do outside of session was outlined on a crude handout, and she did not provide instructions, walk me through it, or ensure that I was using proper technique (after discussing with another PT, it turns out, I was not doing it correctly at all). Additionally, the prescribed exercise contradicted the recommendations she provided during the session. (She said she did not want me to do any kegels, but kegels are a prominent part of the exercise in the handout.)

Overall, I felt that the therapist was reciting a slightly adapted script instead of engaging in a necessary dialogue about my symptoms and needs. She was eager to speak and give handouts but not to listen or adequately explain. I was not able to ask important questions because of how much she spoke. She was unprofessional regarding her criticism about my other medical providers.
Excellent personalization and ease of appointment making as well as great location

I have been suffering with an at work Achilles injury. I even had brief pt with a different business (very unsuccessfully). Lydell made me cry tears of joy and healing. He listened and his applied knowledge actually has me seeing relief from my pain. I am beyond happy with Lyndell at Select PT. Not to mention, but Deborah at the front desk is such a kind and positive person. Thank you so much. I look forward to this journey going forward into my regained health.

The physical therapists in this environment are caring, compassionate, and thorough. From the receptionist to the leadership, professionalism is practiced. I received auspicious rehabilitative treatment and enjoyed the process of healing and restoring my knees. Kudos to an outstanding team.
Weird. I was there to get a print-out for Physical Therapy exercises?

The physical therapist are awesome and really work hard to get patience back into the best shape possible or even better.  They are dedicated and sympathetic to the needs of their patience.  I would highly recommend Select Physical Therapy to anyone and especially family that needs a great helping hand in getting their injuries back into working order.

I am very happy with services received. I have felt major improvement after starting therapy. Even like the fact that they sent me link to an app with the different exercises that i needed to do at home. Staff is very knowledgeable, welcoming and friendly. Feels like meeting with friends.

**The only issue with this location is the faulty A/c in the building.  77¬∞ inside a closed glass cubicle can be a little toasty. Feeling like a little turkey in the oven on Thanksgiving. Gobble gobble ü¶É. ***

Other than that is great.

My physical therapist,  Alicia is great.  She is very knowledgeable, professional and personable.   The exercises she has me doing are really helping with my knee pain and mobility.
I have met several of the other physical therapists, and they all have been wonderful, as well.

Went to Select Physical Therapy on Michigan St. in Orlando and it was awesome.  Had Whitney as my therapist.  She is my miracle worker.  I always had knee pain, but she informed me it was also my ham string that was hurting (behind my knee).  Since seeing her, I am back to my old self with walking a lot.  I really feel great.  Thank you Whitney

Therapists there are very patient oriented and empathic. They function as a tight team to assist each other with patients as needed.  In particular, Brian Sommer was outstanding working with me and together we improved my range of motion, flexibility, and reduced my back pain.  I actually looked forward to going to each of my sessions.

This is a wonderful location to do PT. The staff are welcoming and kind. They are always on time and run smoothly. Brian is a fantastic therapist, very knowledgeable and considerate. Everyone there is kind and it is a friendly environment. While the location is small and can get busy in the afternoons, it is still well run and you feel like you get the attention you need. I highly recommend.

Shout out to the wonderful crew at Ormond Beach Select Physical Therapy 1400 Hand Avenue in Ormond Beach  Florida for joining me in wishing Smokey Bear a Happy  Birthday as we celebrate his 80 years of Service this year. Pattie, Mark and Rick have been integral in providing me the guidance and care as I continue to improve my mobility, flexibility and relieving my chronic pain.  Thank you kids ! 2/27/24

The whole staff is very professional and caring. Pattie and Mark were kind and detailed in helping me recover from my knee replacement surgery. They laid out a program that was key to my healing process and worked individually with me every visit. Heath at the front desk was flexible and easy to schedule appointments  with and he explained billing prior to treatment making the whole process seamless. Big thank you to all the staff and I highly recommend if you are in future need of Physical Therapy.

I had PT 3x/wk, and every time it was primarily Mark I was working with. Mark was great to work with. Cool dude, easy to get along with, professional. Observing him with other patients, I can see he‚Äôs great at building rapport with everyone he works with.

Pattie was always around working with other patients, she‚Äôs great and always has a smile on her face!

And I‚Äôm so sorry, I cannot remember the name of the lady up front, but she deserves a shoutout too as she‚Äôs always the first smiling face I see walking through the door, she greets everyone every single time, and she‚Äôs just fantastic at what she does! Very kind and caring, she helps you feel at home!
This is a great physical therapy place. it's very quiet and peaceful, the physical therapist's are great individuals who are very knowledgeable of the profession and very nice and respectful as well.
Mark deserves 10 stars! He was very kind and patient with my 12 yr old daughter. She even commented about how nice he was when we left therapy!

The staff in the PH office is wonderful. I received my care there following my knee replacement in 2022 and my husband was a patient there with Gordon a few months ago.
I also worked for your company a few years ago in Largo with Koenrad and Sherry
We wouldn't go anywhere else, and I  have referred many  Dunedin friends to that PH office as well.
I know my recovery will be complete as Gordon is the best.

I've had 5 appointments with Cayla for a very tender and sore elbow. The problem is named "lateral epicondylitis" but commonly referred to as "tennis elbow". Cayla gave me a combination of massage and light exercises to help repair and strengthen the forearm tendons. While I still have some discomfort my elbow is about 80% better. I hope to be at 100% in a few more weeks.

Select Physical therapy in Palm Harbor is excellent if you are in need. Especially PT Eric Barnes. He is informative, knowledgeable and professional, targeting pain relief and offering many options for home care. The front desk is awesome, friendly and accommodating. You will not be disappointed.

Cayla was patient with me and explained what I needed to do to reduce my pain.  She also gave me exercises to reduce pain and build strengthe to help keep the pain from returning.  This is my second series of treatments by Select, and both have been outstanding, professional and helpful

Thank you Eric for helping me work through my frozen shoulder issues and giving me the knowledge and confidence to continue it on my own.  It was wonderful to see a kind face to begin my morning and  help me to have more comfortable dayswith a lot less pain.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Plant City East
review_text: All if the staff at this location are exceptional! Every therapist I had the pleasure of working with helped me in their own way during my recovery from ACL surgery. If you're looking for caring, compassionate people to help aide in your recovery, this is the place for you!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Plant City East
review_text: I've been to this Select Physical Therapy location for several different injuries and rehab from surgeries, and the staff has been very talented and professional. During my recent visit, Gillian was my therapist. She worked with me to improve my range of motion, decrease pain, and get back to doing normal activities. I also had the opportunity to work with Annie, a graduate student, who was very knowledgeable about my injury and took time to review my charts before helping me blindly. I appreciate both Gillian and Annie's dedication to helping me recover!!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Plant City East
review_text:
WOW!! Being in the business of customer service, I have high expectations when it comes to providing excellence!  Vivian and Maria are the reason I celebrated being able to continue therapy with them after a devastating injury. They are both very thorough and thoughtful. They provide clear and concise direction and push me to reach my goals. I enjoy the great atmosphere and effort they both put in to their clients‚Äô recovery. I highly rate and recommend this physical therapy location.
Thank you, team!!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Plant City East
review_text: Wonderful service! They are very flexible, encouraging and easy to work with. Maria is very calm and confident with her work! The others step in and cover care for each other to keep therapy consistent. I would highly recommend their practice.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Plant City East
review_text: I would like to take a moment to recognize Maria, Vivian, and Timothy for their exceptional hard work and dedication in helping individuals like me reclaim their lives and receive the rehabilitation I need. After my brain surgery, the journey to recovery was long and challenging, but these three therapists were with me every step of the way. They provided constant encouragement and support, pushing me to keep going even when I felt like giving up. Thanks to their commitment and care, I have regained a level of mobility that I never thought possible. I truly owe them my deepest thanks for all their help in my recovery. Their professionalism and kindness made all the difference.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Plant City West
review_text: This office and staff  are top shelf. Very well educated and trained therapists. They follow your progress and introduce new exercises to get you back to normal.  They are very caring and know your limitations.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Plant City West
review_text: The gentleman working with me,Jeanette , is knowledgeable and understanding.  We will see as things progress as my balance issue is an old one and hindered by the surgeries I had.  I suffer from Minere syndrome and lose more balance with every attack, as well as hearing.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Plant City West
review_text: All the physical therapists that I have met at the Plant City location are knowledgeable and friendly. There is a good vibe going on there. Maritza( Luz) is the main PT who has been helping me. She has a great personality.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Plant City West
review_text: The entire staff are wonderful. My physical therapist Ryan is great and funny. No pressure tactics to overexert your body. I would highly recommend Select Physical Therapy - Plant City West location.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Plant City West
review_text: I enjoyed the attentiveness to my "doing" the therapies while at the Select Physical Therapy Plant City West Alexander : from time-to-time I was posturing incorrectly and benefited from the corrections received.  Wonderful experience, assisted my recovery a lot.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Port St Lucie
review_text: My wife, Cheryl, and I have been going to Select PT for several serious injuries  we received in a. Automobile accident back in December 2024.  We have had Ashley, Rick, and Taylor during our many visits for PT.  I recently had neck & spine surgery from the accident and my surgeon advised me that all of the neck and shoulder PT that I had before the surgery helped me to recover from the surgery faster and with less issues.  I never got a stiff neck from the neck brace.  I still have another 5 weeks of PT for this surgery. My wife has shoulder replacement surgery coming up in a couple of weeks also from the accident.  She will be back at Select for PT.  We really enjoyed and appreciate the PT care we receive from Ashley, Rick, & Taylor along with the staff in the front office.  We are definitely feeling better. Thanks Select PT.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Port St Lucie
review_text: It is a pleasure to work with Ashley. She is both knowledgeable and highly qualified about her work. She is working with me on vestibular therapy and is energetically researching additional treatments for my very difficult case. I would highly recommend Ashley.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Port St Lucie
review_text: I been dealing with neck pain since an accident 2 years ago and sometimes it‚Äôs really bad. Select Physical Therapy they are very professional and understanding, the therapist is giving me pain relief and a program of exercises to do at home that helps alleviate pain.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Port St Lucie
review_text: I would absolutely recommend Select Physical Therapy!  The entire staff is friendly and personable.  And Kiersten, Ashley, and Mario have guided me every step of the way through every exercise for my sciatica.  The exercises have helped tremendously!  It is so nice to meet a group of people who are so dedicated to helping people feel better.  THANK YOU, Select Physical Therapy!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Port St Lucie
review_text: Good therapy group, the staff are wonderful, and there's plenty of activities to get you back in the game. They're good at what they do, which is working with your type of injury.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Royal Palm Beach
review_text:
Nearly a year ago I had spinal fusion surgery and when I was able to start physical therapy, I used another therapy center, not Select, because at that time they were not part of my insurance network. I was not happy with my experience.

My daughter-in-law Jennifer works at Select in Royal Palm Beach and she suggested I try them. However, at that time, They were out of network for my insurance. As of January 1, 2025 my new insurance worked with them so I started using Select.

Therapists cannot work on family members so I have been working primarily with Karla and Jose, but mostly with Karla. What an enormous difference I have noticed during my sessions! They challenge me to do different things to strengthen my body. I did not have that experience at the former practice that I used.

Since I mostly see Karla I wanted specifically thank her for the care, concern and kindness that she extends to me at every visit. She truly is an asset to this practice. All of the therapists are pleasant and professional though.

I would not hesitate to recommend Select Physical Therapy in Royal Palm to anyone who needs a physical therapist.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Royal Palm Beach
review_text: I only have good things to say about this organization.  The Staff was very professional, accommodating and patient.  I will be returning to them right after surgery; which my therapist, doctors and I agreed on that was necessary for my complete healing. Thank you Jose and everyone that was part of my team.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Royal Palm Beach
review_text:
My daughter went there for physical therapy and was checking on her insurance.. but also asked what a direct price would be without insurance. They told us $100 directly or if we use insurance it would be 125 towards our deductible and an office visit(would have been around 200).. logically she decided she wanted to just pay $100 and not use the insurance. But the lady there said that once we know you have insurance, we cannot have you pay directly. That is just insane.
It‚Äôs obvious all they‚Äôre trying to do is they know they get more money for the insurance so they tell you, you can‚Äôt pay them directly. Obviously, we just went somewhere else, but this is such a scam.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Royal Palm Beach
review_text: Jennifer Is a super effective physical therapist. She is fully present with all of her patients. Jennifer is always looking & listening for anything to help her facilitate faster and better progress for her patients. She misses nothing. I tried another place after my hip replacement 1 time and thank God I didn't go back because I see & feel real progress with each session I have with Jennifer. She's super encouraging. All this helps me to go further than I expect every time while respecting & reinforcing Dr.'s restrictions. I believe Jennifer sets the high standard that is clearly visible with all the therapist At Select Physical Therapy - Royal Palm Beach. Thank you Jennifer

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Royal Palm Beach
review_text: Great service at Select Physical Therapy. Both Jose and and Rob have helped in my therapy and are patient and understanding.

I dont know Lisa, I've never worked with her. I have Amy as my PT and she is great! I just started at Select PT, only a few sessions but I find that Amy is knowledgeable, trustworthy and attentive! Lori at the desk does her best to schedule appointments as it is a very busy facility,  but so far so good on all accounts!

My first day 6/5/2025 at Select Physical Therapy - Sebastian the place is neat and the staff are nice and friendly especially Lori the front information counter staff and also my physical therapist Brianna Niquette she's nice and helpful.

I have had multiple joint replacements and there is no other place like Select in Sebastian. I've had both Brianna and Lisa, and both are top notch in my book. I went to another facility in Vero Beach...never again! This team gets the job done in a professional and caring manner.

I had my evaluation with Amy Craig and knew quickly she was going to help with the rehab on my shoulder. The next session I had was with Lisa was also very impressed, both are very good therapist that I would highly recommend going to. Be prepared to work hard.

Lisa was just the best! Providing teaching and instruction in special exercises that were specific to my condition,  she demonstrated her knowledge and was thorough and exacting when assessing my ability to carry out these functions properly until I could get them done correctly.

I am so thankful to both Lisa and Amy for being there with me during my physical therapy experience. Not only did they help with the healing process, they gave me some sense of control over my pain, instructing me in things that I could do to make the discomfort more tolerable.

If you should need physical therapy for any reason, these two wonderful people will set you on the right path to recovery.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - South Dale Mabry
review_text:
I‚Äôve had great experience with Select Physical Therapy so far and I highly recommend them! From start to finish, the process has been seamless. The staff is incredibly professional, and they are all very knowledgeable, which immediately puts you at ease. At the same time, the atmosphere is fun and upbeat, making each visit a positive experience.

Chris Pruitt is extremely knowledgeable in his field. He truly takes the time to listen to your concerns and understand your goals and expected outcomes. He is also fun to work with -  ensuring you feel comfortable and supported throughout the process.

The variety of exercises provided‚Äîboth in the office and at home‚Äîis excellent. Chris uses an app to supplement the at-home exercises, offering easy-to-follow instructions and reminders on frequency and reps. This app, along with the printed instructions, makes it so much easier to stay on track with recovery.

Overall, Select Physical Therapy has been fantastic in helping me on my journey to recovery, and I can‚Äôt thank Chris and the team enough for their dedication and support. I feel confident in my progress, and I‚Äôm excited to continue working with them!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - South Dale Mabry
review_text: Lydia and Chris have been phenomenal to me for so many months- I don‚Äôt know what I would have done without their expertise, kindness and compassion!! I will always go to Select South Dale Mabry!! Amazing staff, therapists!! Like a family to meüåüüåüüåüüåüüåü

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - South Dale Mabry
review_text: Fantastic experience, and my PT is definitely helping my lower back issues.  Ellen is incredible at what she does, and makes each session enjoyable.  Highly recommend!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - South Dale Mabry
review_text: Chris Pruitt really takes pride in his work as he built a custom splint for me.  I greatly appreciate the effort and time Chris spent not only taking off my previous splint and constructing my new splint.  Class act.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - South Dale Mabry
review_text: Select Physical Therapy on Dale Mabry is conveniently located and has a welcoming atmosphere. I recently finished physical therapy there with Andrew Bick, whose excellent guidance and care helped me regain the ability to walk and go up my stairs without pain. I highly recommend him and this location.

I used to work here years ago and I loved the people I worked with. I had PT here and my partner had PT here a few years back. And now I need it again. Two people I worked with years ago are still there. I had a therapist this time named Gabby oh my goodness she is truly a gem. Kind understanding and knows what she's doing my back already feels better.

The entire staff here is nothing less than stellar.  Unfortunately,  due to my age and the toll that military service and service at Tampa Fire and Police departments has taken on my body, I‚Äôve been going there off and on for several years.  Jake has been my personal physical therapist for the whole time and does he ever know his stuff!!! He does.  He is in tune with his patients‚Äô needs, knowledgeable of just what techniques and technologies to use and most of all, compassionate in the delivery of his service.  I will stay with Select for as long as I need therapy!

This is my 3rd time in PT and second time for my neck (which is what I am recovering from now) and Tyler Eisenbacher, PT at South Tampa Select Physical Therapy is very skilled and knowledgeable. It has also been a personal pleasure to work with Tyler as he is pleasant as he is skilled. I am improving every single visit and am confident with what Tyler is teaching me that I will be able to continue at home after school am done at the center. The front office staff are also incredibly helpful and efficient.

Select Physical Therapy South Tampa is awesome! The facility is clean, well equipped, and easy to access. Front staff are super friendly and helpful and make the process with scheduling, payments, insurance all very easy. The team is highly flexible and work with your schedule. My PT was Tyler and I went in for neck pain. I was down about my pain and wasn‚Äôt sure if I‚Äôd feel better but after the first session I started seeing improvements. I went for about two months and feel back to my old self. Tyler is absolute amazing! He is super knowledgeable and an all around great guy. You can tell he genuinely cares about helping you feel better and helps develop a solid plan to get you there. Nobody wants to go to PT but Tyler made it a good experience. He was honest about the improvements he was seeing and about when he felt I didn‚Äôt need to come back. He sends you home with a good plan and offers for you to come back anytime if you need it. I would highly recommend Tyler and Select Physical Therapy to anyone that is needing PT and will 100% go back in the future if needed.

Jacob Marascio was kind, positive and very knowledgeable.  My hip had been bothering me for so long.  I was having trouble getting in and out of the car.  Jacob quickly diagnosed the problem and went right to work on solving it.  I am pain free now and so grateful.  Thank you Jacob!

This facility is really great at what they do. I found myself suddenly needing physical therapy and I wasn‚Äôt sure of what to expect. What I can say is as soon as you walk into the lobby, it is extremely small but just wait a few minutes, that‚Äôs because the physical therapy room takes up 95% of the building and realistically, that is what we are there for.

So once you go into the PT room, there are multiple machines specialized to work on either your arms or your legs, stair steps, pulleys and work out balls to name a few things. Each section or each PT tech specializes in a different section of the body. So far I have witnessed physical therapy of the hands, arms and legs. I have seen people in casts, in wheelchairs and missing appendages. This team will find a way, no matter what, to get you back to where you need to be.

Special shoutout to the ladies in the front! They are your go-to if you need records or whatnot, so treat them right because they do so much for us. They are real angels too! And for the PT techs, Rhonda, hands down puts her heart and soul into what she does. She is stern but it‚Äôs only because she genuinely wants to see you succeed.

PT is hard, but with an amazing staff like this, it‚Äôs a real pleasure every time I come to my appointments. If you‚Äôre seeing this, THANK YOU ALL!

Everyone is very professional, nice, kind and personable. So far, I have had therapy with Brian, Rhonda, Cassie and Melissa and they‚Äôre all GREAT! No long wait time to be called back ( which I LOVE!) Unfortunately, I don‚Äôt know the names of the ladies at the front t desk , but they are very nice as well. Would definitely recommend Select to anyone that needs PT or OT!
I am working on a shoulder issue with Lucas. His evaluation and explanation of my problem and plan for remediation were clear and thorough. He is an excellent therapist.

After 5 months of therapy Heather has helped change my life following complications from thumb surgery. Love herüëç Brian Rhonda and Cassie are currently helping me with a knee. Can‚Äôt thank all enough including front staff! (Below average facilities and patient access‚òπÔ∏è)

I've never been to Pt,I was very nervous, Brian & Michelle were very kind and patient, paid very close attention to my concerns.
I have had 3 sessions and I already feel better. I'm looking forward to being able with their help to walk unaided.
All staff are knowledgeable & friendly
Would highly recommend
My first visit was excellent Jazmin was fantastic looking forward to getting healed

Jazmin and her team are awesome! Very knowledgeable and personable. I mostly work with Madison and she has been a great help with my recovery from several injuries. Jazmin herself has been great with making sure my referrals go through, and any assessments I‚Äôve needed. Genevieve is always a great help getting me scheduled. A wonderful environment for any physical therapy needs! Highly recommend.

I've had a great experience at Select Physical Therapy here in the Heights. Jazmin is excellent - extremely knowlegeable and fun to work with. She painstakingly tested and examined me to ensure she understood what was going on as well as my lifestyle and hobbies. I'm really happy with the treatment so far and would definitely recommend her and Select to my friends!
Jazmine does a fantastic job with her one on one PT and expertise in Physical Therapy.  Her experience is truly appreciated.

Jaz, Mariah, and Bethany (B) are the best!

I would recommend ANYONE to go to here! Not only for the great service, but for the laughs as well.

This is my second time getting therapy here and as great as the first experience was, I was even more impressed this time. I'll never go anywhere else for therapy if I ever need it again.

From initial contact, my therapist Millie, was knowledgeable, kind and showed genuine concern making me confident in her ability to help me. She worked me hard but always asked "Michelle are you OK?" to ensure that I was. Between the exercises she printed for me to do at home and the exercises she put me through I am now pain free, more confident and feeling stronger than I have in a year.
Thank you Millie for your expertise, dedication and care for your patients. You're the Best
Thanks also to the front desk staff who have always been kind caring and helpful.

Both Ylisa and Stephanie were caring and knowledgeable. They understood my position as a flight attendant and helped me work my wrist back to full functionality with that goal in mind. The office staff was friendly and on point. I hope I dont need to go back but if I did need further OT, I wouldn‚Äôt hesitate as to where to go! Outstanding therapists.

I accompanied my son to his back pain treatments at Select Physical Therapy Tamarac and we were both extremely impressed. His therapist Mildred (Millie) was knowledgeable, professional, and thorough, explaining everything about his condition. Most sessions were with Tanya who was patient, kind, attentive, and worked with him at his pace ‚Äî she truly made the difference, and he experienced noticeable relief after just a few sessions.
The front desk staff ‚Äî especially Dionne and Linda ‚Äî were welcoming, friendly, extremely knowledgeable and always tried to accommodate our schedule, making every visit easy and stress-free. We dealt with Joey just once, and she was great as well.
If you‚Äôre looking for a therapy office where the staff truly listen, care, and deliver results, this is the place to go. Highly recommended!

They are wonderful! Sometimes very busy, but you always get the attention you need. Millie did my initial consultation, she is awesome. She explains everything and gives you information on how to improve your condition. Every therapist I have seen has been really great. The atmosphere is friendly and comfortable. I highly recommend them!üíØ

Allison is a great PT.  She is very friendly and knowledgeable and very observant.  She is very understanding of my struggles as a spinal cord injury patient and pushes me to do what she knows I can accomplish but also knows that there are things I'm just not capable of.  I feel very confident and comfortable with her.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Tampa - Himes Avenue
review_text: Elizabeth Celek is a wonderful and exceptional Physical Therapist with over 15 years experience in different States. She has a beautiful disposition and really assisted me with a complex condition with compassion and an individualized treatment plan for PF and other issues post surgery. I'm so grateful for her assistance at a very difficult time. I highly recommend Elizabeth. The Front Desk team are very welcoming and excellent.  Keep up the great work and thank you for assisting me on my healing journey. Caroline

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Tampa - Himes Avenue
review_text: As a new patient this place is great. The beginning evaluation was physically difficult, but Celeste, the working student helped me push myself and made the experience enjoyable!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Tampa - Himes Avenue
review_text: We take our 16 year old autistic son for physical therapy here and could not be happier with our experience. Our therapist, Doug, is excellent! He is patient, knowledgeable and takes the time to make sure that you are not only performing the exercise correctly but also gives you the why behind each exercise. I would highly recommend this company!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Tampa - Himes Avenue
review_text: From the friendly sign in person at the front desk, to the wonderful therapist Elizabeth who always runs on time is great! Elizabeth is absolutely amazing, and really helped me with my pain from other surgeries. Unfortunately I needed another big procedure, and extremely happy I could see Elizabeth again after my recovery period. I had a setback but Elizabeth is really helping me, It‚Äôs a slow process, but I have total confidence with her amazing skill level and expertise knowing I‚Äôll start feeling better in the near future. What a kind and wonderful personality to go with her extensive knowledge, and I highly recommend her.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Tampa - Himes Avenue
review_text: Excellent practice! I‚Äôve worked mostly with Ryan who is absolutely wonderful, but I‚Äôve also had a chance to work with the other therapists, and they are all excellent. I‚Äôd highly recommend this location.

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Kayla and Lynn at Select Physical Therapy in Tampa Carrollwood! Thanks to their incredible care and expertise, I‚Äôve been able to proactively regain sensation and mobility in my hand and fingers.

Lynn is truly a genius with her hands‚Äîshe created some of the coolest custom gadgets to support my recovery, and each one made a noticeable difference. She‚Äôs creative, patient, and clearly loves what she does.

Kayla made every visit feel relaxed and encouraging‚Äîso much so that my daughter actually looked forward to coming with me just to hang out with her! Kayla has a gift for connecting with people and making the process feel less clinical and more personal.

If you're looking for a place where you'll be treated with compassion, creativity, and top-tier professionalism, this is it. What an incredible team. I would highly recommend Select Physical Therapy Carrollwood to anyone in need of physical therapy.

During my year and a half of therapy for a broken wrist, my main OT therapist Lynn Agnew was consistently compassionate, professional, and encouraging. She is a gifted OT and helped me tremendously. I also saw Kayla at times and she was also very caring and professional. The entire staff (as I did some physical therapy for my shoulder) was very competent and caring. And the office staff were always so friendly and worked hard at juggling appointments to fit my schedule. Definitely a 5 star experience!

I have never been to therapy didn't know what to expect. I'm very pleased with the whole process and feel like I'll benefit tremendously.  Denise is very nice and after one visit my knee feels better already.

My experience with Rita at Select Physical Therapy has been nothing short of excellent. Rita is an incredibly knowledgeable and patient therapist who takes the time to not only demonstrate each exercise properly but also thoroughly explain the purpose behind it. Her approach to physical therapy is highly educational, and I feel empowered knowing how each exercise is benefiting my body. With Rita‚Äôs guidance, I am confident that I am strengthening the necessary areas and improving my overall well-being. Her emphasis on proper technique has been invaluable, and I greatly appreciate her commitment to my rehabilitation journey. I would highly recommend Rita to anyone seeking a dedicated and experienced physical therapist who truly cares about her patients' progress.
We love our therapist, Lynn. She has tremendous experience in helping people with their hand problems. She is a great listener. She offers wonderful solutions.

I've been through physical therapy for the same knee for three separate injuries. Kim and the team at Select Physical Therapy have provided the best care I've received for my knee. They are knowledgeable, personable, and accommodating. My recovery was perfect thanks to them. I would easily recommend Select Physical Therapy for anyone in need of PT. They are simply the best!

After eight weeks of occupation therapy and graduated with flying colors from the dedication of Lori and the sincere commitment to help me recover from arthritis on both of the thumb area. I no can really feel a higher percentage better. I thought I would live the rest of my life with the pain. I appreciate all the team from the the two welcoming ladies in the front to a very clean facility throughout and Lori is a blessing person to the community. Thank you and highly recommend

Kim and Eileen are super! They are knowledgable and caring.   I saw them after knee surgery .  Great individual attention and selection of equipment.  Facility is clean and selection of equipment is very good. I would use them again and recommend them highly to anyone. Everyone seems to get along well including other patients and it is a fun environment for therapy which is a plus.

My experience at Select Physical Therapy is amazing. My impression on my first day is lasting. The therapists are real professionals.  They are the real deal. I will not hesitate to recommend them to anyone who may need Physical therapy.  I am so glad that my doctor recommended that I go there
Amy provided excellent therapy reducing pain and increasing ability to conduct daily functions. She is very knowledgable and explained the science (the why) behind my treatment therapy.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Tampa- Fowler Avenue
review_text: The therapist Tina was extremely informative with every step that was done to help me get through my session. I really appreciate the way she handled me with white glove service. Thanks so much!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Tampa- Fowler Avenue
review_text:
I personally enjoy my time at select physical therapy I think everyone that works there Hillary Erin Robert and Jen can't forget about Corey are all great staff they treat you well and they do a great beautiful job no complaints from me Willie Davis
PS I have to take some pictures in a therapy session

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Tampa- Fowler Avenue
review_text: I have complete confidence in Hilliary, my therapist. My wife and I have trusted her for years now, whenever we encounter a need for physical therapy, we call on Hilliary.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Tampa- Fowler Avenue
review_text:
Avoid Select Physical Therapy on Fowler ‚Äì Absolute Nightmare!

If I could give zero stars, I would. The Select Physical Therapy location on Fowler Avenue is a joke. From the moment you walk in, you're hit with a nasty smell in the cramped and outdated waiting area. It‚Äôs like they haven‚Äôt cleaned in years. Definitely not a welcoming or professional environment.

The physical therapist I had was barely competent‚Äîseemed like they got their training off a YouTube crash course. The therapy was completely inadequate, and I left every session feeling like I wasted my time. On top of that, their technology is stuck in the Stone Age. Instead of using a proper digital system to provide exercises, they fumbled around, admitted they didn‚Äôt know how to use their own app, and just handed me a bunch of paper printouts. Seriously? In 2025?

Now let‚Äôs talk about the real disaster: the office manager, Reama. She will smile in your face to get you signed up, but once you're in, forget about decent customer service. She doesn‚Äôt keep her word, isn‚Äôt honest, and has the professionalism of a used car salesman. Once they have your money, you‚Äôre just another number.

Oh, and the equipment? Half of it looks like it was salvaged from a garage sale. Some of the machines are either outdated or barely functional. If you actually care about your recovery, do yourself a favor and go to the Select location on Himes instead. Doug runs a tight ship over there, and the difference is night and day.

Bottom line: If you want to be treated with respect and actually get proper therapy, STAY FAR AWAY from the ghetto fabulous disaster that is Select PT on Fowler. Absolute garbage.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - Tampa- Fowler Avenue
review_text: Erin was focused on exercises I needed to help reduce my pain and tightness and help me feel better.  she is a great person to talk to.

reviewer_name: B J Buccini (Gold Seal Realty Group)
review_text: Catherine, the therapist was wonderful.  She was very present during my therapy and immediately corrected me when I would try to cheat.  She was so "down to earth" and professional.  I will continue my therapy with them and highly recommend them.

My favorite physical Therapist, Kim Albig, is fantastic.  Very effective with the treatment, explains things well, and a pleasant personality.  I recommend her highly.

I have enjoyed working with Kim and the rest of the staff at Select Physical Therapy.
Herb was outstanding !   He was patient with me as I described my situation.  He listened to me.  His evaluation was thorough !

The entire experience at Select Physical Therapy was wonderful. You don't need a physician's referral during the first 30 days, so I was able to schedule something for the next day and get therapy started. The PT, Kim, that treated was incredibly knowledgeable,  a good listener, helpful, creative and respectful. The front office staff and the PTA were all kind and helpful. I would definitely go back if I needed it and I highly recommend them!
Herb, kim and all of the staff are very helpful at my recovery. You couldn't ask for a more professional therapy crew!

Ms.Patty the intake receptionist  is a great  people person,she very accommodating.
The therapy staff is very caring  and  efficient they go out the way to make you feel comfortable.

The whole staff is very caring and very much your best cheerleaders! They make sure you are awake and refreshed for therapy by having coffee and snacks available also!
A great group of people!
They take good care and very professional and friendly, they make you feel like family. I love them very much.

I am very satisfied with Select Physical Therapy, specially with Valerie. She is very knowledgeable, helpful & friendly. Everyone in this place has been very nice, friendly & helpful. I highly recommend this place.

I have come a long way in just 2 weeks. Yaima has pushed me carefully and safety,  but she has pushed me to improve my physical abilities towards walking again without acute pain in my hip and thigh. Yaima's staff is friendly and knowledgeable about their jobs. Can't say I've enjoyed my time there but, but I am greatfull for the improvement.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - West Palm Beach
review_text:
I cannot speak highly enough of my physical therapist, Barbara. If you are looking for someone who will genuinely care for you‚Äînot just physically, but emotionally and personally‚ÄîBarbara is exactly who you need!!!!

Over the course of the nine months I spent in physical therapy, Barbara supported me in ways that went far beyond physical rehabilitation. Having undergone four knee surgeries in four years, I had lost confidence in my body‚Äôs ability to perform everyday tasks without pain or fear of re-injury. Barbara approached my recovery with remarkable patience, compassion, and encouragement. She consistently reaffirmed my progress and reminded me that I was putting in the necessary work to rebuild my strength.

On the difficult days, when the mental toll of yet another recovery felt overwhelming, Barbara was there‚Äînot just as a therapist, but as a steady source of emotional support. She listened without judgment, empathized with my frustrations, and helped me work through the psychological challenges of healing‚Äîsomething very few people truly understand.

Thanks to Barbara‚Äôs dedication and thoughtful care, I experienced a turning point in my recovery journey. For the first time in years, I am running without pain, anxiety, or fear. She never rushed my progress and always made me feel seen and supported.

I wholeheartedly recommend Barbara to anyone in need of physical therapy! Her impact on my life has been profound, and I am so grateful for the role she played in helping me heal. Thank you, sweet Barb Barb, for everything you did to help me get back on my feet‚Äîstronger and confident for the first time in four years!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - West Palm Beach
review_text:
Today we visited your physical therapy office and unfortunately had a very upsetting experience. We tried to speak with the receptionist to explain that we do not speak English fluently and asked her to please be patient with us. Instead of showing understanding, she was extremely rude and disrespectful throughout the interaction.

When we later called to explain our situation more clearly and ask about rescheduling therapy sessions, she didn‚Äôt give us the chance to speak ‚Äî she simply hung up on us. This is completely unacceptable behavior, especially in a healthcare setting where compassion and communication are essential.

We are requesting to speak with a manager as soon as possible to report this incident and to find a respectful and professional way to continue our therapy services. No one should be treated with such a lack of courtesy, especially when they are trying their best to communicate.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - West Palm Beach
review_text: My husband Therapist Barbara was awesome! She was able to get him back to walking after his prior 4 months hospitalization! The receptionist Flo and therapy staff are very professional, and make every effort to get patients back to mobility! Thanks again for your kind and continuous support throughout this journey!üëçüôèüèΩ

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - West Palm Beach
review_text: Allie at Select Physical Therapy is the most conscientious, knowledgeable, and personable physical therapist that I have found in Soth Florida.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - West Palm Beach
review_text: Had to go because of workers comp. Every visit was pleasant, from the receptionist to the therapist they have made the best out of an unfortunate situation. Mrs. Flo is such a delightful person.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - West Pembroke Pines
review_text: Philipe is extremely professional and knowledgeable.    My therapy session was intense but not painful.   He would give me that push for me to do my best.   He is a very good therapist.  Highly recommended

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - West Pembroke Pines
review_text: I've had a wonderful experience at Select Physical Therapy - West Pembroke Pines. I have been working with Alyssa the last 6 weeks or so and she has made a world of difference in my progress and I feel 80% better. Not only does she know what she's doing, she teaches you along the way and is very friendly and helpful. The whole staff is great and everyone is very down to earth. I look forward to the days I have physical therapy. Highly recommend!!

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - West Pembroke Pines
review_text: First, Mr. Abraham is a cool therapist. He always goes the extra mile to meet his patients' expectations.  He listens to you meticulously before finding you the right program that fits your condition.

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - West Pembroke Pines
review_text:
Amy Simbeck was my therapist who helped me with my vertigo. She is a very dedicated & caring professional.  I would recommend her to anybody needing PT.
Sincerely,  Bonnie Glaser

provider_name: Select Physical Therapy - West Pembroke Pines
review_text: Lori is the best therapist I know. She‚Äôs aggressive to get you back to normal, but also caring, funny and just a wonderful person. I‚Äôm so glad my friends recommended her and that she had time to work with my problems. I highly recommend her.

Earlier this month, I underwent therapy for a vestibular disorder. Eddie was very knowledgeable, professional, and compassionate. He fully explained all the procedures before executing them, and answered all my questions. I also had one therapy session with David. He, too, was very knowledgeable with regard to my vestibular affliction. I highly recommend them for vestibular rehab. Thank you, again, for helping me resume my daily activities so quickly. Keep up the AWESOME work!!

My P.T., David Bencomo, was simply wonderful!  He took me through a wide variety of exercises which progressively relieved and greatly improved my condition to normalcy again.  His upbeat and energetic motivating style made my stay at Select Physical Therapy-Weston exceedingly fun and engaging.  Sotti, Maria, and Karly at the front desk were very efficient and extremely sweet, making everyone feel welcome and well cared for.  And Eddie did a fine job of overseeing all operations in an unobtrusive and highly professional manner.  I would greatly recommend Select Physical Therapy-Weston for all your physical therapy needs!

I‚Äôm so impressed with the team of therapists here. They‚Äôre incredibly knowledgeable, hardworking, and super friendly. It really makes you feel at ease and cared for. And the staff is just as welcoming and courteous as the therapists.

Unless you want Katherine taking your man's number from the info provided. Texting your man and sending him photos, don't bring your boyfriend or husband around here. She'll even try to meet up with him on her lunch break.

Replied - you can have your employee give you the name of my boyfriend. Unless she does that to several people. My contact information is on his file.

Just called to ask if they took my insurance and i said i will call them bk to make an appt. after asking my husband if he could drive me to their location for therapy and he said yes, i called bk and the same lady answer the call. She apparently got offended because i said i was going to call bk the first time, and she told me there was no need for me to call again when she could have help me on my first call. I had to confirm with my husband about a ride there. I thought that was very rude if her, because she doesnt know my circumstances or why i needed to call bk. Of course im not going to go there.

The therapists are great however there billing department is less than ethical. My copay for my visits are $40.00. However on 2 of my visits I am being charged $96.plus change and $ 98. Plus change. I have tried to call the billing department and was on hold over 20 minutes then I  left a message with no return call. I also sent an email with no response.  I will not pay until someone can explain to me why I am being overcharged.
I have to give the clinic and Steve a big thank you. Steve called me as soon as he received my review. He apologized and said he was working on my situation.  Within 2 hours the billing department called and the billing was corrected and I gladly paid in full.

The physical therapists are extremely friendly,the facility is clean. It has a great and cheerful environment which everyone seems to enjoy. Love the music being played. Makes doing the exercises more enjoyable. Would recommend them to anyone in need of physical therapy.

Great people.
Made it and Kept it personal. Took close watch over pt and my rehab. I hate doctors they make you feel like cattle just run ya on threw. Here they took close attention to my health and well being jeff and Austin that's your guys. The lady was good to didn't work with her yet.

Friendly, professional, and knowledgeable staff.
Well organized and staffed. The environment is very nice clean
Very friendly and professional.  My therapist took time to talk and find out my situation.  She was very good and easy with my therapy session.  I was WELL pleased with everything she did.

I'm a disabled veteran and was sent here for PT for my back.  After being here for a couple of weeks, I'm getting better with the help of the great therapists they have here. If you have a sense of humor, you might get some laughs while you're there as well.
I was able to get PT today and am glad that I did.

I have only had two appointments so far but I've never felt like I was listened to as much as I have here. Every detail is heard and questioned for more information (which is a LOT in my case), a true indication that someone is actually listening. That may be the expectation, but it's not the norm anymore, I appreciate your approach to patient care so much. I honestly wasn't very positive about the benefits of physical therapy for my specific situation, but I'm feeling very optimistic that I can see some real progress.
Welcoming and professional. They provide an atmosphere that makes the therapy less intimidating.  Very happy with the results of their therapy and exercises they have me do at home.

Thank You to my therapist,Peter Piatasik, PT. He takes the time to listen and access the situation. Developed a plan for me and I already have improved and expect a complete recovery. Thanks again Peter! I highly recommend you and Select PT
Scott has been very helpful with my recovery. He's kind, patient, and understands what will help me!
Kristie deserves MORE than 5 stars! She & Josh were extremely helpful during my time of rehab! A true blessing to me and I‚Äôm sure many others! Thank you Kristie

Noah and Select Physical Therapy are amazing! He is knowledgeable, kind, and funny. I hurt myself at work pretty bad and am very happy with Select P/T and highly recommend Noah as your therapist! Noah takes his time not only with the intake, but with every single session. He pushes me to get better, while still nurturing and supporting me while I am hurting so much. I have some skeletal issues that were unearthed in severity during this whole process and Noah is always actively ensuring that we are working toward both strength and pain relief. I genuinely think this is the VERY BEST therapist and facility! HIGHLY recommend, 5 stars for Noah for sure!

These people are excellent they really know how to do their job. Their kindness, their prompt assistance, They listen to you attentively showing interest in your concerns and teaching you to follow the appropriate techniques at home to help in your speedy recovery. They also educate you about your injury for better understanding and cooperation with treatment. They‚Äôre just excellent. I give them 5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

This is my first time having to do physical therapy, had surgery on my shoulder almost two months ago. The process has been made very simple for me, starting with the front desk, Antonio was clear in communication and helpful in locating my insurance info, and determining what was owed out of pocket. He also took the steps of contacting my surgeon and ensuring the accuracy of the referral. My therapist is Noah Mastone, who has answered all my questions and also been very cool and helpful in helping me regain confidence in my movements and rehab. Others made sure i was comfortable and had water when needed. Thank you all, I would highly recommend Select Physical Therapy to a friend or family member.
Noah and the rest of the team are the best... they are doing a fantastic job with my husband üòä and Mrs Marie is one of the sweetest couldn't ask for a better team...

JoAnna is simply the best. She has worked with my 3 year old son for the past year and always has creative, fun ideas that help him with every area of development. Super patient and caring but also punctual and professional. I would 100% recommend her!

JoAnna is SO wonderful and knowledgeable. She is incredibly patient and was able to truly understand my child and develop a relationship with him very quickly. I have already seen lots of growth in my child due to her work and look forward to the future progress she will guide us towards.

JoAnna is an excellent therapist who provided OT and additional support for our grandson.  JoAnna was able to adapt to challenges presented with our grandson.  She gave him the opportunity and guidance to grow in gross and fine motor function, managing his emotions, improving focus, social skills, and so much more.  She was truly vested in his development and health, often searching for information and solutions on other aspects beyond his therapy goals.  She got him up and riding a bike with confidence in minimal time and assisted when he started baseball.  JoAnna has the ability to motivate her clients and achieve more than they knew was possible.  We only stopped our therapy with JoAnna due to a transition in our care plan.  We are grateful for the impact JoAnna had on our grandson and us.  If you are looking for a terrific member for care who will partner and achieve results, she is great.

I have observed JoAnna with children and found her to be very patient, considerate of their needs and understanding their behavior.
The children react to her in a positive way. She tends to bring out the best in them.
I would highly recommend her.

JoAnna is very professional in her demeanor. She is very knowledgeable in her field and she explains symptoms and diagnosis incredibly well. Based on her extensive knowledge in her field and experience, I would highly recommend JoAnna to any parent or organization who would like to see their children  benefit from JoAnna's skills in the Occupational Therapy arena!

provider_name: Sense Able Brain Therapy and Learning Services
review_text: Sense Able Brain has set the bar so high in so many categories. The therapists are top notch, my son has been here for over a year and no turn over at all,facility is SPOTLESS and very organized. I truly feel like we are one big family, everyone cares about not only your child but your entire family. My son can‚Äôt wait to get out of the car to start his sessions, he is non verbal but his face says it all when we arrive! We love it here!

provider_name: Sense Able Brain Therapy and Learning Services
review_text: TEN stars if I‚Äôm being honest!! We have known Kim H. (owner of Sense Able Brain Therapy) for over 15 years. She provided Occupational Therapy for our son from age 4-8. Kim is so kind and skilled at what she does. Our son had many sensory issues and Miss Kim had many solutions! Our son loved his therapy time, we called it "his workout". Kim taught me how to integrate some daily things that I could do at home to help our son progress. She creates a plan tailored to the child's needs and implements it, modifying along the way as the child shows growth. She deeply cares for her patients and her staff. Kim is a very positive-minded person who stays informed with new approaches and therapeutic solutions including useful technological advances in the field of OT. Her office space is spotless, and full of love. Our son is now an honor roll student and sophomore in college and drives himself. I have no doubt that the early intervention (and care) that he received while working with Kim paved the way to get him where he is. We love Sense Able Brain!

provider_name: Sense Able Brain Therapy and Learning Services
review_text: Our son was struggling with multiple sensory processing issues and we were beginning to lose hope. We met with several OT's and therapists during this time, but Kim from Sense Able Brain made the difference. Our son greatly improved his motor skills and responses thanks to the incredible work of the Sense Able team. We found the treatment to be very helpful and affordable. The personal, loving connection we made here was significant compared to our experiences elsewhere and we received the healing we needed! Highly recommend!

provider_name: Sense Able Brain Therapy and Learning Services
review_text: I am a Kindergarten teacher and often have students who need OT services.  I ALWAYS recommend Sense Able Brain to my families.  Services at Sense Able Brain have helped my students to grow and THRIVE in the classroom.
