I regularly see improvement in academics, because the kids are better able to regulate themselves physically, socially, and emotionally.  Sense Able Brain brings the best out of these students.  They are more confident and joyful due to their increasing success.  I have attended a handful of workshops at Sense Able Brain, which have made me a better teacher too.  I use strategies in my classroom which I have learned directly from the professionals at Sense Able Brain.  I think my favorite thing about Sense Able Brain is that they are not trying to change or fix these kids.  The kids understand that they are brilliant - and they are finally able to access their own gifts and talents.  The parents report that they feel supported, educated, and encouraged after each session.  I only wish there were more stars to give!

provider_name: Sense Able Brain Therapy and Learning Services
review_text: We absolutely love Sense Able Brain. Kim and her team have helped my child with special habits unique to her, to really flourish and blossom. The difference is remarkable and does not go unnoticed by those around my child. I beamed this past summer when relatives that haven't seen us in a year commented on her growth. 10/10 recommend!!

Therapist Cynthia has gone over and beyond to help our child, and us as parents. She‚Äôs visited our son in his classroom environment to help the teachers give him the correct activities he should be doing to build up his fine motor skills and we do private one on one therapy sessions in her office as well and she always helps us to be better at what we‚Äôre doing every day. little stuff like setting a schedule for our three-year-old son has been such a fabulous recommendation we saw results immediately in his day-to-day activities in school and at home.

We have been seeing Cynthia and her team of excellent speech therapists for 3 months and we saw results right away! Cynthia is very kind and knowledgeable and most important  has a positive outlook! My toddler has been improving her speech and fine motor skills and I look forward continue working with Cynthia! If you are looking for an excellent occupational therapist and speech therapist call Cynthia!

So thankful for Sensory Kidz! They truly care about children and providing them with a great therapeutic experience. My son is having a fantastic experience in his Social Skills Group and is already learning new ways to make friends and is having less anxiety in social situations. I highly recommend families with children who have autism or are developmental delayed to look into the services at Sensory Kidz.
Cynthia is very sweet and kind. My son feels at home when he goes to the OT therapy, we have been seeing the improvement in his gross and fine motor skills. I highly recommend Sensory Kidz.

So happy that I decided to put my son in Speech and OT here.
The staff are very patient, understanding, and passionate about what they do. They go above and beyond to help you and make sure your child succeeds. I have seen an improvement with my son in just the short amount of time we have been there.

Review for Heidi (Physical Therapy)

I had an excellent experience working with Heidi. She took the time to explain everything in depth‚Äîwhat was causing my aches and pains, why certain movements mattered, and how each exercise would help. She turned all of my symptoms into a clear, understandable, and manageable plan I could actually follow. Her ability to communicate so effectively shows just how knowledgeable she is, and her passion for her work comes through in every session. I left feeling confident and supported that I‚Äôd be getting better. I highly recommend Heidi for anyone looking for a PT who truly listens, educates, and delivers results.

What an amazing experience. From the ambiance of this intimate, cozy wellness boutique to the Pilates instructor, Arissa. So professional and attention to detail. Highly recommend this studio and take a Pilates class with Arissa!

I had an amazing experience at Rehab Lab in Davie, FL! The facilities are top-notch‚Äîclean, modern, and equipped with everything you‚Äôd need for a successful recovery or fitness journey. I was especially impressed with Heidi, the physical therapist. She is incredibly knowledgeable, attentive, and genuinely invested in helping you feel your best.

My first session was fantastic; Heidi took the time to assess my needs thoroughly and designed a personalized plan for me. I left feeling confident and motivated, and I‚Äôve already decided to purchase a package to continue working with her. If you‚Äôre looking for a place that combines expertise, care, and excellent facilities, Rehab Lab is it! Highly recommend.

For years, I have had issues with my hip, which also led to back and knee pain. I‚Äôd seen three physical therapists, and two chiropractors, and all they succeeded in doing was taking my money.  As a result of this, I didn‚Äôt have very high expectations about Rehab Lab, but, after a week of constant back pain, I decided to give them a try. It turned out to be one of the best decisions I ever made.
My therapist, Heidi, is fantastic!  She is so friendly and put me at ease right away. She listened to everything I said, and knew exactly what to do. She is extremely knowledgeable, patient, and doesn‚Äôt try to bully me or make me push myself before I‚Äôm ready.  Not only am I now practically pain free, I am actually improving my strength and fitness as a result of the work she does. I had never heard of dry-needling before this, and I wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect, but I was willing to give it a try since nothing else had worked. It can certainly be uncomfortable, but the results are incredible!  My hip is vastly improved, as are my knee and back. In fact, once I saw the benefits of the needling, I asked Heidi to work on my traps, arms and shoulders - areas where I‚Äôd had issues in the past - and now those areas are better than they have been in years, no, decades!
I really didn‚Äôt think I would see or feel this much improvement, especially now that I‚Äôm in my mid-50‚Äôs.  I haven‚Äôt even had to take a single Aleve since I started this therapy, and I was taking them at least once a week. Quite simply, Heidi has changed my life. I absolutely recommend Rehab Lab.

I was having lots of knee pain and I started seeing Heidi. She‚Äôs great. From the first session, I was impressed by her professionalism and thoroughness in assessing my condition. She took the time to listen to my concerns and after the first session I was already feeling better. Very pleased and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a physical therapist.

Miss Lauren is the best of the best!  She is incredibly knowledgeable, with a wide ranging scope. She has the ability to see uniquely my identical twins for who they each are.  She celebrates and plays to their interests. Always meeting them where they are at each session. She is engaging, kind, caring.  She provides resources for the whole child. I wholeheartedly recommend the opportunity to work with Miss Lauren. We can‚Äôt say enough how much our family appreciates her!!

Lauren is such a blessing! She was amazing with our son who has a visual processing disorder. Our son loved working with her. He was sad when he graduated therapy because he enjoyed his time with Lauren. He said that she is such a sweet and patient person. Lauren went above and beyond her job description to make sure that our son got all of the support, attention, and encouragement that he needed. We have witness so much growth and positive change in our child. Therapy with Lauren was a total game changer! I would definitely recommend her to other families. She‚Äôs the best!

Lauren is amazing! She‚Äôs super easy to talk to and always keeps us in the loop. You can tell she really cares, not just about the kids she works with but about the whole family. We‚Äôve felt so supported since working with her!

My daughter has been seeing Lauren for a little over 2 years now and we wouldn't have it any other way! Lauren is such a big advocate for my daughter, not only helping her, but also teaching me new techniques on how to help my daughter regulate her big emotions when she gets overstimulated.

Lauren makes an effort to get to know my child so she knows the perfect way to handle any situation, or know when Maddy gets too frustrated and needs a break. She has so much patience and is so kind.

You can tell Lauren cares deeply for the kids and tailors every session to meet Maddy's needs. She is a skilled OT therapist and her compassion shines bright. We have been so lucky to have her and sincerely recommend her to any parent.

A Phenomenal Occupational Therapist ‚Äì Truly Outstanding!

I am incredibly grateful to have had the privilege of working with Miss Lauren for the past three years. From the very beginning, she has been an invaluable support to my son, offering expert guidance and consistent care that has made such a positive difference in his life.

Miss Lauren is truly a gift to anyone she works with. Her deep understanding of sensory needs, coupled with her compassionate approach, has helped my son in ways we could never have imagined. She went above and beyond, offering a wide range of services and tailored sessions that were perfectly suited to his unique challenges. Her dedication and commitment to his progress have been unwavering, and her thoughtful interventions have empowered him to thrive in so many areas of his life.

What sets Miss Lauren apart is her ability to connect with children on a personal level, creating a safe and nurturing environment where they feel supported and encouraged. She‚Äôs not only an outstanding therapist but also a genuinely kind, caring, and empathetic person. The progress my son has made under her guidance has been remarkable, and I will forever be thankful for the positive impact she has had on our lives.

I recommend Miss Lauren. She is truly exceptional, and I feel incredibly fortunate to have had her by our side. Thank you for everything, Miss Lauren‚Äîyou are a true blessing!

My family absolutely loves Ms. Marisa at Sensory Station. She has helped me so much with both my kids and myself. One needing help with sensory processing and sensory processing with food. She was patient with my son during the entire process. She also helped me find the best resources outside of her facility for when it‚Äôs time to move him to the next step in his journey. She also has helped my daughter tremendously with her ADHD, sensory processing, self-esteem, strengthening her core and so much more!!! My kiddos absolutely love her facility and feel very comfortable being there. Marisa has so much knowledge and is always there to help wherever she can. We love Sensory Station!!!!!

We began our Occupational Therapy journey with Marisa at Sensory Station in May 2024. Marisa is a very compassionate, kind, patient, dedicated and knowledgeable Occupational Therapist and person. My daughter gravitated to Marisa and the Sensory Station setting fairly easy.
The sensory gym is a beautiful, clean, welcoming, child-friendly setting. Marisa provides services for children of all different abilities. In less than one year my daughter has gained a variety of stengths and skill sets that are providing her to grow, play and learn in a healthy, safe, effective and exciting manner.
Sensory integration requires a team effort for the process to be impactful and successful. Marisa has provided our family with knowledge, education and support to implement activities and exercises to carry over into our daughters daily routines at home and in the community.
I am a firm believer in the sensory integration theory. Marisa has over 27 years experience and I truly value her as a professional and confidant. Her heart is devoted to her career and her clients. We are so grateful for her. Our daughter makes progress everyday. We look forward to our sessions every week. We are forever thankful for Marisa and The Sensory Station. We are eager and excited to continue our sensory journey with Marisa and The Sensory Station which provides our daughter with the tools and enrichment to continue to grow, blossom and reach all her developmental milestones.

We are so grateful to have found Sensory Station and Marisa. She has been an incredible support not only for our son, but for our entire family. Therapy with Marisa is never a one-size-fits-all approach, she truly sees each child as an individual and meets them exactly where they are.

When Hudson first started OT, he was struggling with coordination, regulation, and communication. Today, he‚Äôs a completely different kid ‚Äî he‚Äôs jumping confidently, problem-solving through obstacle courses, and participating in activities like board games and art projects that once felt overwhelming to him. These improvements didn‚Äôt happen overnight, and I think it‚Äôs important for any parent considering OT to know that real progress takes time, trust, and the right connection. Marisa has built that connection with Hudson in a way that feels natural, encouraging, and empowering.

We can‚Äôt thank Marisa enough for their patience, creativity, and dedication. If you are looking for a place that truly understands sensory needs and how to nurture developmental growth, you‚Äôre in the best hands here.

It's hard to find the words to express the life changing therapy my son and family received while under Ms. Marissa's care. My son not only made tremendous physical strides, but emotional as well. Ms. Marissa taught my husband, daughter, and I how to better understand my son for a happier, less stressful life for all of us. He continues to thrive physically and academically. We are better equipped to deal with the school system to get my son the support he needs. We will forever be greatful for Sensory Station ‚ô•Ô∏è

Marisa at Sensory Station has truly been a miracle worker for my family. She started working with my son when he was just 6 months old. As my third child, I expected him to meet milestones quickly, but he wasn‚Äôt, and it left me feeling like I had failed him. I tried to help him catch up on my own but knew we needed extra support. A friend recommended Marisa, and from our very first conversation, we clicked. Her honesty and ability to make me feel included stood out. During such a scary time, she validated my feelings and gave me the confidence to move forward. Thanks to her, my son is now 19 months old, has caught up beautifully, and is even advanced in many areas.

Marisa has also transformed my relationship with my 6year old daughter.  My daughter and I were in a very tough place before we started OT in June. She‚Äôs always been incredibly strong-willed, but as she got older, her emotions and behaviors became overwhelming for both of us. I was in complete denial that anything was wrong, but deep down, I knew we needed help.

Before our evaluation, I sent Marisa a long text describing all the challenges we were facing. My daughter was constantly frustrated, throwing fits when she felt unheard, lashing out in anger, and struggling with consequences, fairness, and self-regulation. Our relationship was strained because I felt like I could never do anything right. I was always disciplining her or putting out fires, and it felt like we were stuck in a cycle of frustration, anger, and tears.

Marisa didn‚Äôt just address the behaviors; she truly understood my daughter and gave us the tools to reconnect. Through OT, my daughter has transformed into a completely different kid. She‚Äôs learning how to process her emotions, communicate her needs appropriately, and regulate her behaviors. Marisa created a safe space for her to grow, and I can honestly say she saved our relationship.

I will forever be grateful for Marisa and the work she does. She‚Äôs compassionate, knowledgeable, and the kind of support every family deserves. Thank you, Marisa, for giving me my relationship with my daughter back. If you‚Äôre looking for someone to support your child‚Äôs development or struggling with similar challenges,  Marisa is the kind of professional every family deserves. She has been a true blessing to both of my children, and the impact she‚Äôs had on our lives is more than I could even express.

We had a wonderful experience with Serene Minds and Stephanie. Our son has flourished with her help and is a much more confident and patient person with much less reactivity. The shift has been remarkable. Highly recommend both the practice, and Stephanie herself!

I recently started working with Stephanie, and she‚Äôs been amazing. She‚Äôs easy to talk to, really listens, and makes me feel comfortable. I‚Äôm excited to keep working with her and see the positive changes ahead. And of course, Bruce is the best boy! I love getting to see him at every session!

I have been coming to Stephanie for individual couseling since 2011. I have been seeing Brooke since 2023, for Couple's Counseling.

During that time Stephanie has provided alot of hours with well needed talk therapy as well as provided me a space to draw pictures as well as recomended me to do journal entrys for her, as well as provided a good, safe, quiet space to talk to her in. I am very satisfied with the therapy Stephanie, & Bruce do. I can't say enough about Bruce to he is such a good therapy partner and a really great asset for people whom are struggling with diffrent issues. He has provided me with alot of love, & care throghout my therapy sessions.

Brooke is amazing she is good at listening and providing a safe atmosphere to be able to talk about things that are inner most personal to yourself as well as your partner she has been helping & teaching as well as coaching us both in the act of communication, trust, honesty, and love. As well as to become more vulnerable through out that time.

They both in my opinion get 10 stars. With the work they have been doing for me and my partner and providing us with. They have really improved alot in our lives. I am extremley grateful.

I called this office and asked if they could offer services I needed. I spoke with a women from essentially an answering service who said I would need to speak with the provider because she did not know enough to see if they could help me. I agreed on a time and went in to ask the questions I needed to see if they had the ability to offer services and then discovered later they did not have the ability to do the diagnostic and treatment we needed so left. After I found that the office had charged me for services my child never received. They never met my child and I never had any services or authorized any charges. When I contacted them and asked for them to correct the issue and refund the unauthorized and illegitimate charges they denied any wrong doing and refused.

Stephanie has been helping me for months now with different life transitions that I‚Äôve been going through. She is so kind, thoughtful, helpful, supportive, and always leaves me feeling better than when I came! Highly recommend Serene Mind, specifically Stephanie :)

I could not be happier with the training my two dogs received! Over the course of four weeks, Kevin not only worked with my dogs but also took excellent care of them. When we started, both of my dogs were very reactive and difficult to manage, but now they are friendly, social, and so much more enjoyable to be around. What impressed me most is that the training went beyond just teaching my dogs commands. I learned so much about my own relationship with them, how my interactions influence their behavior, and how to confidently handle different situations. Kevin gave me tools and knowledge that will last well beyond the sessions. This experience was truly transformative for both my dogs and me. I would highly recommend this trainer to anyone looking to see real, lasting change in their dogs.

Kevin with Serenity K9 is top notch. Very knowledgeable not only with training but with equipment such as leashes, e collars, prong collars, and treat bags. Recommendations on food, and treats depending on the breed, age, and size of your pup. He has the space and equipment as well as relationships with surrounding establishments and businesses to support in the best training around.

Furthermore, the training provided is not only for your pup but also the owner/owners. To keep your pup motivated and in tune with the training you want, you have to have the drive and love as well.

We fully recommend his services and thank him very much for what he has provided for our pup, Ghost.

We‚Äôve had such a great experience working with Serenity K-9 and Kevin. He is extremely proactive, knowledgeable, and genuinely cares about the dogs. He not only works directly with them but also empowers us as owners by sending helpful videos to practice at home and giving thorough feedback when we send him updates. Our two Yorkies have made wonderful progress thanks to his guidance. Highly recommend!

I cannot recommend Kevin enough for his exceptional work as a dog trainer, particularly for dogs with complex challenges. We met Kevin by chance while he was training dogs at Lowe‚Äôs, and it was immediately clear that he has a remarkable gift for understanding and working with ‚Äúbroken‚Äù dogs. My German Shepherd, a service dog, struggled severely with anxiety, which often left me navigating environments carefully to avoid overwhelming him. Kevin‚Äôs expertise completely transformed our lives.

Kevin‚Äôs approach is nothing short of extraordinary. He didn‚Äôt just train my dog; he unlocked his potential, helping him learn to engage joyfully with other dogs and become part of a pack. The foundation Kevin built has given my dog a new lease on life, allowing him to thrive rather than merely exist in fear. While my dog will always have some anxiety, Kevin has equipped us with practical, effective strategies to manage it, fostering confidence and connection.

What sets Kevin apart is his commitment to ensuring owners are fully equipped to sustain the progress made. Unlike our previous experience with a trainer who provided minimal guidance post-training, Kevin requires follow-up sessions to teach owners how to maintain and build on the foundation he establishes. This has been a game-changer. In just 11 days since my dog returned home, we‚Äôve made incredible strides, moving together more naturally and engaging in activities that ease his anxiety. Kevin‚Äôs training has not only made my dog happier but has also deepened our bond, making our time together more enjoyable than ever.

Kevin‚Äôs passion, expertise, and dedication have been a true blessing. Meeting him was a turning point for us, and I‚Äôm endlessly grateful for the positive impact he‚Äôs had on my dog and me. If you‚Äôre looking for a trainer who can transform your dog‚Äôs life and empower you as an owner, Kevin is the one to call!

About a year ago, I approached Kevin in public to ask about his training services. He immediately asked what I was looking for in a dog. At the time, I was set on a specific breed, and he didn‚Äôt try to change my mind. Instead, he took the time to educate me on breeds, and how genetics and DNA can affect training and health.

When I was ready to get a dog, Kevin used his connections and knowledge to put me in contact with someone who had exactly what I was looking for. After just a few sessions with him, people were asking me how my puppy was so well-behaved on leash. We‚Äôre forever grateful to Serenity K9 and look forward to working with Kevin as our pup continues to grow.

What started as a birthday gift for our newly minted teens four years ago became a new passion for our girls. Serenity Show Stables welcomed our new riders at 13 and with patience and diligence turned them into confident jumpers. The skills learned under Michelle‚Äôs and her team‚Äôs training go beyond riding. The girls also formed new friendships. I‚Äôm so glad we found Serenity Show Stables.

WORDS CAN'T EXPRESS HOW AMAZING! My daughter has found a place where she can be around people who understand her and make her feel welcome.  Michelle and Carlos are a great team.  As a parent I love going and hanging out under the nice trees and watching all the wildlife.  This is such an amazing place that when I don't go because of scheduling reasons on my end, I MISS IT!!
Michelle is a great trainer, she knows horses well and will take your child and know exactly what to work on, in just one lesson.  The horses are happy, well cared for and friendly.  The spaces for boarding are very spacious and they have large paddock spaces for daily turn outs.  I recommend this facility if your just looking for riding lessons, looking to board, or even if you just want to come and perfect your riding skills.

Love this place. It was amazing when I got there. And don‚Äôt get me started with Michelle she was the best, and her niece was so kind my daughter loved her and Michelle and Carlos. Carlos was kind and welcoming when my daughter was brushing Lily the horse. Over all I recommend going here. It is was also my daughters first lesson!

Serenity Show Stables is by far the best boarding facility in Miami for your horse. Michele, Carlos, and Jackie care for the horses as though they were their own. My daughter's horse came to Serenity with terrible thrush, Michele went out of her way to make sure it was treated as quickly and efficiently as possible. Besides being a phenomenal trainer, Michele's level of care for the well being of each and every horse is incredible. Stalls are always clean and the horses spend the day in the spacious paddocks. The quality of care at Serenity is unlike any other barn I've seen, and for an affordable price. For anybody looking for somewhere to board their horse, I cannot recommend Serenity enough.
SSS takes the best care of my boarded horses. They are both healthy and happy. Michele spoils them about as much as I do! Which is all I can ask for from a boarding facility

The staff is friendly and helpful. I love that while I'm there for therapy, I am able to bring my dog with me.

I have 7 dogs, so I switch between which one comes with me every time I go. Having one of my babies there with me helps me to get into a calmer, happier place while I'm trying to work through my sessions.

It's like therapy for me and them all at the same time. They get the socialization while me and others in the office get to smile and enjoy them.

I have felt a change in myself in the 4 weeks I've been going there.

Our 17 yo diabetic cat took a  turn for the worst. When we had to put him to sleep,  everyone there was extremely compassionate and understanding. They have treated my 7 yo dog very well. The staff is great and very helpful.

Shadow Lake Animal Hospital has the best veterinarians and a very friendly staff.  They always make sure you understand everything that is being done for your pet.  My Bud has no issues going in except when he sees all the other dogs he wants to play and they are not always willing to play with my big boy although he would never hurt them he's just big.  They have great services at reasonable prices and give me the good and bad on Buds health.  He is a little overweight they said.  I told him so is momma and we will work on it together.  Then I gave him his medicine and treats and he's good till next year   thank you Shadow Lake Animal Hospital for being so good to our fur babies.
Marge & Bud Mcmahon

First time using Shadow Lake Animal Hospital,  I will be bringing all my pets here from now on. I wish I could give this Place more than 5 üåü Stars. My rating would be  10 Stars üåü ü§© . From the first time I Walked üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è in. The  Receptionist was very Friendly,  Treated me like she knew me for years. I brought my Newest Doggie to them ( Buddy), I was told he had Heartworms from Another Vet that said he had them. And I was worried üòü,  Come to find out . He doesn't,  Thank God üôè.  From the start to Finish all people involved ‚ù§Ô∏è The Aids, Nurse's and Doctor were Very Friendly. Prices are Very Low, Compared to other Vets,
I  Have found my New Vet. SHADOW LAKE ANIMAL HOSPITAL üè• For all my üêï Fur Babies. üëå.
Mark & Galina Wilhelm
We have been taking our Huskey here for the past 2 years.  The staff is great and very friendly to the animals.  Prices for checkups and yearly vaccinations are reasonable as well.

We are very pleased with our experiences at shadow lake.  My dog, who hates the vet, but now, with the staff here, he is able to go without too much hullabaloo.  Whoop whoop.  Thank you Shadow Lakes Animal Hospital.

We had a visit with Ann-Marie and three of her adorable goats, Gomez, Knee Caps, and lovely Ms.Petunia (they came out to us!) We loved it, kids loved it, and we believe our dogs did too !! Highly recommend them, how can you go wrong with a goat play date? Pure magic. Break up the mundane and have yourself a sweet goat visit !!

This is the perfect place to bring your little ones. All of the animals are very friendly and interact well with children. The Sheehan Homesteaders are very welcoming and knowledgeable about their way of life. And the goat yoga classes are the best!

Great experience for all ages! This Homestead is created from a love of  animals and the Earth. A wonderful learning environment founded by 2 truly caring individuals .

We so enjoyed the interaction Ann-Marie has with her animals, she is a true animal whisperer!

Go meet Mike , Ann-Marie and all the animals or let them come to you! A guaranteed fun day !!

I used Sheehan Farms for my daughter's birthday party‚Äîa one-hour bunny experience. It was so sweet and fun! They have a fabulous team and service, great communication, were right on time, and are very friendly. I highly recommend them!

Ann-marie and Mike were so wonderful and generous with their time.  They walked us around to each of the areas so we could learn about raising animals in their town.  Cuddling with the baby goats, ducks and rabbits was the highlight of my day!

Nonye is awesome! I have used her services for my BCBA hours and my RBT competency.She is knowledgeable, understanding, willing to clear up any questions you are not clear on.

I recommend her services and I plan and using again soon ‚ù§Ô∏è

Nonye is a great person to work with. She is genuine and great at helping people prepare for the bcba exam. If you want someone that will take the time to really help you learn and understand the material go with her. I promise you won‚Äôt regret it.

Nonye, did an excellent job with her services offered. She has great bedside manners with kids and I will definitely look forward to going back for further services. If your looking for a top notch and professional services no need to look further, she is the woman for the job!

Developed and managed by a caring, compassionate, and pragmatic family oriented person.  Her love of family and expertise in ABA makes her and all under her well suited and qualified to teach you how to care for yourself and your loved ones. Very smart, great judgement, and insight.

Shiloh ABA Inc is always professional, great with  time management, and provides effectiveness when it comes to behavioral plans. The therapist displays  structured routines to meet individual needs. I would recommend if you are looking for someone that has a passion for children on the spectrum Shiloh ABA services is the way to go.

Our experience with this Side by Side Behavioral Health has been excellent. From the first day, very professionals.The therapists are dedicated, patient, and attentive to my child‚Äôs needs. Communication with the team is clear and consistent. I highly recommend them!

At Side by Side, they perfectly combine a genuine love for children with the highest level of professionalism. The therapies are excellent, and the staff is always warm, friendly, and dedicated. It's clear that they truly love what they do and are highly qualified to provide these services. Highly recommended.

Where do I even begin? There‚Äôs so much I want to say, and not nearly enough words to do this place justice. Simply put‚Äîit‚Äôs incredible. I‚Äôve been to both of their locations, and the staff at each one has been nothing short of amazing. So warm, welcoming, and genuinely kind.

As a mom who‚Äôs new to the world of autism, I was overwhelmed and had no idea where to start‚Äîespecially with my daughter being on the lower end of the spectrum. I felt completely lost. But the team here made me feel seen, heard, and supported from the very beginning. They took the time to listen, answered all my questions with patience, and gently guided me through this journey. I can‚Äôt thank them enough.

Rebecca was especially helpful and attentive from the very first phone call‚Äîshe even followed up with our insurance company on our behalf, which lifted such a huge weight off my shoulders. Every step of the way, the staff has been supportive and kind.

If you‚Äôre searching for a place to help support your child, I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough. They truly care.

Our family is very happy!
We appreciate all the support, help, and love you've given my son; he's very happy and loves going to Therapy Place. Rebeca helped us throughout the entire health insurance approval process. My son loves his RBT, and most importantly he's made progress. Rodriguez Family
An amazing and truly dedicated team! üòä They are deeply committed to their work, and we‚Äôve seen significant progress in the children as they receive their therapies. Highly recommended!

I had zero idea before I called them what to expect. My dog Piper needed an emergency c section. These ladies were absolutely phenomenal. They worked swiftly and kept me informed every step of the way. So down to earth and extremely helpful. Very friendly and yet professional too. They truly love animals.

Ive been to a few different vets that look at your animal with $$$ signs in their eyes. This place didn't do that. They truly just wanted to help my furbaby have her baby. I appreciate each of them.

I have a chihuahua that was in labor but was having a very difficult time . I was very concerned and new something wasn't right I did not know most vets do not handle pregnancies so I had to call a few vets and one of them told me I needed to bring her to Silverthorn vet clinic the woman gave me the phone # I called and they transferred me to Jen who after explaining to her the situation she told me to bring her up right away and she would be waiting for us when we got there. She was right there took her started assessing her doing what needed to be done. She was the most awesome vet tech I have ever been associated with in all my life she knew right what was going on and my poor baby was in big trouble .. unfortunately the puppy died but they took care of my dog right away giving her an emergency C section to save her life ... it was quite a process, but it's been a couple of days now and my dog is doing better, but I do want to say....this is the BEST ANIMAL VET/Clinic  I have ever been to for my pets. The staff is awesome. They are also very knowledgeable and caring and friendly they made us feel very comfortable and reassured I could not say enough about this place I was in awe as to how they operate how they function and how professional they all in handling things. They were great. They  get 20 star rating from me!!!! I am so thankful that I found out about them !! I would highly recommend them To everyone!!
Again ! THANK YOU SILVERTHORN ANIMAL CLINIC! You are the BEST!!

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about this clinic! We were dealing with  complications related to canine reproduction on our toy poodle. The level of care and kindness we received was truly exceptional. Jennifer and Bri were absolutely amazing‚Äîcompassionate, supportive, and ready to answer questions or offer guidance. They made a potentially overwhelming process feel manageable and even hopeful. Jennifer, in particular, went above and beyond! She made me feel heard, respected, and genuinely cared for throughout the entire experience.

What really stood out was their integrity‚Äîno unnecessary tests or upselling, just thoughtful, evidence-based care. Their pricing is also very competitive compared to other clinics, which is a huge relief when navigating expensive fertility treatments. I‚Äôm incredibly grateful for their help and highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for genuine, patient-centered care.
I will tell others about Silverthorn Animal Clinic. They did a great job taking care of Jackson and extracting his teeth. He was in pain before that. Now he's running and happy.

Staff here are so caring and understanding. They‚Äôre also always super helpful and compassionate with our somewhat crazy cat. They‚Äôre professional and we always feel taken care of, medication, advice and support.

We are so incredibly happy with the speech therapy our daughter receives here. In a very short time, she has mastered her basic sounds and has already moved on to working on digraphs‚Äîa major milestone we didn't expect to hit so quickly!
Maddie, our therapist, is an absolute gem. She is patient, fun, and truly great with children. She expertly balances structured table work with engaging playtime, ensuring our daughter stays focused and enjoys every session.
Beyond the therapy room, the administrative support is excellent. Prior to starting, the company was amazing at communication, consistently responding to our messages or calls within 24 hours. When we had to miss sessions due to illness or vacation, Maddie was flexible and worked with us to make up the allowable sessions within the month. Highly recommend!

My daughter has been going to Simple Speech for the past year and our experience has been wonderful! Ashtyn and Cam are very accessible and responsive, and make themselves available to answer any questions! Both therapists that have worked with my daughter (Veronica and now Lara) have been amazing and my daughter has created a special bond with them and looks forward to going every Tuesday and Wednesday.  If you are looking for a place with not only a wonderful staff but a steady, reliable schedule I 100 percent recommend Simple Speech!

My Daughter has been going to speech therapy for months and we have seen drastic improvements! Cam is always available to answer questions or concerns, and Isabella is so interactive with our daughter. I look forward to seeing my daughters growth as she continues going to simple speech therapy.

Simple speech has been a blessing to our family. I called desperate to find help for my daughter and OT was suggested by a friend. Cam reassured me they could help us and they have made a huge difference. I can not recommend them enough!

Simple Speech Therapy has been a life changer for my family. Navigating through my child needs and resources was quite overwhelming and it was concerning to know that I could do more for my child and there was help I was not aware we could benefit from. Cam was extremely supportive and helpful with our transition from our former therapy center. Availability and access to services with Simple Speech were immediately provided and we were advised about additional resources available to support even more my child needs. Beyond grateful and not to mention the therapy sessions. My son LOVES Isabella. He looks forward to his therapy session every week and so much progress has been made and the state testings prove it. Thank you Simple Speech ‚ô•Ô∏è

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training Ocoee/Winter Garden
review_text: My 6 year old German Shepherd Nina joined the Sit Means Sit Family back in August and we couldn‚Äôt be happier. Relena, Michele, and Deanna worked really hard with our sweet girl to make sure she is set up for success! She has already made great strides when we go on walks, the playground, and even camping! We really appreciate the patience, kindness, and skills the staff showed us throughout her trainings and continue to do so in group classes which are super fun and helpful! I highly recommend!

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training Ocoee/Winter Garden
review_text: Beyond pleased with the team here! I came here with my mini Aussie, Rocky, in need of help with his stubbornness, resource guarding, and unpredictable attacking. Since working with Michele, Deanna and Relena, my boy has completely transformed. I truly felt like I picked up a different dog after just 3 days of day and train. Now that he‚Äôs graduated we will be going to weekly group classes for the next year. The staff here are so patient, understanding, and truly only want what‚Äôs best for you and your dog. The collar they use are NOT meant to be used as a punishment/in a negative way. They have you test out all the levels on your palm and it is very slight and works in getting your dog‚Äôs attention back on you. Training here has transformed our boy, he is clearly SO much happier and wants to work and listen now. Thank you all so much!!

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training Ocoee/Winter Garden
review_text:
I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Sit Means Sit! From the moment we walked in, the staff (Deanna, Relena, & Michele) made both me and my dog feel welcomed and comfortable. The trainers are knowledgeable, patient, and genuinely passionate about helping dogs and their owners succeed.
The facility is clean and well-equipped, creating a positive environment for learning. I‚Äôve seen progress in my dog‚Äôs behavior and confidence. Highly recommend.

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training Ocoee/Winter Garden
review_text: If I could give this place 10/5 stars, I would. This program has been transformative to our life and our sweet boy. Since starting and graduating this program, Rocky has transformed into the boy we always knew he could become. From the very first class it is amazing how far our Australian Shepard has come. Not only does he listen but he wants to listen and he enjoys the commands! He made us so proud too being a star student for the trainers. This place truly loves dogs and the trainers are all so amazing. Michele, Deanna, and Relena are so passionate and loving towards dogs and are so professional and very very good at their jobs. If you are thinking of giving this place a try, please do! Go in for a demonstration at the very least! Our home is much happier and peaceful since we started with Sit Means Sit.

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training Ocoee/Winter Garden
review_text:
I've used Sit Means Sit before in Colorado and I am using it again here in Florida. Staff, training, facilities are all top notch. I am a huge believer in the SMS Method and my dog is learning at a rapid rate. I would recommend using SMS to anyone who asked. From the evaluation at the beginning to now my dog, Duke is graduating to group class. The training and guidance have been second to none. They have different options to fit every dog, person and situation. As far as pricing goes if you think about how long your dog will be in your life the cost is a drop in a bucket especially for the quality and what you get out of it. You get out of it what you put in.
All the staff I have met at the Ocoee location Michele, Deanna, Jillian and Relena simply the best!

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training St. Petersburg
review_text: This was such a great learning experience for the family and our Gigi. I can't believe that we would ever would be able to walk our dog off leash! At the beginning we had ask Mark if that would be possible and he answered confidently, Yes!. I didn't believe it could happen, but he proved us wrong. Thank you everyone including those with us in class, as it took everyone to contribute there trust and their part in building up our beautiful fur babies

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training St. Petersburg
review_text: We recently rescued our 3 year old German Shepherd, and quickly realized we were going to need serious training. We were so impressed with how quickly she learned how to just calm down, so she could learn basic commands. Angel was so patient with her, and with us. She and Mark asked each week about any new issues we were having, and addressed them in her training that day. We loved having our lesson at the end of each training day, and look forward to starting group lessons. I cannot recommend Sit Means Sit enough!

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training St. Petersburg
review_text:
We were struggling with our dog (Chopper) He was aggressive toward my boyfriend , kids and other dogs. We decided to bring Chopper to the training class with Sit means Sit dog .Mark and Angel are the best. They know what they doingüëç They always ask about our concern, questions and  struggles that we have.
Our Chopper is getting better and listening to us. He's not get aggressive toward other dogs like before. Chopper be able to ignore them and walk away.  Chopper is Victorian Bulldog, He is really stubborn dog !!!!!
Even though, Chopper already graduated  we still continue bring him to class and be consistent,  I'm deeply recommended to the dog's owner who would like theirs dog to behave well!!!!

Thank you Mark and Angel, without you guys we won't make it this farüíñ
Keke

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training St. Petersburg
review_text:
I used to dread taking my dog out. She‚Äôs very large, very strong, and was very dog reactive. Having to use the elevator in the apartment was so scary. I was always worried the door would open and another dog would be on the other side. I would walk her super late at night to avoid seeing other people. I didn‚Äôt trust her. It made me so sad because I know she‚Äôs a great dog, she just didn‚Äôt know how to manage her big emotions. She was very easily excited and I could tell she just didn‚Äôt know how to process it. Pair that with a bad experience at a dog park (don‚Äôt go!), and she was lunging and barking and very aggressive towards dogs. She would drag me wherever she wanted to go.
Then we met Mark and angel at sit means sit. We did a 3 day board and train and kept up with the group classes. I have shed tears at her transformation. Being able to take her to get coffee with me again. Walking down busy central avenue with her walking right next to me on a loose leash. She knew a lot of ‚Äútricks‚Äù previously, but would never be able to do more than sit in public because she was so unfocused. She has been transformed. I thank Mark and Angel so much for this. If you are on the fence, do it. Having a trusting relationship with your dog, with focus and calm, is such a huge quality of life improvement for both of us. I get to enjoy having her again. I get to enjoy how smart she is. And learn even more with her. And she can enjoy life again, not being scared and overstimulated by everything. Absolutely worth it and thank you so much from the both of us.

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training St. Petersburg
review_text:
Our Frenchie needed some discipline learning. We didn‚Äôt have high expectations as he is super stubborn but Mark surprised us. Every time we came to get our fur baby after his day in training we were amazed with results!
We can now walk on the leash with him no problem and he listens so much better. The more homework you do the better results you‚Äôll achieve. Mark speaks ‚Äúdogs language‚Äù and he is so knowledgeable! We are very pleased with training and results and would definitely recommend Sit Means Sit
to all dog owners!

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training Tampa
review_text: I initially reached out to Sit Means Sit when my dog became reactive to other dogs and I was afraid of losing control of him. We now both have the confidence to visit public places with dogs.  I even feel comfortable letting him off leash in some cases because his recall is amazing and his general obedience has greatly improved. My dog loved his trainers and was always so excited to go to group classes. I regularly receive compliments about how well trained he is and I owe it all to the Sit Means Sit Team.

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training Tampa
review_text: Amazing experience, my boy Duke came back perfect! Knowing all the commands and playing/ ignoring other dogs much better! The whole team at sit means sit is amazing, Duke was very happy to be back for our post training appointment!

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training Tampa
review_text:
I am absolutely thrilled to share my experience with the incredible dog training company Sit Means Sit who has worked wonders with my 5-year-old adopted German Shepherd. Adopting an older dog often comes with unique challenges, but thanks to the expertise and dedication of this company, my journey has been nothing short of miraculous.
From the very first consultation, it was evident that Kris possessed an exceptional understanding of canine behavior, particularly with rescue dogs. Kris and Tina took the time to get to know my dog's history, temperament, and specific needs, crafting a personalized training program that addressed every concern I had.
My German Shepherd had struggled with reactive issues, but the trainer's patient and compassionate approach made all the difference. Their positive reinforcement techniques, combined with clear and consistent guidance, helped my dog gain confidence and trust in a remarkably short time.
One of the most impressive aspects of the training was the focus on strengthening the bond between me and my dog. Kris and Tina not only taught my German Shepherd essential commands and good manners but also educated me on how to communicate effectively with him.
The progress my dog has made is truly astounding. He is now well-behaved, responsive, and much more relaxed in various environments. The transformation has been so profound that friends and family often comment on how well-trained my German Shepherd appears.
In addition to the remarkable results, Kris and Tina‚Äôs professionalism and dedication are commendable. They were always well-prepared and always invested in my dog's success. Their passion for their work shines through, making the training experience enjoyable and rewarding for both me and my dog.
I totally recommend Sit Means Sit and cannot express enough gratitude for the amazing training I received. Their expertise, kindness, and unwavering commitment have changed my German Shepherd for the better. If you are looking for a trainer who can make a real difference in your dog's behavior and overall well-being, look no further. My 5-year-old German Shepherd is living proof of the incredible impact a skilled and compassionate trainer can have.

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training Tampa
review_text:
After alot of Research we reached out to Kris @ Sit Means Sit Dog Training for a consultation.  We have a high energy 3 year old pup whom is like a tank.
Our mission was to help Ripley our pup the best opportunities to be the best Dog he could be.
We decided on the 1 week stay and train.
Mainly to get Ripley a good foundation for us to work off on. I highly recommend this training in my opinion once the Dog gets over the separation the consistency is then set forth.
We went after the week did our training that Saturday got our instruction an the rest was now on us to reinforce what Ripley had learned.
We received communications from the training staff as Ripley was progressing.
A week later we did our follow up.
The amazing part was to see Ripley's reaction when Ripley layed eyes on his trainers. Ripley was so excited to see them again.
We will be taking advantage of the group training to further Ripleys new skill sets an reinforce this amazing foundation Ripley has received.
There are many Dog training methods and different companies out there.
We highly recommend Sit Means Sit of Tampa under the excellent and highly professional leadership of Kris.

provider_name: Sit Means Sit Dog Training Tampa
review_text: My pup and I have had a wonderful experience with Sit Means Sit. We really enjoy the Group Classes and the opportunity to learn and practice with other pups and their humans. We are making great progress! I highly recommend Sit means Sit - you won‚Äôt be disappointed.

My dog's life, and mine, changed the day we met Alberto.

We‚Äôve known him for over five years now, ever since we brought our dog home. From day one, he was so much more than a dog sitter. He just got her. It was like he spoke her language. He helped train her, and over the years, he‚Äôs been there for everything ‚Äî whether we were heading out of town or she just needed a playdate. It didn‚Äôt matter if it was late, a weekend, or even a holiday ‚Äî Alberto always said yes. That kind of reliability gave us such peace of mind.

Then everything changed. Our sweet girl was diagnosed with a serious medical condition, and suddenly, finding help became incredibly hard. Most people either hesitated or said no outright. But not Alberto. When we told him, he didn‚Äôt even flinch. He said yes, with this calm, steady confidence that instantly put us at ease. He took on her care like it was no big deal ‚Äî same love, same attention, just with some extra steps.

Even after we moved half an hour away, we never even considered looking for someone else. We still make the drive because there‚Äôs no one else we trust with her.

Today, his support meant more than ever. We lost our dog unexpectedly ‚Äî a heartbreaking shock for our family. In the middle of all that pain, Alberto was there. He didn‚Äôt just help us through the difficult moments ‚Äî he showed up with real compassion and care. His kindness made a really hard day just a little bit easier, and we‚Äôre so grateful for that.

If you‚Äôre looking for someone to care for your dog ‚Äî especially if they have special needs ‚Äî I honestly can‚Äôt recommend Alberto enough. He doesn‚Äôt just watch dogs. He loves them like they‚Äôre his own. He‚Äôs dependable, trustworthy, and one of the kindest people we‚Äôve ever met. Our family is endlessly grateful for him.

I brought my 1 year old mini Australian shepherd, Willow, to Alberto for the 3 week boot camp and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the results. We were having issues with reactivity to dogs and people and had earned a reputation as the crazy puppy in our neighborhood. When I picked her up from boot camp, I received a class on how to handle her going forward which was incredibly eye opening. Now we are following our schedule and working on training everyday. She is still the same silly, energetic pup she‚Äôs always been, but now she has a much better ‚Äúoff switch‚Äù and on top of that our neighbors are constantly complimenting on how well behaved she is now. I highly recommend Sit Stay Dog Training, not only for training but for boarding and daycare. Alberto and his staff are true professionals and take great care of my baby!

I had my mini goldendoodle, Tito with Alberto for 3 weeks for boot camp! I was very reluctant to send my baby away but it was the best experience for him. Alberto and his staff treated him like he was their own. In  3 weeks he learned, socialization with other dogs, how to walk without pulling and General behavior skills like not to jump on people and of course sit, lie down and stay! Thank you, Alberto for your expertise and help!

We‚Äôve been bringing Lokai to Alberto at Sit Stay Dog Training for nearly five years, and it‚Äôs always a fantastic experience. The best part is seeing how happy and excited Lokai is every time we arrive, it‚Äôs clear he loves it there!

I was so my wits end with my puppy. I didn't know how you train him myself. I searched for weeks and found Alberto.

After three more weeks of not being with Ollie, I felt like a different puppy came home.

Sit Stay Dog Training USA has completely changed my life with my puppy. I'm looking forward to a long happy bond with my puppy.
I am extremely grateful to have found Alberto and his amazing staff.

Ollie has done fantastic with Alberto, now it's my turn to continue at home.

Skill Builders For Kids went above and beyond our expectations! From our initial call with Mike, to each and every session with Ms. Dana. Ms. Dana was very sweet, helpful, informative and my daughter truly enjoyed going to each session. She never wanted to leave! We saw tremendous improvement in our daughter and are so happy with how much she has progressed. I highly recommend Skill Builders For Kids. They are willing to work with your schedule and are truly interested in helping each child with their needs.

Skill Builders has been amazing and supportive since the first contact. Mike was very helpful and responsive and set us up right away on the call I made and we were able to have evaluations done within days. John and Nancy are both superb in addressing the speech and OT needs for our daughter. Most importantly, they are highly invested in her well being and provide a progress report after each session to keep us well informed. They have been supportive and genuine with establishing and following the path to improvement. We started here early in the summer and our daughter has already shown an immediate and significant improvement over the handful of weekly visits thus far. Great environment, the staff enjoys what they do, and that warm energy carries over to my daughter- she loves visiting here! Skill Builders is highly recommended to everyone. Thank you, John and Nancy, for working with us and providing the support that you have.

Skill Builders delivers exceptional care, supported by a remarkable team. My daughter thoroughly enjoys her sessions with Karla and John for speech and occupational therapy. The level of personalization in their care is truly outstanding.

My daughter has been going to Skill Builders for both speech and occupational therapy for about two years.  I am so pleased with both of her therapist.  I have seen so much growth and  progress in her.  She started with speech due to deficits with pronouns, which we completely corrected. We now work on her fine motor skills as well as listening comprehension among other things.  Our therapists love my daughter and it is evident in how excited she is for her appointment each week!
We looked at some of the larger offices around town, but they seemed like factories...not interested in my child specifically, just interested in the payment at the end of each session.  Skill Builders is like an extended family, they are on my daughters team and want the best for her.  So thankful that we found them!

We found Skill Builders when I needed some help with my son's sensory issues. I am so glad we found them!!! Our therapist John has been amazing! He is great with James and has been so helpful in getting us on the right track with therapy. If you are looking for some help or need an evaluation for your child do not look any further!!! Skill Builders for Kids is in my opinion the best therapy center around. Thank you John and Mike for everything!
Miss Nichole is phenomenal. She truly cares about each of the kids/families she works with. We have learned so much from her! If your kiddo is needing OT I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough!
Mandy was amazing getting me all set up. Such a sweetheart and made everything so easy for me. Looking forward to working with them.

I recently began seeing Jennifer over the last few months and wanted to take my time prior to reviewing. Words cannot express the person and therapist that Jennifer is. Jennifer leads every session with a smile on her face, listening ears, and an open heart that doesn‚Äôt judge. Jennifer ensures she sets you up for success by giving you task/homework you can do outside of therapy to solve the issue you may be having, or to help find the reason it is occurring. My favorite thus far has been the ‚Äòbeneath the iceberg‚Äô which helped locate the actual reason behind certain emotions. She is the most understanding person and knows life gets in the way. She has changed her schedule to accommodate me more times than I can count given my busy schedule. She always has a positive ‚Äòwe can do this‚Äô attitude which has me leaving every session with a positive outlook on the situation at hand. Jennifer is also LGBT friendly and doesn‚Äôt judge. For this reason, I not only use her for personal therapy but for marriage as well. She is able to separate the two perfectly and give sound advice. This review and those beneath mine do not scratch the surface of the experience you will have with her. Front staff is nice and were quick to get me in.

I have gotten to know Jennifer over the past years and l am impressed with her skills as a counselor.  She is knowledgeable, kind, compassionate and listens well. Jennifer is able to weave with detailed care a treatment plan that demonstrates her professional expertise.  Highly recommended!

HIGHLY RECOMMEND JENNIFER! The entire practice is fantastic. I am very grateful for the professionalism, integrity, empathy, and detailed care that was received here and by Jen. Her expertise truly helped process and work through various things in a manner that was comfortable and welcoming. In addition, I do feel like I am now in a different chapter due to the work done here. The entire practice was great from consult to being more involved - everything on the admin side was easy, communicative, and done without any issues. With Jen, she truly was an angel that guided me through various techniques and concepts. Super grateful! 5 out of 5.
Jennifer was my therapist here and she is incredible. She is kind and empathetic, but also challenges me to help ensure I stay on a path of growth. Cannot recommend her enough!!

My teenage son and I were in town for spring break and he needed to stay on track for his PT. We reached out to Sloan Stecker they were able to accommodate us and we could not be happier. The facility and set up is awesome and fun. This was just what my son needed for his knee and ankle recovery. We considered PT with Sergio one of the highlights of our vacation. He really took his time with my son and tailored the workout to his needs. Thank you, I wish there was a 6th star!

Charles Reese is a very experienced and dedicated physical therapist at Sloane Stecker. I can‚Äôt say enough about the care he has provided since I had a total knee replacement. The use of the equipment at Sloane i.e.
Antigravity treadmill, balance, quad and hamstring strengthening has helped tremendously in my healing process. Compression boots and TECAR therapy is an added bonus. I highly recommend Sloane Stecker and Charles Reese.

Joel, Charles and the whole team at Sloane Stecker have been great. Everyone has been very professional and caring. The facilities are top notch and the high-tech machines make PT a lot more fun. Highly recommend

I have Iliotibial band syndrome after knee replacement surgery. I have been getting physical therapy treatment for this condition. The Winback Tecartherapy has made a difference in the ligament pain after just two sessions. Winback therapy naturally accelerates the healing of muscle and joint injuries. I highly recommend Winback Tecartherapy and Sloane Stecker for any physical therapy needs.

Excellent therapists with the very best equipment. Easy to work with and professional.  Lots of individual attention with tailored therapy at every appointment. Great atmosphere with a friendly and amiable staff. Highly recommend.

Small Steps has been such a blessing throughout out the years. Through the therapists and staffs patience and determination they‚Äôve helped miracles happen with my son. I will forever be grateful to them for helping my son be who he is today.

They do not have it together, my son‚Äôs been doing the virtual class with one of their workers @7 pm since they are only open till 5 . And most adults work a 9-5 so obviously those hours Arnt good . The teacher they gave us doesn‚Äôt speak great English so this was a bad start to begin with,  trying to get kids to pronounce things they can‚Äôt either . And Changing appointments without any discussion, and being completely rude when I‚Äôm confused about the time change . Since .. it wasn‚Äôt discussed. Because apparently their times during summer are different. Even though they don‚Äôt bother telling you the times will be changing so you can make proper arrangements. They just change it . Hate to pull him out but at this point I think it‚Äôs doing more bad than good.
I think small steps is wonderful. My great grand daughter has Autism. She has speech and occupational therapy there. Her speech has really improved. She loves all her thearapist.

Do not use Small Steps, this place is a JOKE. Called in January for speech and OT for my toddler, got an OT appointment for late February, ST wasn‚Äôt available until JUNE. Okay, fine, whatever, I waited. Went to the OT eval, they said they didn‚Äôt have my referral (my pediatrician faxed it a month prior) so I called and had both referrals resent. They were supposed to write up their report and contact me back to start a therapy schedule, never heard from them again even after I called back 3 times. Showed up today for the speech appointment I waited SIX MONTHS for. They ignored my name on the sign in sheet, eight other kids and an hour and a half later I asked why she hadn‚Äôt been seen yet and they tell me they thought I didn‚Äôt show up. The waiting room is a sardine can, there‚Äôs no way you didn‚Äôt see us or called our name! Then claimed AGAIN that they didn‚Äôt have the referral. I asked them to call the pediatrician but they said I have to do it. Meanwhile I have a tired cranky autistic toddler to wrangle and we‚Äôve been here an hour and a half. I walked out from this nonsense. No apology, no help, just useless!

This place is a damn joke. I‚Äôve been waiting 2 months to hear from this place so my son can start speech therapy after he was evaluated. I called a month an a half after because of the holidays, they hadn‚Äôt even sent my authorization to my insurance. The lady who assisted me was covering that day and submitted the documents while I was on the phone. She told me to follow up that week. Well I forgot to, I finally remember to follow up a week and a half later and the receptionist who is seriously useless is like i don‚Äôt know and the girl who does authorizations isn‚Äôt here. So why are you the receptionist of you can‚Äôt actually assist the patients/parents? I‚Äôm looking for another place. She‚Äôs an idiot and it doesn‚Äôt take long to get this done!! This place sucks!!!!
My son was born very premature and  had speech delay. He has been getting speech therapy with them and he is doing great, he also started on OT and is also advancing. Their therapists are great!

Ashley and Yalin are the best. They helped my daughter reach milestones in a short amount of time. I am so happy with the service here. If you ever need a PT or speech therapist this is the place. They are organized with scheduling and accommodating to your needs. Super nice customer service and it‚Äôs very clean. The gym is super cool my daughter loves it there. And she loves the staff.

My son has improved immensely since he started therapy here. Yeilin and Millie are amazing, my son loves them. The front desk girl‚Äôs Cristal and Merari have great customer service, I highly recommend this office.

They helped my family so much. The attention and care they provide the children is unmatched. Everyone is so kind and so joyful to be around. We are forever grateful for the exceptional experience and support they have given my family.
My daughter has been going there for about 2 months. She loves her therapist assistant. You do not wait after the appointment time has been scheduled. They are very organized and on point.

Small Talk Speech Therapy has been a godsend! My daughter has been a client for 2 years and has made such amazing progress. She has gone from having a severe speech delay to having confident, intelligible conversations with an ever expanding vocabulary. The therapists at Small Talk are so professional, caring and approachable that it makes it a pleasure going to appointments. I am so thankful that my daughter will continue to grow in her success with the help of these wonderful people!

The therapists at Small Talk Speech Therapy are so sweet and helpful. I brought my son to them because he was not talking much, he was shy, always played alone, & when he did speak no one could understand him. Since being in therapy, his teachers have told me they are in awe of how conversational he is, and how much better they can understand him! I have seen him "come out of his shell" at church with my lady friends. I can finally understand what my child is saying and he is less frustrated nowadays. The speech therapists get on the floor with my son & play games with him to help him learn, and he just loves them! I cannot express how much of a difference Small Talk has made for my child & for our family!

I am very impressed with the Smart Body Therapists I have been working with. They are very knowledgeable, professional and friendly. The office staff is wonderful as well. So far I have had an excellent experience and would definitely recommend.

I highly recommend Smart Body. I was so terrified for my first experience that my blood pressure was way up there. But the time Kayla took with me talking, explaining and asking questions made me so comfortable and relaxed. The examine wasn't as bad as expected. I now know what I can do with somewhat of a timeframe to have better results for me. Thanks, Smart Body.

My experience and time at smart body was amazing! The staff and doctors were professional and very helpful specifically Dr. Susan and Dr. Kayla.  If you are looking for personal and professional group to meet all of your needs, Smart Body is the place to be.  Well worth the time and my body is improving !!  Kimtonja Douglas

I found Smart Body because they were *highly* recommended by Mayo Clinic. I was lucky to get on the schedule for nine sessions.

Smart Body staff is what you'd want--respectful, excellent bedside manner, considerate. Which is great, but the reason I urge you for go to Smart Body is COMPETENCE. So much knowledge and insight gathered so quickly!

Was it fun? Nope. (Like any physical therapy that I've ever had).  Do I have a lot of home work ahead of me? Yup. On about day 6 of my experience I was exhausted and ready to cry. But I ultimately came away feeling equipped and ready! My long and frustrating and expensive search for help is over.

Maybe Smart Body has a few hiccups in the booking/reception area, like just about any business right now. But there are some very strong individuals working that area picking up the slack, and that will NOT affect your health care.

Moving forward Smart Body is going to be in even BIGGER demand! Make your appointment sooner, not later. I traveled 1,400 miles to see them. Well worth it.
Jessica is very knowledgeable about pelvic floor exercises! She is patient and understanding with the my issues after s prostatectomy!

I have been going to this gym for over 3 years. The trainers are professional, graduates in the field of physical training, and therefore knowledgeable about the how to do the exercises safely. Shane is very caring and attentive to one‚Äôs skill level and needs. He is quick to encourage, counsel and follow up with his clients. Gabriel is the other trainer and he is just as skillful and motivating. I would recommend this gym to anyone.

Gabriel - whom I have been using for years is the most knowledgeable trainer/therapist I have ever worked with.
I have been dealing with multiple issues that he has been able to correct and keep me from having any additional surgeries.
I recommend him highly with whatever physical ailment you may be dealing with.
He and his team are all fantastic.

Gabriel and his team are awesome!
They are interested in the well being of their clients and keep our needs in mind.
I love Smart Fitness, my trainers are always available to share their expertise and modify our training when is needed. They push me and keep me motivated when I need it.
I‚Äôve signed up for a lot of exercise programs and I‚Äôve never stuck with them. I met Gabriel in 2016 and his attention to detail has made me a loyal member. If you are looking for a team of people that are interested in ensuring you have the right posture and reach your goals, then give Smart Fitness a try!

I have been attending Smart Fitness for a few years‚Ä¶ they are all wonderful and attentive to each persons individual needs. I appreciate the time and consideration that they give to helping me always! A gift to the community! Gabriel is so knowledgeable about the human body and so helpful with helping me reach my fitness goals!

I have a neurological disease and am afraid of the coaches that say go, go, go! Gabriel is the total opposite.  Depending on where I am that day with pain, he already knows what I can and can't do. He's fun to be around, but he knows his stuff (for lack of a better word.)  He watches every move I make, and safety, form and consistency are the words of the day. If you are looking for that kind of workout, this is the gym to go to. Injured?  After your physical therapy, this is the place to transition to. Just need a tough workout, no one makes you feel like you've accomplished a good gym day like Gabriel.

Tony and his Smart Start Puppies Team were the perfect choice to guide me and my recently rescued cane corso mix on a successful path together,   With a patient, gentle, and flexible approach to training, Tony instilled the confidence and patience I needed to allow Lady Bird to thrive.  Even as a seasoned dog owner, the continued lessons and advice were invaluable.  Thank you!

I‚Äôm incredibly grateful to Smart Start Puppies. They taught me how to have better control of my dog. After her training, she‚Äôs become so well-behaved, calm, and brings me a lot of peace of mind.
Now, I can take her to more places with full confidence that Matilda will  behave excellently.

Thank you so much, Tony! You‚Äôre a true professional and an amazing trainer. You taught us key commands and techniques that have made a huge difference in how I manage my dog.

Thank you to this amazing dog training business for teaching my dog to be better around people. Tony and Julie do an amazing job and I recommend them 1000%. Extremely nice people and you can really tell that they love their job. I look forward to work with you guys again
Tony and Julie are the best. They are currently training my Kari to become a service dog and they are doing an amazing job, Kari is already a changed dog. 100% recommended!

Skeptical at first but now a total believer! We have two dogs - a SUPER ENERGETIC chihuahua puppy (Chiqui) and an older STUBBORN AND REACTIVE shih tzu mix (Winston) - both desperately in need of basic obedience and good manners. Just one session with David at Smart Start Puppies and we saw an IMMEDIATE change in both the dog behavior and our own!

Smart Start Puppies equipped us with all the tools we need to become more confident and responsible dog parents. Two months later and the dogs are completely different dogs - not only are they more obedient and reliable, they seem genuinely happier. Training a dog is not for the faint of heart and it takes a lot of discipline but with Smart Start Puppies you‚Äôll have one on one support and a network of super talented, patient and knowledgeable training experts at your disposal to hold you accountable and help you achieve success.

If you love your pups but need help getting them under control or have more advanced needs like therapy or service dog training, call Smart Start Puppies. Everyone at Smart Start is amazing - David, Brianna and Julie, to name a few - and they‚Äôre all genuinely excited to help you create the dog of your dreams. Not only are they kind and passionate about what they do, they‚Äôre legit experts in the field of dog training. If you‚Äôre on the fence, just jump in - Smart Start Puppies is worth EVERY penny and my only regret is that I waited so long to call them!

And special shout-out to David - he's a real gem. Not only is he patient, understanding, smart and super kind, he's a straight shooter and one of the most honest and humble people we've ever met. David gave us homework starting on day one and consistently checked in on us, and no matter how busy he was he always made time for us...and the best part is that he held us accountable (THANK YOU!!). David gave us the confidence we needed to take control of our dogs and ultimately our lives, and for that we're forever grateful.

After 2 months with my new rescue, I knew we needed some help. A great dog, a lot of trauma. We had to start from the basics. She needed to learn how to just be a dog. She had no idea.  Tony and Julie have been the best.  From the house, to the neighborhood, to day boarding to the airport and mall visits, they were always there to help guide Scout and I.  With the consistency learned in training I now have a happy, stress free home and a well adjusted dog 6 months post adoption.  Time and money well spent.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Tony as a dog trainer. From day one, he‚Äôs been patient, professional, and genuinely invested in helping Ollie (and me!) succeed. You can tell he truly understands dog behavior and meets each dog where they‚Äôre at, no cookie-cutter methods, just tailored guidance that actually works.

Ollie not only responded well to Tony‚Äôs techniques but actually enjoyed the training process. Tony helped build Ollie‚Äôs confidence while giving me the tools I needed to feel more confident as a dog owner. Whether we were working on leash manners, commands, or addressing anxiety, Tony always made it feel manageable and encouraging.

He has a calm, grounded energy that dogs pick up on immediately and that energy carries over to the people he works with too. If you‚Äôre looking for someone who‚Äôs kind, consistent, and really knows what they‚Äôre doing, Tony is the one. I‚Äôm grateful we found him.

The training we had with our golden retriever, Cooper is his name, was unbelievable! He came back a totally different dog!! Highly recommend Smart Start Puppies for your loved pooch! By the way the photo of Cooper in our front yard just lounging without a collar and just enjoying the morning:

My husband and I worked with David who helped us in training our 6-month-old Cavalier King Charles Spaniel, Luna. We had an amazing experience. David was incredibly knowledgeable and skilled in helping us with Luna's potty training. Luna had way less accidents just 1 week after training.

David not only provided us with effective training techniques, but he also gave us valuable tips and guidance to help us gain more control over Luna's behavior. David was patient, understanding, and clearly passionate about helping both Luna and us. Luna responded positively to his training methods, and we saw significant improvement in a short amount of time. David's expertise and personalized approach made a huge difference in our puppy's behavior and our overall experience.

We highly recommend David and his team to anyone looking for professional and effective dog training services. Thank you for all your help in training our Luna and giving us the tools to continue building a strong bond with her!

***THE BEST** we were so lucky to find Tony the dog trainer. We have had previous dog trainers and never had success. I was so please to see our dog Toby's success with the training sessions. Now Toby is able to fly with us and we are so happy!!!
