I would like to know in which planet lives the last person that left a nasty review about the center and the excellent costumer service you receive there; not only from the therapists but all the members that work there. I guess you don't know that with everything there involves a process and you have to  abide to the rules and policies of each place. Have a little bit of more respect & education towards the people that served you.

I love this place my daughter has been coming to the center for almost 2 year and her improvement has been amazing.
The front desk  is always willing to accommodate any change always very polite and energetic. The therapist are amazing with my daughter everyone treats her like family.

I recommend this center hands hand for speech and occupational therapy they also have music therapy available as well

My son had been coming here since July of 2023 this place has been the best place for my son because he is interacting with others and trying to sound out words and trying to do everything on his own that he never did before

the team continues to work closely with my child to create steps  to achieve good control of instruction to promete learning, behaviors are presented with high frequency and intensity...thank you team
Excellent service that all the therapist provide to all the kids

Cathy is incredible at what she does. From pretty early on I sensed something was not quite right with my baby regarding feeding. I questioned the pediatrician, consulted two lactation specialists and was placated rather than given a diagnosis, or reason why my baby was unable to take a bottle or eat food. When I was at my breaking point, we found Cathy and she was able to help us get a tongue and lip tie diagnosis. She assisted me in finding a provider who ultimately ended up releasing the ties. Cathy fought for me and my child when no one else would listen to me. Her communication style is very direct and clear, something I have always appreciated. I wish I had found her sooner in my search for answers. We are so grateful for Cathy and a healthy baby that is now able to eat whatever she wants!

Cathy is such a breath of fresh air and a wealth of knowledge, especially with feeding experience. As a fellow SLP with zero experience in feeding and a new mama experiencing post partum anxiety around introducing solids, she placed me at ease and provided me with all of the tools needed to keep my little boy nourished and happy. Thank you so much Cathy!

Best experience going to the chiropractor by far. The atmosphere and their energy alone helped me feel better about the whole experience.  Dr. McKenzie is awesome! She and her staff makes you feel comfortable, and like family. She is very patient and very flexible. Not to mention she knows her stuff and will have you feeling better in no time. Very clean facility and they will work with you until you‚Äôre back to your old self again. A+ from me!!!

My experience with Dr. Ashley and her staff has been wonderful, they have been courteous and very helpful. I always feel welcomed and cared for as a patient.
Clean atmosphere, friendly staff and an awesome chiropractor. I have been feeling much better after each visit. I recommend this office, they are prompt  and helpful every time I need to schedule an appointment. I am very thankful I found Specific Care Chiropractic.

One of the best chiropractic offices that I‚Äôve been to. Everyone is so friendly and the environment is wonderful overall. The staff takes the time to get to know you as a person and not just as a client. Dr. McKenzie is absolutely amazing and gives some of the best adjustments. I have always left feeling refreshed and ready to enjoy the rest of my week. I would definitely recommend Specific Care to anyone who has gotten inside of a car accident and is suffering painful aches, or someone who has mild aches from time to time.

I had an amazing experience at this practice. The level of service that I received was so professional. Yeni was very helpful in conjunction with Dr. McKenzie. I've been in so much pain for the past few years and Dr. McKenzie took her time with me. She acknowledged my concerns and was very gentle with me. The facility was very clean and they practiced great hygiene. I will continue to return and send referrals here! Thank you for the support!! I WILL BE RETURNING!

Best Chiropractor I‚Äôve ever been to. Dr.McKenzie is an amazing doctors who takes the time out to truly care for her patients. The staff is super inviting and is always willing to go above and beyond when it comes to making you feel comfortable and welcomed. Cassandra is amazing with helping you learn the stretches and explaining to you the benefits. I recommend specific care to anyone in need of a chiropractor. The care can‚Äôt get any better than specific care in Coral Springs.

I was very disappointed with my experience with the Speech and Learning Institute. We went through a very challenging divorce and during the process Jaclyn would only communicate with my husband who paid the bill. Jaclyn testified in my divorce on my husband‚Äôs behalf stating I missed appointments that my husband made on my behalf without my knowledge. Jaclyn would not return my phone calls and if we were running 5 minutes late to an appointment she reported it  immediately to my husband. I did find the staff very helpful and knowledgeable. Anyone going through a divorce I highly suggest looking elsewhere for ST.

I couldn‚Äôt be more thankful to Jaclyn and her staff! My thee year old used to have really bad separation anxiety and now walks in there no problem. We have seen tremendous progress with him! I also have a 21 months old that sees miss Jillian and the tenderness and careness she has towards him warms my heart!! The staff is amazing and companionate, I am very happy that we have found this practice.

We are very thankful for Jaclyn and the team that served our family so well. They did an excellent job at evaluating, assessing, and helping our son in his needed areas. All the staff members were friendly which made our son comfortable and excited to be there. Highly Recommend

Our family is overjoyed with the work done here.  Our son was not speaking at age 3, and he was diagnosed with phonological disorder.  We started speech therapy here and were told that the goal would be to have him on par with children his age by kindergarten.  It has been a year and a half and he has just 'graduated' from speech therapy, and he starts kindergarten this fall.  He went from barely verbalizing to communicate, and unable to articulate the consonents/vowels properly -- to the  chatterbox of the family.  Speech therapy was worth every penny.  It not only helped his speech, but his ability to manage his emotions and lessen his frustrations.

We had 2 primary therapists over 1.5 years and they were both incredible.  So skilled from the science end; and so nurturing from the caretaking end -- just perfect therapists for children.  Elena was our last therapist, and she always took her time after each session to talk to me and share updates.  While Elena was our primary therapists, there were several times we had a different therapist fill in -- and they were all honestly so great.  We were never disappointed with whoever worked with Jagger that day.  This place was worth every penny.

I have watched my autistic son go from very poor motor skills and language impairment to accomplish huge milestones. The staff has always been patient and caring when working with my son. I love the dedication each staff member puts in with every child that receives speech or occupational services. This Institue is cutting edge with there knowledge and techniques for working with special needs children. I highly recommend them for any family in need of a speech/occupational therapy services.

SATC has been a game changer for us. We have been met with compassion, professionalism and support. From the moment we walked through the doors we felt like the people actually cared about her child. Willow is 18 years old, high needs, and nonverbal. It has been a challenge in Brevard County to find provider who are suited to her needs.. speech Avenue specializes in unique children that need that extra help and the nonverbal kids. Every staff member is amazing and there is an incredible amount of knowledge in this building. We look forward to working with them for many years in the future.

Speech avenues has been an absolute life changer for my son, he's been coming here for therapy for almost a year and the progress he has made being with them twice a week I'll be forever grateful for. The staff actually cares for your children and you while there‚ù§Ô∏è I couldn't imagine taking my son anywhere else. He loves his "school".

Absolutely phenomenal service, from the administrative staff Michelle, Gabby, and Gail to the wonderful speech pathology provided by Erica. The treatment I receive at speech avenues has transformed my voice after suffering bilateral hearing damage and as a person from the LGBT community I have felt welcomed and never judged since the day I first walked in. Erica has been a wonderful asset who specializes in many things from voice disorders, fluency disorders, gender affirming voice training and aphasia. I love that they work with Veterans through community care and offer timely patient centered care to everyone from children to adults. They also specialize in speech and schooling needs for non-verbal children and work with parents to meet individual client needs. As an adult patient I have been treated with respect and dignity throughout my time as a patient with excellent communication and appointment reminders from the staff. After approximately a year of being a patient here I can truly say that there is nowhere that offers this quality of service in the area that I have found besides speech avenues. Thank you for all your team does each and every day. üòä

My son is nonverbal and has oral aversion. He has been coming here since March 2025 Ms. Gail has him navigating his ACC device like a pro. Also she has him licking his tongue enjoying Italian ice. Ms. Gail is the best! Michelle at the front desk is very helpful and sweet

This place is great! There are truly professionals working here. I am very grateful to the Speech Avenues team.
We take our son to a speech therapist and occupational therapy.
Ms. Gail is a great professional! Ms. Gail and occupational specialist Salina helped my autistic son and taught him how to chew solid food. For a long time this has been a problem for us. I had a very difficult time teaching my son to eat solid foods. Within a few months we have gotten through it.
A huge thank you to Gail, Salina, Erica, Chris and the rest of the Speech Avenues team.
You guys are incredible. You are doing a great job. Thanks to your work, my silent son Nic is also learning to speak and is already saying letters and syllables.
Our family is very happy to have found cool professionals like you. It is great to have your Speech Avenues center close to our home.

It's really cool that (occupational therapist) Chris has a therapy dog named Ozzie. The kids like Ozzie a lot. Ozzie is intelligent and a very friendly, calm dog.
Here also have a summer camp for kids.

Thank you so much, guys!

It was great to have our son with Niki. She is so supportive and dedicated to improve our son's speech, with clear goals. She‚Äôs so kind professional patient and Encouraging .Also she was so flexible adjusting the schedule whenever needed.
We‚Äôre so lucky and happy to have her Highly recommended!

Niki is so sweet, knowledgeable and passionate about her work. It‚Äôs been such a pleasure getting to know her and work in alignment to help families and their senior loved ones. She is my go-to when a family I‚Äôm working with needs help with their cognition and speech therapy :)
Niki is amazingly patient, professional and caring. She has worked with my father for a couple of months and we have seen vast improvement. We would highly recommend her!

I always refer my patients and clients to Niki, she is caring, kind, knowledgeable, and thorough! She has helped so much with their cognition, swallowing, and speech therapy needs with great results. She has a ton of amazing tools and tricks she uses from the long experience she has in her field. I highly recommend Speech Care at Home!

Speech Care at Home has provided us with lots of at home exercises and tips on how to improve our child's phonemic skills and pronunciation. They always respond quickly to our questions on how to navigate the confusing problems that we see crop up with our child's changing speech patterns or their trouble with certain phonemic sounds. We are looking forward to seeing our child's demonstrated progress by using their services and highly recommend them!

I recommend this therapy school. My son's have been showing improvement using sign language mimicking what they've learned and expressing more. Their therapists MICHELLE is very knowledgeable, kind, fun, consistent and understanding.  My children love her.
The environment is cozy & private.
If you have any questions like a lot of us do, please feel free and comfortable to ask Mrs.Michelle or Saadia.

First thing first, I love Mrs.Michelle! She is absolutely wonderful and patient with my child. She also taught me techniques to help curtail my child‚Äôs behavior- using the smiley face method. Mrs.Michelle has completely made my child more confident in his abilities to speak and be himself. His vocabulary has increased since he‚Äôs been seeing her. He also enjoys learning especially since he gets to learn while playing.

Thank you Ms.Sadia for placing my child with Mrs.Michelle and really looking out for his needs. Thank you for always getting back to me amongst our busy schedules and being empathetic to our needs.

All in all, I would recommend any child with language or speech difficulties to go to Speech Language and more.

A real review here. I saw no progress. It seemed promising upon initial sessions, we were getting worksheets to practice, I would get updates from Michelle the speech pathologist but after the initial sessions my son no longer bought home practice pages, or when I asked he would say he just played with toys. Sometimes when I asked my son if he did speech he would repetitively say ‚ÄúShe wasn‚Äôt there today‚Äù. I will say,  The owner and Michelle are both very nice and I can only speak on my experience.

Speech language and more is a second family to me and my son. The owner is a wonderful woman. She‚Äôs always on top of everything I need. My son has been with speech Language and more going on 4 years!! I wouldn‚Äôt know what to do without them. My sons therapist Ms. Michelle works so hard she is so Patient and kind. I am a teacher and I would recommend this company to all my students parents who are seeking help and all the neighboring schools I associate with. üëåüèæ

SLM has been such a blessing for my son's speech!  Within the first few weeks he was already correcting his own "R" sounds and asking when the next time Miss Michelle can come over to "play and talk!" The sessions are very playful but structured and effective.  We definitely spent our time "shopping around" with different speech therapy groups and SLM was not only the most accommodating, but also affordable and has a very quick response time to questions.  They are also VERY flexible when it comes to varying schedules (kids, school, work, etc), which is huge for us.  So thankful to have found Sadia and her team.  Thank you!  5 stars and HIGHLY recommended!!!

I am so grateful to Sadia at Speech Language and More for her work on my toddler with a speech delay. She has a beautiful office where she works on my baby once a week. We have been there for a few months now and already I have seen a significant improvement in his language development, attention span and information processing. I highly recommend this place for anyone in need of a speech pathologist as Sadia is a master at her craft!

I‚Äôm a very satisfied with SL&M. Sadia has been doing a great work and my son had an amazing improvement in his speech. Also, he loves to ‚Äúplay‚Äù with Ms Sadia. She and her staff are always kind with our family.

We love going to see Sadia at SL&M! She takes the time to get to know my daughter and identify her needs. My daughter loves to ‚Äúplay‚Äù and go see her. The staff is amazing as well! They always greet us with a smile and get the door for our family. I wish I could give more stars!!!!

We love Speech, Language, & More! Sadia is an amazing SLP and has helped my daughter so much already. Her holistic, play based approach is developmentally appropriate and effective, and my daughter loves going for her sessions.

We LOVE Sadia!!! My daughter is obsessed w her. She watches asks for her all week and is over the moon when her day rolls around to play with her. My daughter never knows she‚Äôs actually working while she‚Äôs playing and that‚Äôs part of what is so beautiful about it. Sadia has this amazing ability to just connect w kids. Her and my daughter share a special bond and it‚Äôs just so special. Under Sadia‚Äôs guidance and through her abilities, my daughter absolutely flew through her gap and closed it (in what feels like r√©cord time) in less than 1yr. She carries lengthy conversations, uses words and phrases well above her age. None of this would be possible without that connection she formed with her and the confidence she‚Äôs given her to shine like Sadia and I both knew she could. Forever grateful for Sadia. She‚Äôs simply the best.

Speech matters has been an absolute blessing to my family. My son has been going here since February and I've been extremely impressed by the staff. Katie has been working with my son from the beginning and has been so loving and caring towards him. My son is two turning three in October. He was diagnosed with Autism this last summer and can be very hard to handle at times. Despite his undesirable behaviors, Katie has never given up on him and has gone out of her way on multiple occasions to find us the help we need. My son has also worked with Alodia and Jennifer on few occasions and they've also provided my son with QUALITY care. I've never walked into their office and experienced bad service. All the staff and genuinely amazing people. Not only is my son progressing with his speech everyday, he loves to be there and never wants to his session to end!

My son Reid goes to kaylee! He loves her so much. When we first started coming here a few months back I was so nervous leaving my baby with anyone for an hour. But he lights up as soon as he see‚Äôs her. I‚Äôve also seen so much improvement since he‚Äôs started coming here. She informs me of everything they did when I come pick him up & keeps me updated on any concerns. We are so blessed to have found speech matters & can‚Äôt thank kaylee enough for all she does!

I am so grateful for Brittany at Speech Matters! She has truly helped my son with his expressive disorder. They are fun, friendly, k owledgable, and the kids love everyone in this office! I highly recommend Speech Matters for your child's speech therapy needs.

Amazing crew here! They really get to know your child, and they truly care. We drive an hour each way for every appointment, and it is so worth it! The progress my daughter has made here is incredible! 10/10 recommend Speech Matters!

My daughter is 11, and non verbal autistic. Has been attending for almost 3 years. I grew to trust and like her therapist very much, as my daughter is not easy to manage at times. After about 2 years, the therapist requested to have sessions with my daughter ALONE.
I was fine with it, by now the therapists knew her well, and was aware of the SIBS and occasional aggressive stimming. Idk what happened in that room, but the therapist cut short the session, as my daughter began banging her head, and scratching the therapist. The therapist was shaken, but began making a bunch of medical assumptions and recommendations about my daughters sibs,  even though she already sees trained medical doctors for the issue.
As far as im aware, this is the FIRST incident, in 3 years, the company decided to cut off my daughters services, with no parents meetings or input as to how to possibly remedy the situation, such as, having me come back in the room, even though the therapist did request alone sessions.
They took it upon themselves to cut her services, without any type of meetings or talks.
This obviously is not in the best interest of the child, is extremely cold, and will stunt her progress as it was, and well, not to mention any bond she had with that therapist, gone. I would recommend you find a company more apt to work with parents through these incidents through communication, rather than just a cut off. I will also be filing a complaint through the insurance.
I am satisfy with the help provide by Mr. Donald. His sessions are very good, giving me the tools to continue improving my language skills.

provider_name: Speech Pathology of Coral Gables, Inc.
review_text:
We have been clients on and off for about 5 years. This office is so professional and helpful. Both of my daughters have now done therapy here and from the front desk staff to the therapists everyone is great.
Truly life changing for our family. I could not recommend more.

provider_name: Speech Pathology of Coral Gables, Inc.
review_text:
I could not be happier with our experience at speech pathology of Coral Gables.   Our son was seen by a very knowledgeable, compassionate and engaging, occupational therapist for 5 months.  During this time, we have seen significant improvement, for which we are very grateful.
Additionally, their office staff is extremely responsive, detailed and organized; appointments run on time, and the staff is always welcoming and kind.
Highly recommend to anyone seeking speech or occupational therapy for their child.

provider_name: Speech Pathology of Coral Gables, Inc.
review_text: My son has been going there for about 1 year and a half  and he's improved so much. I really appreciate everything they've done to help my children and they are considered like family. The therapist  there are very friendly and devoted. I highly recommend Speech Pathology of Coral Gables.

provider_name: Speech Pathology of Coral Gables, Inc.
review_text: My family has been blessed to have come across such a wonderful place. As soon as I park the car, my son is eager to get down and see his therapist. My son is 4 and we have been coming for a few years now. SPOG is a place of quality care not quantity care. The service you receive is exceptional, from the receptionist Diana ( who is sweet, caring, attentive and more) to the therapist, who are all caring, professional and are constantly working with you and your child. To the owner, who is always present and has an open door policy to answer any questions or concerns. Your kids could not be in better care and get better results. I highly reccomend SPOG.

provider_name: Speech Pathology of Coral Gables, Inc.
review_text: My daughter has significantly improved after starting therapy. She loves her therapist and enjoys going to SPCG.

Speech Pathways of St.John's has always treated my daughter and myself with the utmost respect and professionalism. Before our first visit, the owner Karissa Gussmann personally attended to our every concern and questions regarding my daughter's therapy. She made me feel apart of the process and she valued my input regarding my daughter. We enjoy and benefit from their speech therapy weekly. You won't be disappointed with their personal care and your results of their therapy!!!

We recently moved from out of state and had very big shoes to fill when it came to finding a new speech therapist for our daughter. We were looking for a place that not only had experience but also felt personal‚Ä¶somewhere that didn‚Äôt feel clinical or rushed and where we wouldn‚Äôt just be a number.

From the moment we walked into Speech Pathways of St. Johns, we knew we had found something special. After just two sessions, it already feels like we‚Äôre part of their little speech therapy family. The environment is warm, welcoming, and truly centered around the individual needs of each child.

Karissa is not your typical speech therapist. She took a genuine interest in our daughter‚Äôs entire history, asked thoughtful questions, and truly listened to everything I shared. She involved me in the care plan from the very beginning and even handed me a pen to adjust the goals together. What meant the most to me as a mom was how seriously she took my daughter‚Äôs medical sensitivities. Karissa went above and beyond to make her space safe and comfortable, even making changes to the environment to help my daughter. She‚Äôs followed up outside of sessions with such genuine care and concern, checking in to see how my daughter was doing and how she could support her better. That level of care is so rare and such a gift.

After both sessions, I walked out in happy tears‚Ä¶tears of relief and gratitude. Finding someone who understands your child, listens to your concerns, and cares deeply is everything. Even the other staff members we‚Äôve met have been just as kind and genuine.

If you‚Äôre looking for a holistic, child-centered approach to speech therapy, this is the place. They see the whole child and value the parent‚Äôs role in the process. My daughter usually takes a long time to warm up, but she was already talking to Karissa during the first session. Karissa has a way of connecting that makes kids feel safe and comfortable.

One of my biggest worries with our move was finding a new SLP, and I can now say with confidence that we found exactly what we needed. My daughter already looks forward to going back, and I‚Äôm so incredibly thankful.

Amazing experience at Speech Pathways! My kids received outstanding care and made great progress. The therapists are wonderful, and the owner is so warm and genuinely cares about every child. Highly recommend!

My son is receiving Speech and Occupational therapy at Speech Pathways and I noticed improvement in communication using his AAC device , social skills, and fine motor skills, along with increased confidence and enjoyment of therapy.
Highly recommend them!!!

I am so thankful I found Speech Pathways of St. John‚Äôs for my son who was diagnosed with autism and was non verbal. He has been working with Karissa since 2024 and we have seen such wonderful gains in speech. We have tried so many other centers and private therapists but nothing compares to the level of one on and care they provide.  Gabby and Kara are also so kind and helpful! We have nothing but praise for the staff there.

Outstanding doctor!
Very professional, compassionate, excellent bedside manners! She dedicates enough time to listen very carefully and asks questions about the patient's history to the take the whole picture of the problem. If I had to rate her I would give her 100 out of 10....she likes her profession and works with pleasure and interest. I have nothing else to do that she is EXCELLENT.

My son has been receiving speech and occupational therapy services for approximately 2 years at Bionetworks. During this time, I have watched my son flourish and grow in many aspects with the patience and guidance of his therapists. The sacrifices made weekly to bring him to his appointments were well worth it as he has succeeded in multiple aspects. I can not recommend this facility enough as it has made a profound impact on my son's capabilities and has set a strong foundation for his future. Thank you to all the staff who has been extremely helpful over the years. We will miss this place!
Thanks to this therapy my sister was able to talk to us properly. Its been a few years since she left writing this review doesnt do it justice for the wonderful program they did. Thank you

My daughter loves it here. The therapist are really nice and they love her and she loves them my daughter has grown so much here she's saying more words now. She receives speech, occupational and feeding therapy.
Its a place where they help children a lot. In my case, I have my two children there and it has helped them a lot. The girls are very good and friendly with the children and parents. I recommend it.

Very professional, excellent therapist.
Cares about the patient and their well being.  Maps out an individual plan, and
Discusses it with Patient and Caregiver.
This is the most wonderful place!!

C.Spence

Oh wow what can I say? where can I start? I have been taking Jacob to Speech w a Twist since he was 6 months old and the amount of development my child has received with not only the activities in the class but the things the SLP's teach us is amazing. I am convinced that they have helped Jacob develop amazing motor skills, concentration to play alone and with others. Speaking and communicating more than I would have ever expected at only 15 months old. I am grateful to their constant love, attention and over all concern for Jacob as he develops. They are an amazing team and I will have Jacob there as long a s they are offering a program that will help him. Thank you for all ur hard work and creativity !!
Love Mari and Jacob

My son has been coming to see Ms Indi for a few months now and it‚Äôs been amazing! She is so kind and patient and makes everything fun. My son is extremely shy and she always find ways to connect and have fun while doing the work. He loves his sessions and his progress has been incredible. We are very grateful to Speech with a Twist and Ms Indi in particular. Couldn‚Äôt recommend it more!
And on top of that there‚Äôs plenty of parking so there‚Äôs zero stress.

we Love going to the Friday classes.. Indy and Diana are so much fun for the kids and also educate us parents on what we can be doing at home. My daughter has been going for about 5 months and I‚Äôve seen such a difference and growth since starting there! We also just started my older daughter with private speech therapy and she loves going and have already noticed great progress! So happy to have found this group!

I have no words to thank Speech with a Twist. My daughter connected with Indy from day one. For a young child whose world is divided by selective mutism, Indy became a pillar in helping my daughter navigate. Changes in her vocabulary and her process of articulating was immediate. My heart is full knowing I was able to find the best speech pathologist in South Florida to help my daughter find her voice. I live eternally grateful and hopeful knowing her future has a solid foundation of gradual improvement because speech with a twist is part of our team.

I have the utmost gratitude and appreciation for Speech With A Twist. My child began sessions with Indira 3 months ago knowing only an handful of words. He now puts up to 4 words together in a sentence! I have been brought to tears of joy at times listening to him ask for things and converse with his siblings. Equally as important, he looks forward to his sessions. He‚Äôs learning and having fun at the same time.

Our family has been seeing Mrs. Alex for almost a year, and we couldn‚Äôt be more grateful for her. If you‚Äôre looking for an energetic, knowledgeable, and passionate speech therapist, look no further. She connects so well with our son, making each session something he truly enjoys. Mrs. Alex takes the time to explain the process to us and provides practical tools we can use at home to keep his progress going. Thanks to her guidance and dedication, our son‚Äôs speech has improved significantly ‚Äî and she‚Äôs been a major part of that success. If you‚Äôre searching for a speech therapist in the Land O‚Äô Lakes area, Mrs. Alex is the one you want.

We are so incredibly grateful for our speech therapist! From the very beginning, she has been kind, patient, and genuinely invested in our child‚Äôs growth. We‚Äôve seen so much progress since starting therapy, there‚Äôs more communication, more confidence, and such a joy in expressing thoughts and needs.

She brings not only professionalism and expertise, but also warmth and heart to every session. Our child feels safe, encouraged, and celebrated, and as a parent, that means everything. We always feel supported and included in the process, and it‚Äôs clear she truly cares.

We couldn‚Äôt imagine a better person to be walking this journey with us. Thank you for making such a meaningful difference in our lives!

Alex was my daughter's first speech therapist. She helped and supported us through our daughter's diagnoses with ASD. She was the first to inform and educate us about my daughter being a Gestalt Language Processor and how to best support her language development. To this day, I am helping other moms and therapists by informing them about GLP because it isn't common knowledge yet. This is what makes Alex so special because she strives to always be the best in her practice by always staying informed on the newest findings and teachings. She takes pride in her work and gives 100% to everyone she works with. Even after we have moved on, she has graciously become my go-to guru on everything from best straw cups to use to AAC programs. You name it and Alex knows how to help. She isn't just a phenomenal speech expert, but an even stellar person. It is impossible to be around her and not leave in a better mood. Her energy and light is contagious and pure. Any time anyone is looking for someone in this field, I always recommend Alex. She is simply the best SLP and person. I feel so grateful my daughter was taught by her, and that she is still a part of our lives.

We absolutely love Mrs.Alex and the knowledge she has for GLP. If you‚Äôre looking for a turn from the insurance world and actually have therapy working definitely see Mrs.Alex. The progress my daughter has grown to show is in incredible and so glad to have used Speech without limits!
Ms Alex has truly been so amazing!! My daughter enjoys her sessions every week and always feels so encouraged by Ms Alex!

My daughter attends OT with Miss Darieon and Speech with Miss Darbi. Are they the best? YES!
With Miss Darieon, my daughter found her confidence and comfortability to attend therapy for an entire session. My daughter is encouraged to use her brand of humor and is always welcome to be at her most creative in Miss Darieon‚Äôs safe space.
With Miss Darbi, my daughter is learning different ways to communicate and even started SPELLING words in writing or typed to communicate. This is a HUGE step for a clinically nonverbal child and I am forever grateful to have Miss Darbi give my daughter a voice in any she can find.

I love this place! We all look forward to our appointment every week. There are so many fun things for kids to interact with here. Darbi is wonderful with my son and daughter. All smiles and noticeable progress! Miss Darbi really puts her heart into it! She always finds a solution to any concerns we may bring up and she‚Äôs prompt with responding. We‚Äôre thrilled it‚Äôs back to original ownership again

We have been with speech works for about 4 years now. Dareion is my son‚Äôs OT and she‚Äôs been the sweetest addition to his therapies!
He also sees Darbi for speech and she‚Äôs amazing as well.

My kids have attended here for years. I loved it when it was speech works. The staff was great and helpful. Until kids spot took over, since then it has been nothing but stressful. The insurance/authorization dept is very unorganized and the supervisors just blame the therapists for everything. Their therapists are amazing especially Kara Lindsay and Darieon, if you can tolerate a disorganized office with disrespectful/unprofessional staff. Courtney was another helpful team member who was always on the ball, unfortunately it went downhill after she left. Today I learned why they can't keep therapists and have a revolving door of staff. Good luck if you come here.
We love Ms.Darieon! My son is always excited for OT with her, she is seriously the best!

provider_name: Speech and Language Center of the Palm Beaches
review_text:
We have had the most wonderful experience working with Ana Hoffman!

As a mother I felt my son's speech wasn't on par with his peers but his school always said since his grades weren't affected, it shouldn't be a concern. After a couple years I finally took it upon myself to get him therapy to catch his speech/articulation up with his peers and I am so glad I did.

Ana is very warm and intelligent, incorporates so many clever ways to keep your child engaged with games, and supports continued learning at home with worksheets and tools.

My son always looked forward to his sessions and had a tremendous amount of growth, we were so happy to have found her and absolutely recommend her 10/10!

provider_name: Speech and Language Center of the Palm Beaches
review_text:
Ms Ana has been such a blessing to my toddler who arrived in her care after we self-referred. E was almost 5 months behind in his speech and language development, specifically 2 standards below average in expression. But going into almost a full year with her now, he is well-ahead of his age in comprehension and making great progress in language development and speech.

Ms Ana is an eternal optimist and an expert at play therapy. What started with blowing bubbles to get the ‚Äúp‚Äù sound and understand ‚Äúpop‚Äù has become endless learning, talking and playing. E is so engaged in his sessions each week. Whether they‚Äôre reading books, playing with the farm, cooking in the play oven, or singing songs, he just loves his Ms Ana. I‚Äôm glad I trusted her to develop E‚Äôs comprehension and language before working on his speech. He is excelling under her guidance, care and patience. And the worksheets she sends home for us to practice have helped my husband and I contribute to E‚Äôs gains!

If you find yourself stuck on a waitlist to get your child the support they need, or you are just at a loss for who else to help, I can highly recommend you visit Ms Ana. She will forever be part of E‚Äôs story, and we couldn‚Äôt be happier that she is among the village loving, encouraging and teaching our son.

provider_name: Speech and Language Center of the Palm Beaches
review_text: Mrs. Hoffman has been such a blessing to my son. He loves working with her, and the amount of progress he‚Äôs made since working with her has been amazing. He‚Äôs been speaking more clear and forming sentences on his own. Compared to when he started he wasn‚Äôt saying much. Plus she always gives little worksheets for us to work on at home. I would recommend her to anyone who is looking for speech services.

provider_name: Speech and Language Center of the Palm Beaches
review_text: My son took speech lessons with Anna at the Speech and Language Center of the Palm Beaches for one year, and his speech improved immensely. His speech used to be somewhat unintelligible to others outside of his close circle, but now he speaks clearly and fluently. Anna has many fun kid-centered strategies, and my son always looked forward to his lessons. Anna is also super sweet and wonderful with kids. I highly recommend her!

provider_name: Speech and Language Center of the Palm Beaches
review_text: I can't say enough positive things about Ana Hoffman and the incredible work she does as a speech therapist. Ana's kindness and patience shine through in every session, making my son feel comfortable and at ease. She has a unique ability to turn speech therapy into a delightful and enjoyable experience. Ana comes well-prepared with engaging games that not only help improve speech but also make it feel like a fun and friendly chat with a true professional. I'm deeply grateful for the progress my son has made under Ana's guidance, and I highly recommend her to anyone seeking speech therapy for their child. She's simply fantastic!

provider_name: Speech and Language Connection Services LLC
review_text: My son has been coming here for almost 4 years for speech and occupational therapy. His progress and development has been phenomenal. Everyone in this office from the owners to all therapist who have work with my son have been equally caring, loving and knowledgeable. They go above and beyond to help him succeed. The most important thing is my son loves to come here ,he feels loved and safe. This place has been a blessing in our life‚Äôs

provider_name: Speech and Language Connection Services LLC
review_text: My child was there for about four months. I didn‚Äôt like the fact that they keep changing therapists without my knowledge. I only found out because I ran into my child‚Äôs ‚Äúnew‚Äù therapist in the lobby. How are they supposed to know his progress if they kept changing the therapist. They expect you to confirm appointments every time. But couldn‚Äôt advise me whenever they‚Äôll change his therapist! I called their attention about it twice and I got a rude response from the front staff. Never had the owner contact me or at least apologize for the inconvenience to let me know what was going on. It was just a horrible experience and I honestly wouldn‚Äôt recommend it. You‚Äôre there to help your child progress but I guess they only cared about the charging the insurance.

provider_name: Speech and Language Connection Services LLC
review_text: When my daughter was diagnosed with ASD, this company was the best thing ever happened to us. They have a great team of professionals and sympathetic staff. The staff is really knowledgeable and made a great impact in our lives. I truly recommend this company with my eyes closed.

provider_name: Speech and Language Connection Services LLC
review_text:
They are super professional, from the person who answers the phone and schedules to the therapists.
Employees follow very strict sanitation procedures  keeping everyone safe during this crazy Covid time.
Kids feel at home because of the caring environment they provide during therapies.
The results of Speech and Language Connection Services Staff is 100% improvement in the kids overall: in grades, communication, confidence, social skills and playing.
My son received therapy at a different center once upon a time, but i switched to Speech and Language because i wasn't seeing results in my son. I'm so so glad i found them because they are AMAZING!

provider_name: Speech and Language Connection Services LLC
review_text: This place deserves 10 stars instead of 5. I cannot recommend this enough to any parents out there seeking help/guidance. Starting with the owner to the staff they are all truly amazing, they go above and beyond! Maggie is extremely knowledgeable and will assist you with anything within her power. She worked around my busy schedule and made it possible for my child to attend his therapies. Therapist, Rosmely & Olga are awesome, loving and patient. My child has been attending therapies for a few months now and there‚Äôs such a big difference and so much improvement. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
3 of our children owe a ton of progress to Speech4kids.  From Speech and Reading services to OT they are the best

My son has done speech therapy with Kelli for his entire school year, and she is just wonderful. She has great toys in her office so my son loves going to speech because she plays with him and he doesn‚Äôt feel like he‚Äôs ‚Äúworking.‚Äù She always has another trick up her sleeve of strategies to try, and was so dedicated to helping him be successful! She‚Äôs flexible, patient, and she really cares. Couldn‚Äôt recommend this program more highly!

We absolutely LOVE Kelli at Speech 4 Kids! She is very patient, kind, and soft spoken with our son. Additionally, she is always researching and looking up new, creative, and effective ways to adjust her therapy and treatment to best meet the needs our child. Our son is always happy and excited to see her! She is a top notch speech therapist and we highly reccomend  her.

My grandson attended a Social Skills Group for children who are working through their Autism.  The time these awesome ladies, Kelli and Margaret, took to organize and execute this 4-week social skills group was extremely beneficial.  The Speech4Kids staff is very through and put my grandson at ease as he is shy of strangers.  The take away for my grandson is that he made friends with the other participants which for him is a milestone because this is always a challenge for him.  The benefit for the family is we received at the end of the group time a binder filled with lots of visual queues for my grandson to relate to others and how to cope in a stressful situation.  I am so hoping there will be another group meeting for the children.  I am grateful for the continued support of these ladies.  Very professional, friendly, easy-going!  I HIGHLY recommend these ladies for this program and all the services they offer!!

If you want the best of the best for your child when it comes to speech therapy Mrs Kelli with Speech4kids is who you want. Both my kids have and are receiving speech therapy from Mrs Kelli (speech4kids) and they LOVE her and look forward to every session. She truly has a heart for this and has helped both my kids  tremendously with speech.

Ms. Ray is an absolute master professional in her field. I have the fortune of knowing her personally and I made a call for help based on her expertise and she responded with immediate help and resources. She helped my son with his delayed speech in ways that other medical professionals failed.  She is truly one of a kind and our family will forever be grateful to her. I would recommend her to anyone in need of speech therapy, you will be so grateful you made that call.

Absolutely fantastic...Scarlet provided therapy to my son for about 2 years and it changed our lives. He‚Äôs now able to articulate and communicate with ease.  Her efforts made it possible for him to excel not only academically but socially as well. She is as equally skilled as she is caring. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better speech therapist for our son.

I have known S.R. since we were about six years old, and she stated early this was her calling and desired line of work. I am inspired by her dedication to her patients, her deep understanding, human-ness and all the real-life variables involved when it comes to speech therapy and healing work. Highly recommend and best wishes to your family

Speech Rx people are amazing. They helped me with everything I needed to get started with therapy. They are great at communication.  Lindsay helped me with my speech and language after my stroke. She used the latest research and materials to improve my swallowing. I can‚Äôt speak highly enough about the therapy I received!!

Lindsey At speech, Rx has been an amazing gift to our family. She has provided strategies that are easy to implement for speech and cognitive therapy.  She is enthusiastic, positive and a true professional.  She is a blessing during this time.

I have just completed the speak out therapy program with Lindsay Snyder and her team. The program was excellent and made me focus on my speech, voice and articulating more clearly. I would recommend this office to anyone who may need speech therapy.

I can't recommend Lindsay enough as a speech therapist! She is patient, knowledgeable, and incredibly dedicated to helping her clients achieve their goals. Lindsay creates a comfortable and encouraging environment, making each session not only effective but also enjoyable. She tailors her approach to meet individual needs, always providing valuable feedback and support. I've seen significant progress thanks to her expertise. If you're looking for a skilled and compassionate speech therapist, SpeechRx is the place to go!
Lindsay Snyder is kind, compassionate, knowledgeable, all of the things you want in a speech therapist. She mastered her craft and takes pride in it.

Rochelle with SpeechWise has played a huge role in our child‚Äôs progress with language development. She works alongside of us to give us the tools we need to support her at home and has built a trusting relationship with our child - who looks forward to seeing her each week. We couldn‚Äôt have made it this far without Rochelle‚Äôs support.

My child has been undergoing speech therapy at Speechwise for over a year, with twice weekly sessions led by the outstanding therapist, Ms. Mallory. My son enthusiastically looks forward to his sessions, which have resulted in significant advancements in his speech. Additionally, Ms. Mallory educates him on essential concepts during speech such as colors and counting.  She is very kind and understanding and does so well with my son, it creates such a great learning environment for him . His learning experience has been highly rewarding, and he eagerly looks foward his weekly classes. I am very grateful that we found speech wise.

provider_name: Spellers Center Tampa - Occupational Therapy for Nonverbal Individuals with Autism/ Apraxia
review_text: I have been taking my son to the Spellers Center of Tampa for the past 3 years. Jacob has come such a long way. He has been working with Melanie this last year and has gained such confidence with his spelling to communicate. Melanie is very patient and encouraging with Jacob. Jacob loves going to the Spelling Center of Tampa and working with Melanie. He even spelled out a Christmas Card for her all by himself. Melanie is amazing!

provider_name: Spellers Center Tampa - Occupational Therapy for Nonverbal Individuals with Autism/ Apraxia
review_text:
I first took my adult nonspeaking autistic son to Spellers October 11, 2023. I was very skeptical and was surprised that Melanie spoke directly to Paul almost as if I were not present. She was very encouraging to him, and he was soon Spelling. I was blown away when she asked him what the capital of Delaware was and he spelled out DOVER!
I didn't know that!
Melanie has always treated Paul with utmost respect and PATIENCE...she is very encouraging to him and makes sure he knows that she is proud of him...even through his most dysregulated days.
She always successfully helps Paul to
de escalate when he has violent outbursts of self injury and brings him back to continue his session.
Paul and I lost our home and belongings to the hurricanes last fall. We evacuated after the flood from Helene, then had to evacuate from Milton. I knew I had to get him back to Spellers ASAP after our evacuation to Georgia, to get some stability into his life. His life was turned completely upside down in one night, causing trauma, which increased his bouts of self injury. Melanie was extremely accommodating and got him right in for a session. That was the first time I had seen him smile in days. ü•∞
I simply cannot say enough good about Spellers of Tampa and Melanie in particular.
Bringing Paul to Spellers is the best decision I have ever made for my son. We have grown closer because  I have come to understand him better and  he knows that I understand and support him. I now KNOW for a fact that  he is in there... after hoping and praying for 30+ years that he was.
Spellers of Tampa and Melanie Conway have been MUCH more than a Blessing in our lives! My hopes and dreams for my son have been restored.üòä

provider_name: Spellers Center Tampa - Occupational Therapy for Nonverbal Individuals with Autism/ Apraxia
review_text:
My son is an unreliable speaker. We had our 2 day intensive with Dana Johnson this week. Wow is all I can say. She was amazing with my son and incredibly helpful teaching me how to help my son become an effective Speller.

I know this is the right avenue for my son and so many others like him. What a refreshing thing it is to find a professional that treats my son with respect and dignity of a "real" person!!! My son was so engaged while with Dana, he and I are doing very well the past few days learning our "dance" with this new motor planning. I am so excited for the future.

I finally feel we found a window my son can climb through and finally find his way to the door of communication. I HIGHLY recommend any and all persons that have a communication issue to go see Spellers. JUST MAKE THE CALL! I PROMISE BEST THING YOU WILL EVER DO FOR YOUR LOVED ONE, YOUR FAMILY AND YOUR PEACE OF MIND.

Lisa Greene

provider_name: Spellers Center Tampa - Occupational Therapy for Nonverbal Individuals with Autism/ Apraxia
review_text: Melanie is fantastic and a miracle worker! We brought my son with nonverbal Autism and she kept him engaged and made him feel seen and understood right away. She met him where he was and he was comfortable with her quickly. She is patient, flexible, and presumed competence while assisting him with strengthening his motor skills. The Center is beautiful and so motivational with quotes by nonspeaking people. I cannot recommend Melanie and Spellers enough!

provider_name: Spellers Center Tampa - Occupational Therapy for Nonverbal Individuals with Autism/ Apraxia
review_text: We just did our first intensive at Spellers Tampa, working with Dana and Melanie.  Both Dana and Melanie were so wonderful to learn from and to observe working with our son.  They truly care and work patiently while presuming competence.  They both share an ability to recognize and bring out a child‚Äôs strengths and potential, while understanding the neuromotor challenges that exist in the world of autism (and nonspeakers in the case of our son).  Spending time at Spellers Tampa was beyond worth it.  We‚Äôre motivated to help our son progress and learn more about him through spelling.  We are grateful for the experience we had with Dana and Melanie, and we will definitely be back soon!

A very special thank you to Dr. Jill Westfall and her entire team for taking care of my family for over 10 years. Today was a very special appointment as my father-in-law who is almost 87 came to office. The staff gave him the ‚ÄúRoyal Treatment.‚Äù He is starting a new chapter as my mother-in-law recently passed on. Moving to a new state with everything being new will take time, and knowing that he is in great hands is very reassuring. Thank you and God bless. Diana, Juan Carlos, Juliana, Daniella & now Victor J Velasquez

My Daughter recommended this place and I stopped by today without an appointment and they welcomed me in very warmly. Doctor Westfall was awesome! Very nice and knowledgeable and the staff was very welcoming! All the therapies and massage they gave helped me so much! I definitely recommend this place if your back needs a pick me up.

Dr Jill and her staff are the best. I have been a patient for many years and recommend her services 100%. Don‚Äôt wait until you are in pain, an adjustment is always great for you. I won‚Äôt visit any other chiropractor. 5 stars Dr. Westfall!

My go to place when life kicks me in the back! It‚Äôs conveniently located on Miramar pkwy. The doctor and staff always available when you need them. A busy place but their operation is so smooth that you hardly face any waiting-in-line frustration. The staff is courteous, Dr Jill is a great practitioner and there are no hidden charges that, unfortunately, a norm in many other places.

This is my first visit to this center and it is excellent. The doctor takes her time to evaluate you, listens to you, and explains very well what you have and what therapies they will apply to resolve them. They are really good and I highly recommend them.

So we had the absolute pleasure and privilege of taking my daughter for a horse riding lesson here today - and I can honestly say I am so humbled by the experience throughout. Morgan (the owner I believe) was amazing from the very outset. She accommodated us on short notice and communicated with me via WhatsApp. She arranged her assistant and trainer Tori to have an initial lesson with my daughter, who got to ride the aptly named "Mickey"! What a beautiful pony, and actually the horses here all looked incredibly well looked after. The place itself is deceptively large - it's much bigger than what it looks like from the road! It's one of the most beautiful and well kept facilities I've seen, whilst remaining quite authentic - it felt like we were part of a movie set. A variety of fenced off paddock areas and stable/barn areas really nicely done. Sara even had an opportunity to groom and wash Mickey after her lesson! And fed him treats too. Finally the work they do here with the therapy programme is so admirable. Please visit and support, we most definitely will be, and look forward to riding here every time we're in Orlando!

Today was my son‚Äôs first day of equestrian therapy. I couldn‚Äôt be more happy for him. From his therapist, Shelby, to his horse, Mickey‚Ä¶..just a phenomenal experience. My son is a very anxious little dude but Shelby & Mickey helped him stay cool and collected. I‚Äôm sincerely happy we found them and they are able to help my son. ü•πüíô

I was looking for equestrian therapy for my daughter, was recommended here. I printed all the necessary paperwork, filled it out and mailed to the PO Box on the website. 2 weeks later  it was returned saying the PO Box is vacant, so I emailed the address provided on the website a week ago. NO RESPONSE. No clue if this place still exists or is in business. It‚Äôs a shame, my daughter was really looking forward to this.

Shelby made my Grandfather's dream of riding a horse come true. He will be 100 in November and with the patience of their horse Bella, a special saddle, and positive instruction he was able to cross it off his "bucket list."
This is the best place for horse therapy for kids.  The young lady was knowledgeable, patient and kind and professional.  My son had a incredible workout and a amazing time

Wonderful facility with great people. As someone taking lessons, I cannot say enough great things about our trainers Hannah, Lorraine, and Brittany who are each kind, caring, knowledgeable, patient, and genuinely invested in the riding success of not only myself but also my son. As a boarder and first time horse owner, not only have these same people been amazingly supportive but also the staff and extended barn family, Ejola, Krystal, Alan, Lou to name a few. Owning a horse for a first time can be a little intimidating and these great people have helped me feel confident and ensure that our boy receives the best of love and care at all times.

My family lives near Spitfire and have been interested in getting my daughter lessons there. We went to the property little bit ago to look around and see if Spitfire would be a good place for us. We were more than delighted when we went on the property, all the animals looked to be in good health. We were greeted by a lovely lady by the name of Sarah, she was getting a horse ready to ride and asked my daughter if she wanted to say hello and pet Loki (the horse.) The horse was very friendly. Sarah was very friendly and knowledgeable when answering all the questions we had. My daughter and I watched her ride for a while, she was a stunning rider. Needless to say, we will be getting our daughter lessons soon.

This is a very well put together riding stable. They have horse trainers, and the students attend competitions and win ribbons. They also do kid camp over the summer and other holidays kids have off from school throughout the year. Beautiful place
A beautiful barn!! All the horses look happy and well cared for, and all the staff are very friendly. A great place for horseback riding lessons, I can't recommend high enough!!!
Just started taking lessons here. Mark is a great trainer, very patient and knowledgeable. Staff are friendly, facility is clean and horses are well cared for and happy.

provider_name: Sport & Spine Physical Therapy & Wellness Center
review_text: Oh gosh I have had back pain for almost a year, I want to an orthopedic surgeon who said I needed steroids injections and surgery due to my MRI. My husband saw Dr. Whelton a little over a year ago and we were impressed because be could have taken his money and told him no you need to consult a specialist as Dr. Whelton didn‚Äôt want to take his money fail due to the severity he said. My husband told me to go see him and Dr. Whelton showed me on the first visit that the source of my pain was misdiagnosed and that surgery and injections would have failed. Now I am pain free and have my life back.  He has taught me exercises to maintain my proper alignment for my back if it should go out. He is very upfront on visit 1 that this isn‚Äôt a quick fix and requires dedication to my home exercise program for lastly relief

provider_name: Sport & Spine Physical Therapy & Wellness Center
review_text: I have had low back pain 19 years after or during pregnancy. I have tried chiropractors, meds, acupuncture, i have had some injections. I saw Dr. Whelton‚Äôs FB ads and thought i tried everything maybe this guy knows. On the first visit he relived my pain showed me that i have been misdiagnosed now after 19 years in about 5-6 weeks I‚Äôm pain free! I like the fact that he teaches me how to fix myself instead of what most people do trying to create dependent customers forever. He encouraged me to seek help from another type of specialist for an issue that i ignored but he said that shouldn‚Äôt be ignored i need to see someone.

provider_name: Sport & Spine Physical Therapy & Wellness Center
review_text: Before I came to sport and spine I tried shots, nerve blocks, physical therapy, walking, stim machine, chiropractors and any other list of things previous Dr's have said to do. I was to the point of no return. Since coming to Sport and spine I have dramatically improved both physically and mentally.

provider_name: Sport & Spine Physical Therapy & Wellness Center
review_text: I suffered with back pain for more than ten years. It started with a kind of stiffness when I did gardening or pulling weeds where I hurt trying to stand up after any bent over kinds of activities. It slowly got worse so even just standing in one place to do my work was painful and just a few months after that I couldn‚Äôt even lay in bed on my side without pain. Was like a crunchy sensation in my sacrum and left hip. I spent a few months going to a chiropractor which did a little help but the pain just kept returning and I needed more help. I found Dr. Whelton on YouTube and was so excited that his office was local for me! On my first visit he was able to see what was wrong with my sacrum and I began doing the exercises he recommended. After just a few days I was noticing relief! So awesome to be free from the pain! I‚Äôve just finished my last appointment and I am so pleased to be able to live without the pain now. If you have lower back pain you should go see him because his methods absolutely work. I can‚Äôt thank him enough!

provider_name: Sport & Spine Physical Therapy & Wellness Center
review_text: After 6 years plus of ongoing low back pain and getting no relief from injections chiro PT still no relief from pain. It got to the point that walking a block was impossible. After doing some research I came across Dr. Whelton and his methodology. I decided to schedule a consultation and after the first session I had immediate relief and with ongoing exercises that he taught I am pain free. I also know how fix myself if this condition happens again he taught me!

I purchased my favorite reining gelding 9 years ago at 10 years old and he had huge knees. From vet care to special farrier work and trying all therapeutic wraps and knee boots I could find on the market, nothing took and kept the swelling down until I tried the pemf leg wraps for a month. The results were undeniable and I decided to stop use for a week to see how much swelling came back. To my pleasant surprise none of the swelling came back. His knees almost look normal and I can feel a huge positive difference in his movement. My only regret was not purchasing these sooner since I knew the quality of sport innovations from the vibe pro I purchased last year.  I did not plan to do before/after photos so apologies on quality as I‚Äôm screen-shotting the before pic from a riding video but hopefully it shows the incredible difference after just one month. Who would‚Äôve thought my gelding feels so much healthier and more comfortable at 19 than he did at 10! I‚Äôm thrilled to do this for him

We have been thrilled with the results we have seen with our horses. We have the 3 in 1 Therapy Blanket and the leg wraps. We primarily have OTTB's, it has been such a game changer for their overall suppleness and comfort.

Shadow has been in our family since he was a spry 2 year old. For the last few years he has been losing condition and up until we were introduced to the pro series PEMF technology, we had not been able to find a way to encourage weight and finish building. Now as he turns ,Shadow is in top shape and hitting the tracks at top speed.

The best PEMF equine therapy equipment on the market, they also offer canine PEMF blankets!
Hanna and Willie are amazing !
Love the difference this blanket has made in my program! They all love and benefit from it!

This place is fantastic. I came in because my surgically repaired knee is not where it should be 7 months post surgery. I also brought my son who is having some sports related knee issues as well. Dr. Comerford and his staff are top notch in every aspect.  They are all very knowledgeable and the experience was great for both of us. I have already booked sessions for next week for myself and both of my sons who are athletes. If you are dealing with pain, this is the place for you.

I absolutely love coming to this off Dr. Jordan is the best! He isn‚Äôt one of those doctors that just comes in does the adjustments and just walks out. No, he takes his time with you and talks through your adjustments also making sure you are comfortable! This is so ideal for me especially knowing I am pregnant! Also, I can‚Äôt forget to mention how amazing Kiaya is and does my soft tissue massages, she does her thing every time leaving you feel absolutely fantastic! I always leave this office feeling like I‚Äôm melting and just amazing! Honestly if you do not have an appointment yet I suggest you make that call you won‚Äôt be disappointed!
***I was not asked or am I getting anything from writing this review just be completely honest and shining some light on an amazing office and its staff!***

Doctors should be held to a higher standard, especially this chiropractor, who posts on his LinkedIn account that he was the VP of a Chiropractic State Board.
My family members had an appointment with this chiropractor.  Based on their experience, in my opinion, his display of unprofessionalism, lack of compassion, dismissing the pain of the patient, belittling and bad-mouthing the other doctors of my family is concerning to say the least.

Everyone on the team is very friendly/helpful! After a few months going here, my entire body is feeling a lot better than when I started. They are very patient and show a lot of care through illustrating each range of motion. I am very grateful!

The doctors and staff are top notch. Every time I see them I get a massage and an adjustment. They have multiple tools to get all your knots out and the doctors don‚Äôt just crack bones, they dig in to the root of the issue and go from there. If you are military or first responder, they have specials for us! If you haven‚Äôt been there, you have to give it a try and you will be hooked!

I Highly recommend Norman. Very professional, concerned about your recovery and well being.  Broke my shoulder Feb 2025.  At 69 yrs young üòäand very close to full movement of my shoulder. My Orthopedic Dr. Is very surprised at how
far I have come.  So thanks Norman for your commitment to your patience.ü§ó.                 üëçü•∞7/13/2025. Finished my therapy and all is well.  Thanks again Norman for your dedication to your profession and the clients that you serve.  I have witnessed this with the individual attention you give

I tore both my Rotator Cuffs, within a 4 month period.  I was referred to NORMAN at Sports and Wellness Therapy for my PT after the 2nd tear.  It was such a positive experience after my 1st PT, at a FACTORY like, dirty and dinghy place as compared to NORMAN's PT studio.  Norman is patient and works at your pace and within your pain threshold. He is excellent and a Master of his profession. I have seen tremendous improvement on my 2nd hand and a huge improvement even in my 1st Rotator Cuff as well.  This improvement is in fewer sessions as compared to my 1st place for PT!  I have gone from "NEED SURGERY" to "NO SURGERY NEEDED"!!

I strongly recommend NORMAN and Sports and Wellness Therapy. GO to S&W Physical Therapy, if you want a customized and personal treatment with REAL progress that you can see, measure and feel good about!!!

From Rock Bottom to Walking Again ‚Äî Norman, You Saved My Life.

I don‚Äôt even know how to begin putting this into words‚Ä¶ but I‚Äôll try.

Almost two years bedridden‚Ä¶ ten knee surgeries‚Ä¶ both legs crushed and fractured in a way most people will never understand. I had doctors telling me I‚Äôd never walk again. I had therapists treating me like I was already done. I lost hope. I lost myself. I felt like my life was over.

And then‚Ä¶ I met Norman.

Norman didn‚Äôt just treat me‚Äîhe believed in me when I didn‚Äôt believe in myself.
He took on my case when most would‚Äôve walked away.
He worked with me one-on-one, with more care, knowledge, and dedication than I could‚Äôve ever imagined.

Because of Norman, I am walking pain-free today.
Because of Norman, I got my freedom, my confidence, and my life back.
Because of Norman, I was able to move back to Tampa with hope in my heart again.

I‚Äôve been through dozens of therapists before, and let me tell you‚Äîno one comes close. Norman isn‚Äôt just another therapist reading from a book‚Äîhe lives this, breathes this, and fights for every single one of his patients like family.

So if you‚Äôre reading this and feel like you‚Äôve hit a wall, like you‚Äôll never get better‚Äîgo see Norman. He gave me my life back, and I know he can do the same for you.

Thank you, Norman. I truly owe it all to you.
If you‚Äôre reading this and thinking twice‚Äîdon‚Äôt. Go see Norman. You‚Äôll thank yourself later.

I was referred to Norman by a good friend of mine for debilitating lower back pain. Turns out one of discs has eroded away and was causing me terrible back pain. For months I had to crawl out of bed because my pain was so severe. On my first appointment w/ Norman, he was able to identify some areas to focus on and properly diagnose what was causing me pain. In subsequent sessions Norman provided me with several exercises and stretches to alleviate my back pain.

After only a few weeks the pain was reduced significantly, I can get out of bed in the morning with only minor discomfort and each day gets better and better. This was a huge relief as I thought I‚Äôd have to live with this pain the rest of my life.

Thank you Norman for helping me and providing me with the tools and guidance I need to acquire and maintain a pain-free lower back going forwards!
I highly recommend this location, they are very informative of self care for improving my quality of life! Physical therapy, one on one personal training and therapeutic massage all in one place!

Absolutely love this facility! The therapist and director, Summer, is super knowledgeable and nice. She clearly cares a lot about her patients and always makes me feel so comfortable. The assistant and front desk, Liza, is amazing and has been so helpful since my first day! I will always choose this facility anytime I need physical therapy.

I came to SportsCare Physical Therapy with a significant injury to my C5 and was in considerable pain. From my very first session, I was impressed by the professionalism, knowledge, and compassion of my therapist. She took the time to thoroughly assess my condition, explain the treatment plan clearly, and consistently tailored therapy to meet my specific needs.
What stood out most was the level of care and attentiveness I received. My therapist not only addressed the physical aspects of my injury but also made sure I felt supported throughout the recovery process. Her expertise gave me confidence, and their kindness made a difficult situation much more manageable.
I highly recommend SportsCare to anyone recovering from an injury or dealing with chronic pain. The quality of care is outstanding, and the staff genuinely prioritize your health and well-being

Great place for rehab therapy. You are the only one being worked with instead of being in a group. Therapist has you on their mind while you are there and doesn‚Äôt run to several other people while you work independently. It‚Äôs nice to know that you are doing things correctly during your session.
Marcelo is excellent and really knows his profession. I would recommend him and Summer to anyone serious about regaining function and improving specific and general health. 5 Stars every day.

Great,friendly and professional staff.
After my shoulder surgery just after 3 visits my shoulder already feels better.
Thanks  for helping me.
And i would highly recommend Sports Care Pyisical Therapy...
Kamryn is fantastic with kids! She is warm, inviting, and fun and this allows kids a place to let their walls down and learn how to deal with big feelings. Highly recommend!

Kamryn is an amazing clinician and great to collaborate with. She has a wonderful ability to connect with kids and parents and help make a difference in their lives. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a child therapist!

Ms. Kamryn is making a a huge difference in my family. She is helping my little one gain confidence and self control.  She is always full of great ideas to help with any problems that arise. I am watching my child's anxiety decrease with  every session. She makes my little one feel heard and understood which I absolutely love. I can not recommend Ms. Kamryn enough. Her passion for helping people is apparent in every interaction that we have had. It's evident the extent that she cares for each of her clients and is deeply invested in doing all she can to support them.  Anyone would be in great hands to work with her.

As a local mental health professional, I feel completely confident referring my pediatric patients to Kamryn for therapy. She's skilled, experienced, thorough, and honestly just very easy to talk to. I know my patients will make progress and be in good hands working with her.

If you are looking for a therapist for your kiddo look no further. As someone who has worked closely with Kamryn, she is well versed when it comes to helping support your kids and educate them on coping skills and guiding them through life challenges. She is very professional and knowledgeable on different therapy techniques to improve the lives of your little ones. I cannot recommend Kamryn enough for your therapy needs.

If you‚Äôre struggling with addiction please consider Spring Gardens! ‚Äî>

I feel so blessed that I chose Spring Gardens Recovery. I had no prior knowledge of where to go, and as my first rehab experience I was honestly terrified. From the very first call, the admissions staff were kind and patient, answering every question and making me feel comfortable and welcome.

From the moment I arrived, the entire team went above and beyond. The staff truly feel like family‚Äîthey know your name, care about your story, and give you personal attention every step of the way. The setting is close-knit and never overcrowded, so I never once felt like just a number or a statistic. Instead, it felt like home.

In my 30 days there I learned and grew more than I ever thought possible. The therapists and group leaders were incredible, and the camaraderie with the other clients brought so much laughter and support. Even the food deserves a shout-out‚Äîthe chefs make every meal with care and it honestly makes a huge difference when you‚Äôre going through something so big.

My time at Spring Gardens changed my life and made the process of coming off my substance something I‚Äôll never forget‚Äîin the best way. I loved it so much that I decided to continue with their aftercare program, HOPE Gardens, through PHP, IOP, and OP. That turned out to be another amazing decision, because it was like an extension of Spring Gardens and helped me keep growing and learning.

The alumni events they host are also fantastic. They give you chances to stay connected, keep friendships alive, and build a lifelong support network.

If you‚Äôre lost or stuck in the throws of addiction  and looking for a place where you will be truly cared for, heard, and treated like family, Please chose Spring Gardens Recovery‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs the place to be. I can honestly say my 30 days there were life-changing and gave me the best chances in life and recovery.

Spring Gardens Recovery not only saved my life, it also changed my life. Everybody that works there truly cares about us clients. The daily topics and groups are so insightful. The aquatic therapy program is therapeutic and healing. I will always recommend Spring gardens recovery to anyone seeking help from addiction.

Spring Gardens saved my life. Wonderful staff, nurses, and chefs who genuinely care about the clients. Food is amazing, the place is very clean and provided a safe atmosphere. It felt like home to me. I learned a lot through every day groups and counseling. Their outpatient program is also outstanding. Thank you Spring Gardens!

This is the only place I've been to rehab, but after going here I wouldn't go anywhere else. They truly do care about you, and it's small enough that you really do matter to them. It's not some medical facility that makes you feel like a number or a problem.
Even every meal has you in mind.

Yes, it's rehab. Any discomfort comes from yourself really, which is normal. I've had the privilege of swimming with manatees, going to the beach, doing yoga daily from being here.
They also will help you medically with any issue you may have (within reason) I had some alternative medical issues and was fully met with anything I needed to feel better with medications and was fully listened to. Obviously you're not getting narcotics.

If you need help this is not a scary place, it's actually one of the best experiences of my life.

This is a place with a serene atmosphere and a small intimate setting. My experience here educated me in the recovery process and gave me an opportunity for a fresh start and a clear mind. All of the staff is exceptional and Nurse Elizabeth, Chef Liza, BHT's Laura and Bob and the therapist Linda were very professional and truly cared about the clients.  If someone I know needs help I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this facility.

The reply that was sent to this review is unacceptable. Notice there's no denials or apologies, just continued gaslighting. They are not sorry about anything. They won't try to fix the problems.

This place appears to everyone like a dream in the beginning, with all their discount codes, but like many relationships, it turned into a nightmare. They screw you later on and then think you won't notice it. They gave me less medication than my cat needed. I thought it was an honest mistake, but they did not apologize, and then charged me full price again once they "fixed" it. They are crooks, thieves, do not care about your animals.
