It was like pulling teeth getting them to send ALL the records to another vet. They didn't want to send the xrays but we got them to, finally. My cat has a mass. It's cancer.  Also, I was charged an arm and a leg for tiny amounts of medicine that they know can easily spill, and then they charge you again! They tried to pass this off as .5ml, when it's actually. 4. That 1ml is a lot for a small animal. The second one is a nosedrop they charge $44 for and that's all you get. So just beware if you are there and they do it to you. RUN!

I had a wonderful experience receiving treatment for my cat. Jaiden was very calm and loving with my anxious cat, which set the tone for our visit. I appreciated that her tone of voice was calming. Then Dr Yeager came in, and both he and Jaiden were so wonderful that my cat‚Äîwho used to hiss and try to bite the previous vet we saw‚Äîwas calm throughout the appointment. I appreciated the education Dr Yeager provided (which my previous vet had not provided) about my cat‚Äôs reoccurring condition. Thank you for excellent, compassionate care for my cat! Pets are in great hands here.

I bought my boy Rosco in because I was concerned with his paws and a few other things and I was helped by a lady named Victoria. She treated and talked to Rosco so nice with the upmost respect and helped me understand everything perfectly crystal clear   she deserved all the praise. Ive been struggling to find a good vet as most out there now a days just care about what's in your wallets.  Safe to say that I WILL be returning because of how welcomed and amazing she treated me and my boy Rosco.  Thank you Victoria. Your amazing. Keep up the great work.

This was my first experience bringing my cat Athena to Spring Hill Animal Clinic. It had been recommended by several shoppers, all of us talking about our pets in line at the nearby grocery store.
They couldn‚Äôt have been more correct. You could tell immediately that this was a warm and friendly place, for people and our pets.
Athena tends to be anxious and frighten easily but right away she was very calm and quiet. The appointment was right on time and we were brought back to an exam room immediately upon arriving. Sarah, the nurse, was very nice and made us both feel relaxed. Dr. Fazio was so kind and welcoming. She explained Athena‚Äôs exam thoroughly and professionally without being rushed, giving me plenty of time to ask questions. She was so awesome!
Athena did great and the appointment went very well. The entire staff was so wonderful to us!
I am very pleased with our experience there and I would definitely recommend Spring Hill Animal Clinic to anyone looking for exceptional care for their beloved pets.

We had such a great experience at Spring Hill Animal Clinic with our two huskies, Milo and Maya! The staff was kind, patient, and professional from start to finish. Milo can be a bit touchy at the vet, but they handled him so gently and calmly that he didn‚Äôt make a peep the whole time ‚Äî which is a first! Both dogs were comfortable and well cared for, and I could tell the team truly loves animals. Highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for a vet that treats your pets with compassion and care. üêæüíô

I just want to start out with saying I absolutely adore this office and their staff. I was seeing Dr.Sampang when I was a child at another practice and he now sees my 5 children. I happily drive the hour from Zephyrhills to Spring Hill happily. We moved out of state for a year to Ohio and we definitely missed the service and care we received from this office. Now that we are back in FL the first thing me and my husband discussed was how we need to get back in Dr.Sampangs office. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend any other practice for children.
Ever since Nov 2020 Dr Sampang has always been respectful, honest, and professional about the care for my son. Thank you. Your staff is amazing and professional.

They only care about their money and not doing what is right. I received a bill from Dr.Sampang office for $140 3 months later from when my wife gave birth to my son. He saw my baby for less than 5 minutes gave us his card and left. I called to tell them we did not ask for him to come to our room and we should not have to pay for this as we do not have health insurance. They did not care whatsoever and wouldn't even offer a discount. I am glad we did not choose to use them as our pediatrician.

On Thursday August 28 I went with my 4 years old and he got corresponding vaccine. On Saturday the 30 I had to take him to emergency because a bad reaction on the arm. I was told reaction was due to both vaccine shot being in the same arm and too close to each other‚Äôs. Today September 10 I came back because he was not feeling well and feet on the same side of the vaccine is swelling. I explained situation and let them know what was going on in a very good manner while I was checking in other lady not the one that was doing the check in l, came to tell us that for future reference we have to call before coming in which I found very rude due to the circumstances. Then nurse was hm and not showing any empathy I can say a little bit rude. For me not the best experience especially if they made a mistake applying those vaccine to the same arm and close to each other.
Been going here since my 1st daughter was born and 4 years later he has taken care of my kids (besides when we moved) they are very nice people!

I decided to call because I seen and loved the reviews.
Called  to get a quote on a boarding for my mini horse (he‚Äôs 448 pounds, so, not so mini) for just two days. The lady on the phone was very rude, basically told me my horse is not adequate enough.
Lady on the phone also told me they don‚Äôt do pasture rentals, okay? That wasn‚Äôt my question anyways. Clearly the person handling the phones has poor listening skills.

Spring Lane is the best stable around.
It is absolutely stunning. The facilities are too-notch and always clean. The staff is not only friendly they treat you like family.
My daughter is 5 and has been taking lessons for 7 months. They challenge her and encourage her. She won‚Äôt her first horse show.
They trainers are amazing and knowledgeable.
From the second we toured the facilities it felt like home.

Me and my 2 daughters had the honor of touring Spring Lane Ranch yesterday.  What a hidden jewel!  From the minute you drive in, you are impressed with the stunning views, cleanliness of the grounds, friendliness of the staff (you are literally treated like family), and professionalism of the staff.  Everyone there is extremely knowledgeable and the trainers are 2nd to none!   They also truly care about the animals and they are treated like Kings and Queens.  Everyone there really loves what they do and it shows.  They have some of the most beautiful horses.
They offer all kids of therapies for the horses to remain in optimal shape, or to rehabilitate an injured horse. The owners are wonderful people and have taken the time to put together an amazing team.  I am so thrilled to live such a short drive away from this little paradise.  If you are looking for a top of the line horse, a place to board, an amazing horse trainer for lessons, therapy for your horse, or even Yoga classes overlooking a beautiful, peaceful lake, you definitely need to visit and take a tour.  You will not be sorry!

My daughter loves her time at Spring Lane Ranch. I was raised on a thoroughbred farm, and spent most of my early life in the horse business. I have seldom seen a nicer, more well kept facility anywhere. The personnel are great, from the front office, to the grooms, to the exceptionally knowledgeable trainers/instructors. What a treat to find a world class facility, right here in Lakeland!

Spring Lane Ranch is a drop down gorgeous facility ! What a great place for horsemen! Many different trainers available for different goals with your horse... the grounds are meticulously maintained and it‚Äôs a pleasure to see the beautiful barns and paddocks.
If I didn‚Äôt have my own farm I‚Äôd be there for sure! The staff is very accommodating and they keep you informed about your horses.
This is a great place!

My son was diagnosed with speech delay and the whole team in Sproutlings have been a blessing. Huge shout out to to Mechelle and Racquel for the care they gave to our son. Also a special heartfelt shout out to Brenna who was our initial speech therapist. Everybody here has been so loving and really took the time to teach us to continue the care even at home. Recommend this place 100000%.

What an incredible journey this has been! When I first decided to seek speech therapy for my son, I was nervous that the therapist might not fully understand or share the same concerns I had. However, Ms. Brenna quickly put those worries to rest. During my son‚Äôs assessment, she made me feel truly heard, validated my concerns, and approached everything with such kindness and professionalism. I was thrilled when she became his therapist, along with Ms. Andrea, who also brought immense kindness and patience to every session. The entire office staff has been nothing short of amazing always polite, accommodating, and flexible, even when scheduling challenges arise. I am truly grateful for the care and support we‚Äôve received.

Mechelle is truly exceptional and the best speech therapist our daughter has seen! She did an amazing job connecting with our daughter and made learning a fun experience! We know that our daughter always looked forward to her sessions at Sproutlings Speech & Language Therapy and never wanted to leave, Mechelle has a gift working with kids!! Our daughter‚Äôs speech improved dramatically since we started our sessions with Mechelle and within a few, short, months her vocabulary flourished, and she was speaking in sentences!! Mechelle is always super sweet, knowledgeable, caring and always took the time to provide feedback. My husband took our daughter to her therapy sessions and Mechelle always made sure to text me after each session to discuss progress and gave suggestions on what we should work on at home, which was very appreciated. I would recommend Sproutlings Speech & Language Therapy for anyone seeking to get their child speech services!  Our daughter graduated from Sproutlings Speech & Language Therapy this summer, and we feel very blessed that we had a chance to work with Mechelle and are forever grateful for her hard work and dedication!

Ms Mechelle has been such a Blessing
To our daughter. She has helped her with her self esteem by working with her on social skills, using a special program she created. We are forever grateful and thankful to Ms Mechelle for everything she has done for our daughter. It‚Äôs amazing going out to public outings and watching my daughter understand the basic skills of how to properly socialize. We have worked with her since she was 3 without any success, Ms Mechelle has had her for 6 months and we can already see the difference.

Mechelle and the whole team are top knotch. The level of care, professionalism, and dedication to the success of the kids is quite special. I have 2 children here with different needs, and both have shown significant improvements.

I have been taking my pets for their care needs at Spruce Creek Animal Clinic for over 10 years. Their doctors and staff are very caring and gentle with your furry friends. They have the knowledge and the recommendations to help you make informed decisions when it comes to your pet‚Äôs health. Whether it‚Äôs a routine follow-up or more involved procedure, please give their office a visit. I am so appreciative to their staff for their diligence and reassurance over the time I have come here. Smokey and I thank you so much for taking care of him. We are truly lucky to have them here in our neighborhood. üê±‚ô•Ô∏èüê∂

First, the business card has John 3:16 printed on it which really means a lot to us! Dr. Goldby and Dr. Hancock do complimentary nail trim as they are discussing your pet.  They are both intelligent and detailed in their evaluations. They are salt of the earth and down to earth! They laugh and get to know your pet. They care, they listen, and they make us feel heard about our pets! Goose,  our beagle, thrived at Spruce Creek after her neck injury that had gone unnoticed by a previous vet. Our in laws dog, Suzy, has grown up there and they have given her the best ear treatment and always smile at her antics! When you know Jesus, you love harder, you love sweeter. Our pets are under their praying, wise, humorous, compassionate care! Yay Spruce Creek Animal Clinic!

I have a baby frenchie and was very nervous about choosing a vet. After having poor experiences in the past I feel confident I found the right place.
Dr Hancock has been with us from week 8 and my baby Gucci is 4 months now and we are both very happy with the care and support we have received here!! Highly recommended!!!

Spruce Creek is an absolutely amazing Animal Clinic. I'd highly recommend the entire staff there.  Very attentive, informative.  Reasonably priced as well,
My boy Lemmy approves as well.

A huge thank you to Spruce Creek Animal Clinic staff and most importantly Dr. Hancock for helping my furpets travel on an extremely complicated overseas move, without having even met us prior to taking on the challenge. When no other vets in the area would assist, Dr. Hancock stepped in and provided the vet care and documentation for our pets relocation, with a friendly and understanding demeanor. The vet techs were also especially kind. You and your pets feel like family as soon as you walk through the door. This is huge when you‚Äôre entrusting your pets care in their hands. I HIGHLY recommend this vet for any veterinary needs, big or small. Millie and Vucko are now happily living in New Zealand thanks to the competent and friendly staff at Spruce Creek Animal Clinic.

provider_name: Square One Behavioral Services Inc. - ABA Therapy For Autism
review_text:
Dr. Guerra has been an absolute blessing throughout our entire evaluation process. From the beginning, she has been incredibly professional, kind, and responsive. Every time I had a question or needed a document forwarded ‚Äî even on short notice ‚Äî she went above and beyond to help without hesitation.

When I noticed a small but important correction needed in my child‚Äôs report, Dr. Guerra not only responded immediately but also took care of it with genuine care and understanding. It‚Äôs rare to find someone in this field who combines clinical expertise with such compassion and efficiency.

I‚Äôm truly grateful for her support and would highly recommend her and Square One Behavioral Services to any parent navigating evaluations or behavioral support services. You‚Äôll be in excellent hands.

provider_name: Square One Behavioral Services Inc. - ABA Therapy For Autism
review_text:
Exceptional Experience with Dr. Guerra
I am truly grateful for the incredible support we received from Dr. Guerra for both of my daughters. She conducted a psychological assessment for my younger daughter, which was an essential step for her school requirements. The process was thorough, professional, and compassionate. review_text: Dr. Yaneisy Guerra did and excellent work with my daughter psychological evaluation. She took her time to listen our concerns and asked a wide variety of questions. provider_name: Square One Behavioral Services Inc. - ABA Therapy For Autism
review_text: I had a great experience with Dr. Guerra. She was really helpful, caring and patient with me. I'm really thankful to her and the rest of the Square One staff.

provider_name: Square One Behavioral Services Inc. - ABA Therapy For Autism
review_text: I just wanted to share how phenomenal Square One is!!!!!  Their staff is awesome!  From the receptionist to staff, everyone is so warm and welcoming.  My son's RBT wasn't in today and Ms. Jessica was his substitute.  Mind you my son doesn't do well with change.   But, because she has so much experience with special needs kids he immediately felt comfortable enough to hold her hand. Needless to say he had a wonderful day!  I never have to worry when he is in their care!!!

The staff are so extremely nice and professional. They do everything they can to keep you calm but smiling, feeling safe and warm. They are just an outstanding group! Brent deserves 10 stars for his professionalism and bedside manner during this test.

Staff was awesome however they did not have the meds for the pet scan causing a 2 1/2 hr delay. The staff tried to make me comfortable and were kind however someone drop the ball causing a long delay in tx.

Every aspect of my recent imaging experience was excellent including staff and environment.  The expected almost 2 hour process went smoothly.  Extra considerations were provided for comfort and safety. Time was spent explaining steps in the process and answering any questions.  I appreciated the provided free parking that was steps away from the Pet scan area.  Clerks that handled identifing paperwork were courtious and helpful.  The environment was clean and organized.  Would highly recommend.  Staff were upbeat and positive.

The beat experience I've had at Baycare  The check in process was smooth and efficient. My Pet Scan tech lady, Kat, I believe,  was the best ever . Thank you so much for tour kindness and caring demeanor . I almost gave up on Bay Care . You are #1

The staff is very good. I was informed of the delay with the pharmacy delivery. I was alsokept informed.
At the time of my PET scan, I was made comfortable ( with a blanket and water) and offered a snack and drink when all done.

Very pleased with staff

I‚Äôve never been to a chiropractor before but this experience has set the bar very high! Every staff member and doctor is so kind and welcoming. In every interaction you are treated with respect and more importantly, kindness. Even though going to the chiropractor is not something I want to do, the people there make it something you end up looking forward to doing!

I highly recommend this office for your chiropractor needs. The staff is professional and incredibly kind. Each visit feels welcoming and the care provided is exceptional. They offer Graston technique done by a beautiful lady named Nelvis. 10/10 recommend.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about St Germain Chiropractic and the incredible team there. After a car accident left me with 5 herniated discs in my neck and lower back, I was in constant pain and struggling with everyday tasks. From my first visit, the staff made me feel cared for, understood, and supported.

Dr. Davis took the time to explain my injuries in a way I could understand and developed a treatment plan that was tailored to my needs. Each adjustment, therapy session, and recommendation has helped me make steady progress. The improvement I‚Äôve experienced in my pain levels, mobility, and quality of life has been truly life-changing.

Beyond their clinical skill, the entire office is compassionate, professional, and genuinely dedicated to their patients. They treat you like a person, not just a number. I‚Äôm incredibly grateful for the care I‚Äôve received ‚Äî their support has played a huge role in my recovery and helped me stay hopeful during a very difficult time.

If you‚Äôre dealing with chronic pain or recovering from an injury, I highly recommend st Germain Chiropractic.

If you‚Äôre looking for a chiropractor that treats you like family this place is it. Their office is clean and smells great. As soon as you walk in the ladies at the front desk are warm, welcoming and never make you wait. At the desk Makenzie is great with helping you with your schedule and getting you seen right away and Christina has a great wealth of knowledge and experience. Christina has helped our family in and out of the office with finding great medical care to go with my chiropractic care. I was treated by all the doctors in this office and they all amazing. They have a new addition to the office Dr. Sharma. I only treated with her a few times when my doctor was out. I do wish I would have been able to treat more with her. She is a wonderful Dr and has the magic touch. To sum this up I will never use another chiropractor this place is it and I will always recommend you to everyone I know.

Dr.Davis is very nice. He explained everything thoroughly so I could understand. I was very scared when I first came in.
McKenzie and Christina front desk always very friendly. Make you very comfortable.
Chris,Anthony,yari and Nelvis very nice. Overall office staff super.
I would recommend this Dr anytime.

review_text: PT "Miss Angela" is a gem and Baycare should do whatever they can to keep her! My daughter has seen her for six years and would not be at the level she is today without her. Angela is constantly educating herself to stay relevant for her patients and always puts them first. I feel 100% confident about my daughter being safe in her care. She makes every session super fun for a child and still gets the work done that needs to be. I recently met another pediatric PT who reminded me why I will never leave Miss Angela. She offers a level of care beyond "exceeds expectations" and I am grateful that we found her.

provider_name: St. Joseph's Children's Pediatric Rehabilitation Services
review_text: Laurie at the front desk is so personable and funny! I love seeing her every time I come in. Last time I had blood drawn I was very apprehensive and Rory put me at ease. Today Ellie drew my blood and she was fantastic as well. Great facility and wonderful staff!

provider_name: St. Joseph's Children's Pediatric Rehabilitation Services
review_text: Angela has been so amazing throughout our therapy journey. She has helped my son so much in his gross motor skills. He has caught up on his milestones and we couldn't be happier with our therapist!

provider_name: St. Joseph's Children's Pediatric Rehabilitation Services
review_text: I initially had a bad experience getting through to someone to schedule an appointment. After they realized I had a problem, they got me connected with someone and scheduled immediately.  Since  then, we have had nothing but an amazing experience with the rehabilitation center. My daughter had torticollis and we see Abby for physical therapy. SHES AMAZING!! Very personable and great at what she does. She is so good with my little one and really takes her time getting to know the both of us. We absolutely adore her and look forward to our appointments. :)

provider_name: St. Joseph's Children's Pediatric Rehabilitation Services
review_text: Hannah is absolutely wonderful. She has helped make such a difference for our son and is so kind and informative. We would absolutely recommend her to anyone needing OT for their kiddo.

I did physical therapy for a long time and for various ailments, during which time I was under the care of several therapists, all of whom were excellent professionals who helped me overcome my ailments. The environment is very welcoming because everyone is friendly, polite, and willing to help and answer questions. The administrative staff is also excellent, polite, friendly and willing to provide the best service. The center is very well equipped, always clean and in order. For all these reasons, it is 200% satisfactory and deserves 5 stars or more! I definitely recommend it, as long as the patient is serious about recovering, since they must do the exercises the therapist prescribes both at the center and at home to see and feel progress and relief.

I am so grateful for Jen in occupational therapy! Since day one, she has had such patience with my 3 year old starting and he has quickly been improving more and more each session. His start was pretty rough and we expected it to last a while, but he is doing SO well with the transition in and she has been doing so amazing with understanding him and what he likes, making sure to plan around his interests, which probably sounds standard but I know it‚Äôs not easy with my son being non verbal. I was nervous beginning, but I very quickly began to look forward to bringing him to his sessions every week and slowly but surely he‚Äôs building a great relationship and has been doing WAY better than expected!!

The experience I've had has been amazing. I truly appreciated the caring, attentiveness, compassion, thoroughness, and professionalism, noting that I felt well cared for and was listened to during my visits, both with Alexis and Michele T. They are exceptional at what they do, helping me achieve some semblance of a normal life after all the past issues.

Having surgery is no easy task! I had right rotator cuff, and right carpal tunnel surgery at the same time. When I entered rehab with Manisha  her personality, blew me away!

She basically healed me! I thought,  I would never be able to do anything with my right hand  and shoulder.  She was very kind, professional, hard working and did her job very well! After weeks and weeks of hard work, I am doing very, very well!  Thank you St. Joseph rehab, for hiring such an Awesome person, her Personality won me over! And thank you doctor John Chan for referring me to this wonderful facility. My rating for service exceeds excellent! ‚ù§

I gave a 5 star rating because from the check-in to leaving everyone was caring, concerned for my wellbeing, and very professional. Jody did my evaluation and treatment. She gave me handouts to take home to continue the exercises for Lymphedema and stretching exercises to keep the left side from freezing up after surgery. She is very Knowledgeable and I was glad she knew her stuff. I felt very comfortable with her.

review_text: When it comes to my health, consistency is important. When I got to the office, I found out that I would seeing different therapists throughout the month. I was extremely impressed with the flawless transition between each person. From Selena, to Valerie, to Tina, to Nicole, each therapist was amazing. Professional and friendly. I highly recommend this location!

review_text: They did a fantastic job in getting my right shoulder back in shape after major surgery. provider_name: St. Joseph‚Äôs Hospital Physical Therapy and Sports Rehabilitation (South Tampa)

provider_name: St. Joseph‚Äôs Hospital Physical Therapy and Sports Rehabilitation (South Tampa)
review_text: I appreciate this clinic. They are collaborative with the patient and work WITH you to achieve results.

Staci's Pet Sitting & Training is amazing! Staci watches my pups anytime we go away, and both suffer from anxiety, so they are a handful. Staci is so patient with both of them and adjusts to their specific needs. I would not trust anyone else with my fur babies! Staci is not only their sitter, but she is also the trainer for my youngest, who is both anxious and reactive. She is an amazing trainer and has helped a great deal with my pup's confidence and growth. Highly recommended.

We have used Staci's for daycare and boarding and now completed a training class with Her as well . Staci helped us to address our Doodles high energy and anxiety issues, we were not giving enough of his medication to him and She explained how it was supposed to work for us . This shift in communication and adequate medication levels made a big difference in how our Doodle was able to focus on our commands as well as how these instructions were being received from our dogs perspective. We highly recommend Staci's pet sitting and training LLC to anyone struggling with their dogs responsiveness or looking for a well rounded empathetic approach to training or for Her pet sitting and boarding services all of which we have used for our Doodle.

Staci with Staci‚Äôs Pet Sitting is by far the only person I would allow to take care of my dog. Dr. Shey provided excellent support for my child‚Äôs behavior challenges. Always responsive when needed, she made herself available for questions between sessions. Her approach made a real difference in our daily lives, and I highly recommend her to parents facing similar challenges

Highly recommended!!
Dr. Shey exceeded our expectations in many ways. She was not only very accommodating when scheduling, she was able to fit us into her busy schedule with short notice. Scheduling, testing, and billing was seamless. Her office is clean and inviting and my child quickly warmed up to her controlled, yet gentle demeanor. Her final report was prompt and detailed. Star Psychology / Dr. Shey were both on the approved provider list for many of our scholarships, which helped with reimbursement.

We will be using Dr. Shey soon for our additional testing.

I highly recommend Dr. Shey who has been working with my son on behavior management and ADHD. She provided practical tools that have significantly improved our quality time together and helped me give my son the attention he needs. What impressed me most was her responsiveness‚Äîshe was always available when questions or concerns came up between sessions.
The results speak for themselves: my son has become much more expressive in healthy ways, with noticeably fewer outbursts. Her approach has made a real difference in our daily life. As a parent navigating ADHD challenges, finding a psychologist who can connect with your child while offering practical strategies is invaluable, and Dr. Shey delivered on both counts

I‚Äôm so thankful for Star Psychology. Dr. Shey has been‚Äîand will always be‚Äîa blessing to my family.

My son was struggling with significant behavioral issues, and his school referred us to Star Psychology. After Dr. Shey conducted the initial evaluation at the school, we were offered group therapy sessions. That‚Äôs when everything started to change‚Äînot just for my son, but for me as a father.

Through these sessions, I began to understand how and where I was dropping the ball. I‚Äôm not ashamed to accept accountability for my actions‚Äîand my inaction. Alongside my wife, I completed a 6-week course on play therapy, where I learned how to connect with my son through structured play. To my surprise, he absolutely loves it.

More importantly, I discovered principles and values I had been missing. I learned to slow down, to be more intentional, and to truly focus on my son in every aspect of his life. These changes have transformed not just his behavior, but our relationship.

If you‚Äôre a father reading this, please know‚Äîit‚Äôs okay to feel like you don‚Äôt have all the answers. I thought I was doing everything right: being a good provider, checking all the boxes. But I had slipped into autopilot. I became routine and robotic. I wasn‚Äôt being the daddy my son needed.

This journey has been an awakening for me. I encourage any parent‚Äîespecially fathers‚Äîwho might be struggling to consider working with Dr. Shey. The guidance, compassion, and tools we received changed our family for the better.

Thank you, Dr. Shey. From the bottom of my heart.

Dr. Shey is an exceptional school psychologist. She has a deep understanding of pediatric concerns and is a great resource for parents and teachers as well.  She provides a safe and nonjudgmental space for her clients, allowing her clients to navigate even the most complex concerns.

Star Therapy is the GREATEST place you can take your child for ST! Hands down the best vet I‚Äôve ever been to! They have completely restored my faith in vets. After having a horrible experience at my last vet, I was very nervous to go to another in anticipation that I would be treated the same as before, but Starkey Ranch Animal Hospital completely proved me wrong. From beginning to end I had the best experience, and you can actually FEEL their passion and love for animals. Dr. David Sheridan and staff are wonderful.  From our fur baby Bella's first visit to the most recent one today, she has always received excellent friendly care.  She was terrified on her first visit, and Melissa (the front desk manager) welcomed her with lots of hugs and treats.  She even had us take Bella in and out the front door (welcoming her back in with treats) to help desensitize her anxiety, and it worked!!  On today's visit, Dr. Sheridan, Kathy at the front desk, and Shay were very kind as they allowed me to leave Bella at the office for 2-1/2 hours while I drove down the street for a dentist appointment.  Thank you for saving me from having to make 2 trips!  You guys are the best!

Great place, great Dr
and a wonderful staff.  They take good care of my 2 w/o overcharging or over testing. Truly always a pleasant visit.  My dogs don't like to go but they know he takes good care of their health.

My 16 year old ShihTzu Chunk was a part of the Starkey Ranch Family for many years until his recent decline. We always knew he was in the best hands & the staff knew the quality of life we wanted to give our little boy. Feel at peace knowing you and your loved one will be treated with compassion & given all the time you need to understand your pet's condition &  plan for treatment. Doctor is very special at this! As for his staff; they're like members of my family. Melissa, doctor's wife, is a wonderful listener &  she probably remembers more about the current happenings in our life then we do, because she always asks how things are going. Kathy, at the reception desk, can read what's in your heart before a tear or a smile becomes evident. Shay along with all of the other vet techs offer your loved ones their gentle hands. Please don't miss the opportunity to stop in for a visit here &  you will see &  feel exactly the way we do. Maybe one day, as our  hearts heal, we'll introduce them to a new fur baby member of our family. Till then, we can only wish them continued success, happiness and health...... so they can offer the same to you.
The Best Vet we have ever had. Dr. Sheridan is kind, compassionate and so nice. Gemma loves him.

We started our child here at only 18 months old, and 5 stars isn‚Äôt enough. Everyone was saying not to send her because ABA can be controversial, but if I had listened to peers/family, she would likely be nonverbal to this day. Her developmental pediatrician was adamant it would help her. She was completely nonverbal when she started here. Not even gestures and severe behavior issues. Within weeks of starting she was gesturing, and by 2 years old she was considered verbal. After outpatient therapy failed initially (for us, for others it may be the right fit), ABA was the solution. Not only did our insurance cover it with zero issues, any billing issue we had after starting (our insurance‚Äôs fault) was diligently resolved by Pam, and she worked with me on a big issue with up to 10 calls a day to ensure it was all taken care of. When we decided to finally pull our daughter to get some extra OT/PT/ST to give her a different environment before prek3 started, we realized that the help she was getting from ABA was so vital to her growth that we are now doing a hybrid of both until she starts prek3. We will likely be back every summer till she‚Äôs 18 if she needs it, but I don‚Äôt see us needing them much longer since they truly got her to being in a place where only we can notice her issues and those issues that are left are things that can be chalked up to toddlerhood. I‚Äôm blown away and I‚Äôll always refer people here.

My 5 year old goes here. He has level 3 autism. We've been going for over a year. He loves going and is always excited when we pull up. The therapists are kind and knowledgeable. He seems to improve everyday! He is talking more and trying new things.

We were looking for an ABA therapy center for our 3 year old kid and Step beyond happened to be close and convinient. Only later we came to understand how lucky we were to find such a professional , caring and result oriented center for our kid .
Our kid went from almost non responsive to highly interactive child. Tantrums down and potty trained. He mastered so many of a 3-4 year old milestones from telling his parents names to their phone numbers. He is now much interested in making friends. A big shout out to Miss Caitlin and Miss Hannah for their continuous love, support for helping our child. We wouldn‚Äôt have seen such a turn around of our kid without them.  The entire team here is so much involved for helping the children and the families. We are truly thankful to them for all that they do. We wish them all the very best!!

Many thanks to Step Beyond Development for getting our son on the path to flourish!  Our son was referred to Step Beyond Development by a medical provider well versed in autism.  Step Beyond Development was not only willing to treat our son, a teenager, an age group with limited ABA providers, but did so in such a caring and kind way.  They built a very positive rapport with our son, which enabled them to address difficult behaviors and issues.  The therapy greatly helped with socialization, communication skills, and self-advocating.  Most of all, they fostered the idea of continually practicing the skills outside of therapy.  While ABA therapy is a substantial time commitment, it is effective, which we saw firsthand with our son.  Step Beyond Development also accepted our insurance even though they had challenges in the past with processing claims through our carrier.  They are knowledgeable of the ‚Äúfinancial side‚Äù and able to manage claims and payments accurately and effectively.

We were suggested Step Beyond by our psychologist because she said it was one of the better ones. It was challenging to get our son in a first because of needing to get doctors referrals. Once we got our son in, he improved tremendously and really enjoyed going. At the beginning he was non verbal and had lots of behavioral issues. He could not hold a pencil and was not potty trained ( despite our greatest attempts) . He only communicated by screaming his head off.
After a few months into Step Beyond he finally learned to talk, his behavior lessened, learned to finally communicate without screaming, learned to be social with friends, learned to hold a pencil and is able to write and draw pictures now and is finally potty trained. Step Beyond was huge relief for our family! It is a God send!!  5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è !!!  I would highly recommend!!

Warning parents: stay away from this ABA therapy. The whole team from the person who responds to calls to the directors lie to you to provide good services in a timely way! Even though we clarified from the beginning that we are looking for an English-speaking RBT, they found someone who was not even able to talk in English! This company, also mentioned by another reviewer, is charging unreasonable fees without providing clear justification. They billed my insurance $1,000 for a one-hour initial assessment. Be careful about the charges you receive. Ask about all the costs before doing any evaluation! We had the worst experience with this place considering the fact that they all try to show to be professional! Very disappointed to waste my time in hoping of getting service for my little kid.
We've been with Step forward ABA Therapy for 1  year, and the difference in our daughter's behavior is incredible. They truly tailor the therapy to meet individual needs.

Excellent Facility, wouldn't take my kid anywhere else. Step Forward ABA Staff is very nice to me and my child; they are professional and have clear communication. Very clean facility with constant upkeep, wouldn't think twice when choosing the best therapy for my child.

Step forward is the best and most encouraging ABA therapy company. The therapists there go above and beyond to make sure that the kids are getting the best service possible. The therapists are so caring and dedicated you can clearly tell by their work how high quality they are and what a great deal of knowledge and experience in the ABA therapists field they have. Not only are the clients getting excellent therapy but I see that the employees are also treated very well by the company which makes the environment always extremely pleasant. The clinic is always so clean and inviting as well. Step Forward ABA is fantastic in every aspect and I highly recommend!!!

I am so grateful to the team at step forward ABA for their kindness and support for me and my daughter . While they have helped her open up they also gave me some great tools to help her communication. I‚Äôm understanding my daughter in little ways that I hadn‚Äôt noticed before. Thank you!

I love this place! Everyone there is very friendly and helpful the owner is amazing she gives recommendations on what services your child needs and guide you through the process. Since my daughter started her speech therapy there she is being able to express herself more and has improved tremendously. She gets very happy when she goes for her therapy. My family is very grateful we found Lisely and this place. I Will definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a safe and loving place to care for your special needs child.

I highly recommend Step by step PPEC. My daughter goes there and she loves it. I loved the fact they had transportation and opened on weekends. The owner is a certified pediatric nurse with a lot of experience with special needs children. She is very professional and kind, anything I need she is always a call away. The staff takes good care of my daughter, I never worry. For that I am forever grateful.
The love and attention to children is magnificent!!!! A beautiful place full of beautiful things to give ‚ù§Ô∏è
It is a wonderful place where love for children is the most important thing. I recommend it with my eyes closed ‚ù§Ô∏è

This place is amazing with kids. As most parents, I was very nervous about trusting others in the care of my child. Serena has shown so much improvement since coming here. Bonnie and Melissa are amazing OT's! Everyone there is so friendly, and all the kids seem happy. I am so glad we stayed in this location.
I‚Äôve been trying to get services for 9 months and everytime I call to ask what the next steps are I get ‚ÄúI‚Äôll call you back‚Äù and nobody ever does! Very unprofessional for a business!

My benefit loves this place the therapists are very good and kind with the children my baby Noah really likes coming here to take his therapies and I have seen a huge change in my child since he did not speak now my child has improved a lot my biggest thanks to all super professional and very good Rafa is one of my baby's therapists very professional and kind Noah loves being with him and with Mr Roger üíñ my child's favorite and all the other therapists are very nice and professional and kind, Jessica, Shayane, and the others too. üíûüíûüíû

I originally made a one star review because of some big misunderstandings. But the owner reached out to me and we solved it.
