I have watched my son blossom so much In such a short time with her help. This place is an amazing problem-solving facility and I would highly recommend it.

My daughter has been with Stepping Stone for some time now and it has been amazing. The staff is so well trained, knowledgeable and patient. The clinic is beautiful and offers many many activities for all the children. I have seen such a major difference in my child‚Äôs behavior and general mood. She looks forward to her time with Stepping Stone which is a first for her. I love that her therapist is able to go to her school and spend time with her there. She goes above and beyond for my daughter and treats her like her own. I am very lucky to have found this group. If you have ever heard negative things about ABA, give Stepping Stone a try.

I love how the communication with the staff is so good and I truly recommend anyone looking for a speech therapist this is the place I appreciate you guys and everything that u guys do to help my son he loves going there ‚ù§Ô∏è

Stepping Stone Kids Therapy has been such a blessing for my family. We moved back to Florida from Maryland after our son was diagnosed with autism, and this agency has been pivotal in his blossoming development. Christine, his ABA therapist, is compassionate, motivating, and honest - which is exactly what my husband and I needed as parents. Most importantly, Christine shares a beautiful bond with our son. Her gentle enthusiasm and diverse approach to therapy has been extremely effective and well-received by our son. Christine has provided much more than therapy; she has given our family the genuine, personal support necessary for building a bright future for our son. I strongly recommend Stepping Stone Kids Therapy to any parents searching for quality ABA services and a loving support system for their children.

There really are not enough great things I can say about Stepping Stone. If it is a family centered therapy experience you want for your child this is where you need to be. From intake with Iviania and Speech and OT therapy evaluations with Miss Jen and Miss Sandy every question you have will be answered and every concern put to rest. My son loves going to "Therapy School" and seeing Miss Polly, Miss Amanda, Miss Brooke, and Miss Nikki- just to name a few of the amazing people who show so much love and professionalism. My son is so much more confident in his speech and in his and movement and we are looking forward to more growth in thier ABA program. I will never be able to express my gratitude enough for the confidence and independence I see growing in my son. It gives hope for a wonderful future for him.

This office is amazing. Loved the staff and everyone that has helped me through my time here. They took care of me and gave me hospitality throughout my rehabilitation here. Would like to thank Doc and Kelley and Sam! Amazing people they will help you through your process of healing. Check them out!

I can't say enough positive things about my experience with the Sterling Medical Group. From the moment I stepped in, Ava, Landon, Samantha, and Kelly were incredibly helpful, ensuring my physical therapy sessions were effective and well-coordinated. Alexis made scheduling a breeze with her warm demeanor, and Dr. Chumita was an absolute gem! Her care made me feel like family, and I'll genuinely miss our friendly conversations. Highly recommend this team for anyone seeking top-notch chiropractic care! Thank you all for your care and support!

Every time that I have been here, all of the staff have been absolutely awesome! They're all extremely friendly, knowledgeable, compassionate, and explain each and every step along the way. Today, I had a cervical ablation and Dr. Burns and Xenny made me feel completely at ease. Dr. Burns explained every single step along the way putting my uneasiness at bay. Thank you to every one of you at Sterling Medical Group, including the extremely nice and understanding receptionist at the front. Thank you!

This is an awesome place to go for treatment & therapy. The staff is very helpful and they communicate well. They really care about helping you on your path to recovery. I honestly did not have 1 bad experience here and I‚Äôm thankful to the doctor and all staff for that.

Oh my goodness!! Need to take a moment to share our appreciation of the staff here. They were kind and patient, their warm smiles are a nice welcome during a difficult time. I really hope someone high up sees this and shares with them that they are appreciated. Happy holidays to Sam, Cindy, and Alexis.

provider_name: Straight to the Point Dry Needling
review_text:
I had such a great experience at Straight to the Point today! From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed and cared for. Both Dr. Sharpe and Dr. West are incredibly knowledgeable, professional, and attentive. They took the time to really understand my concerns and find out what was going in with my body.

The combination of chiropractic care and needling provided noticeable relief, and I left feeling lighter, looser, and more aligned. And I can move my neck better! You can tell they truly care about their patients‚Äô overall well-being, not just the symptoms.

provider_name: Straight to the Point Dry Needling
review_text: If you‚Äôre looking for instant relief for muscle pain or tension, this is the place to go. Dry needling here is highly effective, and both doctors are extremely knowledgeable and attentive. The office is modern, clean, and welcoming. They are also very flexible with scheduling, always willing to work with you to find the right time. Overall, an excellent experience - I highly recommend them!

provider_name: Straight to the Point Dry Needling
review_text: My father is a patient at Straight to the Point. Their professionalism is off the charts! They welcome you as they known you for years. Their hospitality what can I say, I love their energy. The environment is not only relaxing, they have the best choice of music to listen to and is pleasant and CLEAN! Oh, almost forgot they speak SPANISH! My father that‚Äôs 96 years of age, has received relief from his lower chronic back pain compared to going to pain management and just loading him up addicting pain meds that didn‚Äôt relieve him of his pain but just made him sleepy and increase other complications.

provider_name: Straight to the Point Dry Needling
review_text:
Dr. West and Dr. Sharpe at Straight to the Point have the BEST patient care and truly enjoy helping people achieve wellness.
I began seeing Dr. West for a small meniscus tear in my knee which had developed bursitis and tendonitis. My knee was very painful and limited all my activities, including walking.  It took several months but I am happy to report that my knee is 100% with only an occasional maintenance session and stretching.  I have also had Dr. West address other issues and he is always able to rectify any problem presented.  I may not always enjoy his methods but he is very knowledgeable and knows how to get results.

provider_name: Straight to the Point Dry Needling
review_text:
Dr. West and Dr. Sharpe have truly gone above and beyond to help me continue with my training. After overworking my shoulders for too long without proper care, I developed severe pain and feared I would need to take months off from working out to recover and loose all my gains. Fortunately, I found them just in time. After my very first dry needling session, I experienced immediate relief, which motivated me to stick with my sessions. They guided and encouraged me to keep exercising in between my dry needling sessions in a more balanced way in order to allow my shoulders to heal while keeping my gains.

Not only are they incredibly skilled, but they are also hospitable and make you feel right at home. They treat you like family, creating a warm and supportive environment. Thank you Dr. West and Dr. Sharpe for your amazing work!

Now that my shoulders have improved significantly, we‚Äôre starting to address other areas that need attention as part of my continued fitness journey.

If you‚Äôre dealing with any kind of muscle or joint pain, I highly recommend reaching out to them. Your body will thank you!
Great experience. I‚Äôm a big guy. Josh had no trouble. I feel much more relaxed and flexible.

This was my first visit to Stretch Zone Lakeland.  Natalie was very thorough in explaining why, how and what she was going to do and made the experience very easy.

My lower back and legs were very tight and a bit sore.  After an hour I came out feeling much more loose and without any pain.  I highly recommend giving it a try if you are suffering from muscle tightness.

I have a tight hip and the practitioners here so a great job stretching me out.  I don't go as often as I would like, but left today feeling much more spry than when I entered.  Have been pleased with all folks in their team.  Nathalie S stretched me out today and my hip is feeling significantly better.  Already scheduled my return visit.
Joshua C is a dedicated therapist and takes his work seriously.  I strongly recommend him.
I had a very pleasant experience in my first visit. So much in fact that I signed up for the membership.
Diandra is very professional and friendly. She made me feel very comfortable and listened intently to all my concerns. I‚Äôm very happy with her and the facility. Would 100% recommend to anyone!!!

I must say, I did not believe that this would work until I came in for the first stretch. Alyssa is the one that stretched me out Who is the regional manager and I would say she is amazing. I had major body pain in my neck and shoulders and my back and since the first time she did it, now I am a member and I come in once a week and I‚Äôve lost all my pain my body. I move swifter, easier, I sleep better and I would recommend this to anyone that has any type of pain or injuries that cannot do certain movements, this will definitely help you in every way..!!!

MUST TRY IT OUT..!!

I had been dealing with persistent shoulder pain for quite a while‚Äîturns out, it was from something as simple as sleeping on my side! I visited Stretch Zone hoping for some relief, and they absolutely delivered. The team was incredibly knowledgeable and immediately pinpointed the issue. Not only did the stretching session alleviate the pain, but they also shared practical tips and pointers to help me prevent it from coming back. I left feeling better than I have in months. Highly recommend Stretch Zone to anyone looking for real, lasting relief with a professional touch!

First time ever on a complementary stretch, it was definitely worth the time & I‚Äôm looking forward to becoming a member, well worth it guys, schedule your session today,  let Ena know I sent you ü§ó
Great staff, Damonte is very professional, and courteous.  He listens to what your needs are and does an excellent job stretching the affected areas.

I am very grateful to Kim, AIS has improved my flexibility, range of motion, and helps me stay active despite an injury.  I also have more energy using some of the simple tips and tricks I learned working with Kim!  Definitely worth the investment of time and resources.

Merisha was very attentive to my issues of tightness in my hamstring and lower back areas. I felt improvement after one session! I am doing the recommended stretches on my own and will be back for another session soon!

I have had two SYL sessions with Merisha Phillips and both were five star experiences! After asking me about any specific problem areas, the stretching exercises were tailored to address those needs. (e.g., neck aches, relief from sciatica). Throughout the session, explanations were provided of the specific muscles being worked. Helpful tips were also provided on how to continue doing the exercises at home. During the sessions, the hands- on stretching was gentle, but challenging and certainly pushed me more than I could do on my own. I left feeling pain-free and significantly more limber.

After seeing a promo flyer on a door at Premier Gym, I was very interested to have a session with Merisha Phillips and find out for myself. As a person who has experienced multiple healing modalities and therapies to interrupt and mitigate low back pain and gripping pain in the SI joint, I can testify that even after only one session with Merisha, I can sense a benefit. There is an internal sense of ease in the areas she worked on. Additionally, I slept so well after this session! I will be scheduling more sessions in order to feel the results with the upper body as well as more focus on hip mobility. I would say that this is a complementary treatment to any of the other modalities / practices that you already incorporate into your wellness routine.
Thank you Merisha!

Kim Ortloff literally wrote the book on proper stretching, and she practices what she wrote‚Ä¶very well.  I know several people that credit Kim with their ability to physically function normally.  I‚Äôve gone to her off and on for years as needed for both stretching maintenance and injury recovery.  I know she‚Äôs not just out for profit, she‚Äôs out for healing, because she tells me when it‚Äôs time to stop getting stretched and go to a certain doctor for something else.
David, the massage therapist who works with her, is also highly skilled with over 20 years of experience and knows so anatomy more so than someone who just did an online class for massage.  I love the story of how he started doing massage to treat injuries of his fellow dancers at Florida State University and turned it into a career. He really knows his stuff and has very strong hands.

I recently visited Stride Physical Therapy for foot therapy and I must say, the experience was exceptional. From the moment I walked in, I was impressed by the level of service and the quality of the facilities.

The staff at Stride Physical Therapy were incredibly helpful and attentive. They took the time to understand my specific needs and provided personalized care throughout my therapy sessions. Matt, in particular, was absolutely fantastic. His expertise and dedication to his work made a noticeable difference in my recovery process.

The facilities at Stride Physical Therapy were top-notch. They were clean, well-maintained, and equipped with the latest equipment and technology. It was evident that the clinic takes pride in creating a comfortable and professional environment for their patients.

Overall, I highly recommend Stride Physical Therapy for anyone in need of exceptional foot therapy. The staff's expertise, the level of care, and the impressive facilities truly set this place apart. Thank you, Stride Physical Therapy, for helping me on my path to recovery!
I've had elbow problems for close to 10 years. Matt and his team were able to help me figure out what exercises I needed to be doing. I'm almost back to normal and I have them to thank!
Matt‚Äôs great! He fixed my knee, then my foot. His staff is kind and helpful as well.

This place and the group of therapists under Matt are amazing! I‚Äôm just 5 months they had me moving like a rock star ‚≠êÔ∏è with my brand new knee. They listen, have conversations, care about you, and you will end up feeling like family!!! I love them and will go back ‚Ä¶ if needed!

I've been seeing the team at Stride Physical Therapy for over 6 months and I am very happy with their service. The owner, Matt, listens to my concerns and carefully analyzes the progress I've made with objective measurements.

His expertise has been invaluable in helping me with my shoulder and foot problems. The entire team is well trained, polite, and friendly. The office is always immaculate.

I never have to wait long for my appointments. Matt runs a tight ship!

I highly recommend Stride Physical Therapy!

How a staff reacts to a new client with a small issue generally speaks for how they will react to any issue. In my case; we went in for a simple ear infection. Very thorough and informative examination(complete head to toes)  while at the same time showing a genuine interest in my dog's well being.
I will be going back for sure. Nice to know that quality care for my two boys can be gotten just up the street.
Keep up the great work.

We spent five long, emotional months fighting for the life of our dog, Hope, who was suffering from a severe, life-threatening infection in her shoulder. It was one of the scariest experiences we've ever gone through, and there were times we truly didn‚Äôt know if she‚Äôd make it. From day one, the team at Stuart Sound went above and beyond for her and for us. Dr. Murawski was incredible throughout the whole process, always keeping us informed and showing so much compassion. One of the vet techs, Max, was very kind and we loved the way he treated Hope like his own. And I can‚Äôt thank the manager enough, who helped us out greatly to make sure Hope got the care she needed. There were so many others who helped along the way, and even though I can‚Äôt remember all their names, I‚Äôll never forget how each person made a difference.
Hope wouldn‚Äôt be here today without their expertise, dedication, and genuine care. We are forever grateful to everyone who helped bring her back to health. Thank you for giving us more time with our girl. ‚ù§Ô∏è

So friendly!!  I got a good one here.  They listen, and care about your pet.  Office is clean and large.  Love it here.  So glad they took us as clients!!  Need to get my son over here with his girl.  Ya'll gonna love her.

I called the vet's office at the last minute, and I couldn't believe how awesome they were! They squeezed me in right away for my sleepy two-year-old wolfhound. Dr. Lile and Lona, the vet tech, were just wonderful with my girl, Cober. I even got to meet Lisa, the office manager, who was super friendly! What a fantastic team over at Stuart Sound Animal Hospital! I'm so grateful to have found this amazing veterinary office just two miles from my home.

I arrived with my puppy for an emergency due to an injury. The staff, from the front desk to the technicians and doctor, responded very quickly and kindly to help my baby. I am very grateful to the entire staff for their professionalism and kindness.

provider_name: Studer Family Children's Hospital Pediatric Rehabilitation
review_text: We have worked with multiple different speech, occupational, and physical therapists here. We have always been well treated. The front desk staff are helpful and friendly.

provider_name: Studer Family Children's Hospital Pediatric Rehabilitation
review_text: We have been with Studer family for years, and have always found them to be kind, courteous, and knowledgeable. I have two children engaged in occupational, speech, and physical therapy, and I am not only seeing growth, but my children are excited to go to therapy!

provider_name: Studer Family Children's Hospital Pediatric Rehabilitation
review_text: If I could give this place no stars I would. Rude. Unknowledgeable. Tried this facility in 2018 for my 3rd child stopped going then because it was not a pleasant environment or surroundings. Tried them again today with my 4th child and I regretted it almost instantly after checking in. Just a bunch of young college students hanging out it seems. Called my son's primary and immediately asked for a change in referral for a new occupational therapist elsewhere outside of this facility.

provider_name: Studer Family Children's Hospital Pediatric Rehabilitation
review_text: I have been incorrectly billed repeatedly and the billing department gives me a different reason every time. Bills continue to trickle in incorrectly from a year ago and I spend every other month fighting them to eventual resolution. Update on 2/12/21: I have called the number and it took two voicemails and a third try before a woman said someone else was supposed to have handled it and was given her extension. Now I have left two voicemails at the second extension and still have yet to even discuss my issues like their reply seems to say would happen. If your going to reply to a review that you would like to fix it, the process should not stop there.

provider_name: Studer Family Children's Hospital Pediatric Rehabilitation - Pace
review_text: Everyone is helpful and friendly!

provider_name: Studer Family Children's Hospital Pediatric Rehabilitation - Pace
review_text: Highly recommend. My daughter went here for her ankle and I went here for my knee replacement. You truly feel like part of the family everybody's extremely friendly and they do a great job pushing you to your full recovery.

provider_name: Studer Family Children's Hospital Pediatric Rehabilitation - Pace
review_text: I have been very happy with my physical therapy. They are professional and listen to you when you are pain. For which I am grateful. I highly recommend the staff and facility.

provider_name: Studer Family Children's Hospital Pediatric Rehabilitation - Pace
review_text: You'll feel at home, really talented people with great attitudes.

provider_name: Studer Family Children's Hospital Pediatric Rehabilitation - Pace
review_text: Great service, they actually listen to you!!

I toured Success on the Spectrum, during their Grand Opening. I was very impressed with the staff. I could see how much they care for the children. The owner has a degree in Child Care and you can see her passion for making a difference for the children and how well she communicates with the parents. They have installed cameras so the parents can at any time come in and see their child being well taken care of. It is obvious based on all the activities they have bought that each child has many interesting and well thought out ways of being worked with and cared for. They even have an indoor gym room and private baths for the children. Each child has an adult trained to provide the care at all times. This is why I gave 5 stars and how I know any child here will be well taken care of.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about SOS! The entire team is incredibly warm and genuinely caring. They truly go above and beyond to make sure each child feels safe, supported, and engaged.

One of my favorite things is the parent room‚Äîit‚Äôs not only comfortable, but the monitors are amazing! You can watch your child‚Äôs sessions in real time, which gives you piece of mind. It‚Äôs clear that the therapists are not only skilled, but also incredibly kind and patient. The way they interact with the kids is heartwarming!

Amazing place for children with autism to receive ABA therapy! The centre is super welcoming with the caretakers showing a great blend of professionalism and friendliness. The use of cameras for supervision really sets a tone of attentiveness and care that I haven‚Äôt seen in similar institutes

I am beyond impressed with Success on the Spectrum and the team working with my son. From the moment we walked in, Jessica, the office manager, was incredibly helpful in getting everything set up with insurance and ensuring my son started therapy right away. Natalia, the clinical director, has been outstanding... she sends me regular updates throughout the day and created a comprehensive plan with goals tailored to my son's needs. Khadija made a great first impression by introducing herself and shaking my hand, making us feel welcomed. The team is not only professional but also kind and compassionate, and I can already see the positive impact they‚Äôre making on my son. Highly recommend!

We had an amazing experience at Success on the Spectrum. The facility stood out from the moment we walked in with its clean, welcoming environment. The playroom and sensory room were fantastic, and my kids loved them! They were so engaged that they didn't want to leave, which speaks volumes about how much fun they had while learning.
The staff at SOS is more than just skilled and knowledgeable in ABA therapy. They are incredibly patient and caring, always putting the needs of the children first. Their dedication to each child's progress is evident, and it's reassuring to know that your kids are in such good hands!!
I highly recommend SOS for any family looking for quality ABA therapy!
Genaya has been absolutely amazing during our son‚Äôs speech delay. She was very patient, kind, always on time, communicated and professional. We highly recommend Palm Beach Speech Clinic.

Genaya is one of a kind! Truly amazing and so knowledgeable. She helped improve my child‚Äôs speech tremendously all while being caring, patient and kind. She took the time to learn my child‚Äôs strengths and weaknesses, in order to help him succeed. Genaya was a blessing for our son and we are so grateful for her!

Genaya is a great speech and language pathologist! She's a very kind, patient, respectful, honest and positive individual who wants what's best for her clients. She is punctual and is responsive to text messages, phone calls, emails, etc. Not only is she knowledgeable and effective in the services she provides, she also makes the sessions fun and is accommodating to her clients and their needs. Out of all the SLPs that my son has had, she's the best! I would recommend her to anyone who needs SLP and/or feeding services. Thank you, Genaya! :)

My little and I love working with Genaya from Palm Beach Speech Clinic! My kiddo was 2 years old when we started working with Genaya (she‚Äôs 3 years old now). Genaya provided us with feeding therapy and speech therapy. When we started with Genaya, my daughter (who is autistic and nonverbal) was not speaking and she also was new to chewing solid foods. Genaya made me feel very comfortable expressing my concerns and goals for my daughter. She took the time to get to know my daughter and bond with her. Sessions were pleasant and tailored for my daughter and she made great progress! Genaya is not only an awesome therapist but also an overall great support! She truly cares about her clients!

We had a wonderful experience with Genaya with Palm Beach Speech Clinic. We met up twice a week over the summer to get a head start for school, and even in that short time, there was so much improvement with my son‚Äôs speech. Genaya was so sweet and my son loved going to see her. She is an amazing person and an amazing speech therapist. Highly recommend!!!

We are so grateful for Sunflower Speech! In just one year, my child has made tremendous progress, and we couldn‚Äôt be happier with his growth. He looks forward to every session because he‚Äôs not only learning but also having fun while doing it. The team has been incredibly kind and supportive to our entire family, and we truly feel cared for. Thank you for everything you‚Äôve done for us!

We are incredibly grateful for the care, expertise, and warmth we've experienced at Sunflower Speech. From the very first visit, we felt supported and understood. The entire team is not only highly skilled, but also deeply compassionate and patient with children. Our child made remarkable progress‚Äînot just in communication, but in confidence and social interaction as well. The therapists created a nurturing, playful environment that made each session something to look forward to. They also kept us informed and involved every step of the way. We truly can‚Äôt thank Sunflower Speech enough for the positive impact they‚Äôve had on our family. If you're looking for a place that combines clinical excellence with genuine heart, this is it.

This place is incredible. The entire staff is so friendly and caring, and they make therapy FUN for the kids. My daughter begs me to take her back there. We live in Miami and make the drive because I haven‚Äôt found anything remotely as good as Sunflower anywhere near me. Her speech was progressed significantly since she started and she has transformed in her skills but most of all her confidence.

The lead, Ms. Stephanie, is remarkable. Friendly, passionate, and also a mom. She‚Äôs always so willing to accommodate us since we come from afar.

This is THE place in South Florida. Thank you Sunflower!

This company is amazing , the way each staff takes the time to care for the kids is incredible. They take the time to work with each child at their own pace. They make speech/OT fun and enjoyable. I am a RBT and I help with my client along the side of speech therapist Nicole . Nicole is so energetic and hard working ,creating new ideas for our clients communication skills to improve. Nicole is such an outgoing person, always has a smile on while working with the kids. I also want to take the time to shout out Noelle , Rayna , and Rina for always coming in with positive energy for the kiddos and making speech therapy an enjoyable experience for them. Every time I am in the center , they are always working so hard and providing each client the best services anyone can ever ask for. Lastly, I want to take the time to shout out Ms. Ruth , she is tremendously amazing. While she provided OT services with my client,  I noticed that she goes above and beyond. I promise you , your child/client are in very good hands here at Sunflower speech/OT center.

I cannot say enough good things about Stephanie and her practice!

When my newborn refused to take a bottle, and I had to return to work, it was such a stressful time. I tried dozens of different bottles, feeding positions, rooms in the house, lactation consultants, handing the baby off to my husband or other family members, and nothing worked. I had resigned myself to being stuck forever in breastfeeding jail for the rest of time.

Stephanie listened to me with such understanding and empathy and took time to observe. She held my little one with the most gentle, caring touch, and had him drinking from the bottle almost immediately. I (only half-joking) asked her to move in with me, but she declined.

Though Sunflower is quite a distance from me and most of my clients, I‚Äôm a language professional and have referred multiple people there. Each of them has been more than satisfied. I‚Äôll continue sending folks their way without hesitation!

When I was looking for a PT for my baby this place and Mari were strongly suggested by other mothers. After only a few months of meeting weekly with Mari my baby‚Äôs skills have improved tremendously! More than we had expected on our first assessment. I can‚Äôt thank enough Sunny Services/ Mari for everything. Mari is a brilliant professional and anyone can see that she really loves what she does, which makes a huge difference! Parents and caregivers, if you ever need help, here you‚Äôll be in good hands! ‚ù§Ô∏è

My son has received world class care from Dr Annika, Dr Tina, Dr Brittany, Dr Mari and more! Each person cares about it him and my son is showing daily improvement! They are reflexible, accommodating, creative,  caring and compassionate competent professionals! I can‚Äôt recommend them enough!

It's incredibly unfair that I am limited to five stars because they deserve the entire sky. My baby is 16months. We were referred to Sunny Pediatric Services through our pediatrician and Early Steps. Annika and Mari were at our initial evaluation and I immediately was validated with several concerns I had. I was blown away with the gentle but thorough exam and explanations. They took the time to not just hear me but to LISTEN and explain why I was seeing these issues and what his initial plan of treatment would be. They were very proactive with their recommendations and setting the goals realistically, and PUSHING my son to smash them. They have been SO flexible with scheduling and being able to come to our home or more recently our daycare at the times that work for our boy. Our current team is Annika, Lauren, Saint Claire, and Mari and I love love LOVE their ability to respect my son's boundaries when he communicates he needs a break or is ready to be done while at the same time pushing him for just a leeetle bit more and showing him what his body can really DO. One of our favorite Saint Claire-isms is "Our hands CAN!". Jamie always giggles when he hears it (which has become often üòÖ). Annika was essential in helping us find a bottle that worked well with his lip tie (the Joovy Boob) and getting evaluated with Dr. Shawn. I can always tell what he and Mari have been working on because it's the new thing he masters that week üòÇ and he has picked up so many new mouth sounds AND DADA since we started working with Lauren (and Betsy). He works SO HARD for all of our ladies and they inspire that in him. I could say SO MANY GOOD THINGS but I will end with they are a pure joy to work with and it will be bittersweet when our time is over. (I have way more photos I will add when I find them üòÖ)

Annika & her team were super helpful and accommodating when treating our newborn's tongue tie. Highly recommend Annika for any newborn feeding needs as well! We learned so much in a short period of time. Thank you!

We owe Sunny Pediatric Services the world! Our little clefty cutie has been seeing their team since he was a month old and is now two years old. The knowledge, patience, compassion, education, and just overall incredible care that we have received from Brittney C. with OT and the rest of the team have been a true answer to prayer. We have gone from learning to eat with specialty bottles, utensils, cups, and even feeding himself with ST to teaching us how to conquer the big behaviors with OT from not being able to communicate with us to now having expected behavior for his age and saying anything he wants. They have introduced us to so many additional resources to help us navigate the phases of a child with a cleft lip & palate that I know would not have been possible without them. At our sessions not only does he learn something new, but I do too. I have learned so much and am so very grateful for such incredible care- Sunny Pediatric Services is simply the best!

Omar, the  B unit manager and his entire team were very professional, caring and helpful. Excellent service.
My therapists, Shanna and Sharon were wonderful.
Valerie Clayton was my CNA and she was great! Very friendly, always making sure if I needed anything. Excellent!
Thank you to the entire team!
Nina V.

The 3 CNA Paulette 's and Lidia are outstanding with their service. Thank you all for your care.
Nurse Junia and Suzie  are outstanding and takes extra care of me.
Gracie is very detailed about her job and very patient, always smiling.
Kesta and Tammy are very determined in making sure you attend their classes. Kelly, Wily, Mayte and Toni are wonderful. Joanna wirh Teddy puts a smile on my face daily. Thank you for your kind hospitality. God bless you all.

Everybody is so friendly and caring! And I know it comes from the top. Charmaine the administrator knows everybody by name and was attentive to any and every need she saw as we walked the facility. Including picking up a receipt she saw on the floor which just happened to be mine.
Everyone is happy! Employees and patients.
Well done and congratulations!

My cousin who suffers from schizophrenia has been admitted for care and the staff has been stellar. Carme, Regine and Suzette have gone the extra mile and some to give her great care! Very impressed with the care and concern of the staff! Our family is very appreciative!!

I had such a great experience here! The clinical educator was incredibly thorough, knowledgeable, and made everything easy to understand. The facility itself is very clean and well maintained, which made me feel comfortable and at ease. The staff is always so friendly and welcoming ‚Äî you can tell they truly enjoy what they do because they‚Äôre always smiling. Overall, a wonderful environment and I‚Äôm very grateful for the excellent care and professionalism.

Elianys is Bilingual! She speaks English and Spanish. She has been providing speech therapy to both of my girls. My girls absolutely love her. They see coming to her as a reward and a really fun experience. My girls have improved so much thanks to her. She is so patient, caring, so kind. My youngest went from not using actual words to using her words and being able to communicate with the rest of the family. She‚Äôs able to express her wants and needs. My family and I are so happy we found Eli she is just amazing!! You will not regret coming to her.

Eliany (Ellie) is an excellent speech and lamguage pathologist who is also bi-lingual (Spanish).¬† She previously worked in the public schools before moving to private practice.¬† Ellie has a private clinic that includes sensory supports (climbing wall, etc) and adapts  therapy to school support.¬† She provides a safe and supportive learning experience with measurable impact.¬† We saw tremendous improvements in speech and language after a brief time in therapy with her.¬† She is also a delightful care provider who is genuinely interested in her clients' well-being.
My son loves coming to his therapies, without a doubt the best place, Eli is very patient with him.

Both my horses are very happy and striving at this barn. Owners are very attentive and the grounds are well kept. My horses have 24/7 hay and shelter with automatic watering. This facility is comfortable, clean and very accommodating.  My horses are older and traveled across the states and the barn owner was very attentive to any special needs they had after such a long haul. Great fencing, nice shelters, private facility with a security gate, cameras and several riding areas. This place is a gem and the owners are great to work with! Super happy with the care and compassion my horses get daily! Fantastic private boarding facility that is geared around a complete package for tranquility for horse and rider.

This is a super excellent private boarding facility. No Lessons for the public. No Trailrides to the public. Not a therapeutic riding facility. Totally professional. If you are looking to board your personal horse there is no better place.

I have boarded both of my horses at Sunset Riding Stables, with Rita for several months and they are thriving there! One of my horses is over 30 and has special needs and Rita is great at helping me ensure that his needs are met. My other horse is much younger but is cared for just as well. The other horses and animals on the property are well cared for, the environment is safe, we have all the amenities necessary, and the boarders and owners are pleasant and fun to spend time with. I am happy that my horses have a safe place to live and good people keeping an eye on them and caring for them when I‚Äôm not able to do so. If I was concerned about any of the nonsense in any negative review posted in relation to this business I would not have my horses boarded here.

Beautiful Ranch...The owner Rita Lundberg is a very experienced and knowledgeable horse woman who cares about the horses and her boarders. From day one she has reached out to help me in any way she can. My horse is happy here too. I couldn't ask for a better place to board.

I have been visiting this Farm for a month or so because my friend lives there. I saw a disturbing review that simply cannot be true from what I've seen. Every time I visit they are tending to the horses. sometimes I feed them carrots or apples, they all seem happy and well cared for. Most of them have face protection Nets for flies though I didn't notice any flies. I think the lady that said she contacted law enforcement and animal control, must be smart enough to know filing false claims like this can have consequences like, counter suits Etc. I don't know the owner's name or have any idea who these people are but what I've seen in the short time I've been there has been very good so I will give them a five-star review. Thanks for reading and have a blessed day

I am a Foster parent to a 1yr old that was born 26week with multiple health conditions. At Sunshine Kids on Taft St. my Foster child has surpassed and thrived due to all the hard work and attention from Staff there. He has Speech Therapy he now is trying to talk and does sign language due to the dedication of the therapist. He has Physical and Occupational therapy there also we thought it would be a while before he walked he is now climbing anything taller than him,  he response to directions when before he would just stand there not responding . I'm not saying they are miracle workers all I know is the the staff their cares about the children there and treat them like every precious child there is important and is cared for based on their Special need. The staff is loving and shows concern for each child. When I pick my child up he is clean he is happy and when he is not there they call or text to see how he is doing and what they can do for me. This is my first time dealing with a PPEC school they are better than regular Day-care. Juan and the Staff allows you to work and not worry about your child well being because they work like a Super Team for Super Special Kids

This PPEC has been AMAZING for my son. The nurses and staff have all grown with my child from when he was 3 months old to now being 18 months. The facility is kept immaculately clean. He gets his therapies and medicines in an environment where they love on all the kids regardless of their life challenges. We interact with the owner regularly and he truly has a passion for every single child and their needs,  he knows them all by name. They work with the doctors and insurances and include you in the personal plan of care for your child. We get daily reports of everything that goes on throughout  day and monthly updates with his therapists on his progress. We couldn‚Äôt recommend this place more!

Sunshine Kids has been a blessing to my family. Both facilities are extremely clean, literally spotless. I am a bit OCD when it comes to cleaning and Sunshine Kids is impeccably clean. Everyone that I‚Äôve encountered there has been professional, kind, caring, and attentive. My daughter has attended Sunshine Kids for almost a year. Since she has started she has grown and improved so much. She has overcame so much and reached so many milestones. It literally brings tears of joy to my eyes just reflecting on her journey and the major role that Sunshine Kids has played in her success. I have never had an issue with Sunshine Kids, literally all the staff there is amazing. All of my needs/wants for my child have been met.  Sunshine Kids has far exceeded my expectations and I highly recommend them.
Thank you Sunshine Kids for all that you do and have done for my child. There are not enough words to express the gratitude that my family and I have for all of you!

Sunshine Kids is by far the best PPEC I have been to. Not only is the facility impeccably clean, but the staff is attentive, caring, and communicative. The kids are genuinely happy, playing and building friendships. They provide physical, occupational and speech therapy as well as an educator who gives the kids one-on-one attention daily. In addition, the owner David does everything he can to make sure these kids and their families have an amazing experience in his facility. 5 stars!

Sunshine Kids came as a huge blessing to us. The facility is spacious, fully-equipped, and SUPER clean. The staff is friendly, informative, and very good with the children. We feel blessed knowing our child is in great, fully-capable hands and getting the medical attention they need while in the care of Sunshine Kids. The hours are great allowing us to drop off our child in the morning, work full time, and make it on time to pick up our child after work. A full report given at the end of each day keeps you up-to-date on the treatment your child receives while in their care. Our child has progressed so much since they started almost 4 months ago and I know they will continue to do so at Sunshine Kids. Like I said, a BLESSING.

Sunshine Kidz Pediatrics has helped my son become a social butterfly. His first week there he amazed me when he start crawling down the hallway at home. He enjoys playing with others and loves to crawl all over his classroom.  My son is able to drink out of a cup with or without a straw. I like how they allow the kids to express themselves first then help them in way that is comfortable for them. They also have a great therapist team . Such as PT OT and speech. My son has never liked therapy before he would always cry but now he‚Äôs happy also he loves his cuddles. I also like how the staff and nurses treat the kids like they are there‚Äôs and that all kids are treated the same with love. At first I was nervous but from the first day signing my son up I knew he would exceed.

I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS DAYCENTER !!!!
From the day my daughter was 3 months old ( she is now 13 months) , she has been attending this day center. They are great from the staff to the students , they are very professional !!! Also very nurturing , they tend to every need of the child and love on them as if they are their own !! ITS A VERY CLEAN ENVIORMENT I MUST ADD !! Rarely does my child get sick or have any issues like other daycares. It takes a village to raise these kids and extra love and patience with special medical needs. They are on top of everything , from sending notes home when the kids need things to verbally letting me know if there is anything i need to do for recertification. Never have i had any issues !! Christmas time came and they did Secret Santa , my child received gifts did arts and crafts and also pictures with the Christmas Tree (same for Thanksgiving). They are very involved with every student there. They also provide therapy that my child needs so she doesn't have to go anywhere else for services , everything is inhouse , i love it and it makes it convenient !! The therapist also sends picture mail and videos of progress which always makes my day seeing that when my daughter started she was a little little baby less then 8lbs and now she 25lbs with the help of PPEC. Also in addition , THEY DO PROVIDE TRANSPORTATION !!!! They have a bus that will pick them up and drop them off if ever transportation becomes a issue . Giselle is the woman in charge and she is very understanding and knowledgeable and Imani is 2nd in charge and she is great as well . They get the job done and are very responsible and organized sometimes more then me =)!!

They are really the best day center in the whole Broward Region . YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED I PROMISE!!!!!!

This PPEC is awesome and so are their staff members.  My child has made tremendous progress (speech, physical, & occupational therapy) since she started attending here. I am very happy with my decision of sending my daughter here to assist and improve with her social and developmental skills.

I work in the same building as Sunshine Kidz Pediatric Care Center. I have had the pleasure over the last few years of attending their holiday party for the children. I am always blown away by the level of care the children receive. The staff is so amazing with the children. I am so grateful to be able to experience this it is truly heartwarming.

Staff has been amazing in accommodating all of my son‚Äôs needs! They are all very respectful and work graciously to accomplish all of his goals. Love the communication between the staff and parents. This center has been nothing but a blessing to us. Thanks for all your hard efforts!

This is actually Carol Heberling leaving this review. Abbie & Leo are the best at occupational therapy. They worked well together helping me with my range of motion of my arms.  After their help in improving my range of motion,  I now have the exercises I need to make sure this won‚Äôt happen to me in the future. Thank you. I really appreciated how you made me feel so comfortable.
Abbie and Leo were my tag team partners for physical therapy. Their everyday friendly professionalism was definitely appreciated. I never felt more comfortable. Highly recommended

Big fear of needles over here, but I
know the benefits that acupuncture could bring and wanted to give it a shot for some neck and back pain I‚Äôve been dealing with off and on for some time.

Karli is absolutely fantastic and so patient and kind! She‚Äôs transparent about the areas where the acupuncture may be uncomfortable, and is so understanding if I want to hold off.

Each time she‚Äôs worked on me, I always feel so much better! Less anxious, less stressed, and definitely less pain!

I can‚Äôt thank her enough!

I had acupuncture for the first time and it was amazing! Karli K really took her time speaking with me about my areas of concerns, health issues, and what end results I was looking for. She let me know that all of my issues aligned and explained her treatment plan that she thought would be best. Most of pain is postpartum, and just after my first visit, I could tell a huge difference when holding my baby and putting her into the truck. I recommend her to anyone and everyone. I can‚Äôt wait for my next session!

Sunshine physical therapy is already an amazing space, but they just added an acupuncturist, Karli in the office, and I HAD to try it for my back pain. All I can say is WOW. Karli is so awesome. She listened to my complaints, and found the perfect treatment for me. I am looking forward to more treatments with her! Can't wait to feel even better than I did after the first treatment! 10/10 recommend her!

I worked as an SLP Graduate clinician over the summer at Sunshine Spot and I had an amazing experience. Christie and all of the Sunshine Spot staff do a great job with their clients. As a student, it was an honor to learn the ins and outs of pediatric speech, language, and swallowing therapy under such great supervision. As someone who has worked as a Speech-Therapist Assistant for the past 6 years, I can genuinely say I would trust the staff at Sunshine Spot to treat my loved ones if needed.

I am currently working with Christie as a SLP Graduate Clinician and it has been a great experience so far. She is very helpful when I have any questions and the rest of her staff is so kind and welcoming! It is a great environment and company to work with! I am very grateful that I have been given this opportunity to work with Christie!

My home practice sessions strengthened his positive behavior and she supported me even during those sessions, giving feedback when needed.  In just a few sessions with Stephanie my dog was so much better and I now have many techniques to deal with all of his behaviors that we are still working on correcting at home.  His overall behavior has improved tremendously, he is a much different dog.  Anyone who is looking for any kind of help with their dog from basic obedience up to show ready dogs, will benefit from her knowledge and training techniques.

While at Home Depot I met a man who had his GSD in the store and we got to talking and he recommended Super Dog Center.  Just a couple of lessons with Stephanie and I knew how to pretty much correct any bad behavior.  Now I have a dog I can take anywhere.  It improves his quality of life because he can be involved with everything our family does.   I realized after watching her with the dogs, she is able to do what she does, because she truly loves them.  I have not boarded my dog, but every time I am there, I can see the dogs being boarded on the property and they are so well taken care of.  Just very impressed with such professionalism, when in this day is truly rare and very hard to find.

review_text:
As a speech therapist who has collaborated with many ABA providers over the years, I can confidently say that Superhero Kiddos stands out in the best possible way. It‚Äôs rare for me to come across an ABA center that feels so truly child-centered, collaborative, and joyful in their approach but this team absolutely gets it.

The environment at Superhero Kiddos is bright, playful, and full of positive energy. The therapists go above and beyond to meet each child where they are, celebrating every small victory and creating a space where learning feels fun and empowering rather than rigid or pressured. You can tell that every staff member genuinely loves what they do and that they care deeply about the progress and happiness of their kiddos.

From my professional perspective, I‚Äôve seen tremendous growth in my shared client since beginning with Superhero Kiddos not just in target behaviors, but in confidence, communication, and overall engagement. Their collaboration with outside providers like myself has been seamless and respectful, which is something I deeply appreciate.

If you‚Äôre looking for an ABA center that values play, positivity, and true teamwork, I can‚Äôt recommend Superhero Kiddos enough. They embody everything quality, child-centered therapy should be.

review_text: Very clean super professional guys my son loves it here.

When we started there he had only 9 words and now a year and a half later he is talking full blown sentences and communicating far better than I could have expected at this point. Melanie has been very professional and works well with my daughter.

I've wasted over a month of my time trying to get an appointment here. The rating is for whoever works the front office in the Brooksville location. Although she is friendly when she actually answers the phone, she NEVER gets back to you! I've given her the benefit of the doubt multiple times, but I can't continue to wait until she decides to call me back for an appointment.

For context: I reached out in January to make an appointment for my son. I was told I had to fill out the paperwork before I could make an appt. (weird process- not sure why she couldn't get me on the calendar since they were already booking 1 month out), but okay no problem. She stated she'd email me the new patient paperwork. I had to call back two days later because I never got the email. I then asked a follow- up question via email and never received an answer. These should have been my first clues that I ignored. I sent the paperwork via email over 2 WEEKS ago on 2/8 and never got a response. Again I had to call to confirm it was received. She stated once she processed everything she'd call me to get my son on the calendar. I called on (2/20 am) and left a voicemail to follow up. I also called the Crystal River office letting them know I can't get a hold of this office. She said she would forward the message. Today is 2/26 and still nothing. I'm done trying to force this, they just lost a potential customer!

Thank you for all you do!
The dedication and compassion demonstrated during times of immense difficulty are truly appreciated. The ability to provide comfort and support during a vulnerable period is a testament to the strength of the human spirit. The impact of such care extends far beyond the immediate moment, leaving a lasting impression. Your actions have created a space for dignity and peace during a heartbreaking experience. Ultimately, the kindness offered will forever be remembered with gratitude.
Thank you!

Way before we were thinking of getting another puppy I knew that we would want him to be trained from the early stage of his life. I started to search for a Dog trainer in Florida area. When I came across the Sweet Bee K9 I immediately knew they would be the one. I reached out to Danielle and she responded right away. We even phoned back and forth. I had so many questions and she explained everything. I loved her personality and the enthusiasm about the dogs and training programs. After we got our GSP puppy, she recommended once a week personal one on one puppy training. We live 1,5h away from them and they did not hesitate for one minute and offered that they would come to us to do the training. The puppy training went absolutely amazing. Their patience with the puppy and especially with us :) was great. We and our GSP got a really good basic training foundation and he was ready to take the next step. Their 5 weeks Board and Train program. We dropped off our dog with Sweet Bee K9 and knew he is in good hands and didn‚Äôt have to worry about him.
When I say they exceeded our expectations is an understatement. Our dog is a complete different, well behaved dog. He sits when asked, stays in his place while how food is prepared, nicely next to us, loves to go to his crate for quiet time and for the night. We can‚Äôt be happier. The progress is remarkable.
If you have a dog that needs training don‚Äôt look any further, I highly recommend Sweet Bee K9 for the dog board and train program. Danielle‚Äôs and Larry‚Äôs passion for dogs and upbeat nature makes us feel like a family.
We are so lucky üçÄ to have them. Looking forward to our next and new adventures with our GSP..

can‚Äôt say enough good things about Sweet Bee K9! Danielle and Larry are absolutely incredible ‚Äî from the very beginning, they were patient, professional, and so passionate about what they do.

They helped us with our dog Scout, and the transformation has been amazing. Not only did they teach Scout obedience and better behavior, but they also helped us as owners feel more confident and connected with our pup.

You can tell they truly care about every dog and family they work with. If you‚Äôre thinking about getting your dog professionally trained, Sweet Bee K9 is 100% the team you want on your side. We‚Äôre so grateful for everything they‚Äôve done and would recommend them to anyone!

Would 100% recommend Danielle at Sweet Bee K9! We did their board and train program for our puppy. They truly care about the dogs in the program and treat them as their own. Our pup is still his fun, energetic self but will now listen and is so well-mannered that we can take him literally anywhere with zero issues. Highly recommend this program!!

Cannot brag enough about Sweet Bee K9! Danielle and her family are so kind and caring.

I could not recommend Sweet Bee K9 enough.
Danielle, her husband Larry and son Ty are such amazing, kind people. She goes above and beyond to ensure your pet will be trained to appropriately handle high volume stimulation with social/distraction techniques and ensures your pet is socialized with other animals to lessen reactivity.
I am so happy we used Danielle for training, not only did we gain a friend but she‚Äôs now Meleys's ‚Äúfun aunt‚Äù that she looks forward to seeing for daycare.

If you take anything from this review I hope that you understand how much love and care they put into their training and client education.

Brittany with Sweet Speech has been the perfect fit for our son with speech delay due to Down syndrome. She is so dynamic, relates well with our son, has incredible evaluation skills and listens to my concerns as a parent. We have seen such amazing progress in his verbal skills, sight words skills, increased sentence length, the understanding of prepositions, adjectives and social communication. Brittany believes the best in my son, and I value that SO much in her. We would highly recommend her services to parents not only of typical children with speech delays, but also parents of children with special needs.

Brittany is wonderful! She provides speech therapy for two of our children and they respond really well to her.

Before Brittany, our son (ASD) had seen a number of speech therapists and she‚Äôs the only one who can get him to cooperate with her consistently. Our son often threw tantrums during ST sessions but he quickly warmed up to Brittany‚Äôs calm presence, patience and commitment to integrating fun into her therapy sessions. He‚Äôs been so receptive that we‚Äôve added additional floor time therapy sessions at home so that he can further benefit from her services.

Brittany also provides speech therapy for our daughter at her daycare and works closely with the staff so that they have options on how to communicate with our daughter when she can‚Äôt articulate what she wants, needs or feels.

Brittany works well in communicating with other therapy providers and teachers, and makes sure that her speech goals align with whatever goals they might have. Our son‚Äôs developmental pediatrician consistently compliments his progress in communicating, and just keeps telling us to ‚Äúkeep doing what you‚Äôre doing.‚Äù Along with his other providers, we believe Brittany plays an integral role in his progress.

Our family can‚Äôt recommend Brittany highly enough. We feel lucky to have found her, and would like her to keep working with our children as long as she‚Äôs willing.

I had a very educational and informative experience at SWISH! I made a visit to help with my knee. Post op for a meniscus replacement that went awry.. I took the FBDCU to diagnose not only my knee but my entire body. Kevin was so knowledgeable & thorough with explaining the recovery process! I can‚Äôt say better things about SWISH & their team.

If I could give my experience 10 stars I would. I recently did their Private Infrared Sauna and I‚Äôve never felt better! I left feeling refreshed, revived, and ready to take on my day like a champ. Not only does Kevin take the time to make his clients feel comfortable, he also goes above and beyond to explain the benefits of each treatment and tailors it to your specific needs. I learned so much during my visit and I‚Äôm excited to come back and try the Cold Plunge next!

Swish is amazing!! I first worked with Dr. Coach Kev back in December of 2021. He helped me rehab my shoulder after a surgery I had in November. I play collegiate softball so I was eager to get back to practice! I came in around 3 times every week and every single time I was filled with positivity and motivation. Anyone dealing with an injury knows how difficult it is to see the positives at times but Kevin always made sure I did. With that I underwent another surgery on my finger a year later. When I came home from school I went out of my way to find where Kevin was. Here I found him at Swish and had to make a visit. I was able to do a full body diagnostic check up and saw areas that I needed to improve on in order to prevent injury. The whole reason I went out of my way to find Dr.Melendez is because he is the best! He‚Äôs very passionate at what he does and has a way of connecting and forming relationships with anybody. If your in the Oviedo area I highly recommend Kevin and Mike! They are both upbeat and willing to take on any challenge that comes their way. Whatever you want I assure you they will help you achieve it.

HOLY COW!!!

Listen if you are an athlete in any part of Central Florida, you need to come! I just came for cold plunge and normatec but I am already  scheduled to come in for a diagnostic!

I am a professional athlete and am still recovering from a knee injury and can‚Äôt wait to break this down and go from there!

There is no one else I trust more then Swish!!

Absolutely recommend the services SWISH provides.  Kevin, the owner, is extremely knowledgeable on physiology and how to get the most out of our bodies using his technologies.  I'm training for a 2,650 mile-long expedition on the Pacific Crest Trail soon and sought out SWISH to help me recover from some intense training.  I've been seeing Kevin for a couple of months now and feel a lot more confident in my abilities to complete the upcoming hike.  I've fallen in love with cold plunging.  There are many other methods of recovery from workouts, but none I've ever experienced as effective as 35 to 50-degree cold water plunging.  Add compression treatments and an IR sauna too?  A recipe for success.  Kevin's Mom and Brother also work at SWISH!  An awesome family.  Very professional and great people!  ‚ù§Ô∏èüí™

My husband purchased me a gift certificate from this location for Mother‚Äôs Day 2 years ago. I went to redeem today and was told the technician is no longer available so my certificate would not be honored. As a director of the largest spas in the world I find this to be extremely disappointing and illegal customer service. For an owner of a business to put the blame on me for not coming sooner (being a mother of toddlers this was the first time I had a moment to myself) was improper management of the situation. Had she explained the situation and offered a discount or some sort of resolution I would have been a client for life and I would have referred others as well. Instead she referred me to another spa, which tells me how dedicated she is to her own business. So since you do not know law on gift certificates let me educate you.

I purchased this gift certificate from your business, and it does not have an expiration date. Under federal and state consumer protection laws, gift certificates without expiration dates remain valid. The fact that the employee who sold it is no longer with you does not affect the business‚Äôs obligation to honor it. Please let me know how we can resolve this promptly and no I am not interested in having a massage from you any longer. But I will be filing with Florida better business bureau if this isn‚Äôt rectified.
Sybil is amazing! I‚Äôve had lots of massages in my 63 years, and she is the best without question! She is truly a gifted healer and a caring human.

She is absolutely amazing! Listened to me about the pressure, if she was applying too much or not enough. I highly recommend her too anyone. I even got my husband an appointment, he just had back fusions done and hates anyone touching him & he has been back multiple times. I can‚Äôt say enough about her.
Sybil is the best! She takes time to hear your needs and wants, then her hands do the rest! The best massage I have ever had!
Sybil made my skin GLOW! I felt so amazing after my service. HIGHLY RECOMMEND! She‚Äôs very personable and professional!

I highly recommend Symmetry Physical Therapy and this office.

After 18 months of intense pain, fear, and mobility restrictions following a bike vs. car accident (concussion, multiple disc herniations, two shoulder tears, intense muscle guarding, TMJ, injections, surgery, and rounds of PT at other providers), I immediately noticed Symmetry was different. Sessions are full 60-minute, truly one-on-one; meaning time is spent on careful assessment, hands-on treatment, and clear next steps rather than waiting or being split between multiple patients. The office is organized, responsive, and compassionate, which has reduced administrative insurance roadblocks and allowed my care to move forward. And Lisette sharing her cafecito during morning dry-needling sessions somehow makes a rough process feel calm and personable.

Dr. Fabrizio (‚ÄúFab‚Äù) Russo is an outstanding and charismatic provider and an even better human. From the outset he validated the severity of my pain and the frustration of limited progress whereas prior to the accident I did olympic weightlifting. He assured me there was no reason I should be 9 months post-op and unable to raise my arm overhead - and he‚Äôs been fully invested in my care since. As a woman, our pain is often minimized even by healthcare professionals. Fab takes it seriously and pairs compassion with a clear plan.  Treatment has combined manual therapy and myofascial work, scraping and cupping, heat and compression therapy, trigger point dry needling when appropriate, and a PT exercise program with thoughtful progression. I highly value his education and consultation: Fab explains mechanics in plain language and helps me distinguish tightness from weakness, when to rest versus strengthen, and when to press forward or ease off.

Progress has not been linear, but it has been real. In the past nine months I have advanced more than in the year and a half prior: I can walk and stand more comfortably, turn and support my head/neck with less restrictions, and complete daily tasks‚Äîwalking my dog, carrying groceries, household chores‚Äîwith noticeably less pain. Small milestones have been profoundly encouraging wins; a year ago I was crying in a store because I couldn‚Äôt reach the top shelf without excruciating pain; last month I was able to put my carry-on in overhead luggage comfortably.  Athletic ambitions are still a long way off, but I now have a stable path toward progression and an exceptional clinician + coach + accountability partner every step of the way.

For patients navigating complex, severe, and/or chronic injuries and who value consistent, individualized, one-on-one care Symmetry Physical Therapy and Dr. Fabrizio Russo have my gratitude and sincere recommendation.

Fabrizio truly worked a miracle on my knee. I was struggling even to stand, but thanks to his treatment I can now carry out my daily activities normally. I‚Äôm very grateful for his care and professionalism, as well as the kindness of Tessa, Jose, and Lissette, who always made me feel welcome. Definitely recommend!

My experience at Symmetry was fantastic! Everyone was so nice and welcoming there! Fab was my therapist and he is wonderful! He is so nice and was a great PT always listening to any concerns or questions I had. He is really dedicated to getting his patients back to full strength! I also had a few sessions with Jose who was also so great! I definitely recommend Symmetry to anywho who is recovering from an injury or needs PT!

If you ever get vertigo, this place provides the best treatment. I called around to a few different places but none gave me confidence that they knew what they were doing. Jose knew vertigo and all the maneuvers to get you back to normal. 10/10 would recommend. The owner was super nice and welcoming and the office is clean and easy to get to. Miami is filled with a bunch of PT that just aren‚Äôt that great, this place is amazing and I would send anyone I care about here.

I was experiencing knee pain and mobility issues and came to Symmetry Physical Therapy for treatment. My only regret is that I didn‚Äôt come sooner. Dr. Tessa is a phenomenal therapist, and she quickly got to the root of the problem. I appreciate that she found the cause of the problem (for me it started in my hip) rather than only treating the symptoms. She is also a great person who really cares about her patients. My treatment took time and effort (of course) but I am very pleased with the results. Highly recommend!

My experience during the healing therapy conducted by Marcela was truly transformative. She guided the process with all her mastery, and light, creating a safe and nurturing space for deep healing. I am deeply grateful because I can feel the positive shift within myself ‚Äî not just in my emotions, but in my energy and overall well-being. Marcela‚Äôs gift is genuine, and her presence brings clarity, and renewal. I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking authentic and profound healing.

I had a remarkable healing experience with Gaston. I felt a profound connection throughout the session, which I interpreted as a refreshing, divine energy. I appreciate Gaston's skill and expertise!

My experience with Marcela‚Äôs healing therapy was amazing! She is very professional, sweet, and truly cares about her clients. She made me feel so comfortable, and I left the session feeling renewed. I highly recommend her healing therapy and will definitely be coming back.

I am so grateful for the work I‚Äôve done with Marcela. Over the past few months, I‚Äôve experienced so much growth and healing, and I feel like a completely different person. Her support and guidance have helped me reach a place of clarity and peace that I didn‚Äôt think was possible. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for real, lasting change.

I actually met with Dr. Chance Rohter just after I had to put my dog down at another vet clinic on Sept 2nd that I didn't think handled the euthanasia very well at all. TLC Pediatric Therapies has been an essential part of my son‚Äôs life for over 4 years, and I can confidently say that we wouldn‚Äôt change this place for anything. It is a safe, clean environment that always has the resources and services children need. The therapists are the heart of this clinic ‚Äî truly special people who have played a huge role in my son‚Äôs development. Jocelyn, with whom we have worked for more than 4 years, is incredibly sweet and professional, and Karyn has also been wonderful in her work with my son. The front desk staff has always treated us with kindness and respect.

Like many places that serve children with special needs, TLC has faced some administrative and insurance-related changes in the past, which unfortunately created delays and confusion for some families. These situations were related to the transition period and not to the therapists themselves. From my experience, the team has been working hard to get everything back on track, and the quality of therapy has never been affected.

I‚Äôm truly grateful for this clinic, the dedication of its staff, and the safe, supportive environment they provide for children and families.

TLC Pediatric Therapies is truly amazing! Karyn (Speech), Jocelyn (Occupational) and Bradley (PT)  are truly GOD sent. The entire team is professional, knowledgeable, and incredibly kind. They take the time to understand my child‚Äôs unique needs and create a plan that actually works for him. He‚Äôs been with TLC from around the time he was 6 months, and is still a patient 7 years later.

I‚Äôve seen such incredible progress with my son.  Not just in skills but in confidence, and that‚Äôs thanks to their patient, and encouraging approach. They celebrate every milestone‚Äîbig or small‚Äîand make therapy a positive, motivating experience.

The communication with parents is outstanding. They keep me updated, offer helpful tips to continue progress at home, and are always available to answer questions day or night. It‚Äôs clear they truly care about each child‚Äôs growth and well-being.

I am so grateful for TLC Pediatric Therapies and my child amazing team. They have made such a difference in our lives, and I would recommend them without hesitation to any parent looking for a supportive, professional, and compassionate therapy team.

We have been coming to tlc pediatrics for many years, and my daughter has absolutely thrived here. Even with the change in management, the same wonderful therapists we‚Äôve known and loved are still here ‚Äî and they are truly amazing. Their kindness, dedication, and genuine care for the kids shine through in everything they do. My daughter‚Äôs quality of life is so much better because we‚Äôve had this place to go to, and we are endlessly grateful for the progress and joy they‚Äôve helped her achieve. I want to give a special shout out to Mrs. Jocelyn and Mrs. Karyn. They have been great with my daughter. And also always making sure I'm up to date on what's going on with her and even helps me out with scheduling if I'm having a hard time. Highly recommend!

I am grateful for Jocelyn and Karyn. My daughters has made remarkable progress since they been working with them. They creates a comfortable and welcoming environment. We have been using TLC Pediatric Therapies for 5 years now. And I cannot say enough about the amazing therapists they staff. It‚Äôs almost an hour drive for us and we have been making the commute for 5 years because they are worth it. I cannot recommend them enough to any other family trying hard for their children to find their place in this world.

My first daughter was speech delayed utilize the speech therapy at her Daycare with Kali . My daughter now won‚Äôt stop talking which is great . He went from being almost silent to non stop talking. She answers any questions or concerns I have and always reassuring to me.  The overall office and staff have been amazing. Baylee is amazing! She is very knowledgeable and professional. She has been nothing but kind, caring and flexible. My sons speech has greatly improved in the short time they have known each other. I‚Äôm am so happy and Blessed we found her! I would recommend her to anyone!

Speech therapy has helped my son so much! Within 2 months my son was using REAL words. We‚Äôre like 6 months in and Baylee has really helped my son communicate with us. She is quick to respond via text, which is a total plus for moms like me. My son looks forward to his sessions with her, he doesn‚Äôt look at it as a class, he looks at it as playtime yet he‚Äôs learning so much. 10/10 would recommend

Her daughter who is also very experienced is her right hand woman so there‚Äôs help whenever you need it. It‚Äôs a great barn family. I highly recommend this place!!!

We are so extremely grateful to have found Tammi and TLC farms! We have 2 daughters who have been taking lessons for about 6 months and have learned a tremendous amount and look forward to going each week. Thank you, Tammi and TLC Farms! We love you guys! ‚ù§Ô∏è

TLC provides a safe and clean environment and has horses for all levels of riding. Tammi not only teaches the kids to ride, she teaches them overall horsemanship. My daughter has been riding at TLC‚Äôs Gypsy Haven for the pass 4yrs and if she could spent everyday at the barn she would. Mrs.Tammi has not only showed her how to ride but also how to love and care for horses.

I wouldn‚Äôt want her anywhere else. Tammi has been so helpful and she is one of my daughter biggest cheerleader. I love knowing that when we can‚Äôt be there Promise is being well taken care of by Mrs.Tammi.

I can't say enough good things about Tyler and TM Canine Services. My dog Mongo (a super anxious chihuahua) had been struggling with some reactive behavioral challenges, and I was starting to feel overwhelmed and unsure of how to help him. Enter Tyler‚Äîpatient, knowledgeable, and genuinely passionate about dogs.

From the very first session some two years ago, Tyler connected with Mongo in a way that was both calming and effective. He took the time to understand Mongo‚Äôs unique personality and tailored the training to suit his needs. The transformation has been incredible. Mongo is more confident, responsive, and relaxed‚Äîand I feel empowered as a dog owner thanks to the tools and guidance Tyler provided.

In a recent pop-up session and with Tyler‚Äôs guidance, I was able to get Mongo to sit with another dog and even tolerate some tail wagging!

If you're looking for someone who truly cares and knows their stuff, TM Canine Services is the place to go. Mongo and I are both better for it!

Tyler I can‚Äôt Thank you enough for your support and Thank you to all of the amazing wonderful people in the TM community who have also helped us along the way.
