reach  out with  smiles  as they pass you while  doing their job. And Karens daughter , Mary Heather , is sure to make you smile!   I feel blessed that my very special young neighbor and her husband and both of their sons  , were already going to Tree Of Life for her diagnosis of  MS , and the boys Sports injuries. Once  I was diagnosed and struggling ,
they all recommended Mario to me. !!!!
And I AM SO THANKFUL HE AGREED  TO MY FIRST APPOINTMENT!!

Tree of life is the best at what they do. Karen is a delight to speak with and makes it easy becoming a patient. I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Mario and the treatment I have received. If you are having neck or back pain , Mario is the one you want working on you. I couldn‚Äôt feel my feet and legs when I first started working with Mario , and he has be back up and swinging a golf club like a champ again. THANK YOU !!

Mario, Alex and Karen are the most wonderful people that I work with on my shoulders! There are many others there that I have not met yet. It is the very best care you can get. They personalize your care and really care. Definitely recommend to everyone!!

I‚Äôve had severe thoracic and mild lumbar  scoliosis since I was a teenager with only chiropractic treatment up until the past few years. I‚Äôm now 28 and have developed bulging discs in my lumbar spine which led to me seeking several professionals for pain relief. I did regular PT for about 7 months with no luck. However, Schroth method physical therapy was the first thing that has shown consistent pain relief and has given me better confidence in my body‚Äôs ability to move and heal. Andrew is not only kind and respectful, he is also great at what he does and shows you the research and logic behind every exercise that is performed. I would recommend this place to anybody with scoliosis.

I‚Äôve been going to Take Control Physical Therapy with Andrew for 5 months, and the results have been incredible! My scoliosis curve has improved tremendously thanks to their expertise in Schroth scoliosis treatment. Andrew is very professional, knowledgeable, and truly cares about his patients. Highly recommend to anyone dealing with scoliosis in Jacksonville!

I‚Äôm a local physical therapist myself, and honestly? It‚Äôs vulnerable to ask for help when you‚Äôre usually the one giving it.

Working with Andrew was amazing. His spine expertise helped me heal in a way that felt smart, safe, and helpful.

When we started, I was scared to move after  having spine surgery. Now I‚Äôm body building five days a week and moving with total confidence. What a joy :)

I am so grateful for the outstanding care and expertise provided by Dr.Andrew!
After injuring my shoulder,  I was in a lot of pain, especially when laying in bad and falling asleep on my right side!
From the moment I walked into  Clinic,
Dr. Andrew made me feel very comfortable and confident I was in right place!
He took the time to assess my condition,  explaining everything in detail and addressing all of my concerns and answering all the questions I had!
The treatment plan was personalized and well thought out, with perfect balance of different exercises,  that really helped improve my mobility and reduce pain, EVEN ON MY FIRST VISIT!
After only couple visits I felt 90% better!
I kept doing exercises at home and just did what Dr. Andrew requested me to do!!
I also took off  fom going to gym, little over 2 weeks  and I believe,  combination of physical therapy and time off from gym, helped me to become pain free!
Thanks to Dr. Andrew expertise,  my shoulder  has healed significantly and I can now return to daily activities and Gym!
I highly recommend Dr.Andrew to anyone in need!! He truly goes above and beyond  to help his patients!

I was referred to Andrew Merget at Take Control Physical Therapy for a rotator cuff injury, and I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful. After just two visits, I noticed a drastic improvement in both my pain and mobility. Andrew is incredibly knowledgeable, takes the time to explain everything clearly, and is very easy to work with. His personalized approach and attention to detail make all the difference. Highly recommend him if you‚Äôre dealing with any kind of injury or just want top-tier physical therapy care!

provider_name: Talk Active Speech & Occupational - Florida Mall
review_text: The clinic and staff are incredible, extremely professional, trustworthy and friendly! I highly recommend it!

provider_name: Talk Active Speech & Occupational - Florida Mall
review_text: I absolutely love talk active .My daughter attends speech and occupational therapy here and loves it .We absolutely adore the staff but have been with alex for more than a year now and she is the best! They have made the kids so comfortable here .its 25 minutes from me but i refuse to change locations because my child loves the staff! I have also seen improvements with my child(Ofcourse everyone is different) but i also put in the work at home

provider_name: Talk Active Speech & Occupational - Florida Mall
review_text: Thank you for being so understanding during these hard times. I truly appreciate the concern for everyone‚Äôs safety! My son has had a few therapist before when we lived in Miami but I truly hear his improvement ever since he began here. Thank you thank you thank you! Such positivity and professionalism from the staff, again THANK YOU!

provider_name: Talk Active Speech & Occupational - Florida Mall
review_text: I have no complaints with any of my children's therapists (Iqra, Yari and Alex) excellent therapists, very professional, friendly, responsible, they always ask about the well-being of the children, my children in a short time had an evolution in their communication as I had never seen it before and I am very grateful to the Talk Active team, my children were always excited about their therapies, they came out of the super happy therapies, sadly I changed my children's health insurance and I had to take them out of the therapies, but if in the future I needed more therapies for the children I would undoubtedly choose talk Active again, 100% recommended.

provider_name: Talk Active Speech & Occupational - Florida Mall
review_text: My daughter has been attending this practice in Orlando for over 2 years. She has the best therapists, is currently receiving Speech and occupational therapy. My child has come such a long way thanks to the effort and dedication that the therapists  have shown. I recommend TalkActive üëçüèº

provider_name: Talk the Talk Pediatric Therapy, LLC
review_text: Alyssa is the best! She creates a comfortable environment and tailors the specific needs to allow our ASD son to build his confidence and thrive in his communication. It‚Äôs always a positive, happy space that he asks to go and never wants to leave! She goes above and beyond just the sessions. Her knowledge, help and support have been an amazing addition to our son‚Äôs team as well as our family. She truly is the most caring and supportive SLP and person.

provider_name: Talk the Talk Pediatric Therapy, LLC
review_text: Alyssa is amazing at what she does. My son is always excited to go to his sessions. She gets down with him, and always tailors the activities to what will keep him engaged. She is also amazing with the parents. She continually makes sure that we know what is going on, and how we can better support our child outside of the weekly therapy sessions.

provider_name: Talk the Talk Pediatric Therapy, LLC
review_text: We are so grateful for Alyssa and the resources she provides!! They are a small office but have huge hearts. The best in Apollo beach and dare I say Tampa! Alyssa and her team truly care about us and our children. I see such progress in my own child as he has been a patient there for almost a year! She truly helps me understand what I can help him with at home to compliment her teaching!

provider_name: Talk the Talk Pediatric Therapy, LLC
review_text:
It's heartwarming to see my 4 year old excited to attend her Speech sessions with Ms. Alyssa, and sometimes it‚Äôs hard to get her to leave her sessions üòÑ

Our journey with Talk The Talk began last spring, and we have been impressed with the notable improvements in her speech.  The play base therapy has also helped unleash my daughter‚Äòs imagination, which has been really awesome.

We are also grateful for the OT services provided by Ms. Shelby, who is helping us with school readiness and offered helpful tips on potty training.

Can‚Äôt thank them both enough and highly recommend their exceptional support!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è

provider_name: Talk the Talk Pediatric Therapy, LLC
review_text: We have been with Alyssa at Talk the Talk since August when our previous provider moved locations. It was the best thing that ever happened to us! Her neuroaffirming, play-based approach works wonders, and she takes the time to really get to know her clients and their specific needs. My son has made amazing strides with his speech and absolutely adores "beautiful Lyssa" ü•∞ 10/10  highly recommend!!

I had the privilege of working with Taylor to prepare for my dental school interview, and I can't recommend her enough! English is not my first language, and I was feeling nervous about how I would come across during the interview. But Taylor was incredibly patient and understanding. She helped me boost my confidence, especially with my speaking and communication skills.

Taylor took the time to review my responses, provide constructive feedback, and guide me through mock interview sessions. Her approach was always encouraging, which helped me feel more comfortable and clear in my answers. With her coaching, I was able to improve my fluency and communicate my thoughts more effectively, which was exactly what I needed for the interview.

Thanks to Taylor, I walked into my interview feeling confident and ready, and I'm happy to say that it went great! If you're looking for someone who can help with both language barriers and interview prep, Taylor is definitely the person to go to.

Taylor is an exceptional speech pathologist in South Florida. Thanks to her diligent work with our son, who was diagnosed with a speech delay at 18 months, he is now starting to talk. We drive 50 minutes to see her because we've witnessed the significant difference she's made in our family, providing both practical tools for home practice and genuine hope for our son's success.

My son B had a wonderful experience with Taylor. She helped him with articulation and language. Taylor made the sessions fun and interactive so B always looked forward to seeing her. She individualized the sessions to fit my son's needs and kept him engaged by doing activities geared around his interests. For example, he loved Pok√©mon at the time, so she made a game out of the cards. Taylor has great tools and ideas that helped my son stay focused.

She took extra time at the end of the sessions to give me ideas for practicing in every day life and helping to maximize my son's potential.
It was a pleasure having Taylor work with B, and she is going to start therapy for my daughter in the next few weeks!

Taylor has been an amazing therapist for our son! He always looks forward to her sessions. Taylor is a very engaging therapist and creates a fun and accepting environment that allows my son to thrive. His language has really progressed since he started working with her!

After having a really bad experience with a therapist I met Taylor. Taylor showed me how much she cared. Taylor would spend endless time trying to help my son right away, giving me pointers and ways to help him. She really  is one of a kind!! The moment my son met her he was comfortable and felt her warmth. She really helped my son so much I‚Äôm forever grateful to her! My son would wait by the door every time and asked if it was ‚Äúmy Taylor time‚Äù everyday. Not only did she help him but she made it fun!

My daughter used her for reading and she was incredible!

I have worked with Shelly Mincy for quite some time now, and I can confidently say that she has been one of the most important sources of support in my life. Through some of my most challenging seasons‚Äîtimes when I felt overwhelmed, lost, or uncertain‚ÄîShelly provided a safe space where I could be heard, understood, and gently guided toward healing and clarity.

Her compassion is unmatched, and her calm, grounded presence always makes me feel at ease. What sets Shelly apart is not just her deep expertise and professionalism, but also the genuine kindness and empathy she brings into every session. She never makes you feel rushed or judged‚Äîinstead, she listens with intent and responds with wisdom, patience, and care.

I honestly don‚Äôt know what I would have done without her support. She has helped me grow, process, and make peace with things I didn‚Äôt think I could get through. If you‚Äôre searching for a therapist who is truly invested in your well-being, who will walk alongside you with grace and insight, Shelly Mincy is the one. I‚Äôm endlessly grateful to have found her.
The staff is friendly and professional. I've been seeing Leslie Clark for years, she is a wonderful therapist. I highly recommend her. However, they do have other good therapists onsite.

Took me 10 yrs to find a good therapist. No one ever truly helped me until I started seeing Mike. In the past I was told I was too self aware to help. I spent years reading self help books specifically on my struggles, which helped but never undid the trauma stored in my nervous system. My obsession with self help and getting better made me more self critical. My other CBT therapists just told me ‚Äúyou‚Äôre so strong‚Äù and ‚Äúthat must be hard,‚Äù and to use my coping skills. CBT can actually make people with my conditions worse. I felt like every therapist just treated me like a sick puppy. Mike quite literally changed my life. Everyday was suffering up until I started seeing him about a year ago. I‚Äôve always been afraid of men because of my past experiences, but Ive never felt judged or unsafe. I feel like I‚Äôm talking to the mentor I needed growing up. I truly believed I was beyond repair until EMDR. I  felt like I tried everything. He was highly recommended to me by multiple people. Life is hard but he‚Äôs helped me rewire my brain to become the person I always wanted to be. He taught me that above all else, I must be kind to myself. Self love and kindness to your fellow humans is always the answer. Mike really cares.

I hate to leave bad reviews, but I needed to get this off my chest. The office and receptionist were wonderful and timely in the scheduling process. I'm sure the other therapists at this office are wonderful, as well, but the one I met with was not. Mike was polite and formal. He never openly made any negative statements, but his office did not feel like a safe space. I felt judged for my faith and beliefs from his facial expressions, and felt that he lacked the proper credentialing to treat my OCD and the nature of it. I was extremely nervous going in, and didn't feel that my courage in asking for help was acknowledged at all. At one point, he asked me why I was crying, and seemed to be at a loss as to why I was so emotional. It had been a long time since I had met with a therapist, and so everything had been bubbling up to the surface. Then, towards the end, he gave me a piece of paper with some cognitive behavioral therapy strategies and told me I would benefit from some memory therapy that they offered. That was it. I understand this was a first initial appointment, and we were just getting to know each other, but it sent me on a depressive episode that I am still recovering from. I wouldn't recommend him.
great place. would be even better if someone would bother to answer the phone sometimes.

provider_name: Tallahassee Orthopedic & Sports Physical Therapy - Capital Circle NE
review_text: TOSPT has truly been wonderful.  The therapists are very skilled and knowledgeable and were genuinely interested in my recovery.  They became my friends !!  Melanie, the first face I saw, is very pleasant with a beautiful and welcoming smile.  Thank you  Ann, Teresa, Joseph, and Christian.  A great team !!  I love you all ‚ù§Ô∏è

provider_name: Tallahassee Orthopedic & Sports Physical Therapy - Capital Circle NE
review_text: Anne is amazing! She helped me so much after I broke my leg and is now helping me with my back after years of issues with it! I highly recommend TOSPT! Everyone is so friendly, especially the 2 ladies up front!

provider_name: Tallahassee Orthopedic & Sports Physical Therapy - Capital Circle NE
review_text: I had my knee replaced in November. I went to TOSPT before the surgery to do PreHab. I am so glad I did it made a huge difference. Once surgery was complete I was at TOSPT 3X/week. The results were awesome. The therapists were very diligent, caring, and professional. Christian was outstanding and a great ambassador for the profession and TOSPT. The only reason they get 5 stars is because I can't give them 10!

provider_name: Tallahassee Orthopedic & Sports Physical Therapy - Capital Circle NE
review_text: I have been feeling much better since I began physical therapy at TOSPT! Anne is very informative, caring and encouraging. She motivates me to push through my discomfort and I can see results from the program she has set up for me!

provider_name: Tallahassee Orthopedic & Sports Physical Therapy - Capital Circle NE
review_text: The staff and expertise here is top notch! I have seen two physical therapists here Jenny, and Anne, and they were both absolutely wonderful! My shoulder hasn't felt this good in a very long time. I couldn't recommend them more, although Jenny is no longer working here.

provider_name: Tallahassee Orthopedic & Sports Physical Therapy - Collegiate Village
review_text: I have been treated at this facility more than a year due to my injury/surgery.  I can tell you they are the most attentive professional physical therapists I have ever encountered. (I have seen a few in my time).  Sierra is a great receptionist (along with her plethora of other duties).  Lacey is a great PT and works with her patients the way they need it to get results.  Jasmine is great, running a very efficient and productive facility.  Josh and Mia are great technicians ready to assist at a moments notice!  Well, Mia any way (LOL!  Josh loves Wendy's)  Thanks for all you guys do, keep up the great work!

provider_name: Tallahassee Orthopedic & Sports Physical Therapy - Collegiate Village
review_text: This location has the most helpful, bright and cheerful staff you could ever ask for; be it Sierra at the front desk, Jasmine running the day to day or Lacey making all the patients push to reach the levels of recovery they need they will make your time feel completely worthwhile. I used them for two injuries and they helped me achieve recovery in a timely manner but also post injury plans they will help mitigate any potential future problems. Big thanks from the Studio B family as well for being the best neighbors a small business could ask for. Thanks so much!!!

provider_name: Tallahassee Orthopedic & Sports Physical Therapy - Collegiate Village
review_text:
I can‚Äôt say enough good things about my experience at TOSPT! From the moment I walked in, Sierra made me feel welcomed and supported.

My physical therapist, Jasmine, took the time to understand my concerns and created a personalized treatment plan that truly made a difference. Each session was productive, and I always felt like I was in great hands. Thanks to them, I‚Äôve seen major improvement and feel stronger and more confident every day.

provider_name: Tallahassee Orthopedic & Sports Physical Therapy - Collegiate Village
review_text: I‚Äôve visited this TOSPT Collegiate Village location several times now, and every interaction has been fantastic. Sierra at the front desk is always welcoming and on top of things, and Laci and the therapy team bring a level of passion and attention to detail that‚Äôs rare to find. You can tell they are passionate about making patients feel like more than just a number, and it shows in the way they listen, explain, and celebrate progress. Highly recommend this team to anyone looking for exceptional, personalized care.

provider_name: Tallahassee Orthopedic & Sports Physical Therapy - Collegiate Village
review_text: Jasmine, Laci, and Fiji are such caring and amazing physical therapists who made the facility feel like home, and Sierra at the front desk was so friendly and upbeat. The best clinic in Tallahassee!

They just randomly refunded my account from some visit about 4 months ago. I don't regard this TOC operation--everything including providers, MRI, etc.--as a medical practice. I suspect they are an over-leveraged poorly run business. A complete embarrassment for the city. I literally know no one who has anything positive to say about TOC.

I had a MRI Monday 3/24/25 ordered by Jacob Nelson, TOC Now Canapy, 2605 Welaunee Blvd 32308. I was promised a call when MRI was read. Today is Friday 03/28/25 no call received. I was told to come in to PC TOC Now Tuesday and they could help me. We drove 40 miles to be told they could help. Sorry! Very very disappointing! I would really discourage anyone else that is in pain to use TOC

Comparing to an MRI experience at another facility, this experience was not pleasant. The gown fit just enough to cover me when pulled tight. I‚Äôm only a size 10, so I‚Äôm not very large. The guy spoke so fast & scripted, I felt very very rushed. There was ice cold air blowing on my head & ear. I left with a pounding headache, gooey eyes & I could feel my eyes swelling from the cold air. I feel they should have warned me of the cold air so I could cover my face.  The other facility was so accommodating, explained everything, provided headphones, kept asking me if I was comfortable & told me to move a foot to speak if needed. This guy just said ‚Äúdon‚Äôt move‚Äù & gave me something to squeeze for an emergency & couldn‚Äôt get me in the machine fast enough. I put my clothes in a locker and he immediately took the key from me & apparently hung it on the doorway out in the open. That made absolutely no sense as putting my stuff in an unlocked locker would have been just as safe. Overall, it was not pleasant and hopefully I will not have to go back there.

Kerstum

Did a great job explaining everything

Great facility
Very efficient and painless
TOC mri is excellent
Only thing missing is headphones

I highly recommend this office. When I was referred to them they quickly called me to schedule. I met with Michael Reetz yesterday and he was thorough in explaining the process, managing expectations, providing relevant education, he was personable and considerate. He listened to me and even took notes. This is definitely a great place to get treatment!

I went here years back in my experience was great everybody here was highly trained and friendly to be around my therapist was awesome to me i really enjoyed everybody in my time at this Tallahassee orthopedic clinic

Excellent facility starting at X-ray - no wait!  Dr Oberste is an excellent surgeon who took the time to sit down with me and address my concerns- great bedside manner!  His support staff is excellent too including Ms Lane.  Patty the Surgery RN was excellent even though she got the run around from my PC provider, she still remained up beat and positive.  My meeting with Krystal in PT was great.  I even met a patient in the PT waiting room of Dr Oberste who had nothing but great things about him.  Thank you for providing such great service!

Front staff were friendly and professional even though I was running a bit late. Almost no wait time and Curry, my PT, is awesome. She took her time and I never felt rushed, but she was efficient and I left feeling excited and ready to rebuild my strength.

I received excellent and thoughtful service from both TOC clinical MD Mathew Durgin and TOC Physical Therapist Jason. I highly recommend TOC. I did have to wait two weeks to get started with Jason but thereafter appointments were set up in advance  to be weekly. I found Jason to be both encouraging and helpful, carefully explaining and working through each exercise and giving me clear photographic materials to take home with me.   Cecelia Shaw, Tallahassee

I had my autism evaluation here and have gone back and forth on leaving a review. I don't like leaving low reviews, but, considering how much this experience has stayed with me, I thought it important enough to say something. This service provider did not seem prepared to assess adults, nor did she seem to take into account cultural differences (like parents who were in no way able to address social or sensory issues with a child when they were just trying to survive each day). I am a Black Woman and to say I was disappointed after going here, thinking I would be heard and safe, is an understatement. I fully agree with the other one-star reviews (one of which was oddly taken down a few days after I first saw it). In fact, the only time I felt validated during this process was when I read the other one-star reviews on here. That let me know it wasn't just me. I wish those reviews had been up when I was looking at this place for evaluation. The Dr. was very judgmental and told me I struggle maintaining relationships because my parents are divorced so no one modeled healthy relationships for me. What an awful thing to tell someone, as if marriages are guaranteed to be healthy and safe for the children. She seemed ready to dismiss everything I said, almost like "Rainman-esque" persons are the only ones who'll pass scrutiny. There seemed to be no consideration for 1) masking, 2) a spectrum of persons with a spectrum of qualifying behaviors, and 3) varying levels of functionality and growth as an adult (not a child, an adult). Now my challenge of being seen and heard is even greater. For someone already struggling and looking for support, I sincerely regret going here for my evaluation.

Dr. Hooper removed my previous negative review. She did not give me an assessment that was appropriate for my age or abilities. Her evaluation report had errors ranging from simple (my age, the date the assessment was given) to full-on inaccuracies about my life and experiences, including making assumptions about my feelings and emotions and listing these assumptions as facts. I highly recommend looking elsewhere for assessment services.

Dr. Hooper is extraordinary! She has a genuine ability to connect with individuals and feel as though they are seen and heard. She truly cares about people and it shows in the profession she has chosen. I look forward to seeing what Dr. Hooper can accomplish as she continues to use her gifts to help others find their value and truth!

Working with Dr. Hooper has been nothing short of amazing! She is extremely professional and has helped me in so many ways! Her feedback really helped me understand myself and relationships. Thank you!

Dr. Hooper was very thorough with my evaluation. She did every necessary test to give me the right diagnosis. I am confident that what my evaluation reveled, is correct. She led me in the right direction for therapy options and I am doing great! 10/10 would recommend!

Great staff. Everything went well. Considering the volume of pets they see. They go above and beyond to make your experience a smooth one. Answered all of my questions and felt good leaving the facility. Harper is healing great and Ty for the service you provide for the pets.

Tally Spay is a wonderful pet resource here in Tallahassee. I was provided a voucher by Be The solution and my cost was minimal. Not only was my female dog spayed, but she also got rabies and all her other needed vaccinations along with a nail trim. She was provided with pain and relaxing medications for her aftercare along with clear instructions. The staff working at Tally Spay were found  to be actually joyous to be working there, as well as very caring and professional. I am happy to share with others my excellent review.

This place was excellent. You make the  appointment on computer any documents they need upload or take with you. To drop off took about 10 minutes process and you pay once it‚Äôs done over the internet. They send a summary of the pets health if that‚Äôs the pkg you ordered. Pick up is just as quick. They even helped my husband load our pit bull. Very courteous. I had a voucher from Be the solution thrift store, and got the everything package a 80lb dog with the pkg and he was high risk was $139.00, the neutering was $40.00 everything else was extra that I chose. You can not find any better place. This is my second dog I only have 3 more to go. I‚Äôm trying to be a part of the solution.

I am so grateful to tally spay and all of the staff members who treated Lightning (my chihuahua) with such great care. They answered all of my questions. They were all very professional. I wouldn‚Äôt have been able to afford to get Lightning spayed without them. I am so impressed with the quality of their services and their care!  Thank you so very much for everything!

They did do good on neutraling my cats, Would I go back (no) one incision work is way better then my other cat but everyone was really nice except the people at the front desk, you ask them questions and they don't even try to hide that they want you to leave them alone or shut up. Even at the end when the desk person was telling us the rules when people had questions she still was being rude to a point patience was asking other patience the questions over again because they didn‚Äôt wanna talk to the desk lady.

Tammy was amazing with our son. The longer he waited to learn a 2-wheeler, the more anxious he was about it.
She put him right at ease, and he was pedaling independently by the second session!
After the third lesson he asked to ride his bike to school!
We can‚Äôt recommend her enough.

My son learned how to ride his bike without training wheels from one lesson with Tammy!  We had been referred to her from a friend and are so glad we got a lesson from her.  My 6 year old would only do his balance bike and enjoyed it but we were really ready for him to ride a real big bike now.  He was so proud of himself after his lesson with Tammy and wants to ride his bike all the time now.  I highly highly highly recommend Tammy Bishop for bike riding lessons!!
Tammy is the BEST!!!! So patient innovative kind and passionate!!! Helped out sweet girl learn to ride her bike at her pace and gave us amazing tips to help outside of lessons!

My son has been working with Tammy doing SOS feeding therapy since last summer. When they first began working together, he was afraid to touch and even look at some foods. He progressed to touching and playing with the food and eventually being able to try new foods. He now eats a variety of fruits, vegetables and meat. My son also looked forward to each session and would say ‚ÄúMiss Tammy!!‚Äù And run to her!

Tammy is very professional and an expert at what she does. She is also very patient and truly has a gift for working with children. Tammy was also very flexible in being able to do sessions at his daycare and our home. I would recommend her to anyone looking for help with feeding therapy.

Mrs. Tammy is a fantastic resource to the Oviedo community! From bike riding lessons, feeding therapy, social skills groups and more. She is very knowledgeable, kind and extremely patient. Her location at the Oviedo mall helps build community by providing a central place for other businesses to gather and provide services to Oviedo. I highly recommend Tammy and "Our Suite Village"!

Dr Greestein made a statement which was used in court that our 8 year old son was the worst case of ODD he has seen in the last 10 years after my ex-wife brought him our son for appointments following a referral from Dr Reich who had initially diagnosed our son as having ODD (Oppositional Defiant Disorder).

During the court fight that ensued between my ex-wife and I, I was able to get the Rice Psychology group to assess our son and they ultimately cleared him of ODD.

ODD is a fake psychological disorder that made its way into DSM-5 so crooks could offer 'treatment' for non-existing pathologies. Do not trust Dr Greestein.
We have been seeing Dr. Greenstein for several years.  He's been great for our family and he's excellent with our kids.
Best restaurant everüëπüëπüëπüëπüëπüëπüëπüëπüëπüëπüëπüë∫üë∫üë∫üë∫üë∫üë∫üë∫ü§°

provider_name: Tampa Bay Speech, Language & Reading Clinic
review_text:
After just one food therapy session, I was completely blown away by the progress my daughter made. She went from only eating about three different foods to suddenly asking to try new things‚Äîshe even requested a taco that same week! I was in shock (in the best way).

I truly can‚Äôt say enough good things about this place. From the very first phone call to every moment in therapy, the experience has been nothing short of amazing. The entire staff is so friendly, welcoming, and supportive‚Äîit immediately put us at ease. If you‚Äôre considering food therapy for your child, this is the place to go.

provider_name: Tampa Bay Speech, Language & Reading Clinic
review_text: I been going to Tampa Bay Speech with both my daughter and Son for the past 4 years. They're incredible. They communicate well and Zack at the front is always polite and ready to answer any problem in person or on the app. My daughter, who has apraxia, has graduated from their program and is thriving. She is excelling in school and her love for words and letters can definitely be credited to Tampa Bay Speech. My son who is typically shy and incredibly cautious of people who aren't his family run in and is excited to learn. He is doing amazing as well. Tampa bay speech has helped us with notes and evaluations to get insurance to cover his therapy. Although they don't submit insurance, I am able to get his sessions covered by submitting them myself (Anthem Blue Cross Blue Shield). I have recommended Tampa bay speech to several friends who's kids are currently attending and would recommend them to anyone looking for people who will love your kid and help them overcome their struggles.

provider_name: Tampa Bay Speech, Language & Reading Clinic
review_text: As a provider, I am always looking for high-quality services to recommend to my clients, and this office consistently meets expectations. I have heard from numerous parents about the remarkable progress their children have made. Julie and her teams' personalized, evidence-based methods not only enhance academic and language skills but also build confidence in their young clients.

provider_name: Tampa Bay Speech, Language & Reading Clinic
review_text: Amazing place for kiddos on the spectrum. Our little guy is taking speech and handwriting and is making so much progress! We couldn't be more happier taking our son here for the help he needs to strive! From the front desk to the back, everyone is so nice and so helpful. They take their time to listen to the parents! Definitely recommend this place!!

provider_name: Tampa Bay Speech, Language & Reading Clinic
review_text:
Julie and her team at Tampa Bay Speech are phenomenal! We originally brought our son to them years ago, when he was around 2-3 years old, because we noticed some speech delay. The entire team took the time to customize each lesson and make sure the environment was there for him to feel comfortable and learn each and every time. After working with him, he progressed amazingly and we were able to graduate him at that time.

Fast forward to him turning eight years old, we realized that he could benefit from some support around his handwriting and reading comprehension. We proactively reached out to Julie for an assessment, and she immediately was able to guide us in the direction of what could help. In fact, we thought he might need guidance in another area as well, but she assessed that he was on track for it, so we only needed to focus on the other items - another example (of many) of how great and honest Julie is to work with. Our son is now enrolled in lessons for both reading comprehension and handwriting, and I can't tell you the amount of progress he has made over the last couple of months. Moving into third grade after a very disruptive period of time with e-learning and COVID, these lessons have made things so much easier on his day to day, as he is understanding the content so much better, not getting frustrated with himself at the amount of time or energy it was previously taking him to complete tasks and his confidence has boosted tremendously. Julie and her team do an amazing job of identifying the true need, and tailoring the guidance and lessons to that. I have recommended this team to many over the years and will continue to do so! Thank you Tampa Bay Speech for being such a great part of our sons development over time!

This group is truly AMAZING and so in tune to the children and families they help serve. They are always quick to respond and happy to help answer questions or discuss any concerns. We met almost all our goals in just 6 months!!
Maria is such a a wonderful breath of fresh air helping to admin for the company, quick, and sweet. Donna was brilliant in helping to evaluate my son quickly and draft up a FULL and detailed treatment plan like no other specialist we have seen yet in the last 9 months. Judith was just such a joy to have running each weekly session. She was patient, always joyful, and quick to incorporate any pressing needs of the week. You will surely be cared for by this team!! 100% recommend!!

My sons have absolutely loved their time with each therapist at Tampa Choice. As a mother of children with Sunshine Health, it has been extremely difficult to find providers who are knowledgeable and child-centered. This is the place you have been searching for!

This place is everything and more. Maria from the beginning of the whole process and starting my daughter with speech and OT was so hassle free because of you, Maria. From the bottom of my heart thank you so much for everything you have done for my daughter and I , Specifically my daughter. The amount of compassion you have does not go unnoticed. The world needs more people like you, Maria. Ariel, you were a wonderful working with my daughter with OT. She absolutely adore you for that short. We were with you guys made such a long lasting impact. Thank you so much Ariel for what you have done for my daughter Emily, thank you so much for the progress. Mia made in the short period of time she worked with you. She absolutely loved you and couldn‚Äôt wait to see Miss Emily. Again thank you all from the bottom of my heart for everything you guys have done. We wish you we could bring you with us as we move, but I wish you all nothing but blessings and love in your futures.

My experience at Tampa Choice Therapy was nothing short of remarkable! Donna Kato was incredibly empathetic and kind, taking her time to truly listen to my concerns. She not only offered different options tailored to my needs but also explained in detail what each procedure does to the body, which made me feel very comfortable and informed.

I tried several treatments including myofascial cupping for back pain, microcurrent point stimulation acupuncture to ease pain from my recent gallbladder surgery that caused nerve damage, as well as kinesiology taping and instrument-assisted soft tissue mobilization. Each one provided noticeable relief, and I felt an immediate difference right after the session. By the next day, even people around me noticed how much better I was moving and feeling.

The pain relief lasted for about a week, which was amazing, and it gave me a wonderful alternative to relying on pain medication. I highly recommend Tampa Choice Therapy and Donna Kato to anyone looking for genuine, compassionate care and effective treatment.

Tampa Choice Therapy has been life-changing for our family . My son receives speech therapy, occupational therapy, and ABA therapy here, and the progress he has made is incredible. The therapists are not only highly skilled but also genuinely caring and dedicated. They have helped me learn how to be a better parent for my child and I couldn't imagine taking my son anywhere else.
It‚Äôs always been hard for me to trust anyone with my child, but I trust the team at Tampa Choice Therapy. They‚Äôve created a supportive and nurturing environment where my son thrives. They are patient and work with him at a pace that works for him. I've seen his growth and so have others. We both love all his therapists, and I‚Äôm so grateful for the positive impact they‚Äôve had on his life. I highly recommend Tampa Choice Therapy to any parent seeking compassionate and effective care for their child.

I cant say enough good things about Tampa Counseling and Wellness! I searched for a long time to find the right combination of Health care and professionals who understood Veterans hardships and the Mental health issues we face.   I highly recommend Dr. Garcia and Tampa Counseling and Wellness,   I could not have gotten the help I needed from the VA for my issues with out their help.  Since being seen by Dr. Garcia i now have the VA willing to give me all the care and assistance for my condition.  I would highly recommend Dr. Garcia and his team to all veterans that need assistance.

I have been seeing therapist Kathryn Arnold for several years now. She has really helped me rediscover my life after divorce. I cannot express enough how patient Kathryn has been navigating me through the dating world as well as helping me heal from past trauma. Therapy has truly been my lifeline throughout these last few years and I am so grateful to have found Kathryn.

Dr. Garcia is the most compassionate person I have ever met. He was always available for me and helped me work through a lot of depression and develop the person I wanted to be. Even today there are things that I remind myself of that he told me that there is no quick fix to undo years of life experience. Having similar backgrounds in the military I found it extremely easy to relate and open up to him about what was going on in my personal life and therefore better to see results. He was the first person who made me realize I was important and that someone cared. Definitely recommend!

Dr. Garcia is a doctor that is all about integrity both as a person and as a professional.  In the community, Dr. Garcia is widely known as a doctor that genuinely cares and listens to his patients.  He is also an amazing speaker that always captivates the audience.  This is certainly the person you must call when you need help.

Dr. Garcia is professional, caring and a strongly skilled psychologist. I refer to him whenever possible to make sure that potential clients are receiving excellent care. I highly recommend him for any of your mental and emotional health needs!

A necessity in South Tampa! We are so lucky to live so close to such an amazing facility. (The closest place that I have found that even comes close is an hour North.) Every one of the therapists we have worked with at Tampa Kids Therapy has been a gem. Hardworking, talented, outside of the box thinkers that are passionate and truly care about their clients. I appreciate the camp offerings and writing workshops as well as social skills groups tool! Every child should be so lucky to go here! Highly recommend!

I cannot say enough positive things about our family‚Äôs experience with Tampa Kids Therapy. Their entire team is knowledgeable, caring, and dedicated. Our child has made significant progress towards his developmental goals thanks to their team. Added bonus: he loves going to their clinic!

I can‚Äôt begin to express my gratitude for Tampa Kids Therapy. Lori and Paige are so knowledgeable , professional and passionate about their work. They both go above and beyond and are always willing to collaborate on ideas and communicate with our team of therapists and physicians. Thank you for continuing to make such a positive impact on our entire family.

Tampa Kids Therapy has been amazing for our family! The ot staff and behavioral therapists have given us invaluable suggestions. We are so grateful for the entire amazing team! Our family has seen such an impact in a short time. We have many more strategizes for calm parenting!

As a private speech therapist Tampa Kids Therapy is more than willing to collaborate on services, ideas and treatment with other therapists to find the best plan for every child! Really important to work together across settings to get the best outcome for success!

I have been working with Kara for about 2 months now and I highly recommend her. She is extremely easy to talk to and gives great advice and coping strategies. I feel she is looking out for my best interest. I leave every session feeling a weight has been lifted off my shoulders. I appreciate her patience and support in every session.

Kathy, ‚ÄúK‚Äù, is seriously the best. I have been going to her for 7 months now and I have seen more improvement than I ever have. There is no need to be nervous to start therapy here, especially with K. Her along with everyone else are so understanding, helpful, and really easy to talk to!

We are new to therapy as a couple but the team here has made it so simple especially for busy, working professionals. Grace has been absolutely amazing and has helped so much in a short amount of time. She is attentive, patient and keeps us on track. We highly recommend.

Tampa Therapy group has been phenomenal! I‚Äôve been seeing Kara for some time and couldn‚Äôt ask for a better therapist. She understands real life and the difficulties that come with it. She has a very calming way of helping through almost any situation while still being extremely realistic.

I‚Äôve been seeing Grace for about two months now for anxiety and depression, and I can honestly say she‚Äôs been amazing. She‚Äôs very calm, professional, and compassionate, and she always makes me feel truly understood when I‚Äôm trying to explain how I feel.

We recently started EMDRand it has already made a huge difference for me. Grace has a way of redirecting my focus‚Äînot just centering on the people or situations that make me anxious, but instead helping me explore my own feelings and giving me tools to change how I experience them. She challenges me to think about how I don‚Äôt have to stay stuck in feeling overwhelmed and anxious, and what it would feel like to instead feel peaceful and calm.

I really value her perspective and the way she gently pushes me to do the inner work while still making me feel supported. I‚Äôm so grateful I found her, and I highly recommend her to anyone looking for a thoughtful and effective therapist.

We had the best experience with Team SamIvy. Our rescue Beagle Jack was leash aggressive and we had trouble walking him without pulling and barking at any dog that came into his line of vision.  There was some skepticism as to whether virtual training would work for Jack, but we were open to the process once we had aloud consultation with Maribel. We were optimistic once the process was explained. Our assigned trainer was Gina. We couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better, more professional, patient and overall pleasant person to teach us how to interact with Jack. By the end of the first session we could see he understood commands. The lessons were an hour long and Jack did well. We did our ‚Äúhomework‚Äù every day and Jack was responding well to the process.  By the last session, Jack was doing so well we ended our session a little early. Gina made us feel comfortable and communication was great. Virtual training may have its critics and skeptics, but we are 100% believers in the this method of training. The cost, while pricey, was worth it. Jack is ‚Äúnew and improved‚Äù.

We cannot say enough great things about out experience with Sam Ivy Dog Training and especially our exceptional training, HOLLI. From the very first session, Holli impressed us with her deep knowledge of canine behavior, her clean and structures training approach, and her genuine passion for helping both the dog and their owners success.

Holli is not only highly skilled and professional- she's also incredibly hands on and intuitive.  She took the time to truly understand our dog's unique personality and challenges, and she tailored each session to meet our specific goals. Her ability to communicate complex training techniques in a simple, approachable way made the process smooth and enjoyable for everyone involved.

Thanks Holli and Sam Ivy. We saw real, lasting results in a matter of weeks. Adding on the service training at the end was like the cherry on top of the cake. Our dog is more confident, better behaved, and happier. SO are WE!!!! Her calm, confident demeanor and consistent follow through made all the difference. She is a true gem and an expert in her field. It is clear as day she genuinely cares about the success of every dog and owners she works with.

So happy to be apart of our journey and would recommend her to anyone that asks.

We are so grateful to have found Sam Ivy, and especially to our trainer, Gina! We were desperate for help with our two and half year old dog Ivy. She is one of the sweetest, smartest dogs, but we were having a hard time reigning in her working/herding dog instincts - especially once we brought a new puppy home. I had spent hours looking for dog trainers online, but none of them really seemed to meet our needs. I finally came across Sam Ivy and spent a lot of time researching them, and it felt like they could be the right fit. But it is a big investment, and my husband was very apprehensive. He reluctantly agreed to commit after our first consultation with Enzo... and six weeks later we are both confident that it was worth every penny. Ivy has come SO far in the six weeks since we began training. She is no longer in charge around here - we are! Our home is a much more peaceful place and we have the tools, knowledge, and confidence to be better dog owners for our whole pack. Gina was patient with me and all of my fears, she is so knowledgeable and caring, and she was keenly perceptive to the unique needs of Ivy. Being paired with her was truly an answer to a prayer! I know that the training we've done and the investment we made will have a positive impact in our lives, and our dogs lives, for many years to come! THANK YOU GINA AND SAM IVY!

My husband and I (first time dog owners) rescued Vino, a 6 month old female (half husky with some Staffordshire terrier, Pitbull, & Boston terrier) in May of this year. The only history we knew of was that the police were called to a house and they ended up confiscating 9 puppies and brought them into the shelter. Vino was terrified in the shelter and terrified when we brought her home. She would not leave her crate for the first two weeks, then once we moved her crate in our room she would hide under the bed (shaking) so we couldn't reach her. We decided to get a dog trainer because we weren't sure how to handle the situation. If we had an in person trainer, we knew Vino would not respond well to that because she was still so scared around us, so we looked around online and came across SamIvy. At first, I was a little skeptical of online dog training, but once we had the consultation with Sam, I knew it was the right decision. Right off the bat he answered so many of our questions, gave us recommendations, and reassured us that after the training program, Vino would be a completely different dog - and he was right! Our trainer, Treena, was INCREDIBLE!!!! She knew exactly how to help us train Vino in a way that built trust, yet still set boundaries. She answered all of our many questions and encouraged us, when at times, we felt like Vino's progress was plateauing. She helped us understand the mind of a dog and how best to tackle certain situations so that Vino's scaredness didn't turn into aggression later on. When we would practice commands with Vino, Treena would take the time to ensure we knew how to do the command properly before the end of the session. Treena's expertise, passion, attention to detail, and positive attitude, truly made all the difference in Vino's transformation. I would recommend SamIvy to ANYONE and EVERYONE! It is worth every penny. They have the program and structure down to a science, and as long as you put the time in with your dog, the results are truly unbelievable!!! Thank you SamIvy and thank you Treena!!!

Image 1 and 2 before SamIvy training - hiding places for sometimes 12 to 14 hours.

Images 3, 4, and 5 after SamIvy training - happy as can be, not scared or aggressive!

We have been working with Holli as our trainer for our reactive 4 year pittie mix rescue pup, Wesley, for the last few weeks and I am truly amazed at the results she has helped us to achieve. Wesley was always a sweet, loving dog at home but because of his reactivity and sheer strength, he was so stressful and frankly scary for me to walk. I never knew what might startle or trigger him and more than once, I was pulled to the ground as Wes lunged at a jogger or a cat. Because of Holli‚Äôs careful, smart and completely doable approach to training exactly these kinds of dogs , and their owners , in a matter of weeks, I have a calm, relaxed dog and I feel so much more confident and safe walking him. As a small woman in her 50s, I was really worried that I couldn‚Äôt keep either of us safe outside our house. I can‚Äôt express how grateful I am to Holli for showing me this was not our fate forever!

Lastly, we had a gathering at our house of multiple families and small children last weekend. Normally, we would board Wesley because he would just be too excitable and disruptive. We put into practice Holli‚Äôs strategies and all of us- including Wesley- were able to enjoy a fun and stress free time together. Thank you Sam Ivey and thank you Holli!

provider_name: Tender Care Centers, Inc. Fort Lauderdale PPEC
review_text: Such an amazing facility the staff treats you like family. From the first day I visited the location the nurses were so friendly and informative their main focus was to understand my child's needs. The facility is very clean and well organized after meeting with the staff and touring the toddlers room. I was able to go to work with a peace of mind that my child would be in great hands not to mention their transportation service makes my morning go very smooth.  I would refer any parent to the tender care family.

provider_name: Tender Care Centers, Inc. Fort Lauderdale PPEC
review_text: This daycare truly makes me feel like we are family. The owner goes out of his way to ensure my son recieves the best care possible. Anything we need or request they accommodate us immediately. I really cant say enough good things. All of his staff including maintenance remember my name and greet me with all smiles. I feel 100% comfortable trusting tender care with my baby. He is so happy when I pick him up. They spoil him just as I do at home. ‚ô•Ô∏èMommy

provider_name: Tender Care Centers, Inc. Fort Lauderdale PPEC
review_text:
Beyond impressed.
The love and expertise I have witnessed here is amazing. Rarely have I encountered this level of consistency and commitment observed in the nursing, respiratory and ancillary staff as well as with the incredible therapists I have seen here, and with regularity.
I recommend Tender Care without hesitation.
The staff clearly loves what they do, and they truly love these children.
This is comprehensive, intelligent, thorough, loving and meticulous care for children at its finest. Please tour this facility if you find yourself needing this type of care for a loved one and tell your colleagues. Tender Care raises the bar and represents superior childcare.
Their facility is the standard by which all others should be judged.

provider_name: Tender Care Centers, Inc. Fort Lauderdale PPEC
review_text: Tender car facility is a warm, nurturing and professional environment.  All the staff genuinely care for the children and offer a level of care and support that is unmatched in any other special needs care facility.  I am honored to have spent my clinical rotation at this facility and look forward to perhaps volunteering in the future.  Special shout out to Eric and Angel who go above and beyond for those kids each and every day.

provider_name: Tender Care Centers, Inc. Fort Lauderdale PPEC
review_text: I love working with the children of Tender Care and enjoy teaching them lots of fun things.  This facility is a very caring and enriching environment for children that require special care. The nursing staff not only provide excellent medical care but truly love these kids! I truly believe Tender Care is one of a kind...setup a tour and see for yourself! :)

We went to TCP for a year and a half and they never remembered who we were. Every concern we brought up was dismissed as normal. The staff does not care because they don‚Äôt have the time to get to know your child. The staff is rude and makes you feel like you‚Äôre bothering them by just being there. It seems like they‚Äôre too short staffed to care or clean. The waiting room is disgusting, they have two toys in the whole place and they‚Äôre covered in a layer of grime that‚Äôs past the point of scrubbing off. The exam rooms have hand and foot prints all over the walls that are always there, they never wipe off the exam tables just pull down the tissue paper like it‚Äôs clean. I wish we would have changed offices a long time ago due to the lack of care and compassion. The receptionist refuses to let you talk to the doctor about concerns during a well visit because they want you to pre pay and if you have a concern then she makes you pay for a
Sick visit.  If you have a question about vaccines there‚Äôs no education just a lot gas lighting. I was told by the receptionist to find a different office if we weren‚Äôt gonna comply and that was all over a question about delaying one vaccine after a reaction! There‚Äôs no education, no empathy just a lot of attitude. When I had concerns about his ears Dr.J just said they were normal. They were in fact impacted with wax which we found out after changing pediatricians.  Our other concerns were taken serious at our new pediatrician, we were educated and set up with a game plan. I never felt taken care of at TCP and I am so glad to be done with this unprofessional and disgusting cesspool of an office. If you are a first time parent I would definitely pick a different office where they take their time to educate and help your baby instead of dismissing you.

Tender care Pediatrics has been caring for all 5 of my kids. They are wonderful, very attentive to details or any concerns I have. Being listened to and taken seriously was something very important to me. The nurses are so sweet and kind to my girls and remember them by their faces which makes them light up every time they walk in.
Dr. Gamez is a good doctor. My children have seen him for years with no issues. He‚Äôs always helpful and does everything to make sure our concerns are fully addressed.

My kids have been going here since 2021, and I absolutely love everyone in this office. I can't single out just one person they're all so caring and professional. The staff always makes sure my children are comfortable, and the wait time is never long. We‚Äôve always had a great experience!

I‚Äôve been coming here for over 6 years! I absolutely love it here ! It‚Äôs like family the staff has been there as long as I‚Äôve been coming so the rapport has been built without the concern of high turnover especially in the medical field. They know my children names and personality so it makes it easier for them to feel comfortable when coming for a visit. We had to move about an hour away and I refuse to find another pediatrician because of the relationship we‚Äôve built with the Doctors and staff!They are open late 6pm to accommodate parents and work schedules, virtual visits was offered as needed , even last minute appointments are offered. Thank you Tender Care Pediatrics for always having us..

I had the best experience after my auto accident with all the lovely people at Terlep Chiropractic. I often find myself missing my adjustments and PT exercises‚Ä¶ truly an experience like no other! Thank you to everyone for taking such great care of me following my accident. 10/10 recommend üëèüèº

I have only been to two physical therapy sessions, but I love all the staff at this facility. They are amazing caring people. They know what they‚Äôre doing and they have amazing bedside manner. If you need Physical Therapy look no further this place is the place to go to!

This office was reccomended to me by numerous people so I decided to try them out for some repair and relief. Best decision I could have made. They have awards all over the office for best in class care. Their facility is always sparkling clean and with pleasant scent. The staff is always polite, mannered, up beat, cheerful, and positive. The providers do a thorough job and make sure to evaluate everything as a team to ensure that you get the best possible care plan. They also have on site physical therapy, massage therapy, and hydro massage beds. You can't go wrong by choosing Terlep. I will definitely recommend to anyone that I hear is experiencing pain, discomfort, or may have been in an accident and needs to get checked. AAAAA+++++

If you are injured, please make an appointment with Vitality!  My recovery is moving right along, thanks to this wonderful staff - their guidance and expertise.  The atmosphere is welcoming, caring, and clean.  You won‚Äôt find a better place.

I came to Terlep Chiropractic because of neck pain that was getting worse and worse. The X-rays showed bone spurs and barely a curve in my c-spine. After my first adjustment with Dr. Bennington, I felt such relief and more range of motion. The second adjustment was even better. My neck, my back, and my hips are in alignment. I'm so happy to have come here and found this relief. Dr. Bennington is extremely knowledgeable and professional. I appreciate him and everyone at Terlep Chiropractic. Everybody there is so friendly. Thank you to all!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Ace Dog Boarding! We left our Dalmatian, Zorro, and our mini Dachshund, Kato, for 6 days and they had the time of their lives. The staff truly made it feel like a vacation for them instead of just boarding. They got two full days of pond time in the artificial pond, splashing, swimming, and playing‚Äîit was their absolute favorite part!

Every single day we got photo updates that showed them happy, safe, and having fun, which gave us so much peace of mind while we were away. The team was also quick to answer any questions we had, which made the whole experience stress-free for us as owners.

When we picked them up, they were not only happy and relaxed, but also freshly bathed and sporting the cutest little bandanas. That extra touch really showed how much care and attention Ace puts into every detail.

It‚Äôs hard to find a place where you feel 100% confident leaving your pets, but Ace Dog Boarding absolutely earned our trust. Zorro and Kato will definitely be back, and I‚Äôd recommend this place to anyone who wants their pups treated like family while they‚Äôre away.

I cannot recommend Ace Dog Training enough! They are by far the best boarding facility around. Charlie has the best time - when I go on vacation, he gets vacation too! I appreciate that they only let out one dog at a time (I think if dogs are in same family, they let out together) - Charlie doesn't always do well in the typical dog daycare environment. I can tell they genuinely adore Charlie - and the feeling is mutual. He is excited to go to boarding and sad to come home. I live in downtown WPB but find the drive worth it given the exceptional service and accommodations. All of the staff are so kind. I highly recommend "pond time" if you are boarding for multiple days- Charlie loves it. If my words aren't enough, check out a few of the pictures I've received from the team while boarding- Charlie's joy in his face and sheer excitement says it all!!

Incredible facility and property. The owner was incredibly nice and welcoming and gave us a full run down for our first time there. We rented the pond area with the dock for an hour and our girl was in heaven. Super clean and secure, with places to relax and enjoy the time with your dog. Well definitely be back!

Immediate results for an anxious, barky dog
Debra at Ace Dog Training is fantastic. My dog was anxious and would bark nonstop; she showed me how to be the calm, confident ‚Äúalpha‚Äù he needed, with simple techniques that made sense to him. I saw improvement after just one visit. No upselling‚Äîshe even said I didn‚Äôt need a package of lessons. Professional, honest, and truly dog-centered. Highly recommend.

We have been working with Debra for about 6 months and beyond grateful that we found her.
We have 2 rescues from Big Dog Ranch and we love them so much!  We have worked with 2 others trainers locally starting with puppy classes but were only making minimal progress.  This was so frustrating.   We have had labs & Golden‚Äôs and we‚Äôre used to their demeanor.  These 2 boys are very different.
Debra and her staff are beyond amazing!   Patient, teaching us so much and our dogs love her (including the incredibly timid one who was abused). .

Training and loving our dogs and beyond patient with us.  If you‚Äôre looking for help with your dog, call her. I actually would give her a 10 star rating

So blessed to have crossed paths with the Alfano Center. My son‚Äôs speech has improved dramatically after starting with Blanca. She‚Äôs so patient with him but also instills structure into their sessions. She always keeps me updated on his progress and ways we can be improving at home. Both her and the owner have gone to great lengths to help my son in every way possible and accommodate to his needs. Thank you guys for all you‚Äôve done!

With brand new cochlear implants and a job with a VERY unique, highly specialized, listening environment, I sent out a ton of emails requesting AVT... inside the waterfall at a local, notoriously frigid, public pool. Alliete was up for the adventure, exceeded all expectations, and made it possible to continue doing my job effectively. For our next awesome adventure... bug hunting in the woods! Seriously. Alfano Center is wonderful, creative, and person-focused. Can't say enough positive things.

THE MOST TERRIBLE TERRIBLE SERVICE YOU CAN EVER RECEIVE! MY 3 YR OLD SON WAS VERBALLY MISTREATED BY SHIRLEY SHE IS THE MOST INHUMANE PERSON THAT CAN EVER EXIST! CORNERING MY KID FOR ONE HOUR TRYING TO GET HIM TO SAY A WORD.  SHE HAS NO BEDSIDE MANNERS NOR PATIENCE!!!!! DO NOT GO TO THIS PLACE. MY SON SAT IN A CORNER SCREAMING HIS LUNGS OUT AND DID NOT THINK ABOUT GIVING HIM A BREAK. SHE CONSTANTLY SCREAMED AT HIM GIVING HIM TASKS THE WRONG WAY. NOT PROFESSIONAL AT ALL! I WILL CONTINUE TO FIGHT UNTIL I GET MY WORD ACCROSS. SHE SHOULD NOT BE WORKING WITH KIDS. THERE IS VIDEO FOOTAGE OF ALL OF THIS. DISGUSTING INHUMANE PERSON.

My son has received therapy services at this center for years, and I wouldn't know where to begin to highlight THE FANTASTIC WORK they do. From confirming appointments daily with punctuality and good treatment, to therapists with the highest professional and human qualities (and great sensitivity and vocation), EVERYTHING at this center works perfectly. If you need to coordinate or change something, Mar√≠a Teresa helps you with all the love and professionalism in the world, but also with that feeling of familiarity and trust that only comes from talking to a friend or someone who truly cares about you and your son. Having searched for a good therapy center for a long time, arriving here is a welcome respite from so many places with poor service or where money is prioritized over people. One detail worth noting is that nothing changed after the start of the pandemic. Alfano Center has continued to offer its services via teletherapy with the same punctuality and quality as in-person services. Simply a place you'll never want to leave. Thank you for EVERYTHING.
Above all, very professional, super good service, I recommend it 100%. My daughter has made a lot of progress since I took her there.

This is the BEST vet in town!! The whole team are the kindest, most gentle folks I've had the pleasure of knowing. They've seen us through several emergency procedures and I trust them inherently. Take your pets here--you'll be glad you did!

If you want a great vet and a wonderful staff go to the Animal clinic of St Pete. My little dog can become a crazy dog at time's but they handle her wonderfully it's amazing. Great place!! Highly recommended

Dr stamp Don and Kim are wonderful. I've been taking my four cats and dog there for 2 years since I moved to St Petersburg and could not be happier. Dr stamp is one of the kindest most gentle veterinarians I've ever encountered

Best vet experience I‚Äôve ever had.

What impressed us most was how Dr. Dana first took the time to befriend Ruby, then treated her with gentle yet highly effective methods. She even recommended simple home treatments, showing us how to apply them ourselves, with no financial gain to her, just genuine care. The hour-long drive to the practice was absolutely worth it. Thanks to Dr. Dana, Ruby is happily walking on all four legs again!

I was happy that she found some of her issues and was able to adjust her. I didn't feel rushed and I appreciate the education. I enjoyed the experience and look forward to continuing with Pumpkin's journey.

This is a doctor who cares about her patients human kind and the furry ones too! provider_name: The Bark Stop‚Ñ¢Ô∏è Force Free, Reward Based Puppy & Dog Training
review_text: Joe and The Bark Stop have gone way above my expectations. I recently became a father to a cute, sassy puppy, and I was worried I wouldn't be able to train her properly. He recommended everything I needed from snacks to training equipment, daily food, and lifestyle changes. My little Myla clicked so well with him! His advice and endless resources for any type of situation have been extremely valuable, and I recommend him to anyone who is looking to get their puppy/doggy trained.

provider_name: The Bark Stop‚Ñ¢Ô∏è Force Free, Reward Based Puppy & Dog Training
review_text: Joe and The Bark Stop are absolutely AMAZING! He gave us the knowledge and tools needed to train our 8 week old puppy (Winnie) the right way. She is now 6 months old and is a dream dog. If you want what‚Äôs best for your dog, hire Joe for dog training. You will not be disappointed and you will be investing in having a perfect canine companion. Thanks so much for everything Joe!

review_text: Joe was great! He was very patient with both me and my dog (turns out half of dog training is owner training). review_text:

review_text:

review_text: I highly recommend Rachel as a speech therapist for your child! She is incredibly patient, compassionate, and skilled at building rapport with kids. She creates a positive, engaging environment that helps kids feel comfortable and excited to participate in therapy. Parents will appreciate her clear communication and dedication to progress. I've seen noticeable improvements in my child's speech and confidence since working with Rachel, and I‚Äôm confident others will have the same positive experience.

provider_name: The Blue Door Holistic Therapy & Lactation
review_text: We can‚Äôt thank Rachel enough for all the help she‚Äôs given our son at The Blue Door! She made every session fun and engaging, and we saw his confidence and speech improve quickly. Rachel is so patient and really knows how to connect with kids. We‚Äôre so grateful for the progress he‚Äôs made thanks to her, and we‚Äôd highly recommend her to anyone looking for a great speech therapist!

provider_name: The Blue Door Holistic Therapy & Lactation
review_text:

provider_name: The Blue Door Holistic Therapy & Lactation
review_text: Rachel Bender was the speech therapist that worked with my son for a bit of some time, I just want to say that she is wonderful with the children, she was very patient and thorough with my son during the span of time they worked together. Best therapy center , if you have a children diagnosed with autism this is the place to take your child , because they help to improve skills so that your child can be as independent as possible. Great therapist and a really lovely environment.

I high recommend The Body Mechanics.  I've had a lot of physical therapy, and found Janelle better than the others. She truly cares and is very knowledgeable.  Janelle is very knowledgeable, and she tailors  workouts to your specific needs. She doesn't just give you an exercise and go off to help someone else.  You have her individual attention and she stays with you to make to make sure you do each exercise correction with correct posture for the maximum benefit. I saw her for neck, back and hip problems which are much improved.  Thank you Janelle for all your help.

Thank you Janelle and Kim for assisting me with my shoulder injury. You designed a tailored plan that outlined the proper exercises to have optimal health and functionality of my shoulder.

You both were so encouraging, knowledgeable,  and helpful and in sync to ensure that you listened to my goals, designed a treatment plan that was specific to my injury, and shared helpful tips during my sessions.

Today I graduated, and will miss working with you both. But I know that I can continue to use the skills that you provided to manage the pain with my bone spur, prior injury of torn muscle, and prayerfully live pain free!

I highly recommend the Body Mechanics to anyone who needs physical therapy, as you will be welcomed and treated as family as they design a treatment plan that is right for any injury!!

Blessings, Maria Emigh

I did NOT have a good experience with Janelle at Body Mechanics Physical Therapy. On multiple occasions she belittled my anxiety. She also interjected her political opinions during our therapy sessions, which made me uncomfortable. During the 'active range of motion' phase of my surgical protocol she prescribed an inappropriate resisted exercise that resulted in injury. When my wife addressed this issue with her, Janelle responded with hostility and criticized her for even raising the concern. I no longer felt my health and safety were in her best interest. Janelle's refusal to take responsibility, along with her dismissive behavior, broke my trust in her as a healthcare provider.
Janelle and Kim are incredible! Their stretching and strengthening routines resolved my muscle/nerve issue and I am back to running again! Thank you two!

Dr. Janelle Biele does amazing work! She is professional, courteous and she knows her stuff. I have had multiple injuries to both of my shoulders that could have required surgery but Dr. Janelle worked with me for months until I could move again.  and not be in pain. I am pain free today and I am grateful for her expertise in her field. If you have any physical pain,  I recommend you call today and make an appointment. She will help you feel better!

Alana is such a professional owner that she guided us on how to take care of horses as she gave us a lot of useful information. We love this place‚ù§Ô∏è

We've been taking our daughter to this horseback riding stables since she was 5 and it's always a blast. The staff is super friendly and makes us feel right at home. They let us brush and feed the horses, which is cool and teaches our daughter how to be responsible. The people there really know their stuff and help us become better riders. Overall, we love this place and highly recommend it to anyone who wants to have fun riding horses.

We have been at this barn for 5 years. We would never go anywhere else. My daughter has learned so much about not just being a good rider but about overall good horsemanship. Alana does not just put you on top of a horse. You learn how to groom and care for the horse as well as learning how to ride. Over the years, I have seen people from ages 5 to 75 lesson here. Emma Whillains, the trainer that Alana partners with for those persons who want to be competitive riders and show horses, is an amazing trainer as well. We love the British Barn!

My children enjoyed summer camp there. There is a laid back feel to this camp where your kids get to really learn about horse safety and have hands on fun. The owner is very sweet with the children and give them responsibilities throughout the day with the horses. They get to spend time inside doing arts and crafts and swimming in the pool as well.

I have been bringing my dog Sierra to Alana for about three years now. She came highly recommended to me at the dog park I go to. The dogs there have run of the house and  farm. I travel for months at a time and I know Sierra is in very good hands with Alana. I always miss Sierra when I go, but it it warms me to know she is having a good time the whole time she is there.

I board my dog here every time i go out of town and most recently when I gave birth to our baby. 10/10 could not recommend these guys enough. They are so caring and attentive. The love they feel for my dog literally radiates!!!!

Long story short, we had Paisley board and train with Emily for 3 weeks, and she came back a new dog. She went from being borderline uncontrollable on the leash, to walking with no leash. It is really incredible.

TLDR: Emily is incredible and I would recommend her 110%

I‚Äôm so happy to give these 5 stars. I brought charlie as a puppy to see Emily at Confident Canine. I was immediately impressed. The facility is like no other. Audra and Lamar are excellent, I was just a drop-in with no appointment and they spent lots of time educating me about the different IV services available and how I can improve my health. What a great resource to have. I am happy I stopped by!

Had the absolute pleasure of getting IV therapy here today, and wow ‚Äî what a fantastic experience! The owner, Audra, was there in person, shared her story, and instantly put me at ease. Easy to find, quick service, and my IV was placed so smoothly I barely felt a thing. They offer a great variety of drips with clear, no-pressure explanations to help you choose exactly what you need. The space is spotless, quiet, and comfortable ‚Äî whether you want a plush chair or a lounge.

Absolutely loved my experience at The DripBar Largo. Lamar and Audra were amazing, so friendly, professional, and really knowledgeable. They made the whole process super easy and comfortable.
