I‚Äôve only done therapy in high school and had a good therapist but from what I seen so far here at Thriveworks‚Ä¶ I literally cried on the appointment setup phone call, I don‚Äôt remember the lady‚Äôs name but she was super sweet and welcoming.  Miss Yates is absolutely amazing and is my counselor, she‚Äôs always telling me to reach out to her if I need her on hard days. I‚Äôve never had that before and it‚Äôs kinda a weird feeling lol but it just goes to show therapist or not there‚Äôs still people out there that care enough to handle someone‚Äôs mental issues when they can‚Äôt do it on their own and not feel like they‚Äôre being a burden üò≠ü´∂üèª I‚Äôm forever using Thriveworks until the end of time!! Thank you Thriveworks for having such an amazing team of people that actually care!!it‚Äôs so hard to find that nowadays.

Honestly amazing! I‚Äôm not sure if I can include their names but Anna Maria has been awesome!
I feel completely comfortable speaking to her.
Also my psychiatrist has been great too!

I can say it‚Äôs not so simple finding a therapist. You have to feel comfortable and be able to build a rapport. Sometimes you just don‚Äôt vibe with that person. I‚Äôve had my share of trying to find the right therapist also for my child. ( it wasn‚Äôt the right fit)
Since meeting Anna I have been so much more communicative. I really enjoy being able to express my feelings but actually be heard and understood.
Empathy goes a long way.

Ty Anna!! ü´∂

What can I say‚ÄîPatrice Glenn is truly exceptional! I absolutely love working with her. She‚Äôs not only highly knowledgeable in the field of mental health, but also deeply rooted in the Word of God. It‚Äôs incredibly refreshing to speak with someone who can both relate to your experiences and offer wise, sound counsel aligned with your faith and values. I genuinely look forward to our weekly sessions, and she has made a tremendous impact on how I manage daily stress and navigate life overall. I‚Äôm truly grateful for her guidance and support!

Joe Mella is amazing! He has a remarkable ability to observe and make accurate, thoughtful comments about me and my partner ‚Äî often picking up on things we hadn‚Äôt even articulated ourselves. His insights have already helped us better understand our dynamics. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a therapist who is direct, perceptive, and grounded.
My therapist Ms. Amanda is amazing. She gives you opportunity to explain your story, your emotions, and then walks you through processing them. I would recommend her!

I have only had 2 sessions so far with my counselor(Korrie Watson), so that's why 4 stars. But im sure as time goes on, she will get 5 stars.
I was worried with my Christian beliefs that it would be hard to find someone but she's been awesome so far. I really like how I can have the sessions virtually in the comfort of my home or on my back porch. Makes it easy with my chronic health problems and not always being able to drive. I really hope I'm able to continue these sessions and get the weight and anxiousness off my shoulders. Its also a plus that I can just vent to someone who isn't biased to whatever or whoever I may be venting about. I would definitely recommend my counselor Korrie Watson. Or even giving a coordinator a chance to set you up with someone, it worked for me, so far!

Apparently she likes to over-talk her clients instead of listening like a good therapist,
My husband's experience with this woman was horrendously chaotic.
He told her that she seems very confrontational and she agreed that she gets that a lot.
Clearly not understanding how unprofessional that is.
And for $300 he didn't get the evaluation he was looking for.
Most people that are seeking mental health help are in control of what they need out of their mental health services this woman just wanted to control the situation.
And of course prescribed medication.
I believe zero stars but you got to leave at least one star to get the comment to display,

Advice for someone looking for online therapy try better help.

You will get better help on a sliding scale!

Jacklyn is a very caring and understanding since I‚Äôve been going to her. She‚Äôs helped me dramatically. I‚Äôm blessed to have her as my therapist. Sincerely Paul Mormando. I look forward every week to speaking with her
She was amazing. I felt very comfortable from the beginning. Shes professional and knowledgeable. It was really really centering to find someone who cares, in the medical field. Thank you

I am absolutely appalled at my experience with Thriveworks. Due to a change in insurance, I was seeking a new psychiatrist to prescribe my usual medications that I have been taking and have worked wonderfully for me. I was unfortunate enough to have seen Salacia Cunningham. There is one medication that I have been taking for 25 years that she refused to prescribe to me. This is not a controlled or addictive substance and actually quite a common medication. Salacia told me that she didn't feel comfortable prescribing my usual dose of this medication. She wrongfully stated that this is a medication that  is used on patients at state hospitals. I am in the mental health field and that could not be furthest from the truth. Like I said it is quite common. This medication gave me my life back and for 25 years I have not had any issues with any psychiatrists prescribing this for me. I think it's dangerous and irresponsible to tell a patient to stop taking a medication that improved my life for many many years. Even more dangerous is quitting this medication cold turkey or reducing the medication to a very low dose. Now that she did not prescribe it, I may experience symptoms such as dizziness, chills, insomnia, vomiting, anxiety, depression and SUICIDAL THOUGHTS!  This is the most dangerous and irresponsible thing that a healthcare provider can do to someone. If any of these symptoms materialize I will be contacting an attorney. Salicia has no business being in this field. I want my money back!
Jacklyn is a wonderful therapist, caring and understanding gives me great advice, listens without judgment. I‚Äôm grateful to have her as my therapist. Thank you.

I went to meet my therapist and  the door was locked and the lights off. I got there 10 minutes prior my appointment,  knocked on the door  and waited for about half-hour to see if she was going to show up. Nothing.
A funny thing is that if i miss my appointment I will have to pay $135. Will her pay me $135 for not showing up?

I feel for the couples counseling an assessment of individual personality type should had been addressed firstly to get a better idea of they type of individual you will be dealing with once they try to explain thier part of the story. I feel like jumping into it and just putting a label on what the therapist assumes what the issue right away is not helpful at all. Because a person's character saids alot when they are speaking about thier partner. And the therapist should remain neutral not say he is right or she is right immediately because it makes the person automatically feel like they got the upper hand on proving the partner was right n just creates an uneasy feeling. Also if a therapist has not experienced any sort of real abuse patterns themselves it will be extremely difficult to relate and understand.

Absolutely loving working with Ginger!  My man and I (17 yr. Relationship) are in couples counseling with her.   After our first session I found out more about what is in my man's brain than I could in the last 3 yrs. !!!!  We both have a different aura around us since beginning therapy.   Ginger is easy to talk to and is practical and understanding.   She doesn't hold back and is unbiased.   She tells both of us like it is and identifies the parts that need to be addressed.   Looking forward to the journey we take with her guidance to repair our relationship.

My therapist is compassionate, knowledgeable and professional. She has gone out of her way to meet my needs.
I am a senior, and I have seen a number of therapists over my lifetime. The therapist I see at Thriveworks is the best by far.

Terrible first experience. No show bo call for our clinician. Do email follow up no heads up. And this was an important first appointment. Hope this was a one time thing. I will not be back for a second chance.

I felt very comfortable,  except GPS gave me wrong directions.  I feel that she can really help me with my problems!
I just am in too big of a hurry, to get started.  Ha.Ha!

I can't wait until my next visit. Mu

Dr. Liz is friendly and easy to talk to.
She tweaked my meds and had/has me feeling better within a week.
The sessions are comfortable because you are in your home online.
I highly recommend Thriveworks...and Dr. Liz.

Update [8/21/2025]:
I‚Äôm lowering my review of Thriveworks to 1 star. After my initial feedback, I was asked what I expected from my session, only to be told they regretted I was unsatisfied. This came after I had to follow up a second time to get a reply. The response I eventually received was cold, dismissive, and took no accountability.

The question they asked served no purpose other than to restate what they had already said, without any effort to resolve the issue. Don‚Äôt waste my time if you don‚Äôt intend to make up for a poorly executed program.

I was willing to leave my review at 2 stars, but after wasting more time with unhelpful back-and-forth emails, I feel forced to drop Thriveworks to 1 star. I would strongly advise against using them until they improve their system and provide customers with genuine transparency and accountability.

[Original Review]:
Liz, the nurse practitioner, was polite and professional, but the session felt like a waste of time due to the poor transparency in onboarding. I was told I would be offered pharmaceutical treatment, but the specific options were never explained until after I had scheduled and attended the session. This approach feels misleading, as if the priority is booking a session before disclosing the limited treatment options. Overall, my experience with Thriveworks has been subpar and could benefit from clearer communication upfront.

Kesha has truly been a blessing to us. As someone who has been in couples counseling with her, I can honestly say she creates such a safe and welcoming space for open communication and deep self-reflection. She has a way of being honest and direct, but still incredibly kind and uplifting. Kesha doesn‚Äôt just help guide conversations between partners she also encourages you to take a deeper look at yourself and how your own experiences may be impacting the way you show up in your relationship. If you‚Äôre looking for a therapist who will lovingly challenge you while helping you grow both individually and together, I highly recommend her.

I love Juanita.
Down to earth and knows her stuff.
Very easy to talk to and explains what you dont understand. Very patient as well

Joe is absolutely incredible! He has such a natural way of holding space for both partners to share while offering thoughtful, valuable insight that truly moves the conversation forward. He struck the perfect balance between listening and guiding, and every session felt productive and safe. He was so effective that we actually wrapped up our session bundle earlier than expected ‚Äî a true testament to how impactful his work is. Beyond being an excellent therapist, Joe is just a kind, empathetic human being to the core. We couldn‚Äôt recommend him more highly!

I consider it a positive experience. We just met, so the focus was intake, getting to know each other, my background, and expectations. Hallie was approachable, made me feel, welcome, friendly, attentive to my needs and  questions. Provided encouraging answers, and even share some things that we have in common. That helped me a lot, as I felt understood. I'm looking forward to seeing her next week

My wife and I have been working with Joe and the experience has been nothing short of transformative. From the beginning, he created a safe, nonjudgmental space where we could be honest, vulnerable, and heard.

Joe has helped us improve our communication, understand one another on a deeper level, and begin the healing process from past hurt. What we appreciate most is how balanced and intentional each session feels ‚Äî not one-sided, but centered on growth for both of us individually and together as a couple.

If you‚Äôre looking for a compassionate, skilled therapist who genuinely cares and helps you do the real work, we highly recommend Joe Mella.

I've been seeing Joe Mella for a few months now and he is great! He takes the time to listen and fully understand your situation and what you're going through, providing meaningful insights and digging deeper into the core of what brought you here in the first place. I never really expected my situation to change much, but he helped me gain some perspective, realize ways to improve my situation, build better habits, and value myself. He's knowledgeable and has a lot of good information to share. Highly recommend for anyone on the fence about therapy, you owe it to yourself to give it a solid try. Thanks, Joe!

Joe Mella is incredible at what he does üôè! He has a gift for telling the truth in a way that is digestible, wise and humorous all at once. Thank you to Joe for helping me and my husband reach a new height in our relationship. He is truly a God- send.

OMG this company financial department is a joke ai have been waiting for a refund since January and tomorrow is June 1st. I would never recommendüòî, please do not get me wrong Therapist and counselor were fantastic but the management and financial department poorly professional. Please see all the details below:
1st: I contacted my insurance and Thriveworks in a conference call to make sure coverage was provided.
2nd: After confirming coverage and only having a co pay of 15 dollars I receive a bill for selfpay consultation when I was already confirmed to be covered by my insurance.
3rd: Please note my daughter and I are under the same policy and we receive same coverage and hers was 15 dollars but for myself they were charging me the complete consultation, when I saw the charge I contacted the customer services and aparently my insurance information was logged incorrectly.
4th: After talking to customer service they resubmit my bill to insurance and insurance paid. Instead of refunding my money after receiving payment I had to call multiple time to claim reimbursement. I have been calling and was informed I was going to received my US$155.00 between since May 9th, between 7 to14 day.
5th:Today 5/30/25 I called  to follow up because I have not receive my money back and they reportwd me that because is more than 90 days they can't reimburse the money to my card and they need to send me a paper check that takes between 2 to 4 week to be processü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è when I request to speak with a supervisor or manager I was denied because they did not have the time aparently to take my call.
I requested my payment to be expedite  because of the long way and aparently that is not possible.
This was a very poor customer support not even try to compensate all the time waiting for my reimbursement and no even taking the moment to answer my call from supervisor.
I would not recomend this place because whatever you try to resolve in therapy, the financial or manager will screw you up.
Rosana Guadalupe has been Professional and informative.  She has saved my marriage.  Highly recommend.  Punctual and kind.
I am learning so much about myself and how to take care of me first. Incredibly knowledgeable therapist. I recommend this experience with everyone.

Was misleading when informed at time of booking that my insurance was accepted. Just recieved a bill 6 months later for over $700, because they state they do not do pre-authorizations, it's Up to the patient. What a scam! BUYER BEWARE
Laura has been helping me not only improve my life I‚Äôm feeling like I‚Äôm on my way to be not just surviving but Thriving no pun intended but if it helps that ok.
My wife had a most unfortunate experience with Anzola Wiggins. She spoke over her and was not listening to anything she had to say. We have major concerns.
Julouse Etienne was very kind and understanding. I truly enjoy speaking with her today! I haven't had a smile on in weeks and she brought one out while speaking to her. Very much recommend!!!
Excellent. Time well spent.  Dr Wiggins was very professional  and very helpful.

Updating my review because I was eventually contacted and the fees were waived. Still disappointed it took a nasty online review and several attempts to reach out on my part to rectify.

Original review:
I would leave zero stars. First, they want to charge me $140 after missing an appointment because I had to take my daughter to the ER. At the next meeting, I waited for 15 minutes for the counselor to show up. She no-showed. I immediately sent screen captures of myself in the meeting room waiting, dated and time stamped, to customer support. The next morning, I get an email from my counselor that I missed the session and they're charging ME $140 for missing another meeting?! I am willing to update my review and continue service if, and only if, both charges are reversed.

I tried booking an appointment with these guys. They scheduled me an appointment out of Michigan. I call to get them to fix the issue and to schedule a different appointment. I'm supposed to get a call back when their "issue with the system" is fixed. I don't get a call back. I call the next day, and the woman on the phone has the nerve to start to get upset with me over where the appointment is scheduled, WHEN SOMEONE FROM HER TEAM SCHEDULED THE APPOINTMENT. I was distressed setting up my account and wanted the first available therapist. I did not expect them to be in MICHIGAN. When I finally do get an appointment for a therapist, it lasts for ten minutes. I am honest about having suicidal thoughts, and my therapist informs me that I can't do telehealth because of this. it's against their policy. The therapy session was immediately ended, what a joke. Nobody had let me know about this despite me bringing up Ptsd multiple times.

If you're looking for therapy in tallahassee please consider going anywhere else. These guys are going to actively deny you help.

Absolutely horrible experience for my daughter. Her therapist seemed drugged and hardly spoke at all. She was extremely dry and awkward and spent the first half of the visit typing every word that was said, and then said she ended her sessions 15 minutes early so she could take notes. She had my 14 year old daughter playing Trouble (board game) and the tension in the room was so unbelievably uncomfortable. So so disappointed in our experience with Thriveworks.

My experience with miss Ninna and thrive works has been great she takes great care and pride in my case listening and giving professional advise that helps improve my quality of life.. I love working with her because when everyone else kind of just put me on the back burner she did not she took on my case and not only listened but helped me thank you Miss Nina and thrive works

I find that the guidance I am receiving from Denise to be invaluable! I am trying to work through difficulties that seemed insurmountable, but with her advice I am finding a way to move forward. I am eternally grateful! Thank you!
Excellent mental health care provided by Nina who is very caring and engaging. Thank you for helping bring the light back into my life.

reviewer_name: GOD IS GOOD All THE TIME
review_text: I'm beyond humble  to have Angela as my therapist .I've seen other  therapists before but never met anyone like my therapist at Thriveworks..she is  exceptional... She is super smart and caring. I'm blessed to have her as my therapist .

provider_name: Thriveworks Counseling & Psychiatry West Palm Beach
review_text: Please don't give Thriveworks your credit card #. They rip people off. Be careful. provider_name: Thriveworks Counseling & Psychiatry West Palm Beach
review_text:
I wish I could give this place a zero. I never had a chance to even step one foot inside the office on my first visit before my appointment was canceled and charged $150. while I was on the phone with one of their receptionist after numerous attempts to get the proper address, as for the address that is listed online for west palm office took me to Embassy suite hotel. After numerous attempts to get in touch with them, someone picked up the phone. I clearly explained to her that I have a nine o‚Äôclock appointment and the address that is listed online for west palm beach office took me to embassy hotel and wanted to know if this was the proper address because I didn‚Äôt see any suite number
She said that she would have to look into my chart and I was asked several questions about my daughter and myself to verify that it was the right account. Again, I said to her just tell me if this is the place because I don‚Äôt want to miss my appointment. She put me on hold and said she would google map the address. Just for her to came back on the phone to tell me that I would need to reschedule because it was now 15 minutes past my appointment. All I needed was the proper address and she never tell me the address after pleading with her for it because according to her she had to go through all my information, questions before giving out the address. And now they want to charge me $150 for no show. Imagine my first time appointment with them. First, first, first. this place is a scam, Stay away.

provider_name: Thriveworks Counseling & Psychiatry West Palm Beach
review_text: Both Therapists are very knowledgeable and kind and they take the time to clarify issues that I can struggle with.

provider_name: Thriveworks Counseling & Psychiatry West Palm Beach
review_text: These people are ridiculous. My sister in law is sick and cannot make her appointment 36 hours from now. Because it was not cancelled 48 hours in advance, they are charging us for the session. $135. I asked to speak to the supervisor, who couldn‚Äôt give me his full name. Joe D, is the person in charge. He should not be in this position. We will be taking our business elsewhere. These people are not in any position to be in the ‚Äúhelping field.‚Äù

provider_name: Thriveworks Counseling & Psychiatry West Palm Beach
review_text: My first experience with Thriveworks was an excellent one! The registration and appointment process was shockingly easy and painless. The facility is located in a building shared with a large chain hotel and was a bit tricky to find but I asked the front desk at the hotel and they told me how to find it. The office is small but nice and I was impressed that it had a full coffee/tea/beverage bar available in the lobby. The therapist was understanding, patient, kind and went out her way to accommodate me, even though I made an error with the way the appointment was made. The first session was supposed to be just for intake, but it turned out to be a great kickoff as well. I am confident that I chose the right facility and the right person to help me and my family. Enthusiastic 5 stars!

provider_name: Thriving Joy Pediatric Therapy - Feeding, Lactation, & Speech
review_text: My son was struggling with speech. After identifying that he needed tubes in his ears, his daycare recommended Jaime for speech and he's been seeing her twice a week over the last year. When he started working with Jaime, he was only saying a handful of words. Fast forward to today and he is full of language and able to communicate effectively. Jaime has become a trusted source and texts often to provide me with updates. I trust her opinion and am able to continually check in on his progress and speak to her about concerns. I also happen to adore her social media account. I highly recommend her!

provider_name: Thriving Joy Pediatric Therapy - Feeding, Lactation, & Speech
review_text: So thankful for Jaime and Stephanie! My daughter has been doing therapy with Thriving Joy for a year now, and Jaime has been fundamental in helping my daughter seek the help and services she needs. With her, we have been able to establish an amazing team of therapists and doctors for my daughter and have seen so much progress thus far!  Stephanie has really helped establish her go to the next level in terms of vocializing my daughter's needs with the help of visual aids, AAC, etc. That really has made a difference. She also goes above and beyond to figure out the type of learning my daughter does best with. So appreciated of them both for all their help and hard work!üíú

provider_name: Thriving Joy Pediatric Therapy - Feeding, Lactation, & Speech
review_text: My daughter has selective mutism, which you don't see too often. We had her with a speech therapist,  but pulled her therr, and found Jaime and Stephanie. Stephanie comes in twice a week to her preschool to help her with communicating and talking in social environments like school. We've only had a few sessions, but I am so glad we were able to have Hazel work with her. She is so nice, even when I text her a million times a week,  always gives me updates on what happened during session, what they worked on, and she even rearranged her schedule so she could come into school twice a week vs once a week. So thankful for the communication and kindness towards us.

provider_name: Thriving Joy Pediatric Therapy - Feeding, Lactation, & Speech
review_text: Our experience with thriving joy has been exceptional! Jaime started seeing my little boy for a speech delay and the progress we saw even in the first few weeks was amazing! She would keep us updated after each session letting us know what they worked on, how they worked on developing his speech and what she recommend we practice with him at home to keep us involved! She also had the sessions at my son‚Äôs daycare, which made it so easy for us! Definitely recommend!

provider_name: Thriving Joy Pediatric Therapy - Feeding, Lactation, & Speech
review_text: My son has had speech therapy in the past and didn't make much progress. We learned more in his very first session with Miss Stephanie at Thriving Joy than we had in 6 months with his previous therapist.  I am blown away with how effectively Stephanie is able to teach him while still making it fun! We love Thriving Joy!

Several months I had the good fortune of speaking to one of my neighbors about an amazing dog trainer she had used who had skills that ended up training both myself and my slightly aggressive rescue pup to be a much better dog and owner.  Within weeks of working with Summit my pup Stevie was a much better mannered dog.  His methods make any dog he works with change their behavior in a calm way.  If you are looking for a dog trainer who will work with both you and your pooch for the solution to any obedience issue call him.

Summit and Shyann have been so amazing with our dog. We reached out to Tidal K9 for dog training for my girl Kuddles. We were so nervous putting our trust in a boarding school. However, when we met Summit, we can instantly tell that he was going to be a great trainer for our girl Kuddles. When Summit came to our house for a first time visit, he was so kind, patient and knowledge. Kuddles LOVES going to Tidal K9 and playing with all of her doggy friends. Kuddles has grown so much and has finally found her confidence, thanks to Summit and Shyann.

Summit is so great with dogs. Our dog, Milo, loves going to Tidal K9.  Today, when I got his bag of dogfood to take, he got so excited because he knew he would see all his dog buddies!  Milo came to us as a rescue, totally untrained.  Summit trained him so quickly!  We get compliments on Milo‚Äôs  good behavior.

Shyann and Summit have been ANGELS through this whole experience. My dog Brock is currently in bootcamp with them but i just have to post a review two weeks in. To start off Brock is 6 years old. They say you cant teach an old dog new trick but this is not the case for his trainers. I am disabled so walking Brock became very hard for me as he would run off and be reactive. He doesn‚Äôt do that anymore. Not only Shyann and Summit are training Brock but also training ME. Which is AMAZING. These people know what they are doing. Brock is still learning but i gotta say in two weeks he has been doing so good. I will update this review as time goes and i have a feeling it will only get better.
UPDATE: Brock has graduated his first month and if i could give Shyann and Summit a million stars i would!!!! He is back home with me and such a changed dog for the better. He is so well behaved.

I can not say enough good things about Summit and his team!   Our English Bull Terrier, Vader, has been going to Tidal K9 since about 12 weeks old.   If you know anything about Bull Terrier‚Äôs they can be a handful!   We were at wits end!    Vader is a total different dog since the training with Tidal K9.  Summit has become such an important part of our lives!  We have found not only an amazing trainer but an extension of our family!   If you are considering training, daycare or boarding look NO FURTHER!

My cat became ill over the weekend. Monday morning I called for an appointment. As a new client the staff worked me in with no wait time at arrival. The front desk staff were polite and helpful. Dr. Layton and techs were very knowledgeable and caring. Dr. Layton preformed a thorough exam on Daisy May and answered all my questions. I highly recommend Timberlane Pet Hospital.

We recently moved to Plant City from Tennessee and our longtime vet. Everyone here at Dr. Layton's practice have been great and made us and our dogs feel right at home. Very happy we found Timberlane Pet Hospital for our new vet. Highly recommend.

Great staff and they care deeply about the animals they treat. Our two boxers loved the cheese wiz lol Marissa is awesome, she helped us get checked in and she also recommended Timberlane to me. I'm glad she did, they rock!
Efficient and friendly. Made my baby feel safe and at ease. The entire staff was great. Christy instilled trust with both me and my dog with her knowledge and approach.
Great and knowledgeable staff. Been going there over 20 years. Dr. Layton is amazing. I also use the doggie day care and boarding. I highly recommend them for all your pets needsüêæüêæüêæüêæüêæ

Time2Thrive has really helped my child, Silas, in so many different ways.  He has learned so much and has just so many more skills thanks to Ms. Kristin!  He loves it there and looks forward to going every single time!  Definitely recommend Time2Thrive for anyone needing occupational therapy.
Amazing!!! Understanding, supportive and great. We have seen Ms. Kristin for years and love the support and flexibility. She listens to things we need help with and is very knowledgable.

Kristen is our son's Occupational therapist and she is great. We definitely see a huge improvement on his behavior. He is able to focus more on task, does not get agitated as quickly as he used to, and when he does he is able to center himself and come back to the task. Highly recommended.

My nonverbal four-year-old child attends this wonderful therapy. I cannot thank them enough for all the hard work that they do for my child.

My 10 year old is learning not just how to ride but horse care and riding equipment application. She loves Tina and the two horses, Beamer & Chance, she has ridden so far. I highly recommend Tina's Equine Services for anyone interested in learning all encompassing horseback riding & care.

My daughter has been taking weekly lessons with Tina for a few months now. Tina is great with my 8 year old daughter. The horses and farm are well taken care of and is always neat and tidy. I really appreciate the patience and thoroughness that Tina has while teaching my daughter about riding and horse care. I have already recommended her to another family. Thanks Miss Tina!

I am amazed at both the care for the animals and the orderly nature of this incredible facility.  I may actually get over my fear and get on a horse.  Thank you Tina for your patience.  I will be joining you on a trail ride eventually!

Amazing place to be! The horses are well mannered and the business owner is amazing! She provides you with her full attention, making sure you are educated, safe and having fun. My daughter benefits and enjoys the experience immensely!!!!

Fantastic place for horse riding lessons.   I have two of my girls taking lessons there.  Tina has amazing patience, and a real connection with the kids and horses.  My girls talk about nothing but horse riding lessons all week.   Great property as well, with goats, chickens, ducks and fun for my youngest while we watched.  Highly recommended!

provider_name: To Your Health and Wellness, LLC
review_text: Jen is absolutely wonderful! She‚Äôs always just a phone call or text away whenever I need her, and she responds with kindness and genuine care. provider_name: To Your Health and Wellness, LLC
review_text: Started as an HRT patient. Dr. Jennifer was so thorough and easy to talk to.  I was so pleased with how attentive she and the staff were that I decided to become one of her Primary Care Patients as well.   I don‚Äôt feel like just a number anymore.

The perfect family dentist! I have personally had my teeth cleaned there and then also brought my children there as well.

Having my teeth cleaned after a many year lapse was such a good experience. They were attentive, informative, and friendly! The office felt clean and inviting! They were willing to answer my questions and I didn‚Äôt ever feel rushed.

I then took my children there which was also a wonderful experience. The hygienist made it fun for them and informative in a way that they would understand. Each tool was shown to them and explained in simple terms before they used it. My son was highly impressed by the ‚Äúvacuum‚Äù when she gave a demonstration prior to using it in his mouth. My daughter was nervous so they took it easy with her and went at her pace. They were cautious to make sure they kept it a good experience for her even if that only meant counting a couple teeth. We walked out and my son was already asking when he could go back! Dr. Toland was also great with the kids and was personable.

Also to add, every phone call with them has been so positive and they‚Äôre so friendly!! Highly suggest taking your whole family there.

I had an outstanding experience at Toland Dental with Dr. Toland for my recent cleaning! From the moment I walked in, the staff was incredibly welcoming and efficient, making the whole visit stress-free. Dr. Toland was thorough and took the time to explain everything clearly, ensuring I felt comfortable throughout. The office is spotless and equipped with the latest technology, which made the cleaning quick and painless. I‚Äôve never left a dental appointment feeling so refreshed and informed. Highly recommend Dr. Toland and the team 5 stars all the way!
Have always had a great experience with Toland Dental. Punctuality and quality of care is great. Staff and dog alike are fantastic, would and recommended for anyone looking for a new office

I can‚Äôt recommend Dr. Toland enough!  He is an excellent dentist and takes care of my teeth and whatever they need.  The office is wonderful especially Dr Piper. Colorful and happy paintings in that office. Beach theme. Debra is a wonderful hygienist. Olivia is very professional and Cindy is fun. Very positive experience.

I‚Äôm very pleased with their service everyone is friendly and attentive to your needs make you feel comfortable! The dentist did a great job in filling my tooth he made me feel comfortable and at ease!

Have an awesome opportunity to meet a group of people that are really changing things for the community especially our youth thank you for allowing me the opportunity to volunteer and help make this site even better.

They do amazing work over here and don't get enough credit. The calming effect of being around animals and caring for them can really make a difference for people. The work they do at TR is important.
This place is amazing. They focus on the children. Also offering services for the parents. Anybody you could ever say a bad thing about them obviously has some type of issue

I have had an extremely negative experience with this organization as I found them to be highly unprofessional not to mention unethical how they handle working with clients. Wonderful place doing amazing things for the local community. The owner and staff are well knowledgeable and do such a good job helping families who are grieving the loss of loved ones.

Hands down, Jay with Top Training is an exceptional dog trainer! He worked with my puppy Roo and did an amazing job teaching him all the basic commands and then some. If you're looking for a trainer who truly cares about your pet, look no further than Jay. Highly recommend!"

Working with Jay has been great! He helped us better train our toy poodle, Gizmo, by giving us the tools and resources we needed to be better at actually training him. We‚Äôre happy with the results we‚Äôve seen so far and look forward to building on that with further training. We would highly recommend Jay to anyone looking for a personalized approach to training your dog.

Our experience with Jay was amazing!  Training was done in our home which made the training more personalized for our puppies needs!  We were able to adjust our training needs based on Theodore‚Äôs behaviors!  Jay listened to our concerns and was able to give us excellent tips that best suited Theodore!  We saw results in our puppy overnight!  Thanks Jay for all your guidance!

Jay has been an incredible trainer for my puppy, Belle. Over the past couple of months, she has become so well-behaved thanks to his guidance. During our sessions, we worked on a variety of commands, and Jay did an excellent job teaching me how to train her‚Äîsomething that was both crucial and incredibly helpful. He made the process fun and enjoyable, and it was such a joy to watch Belle make consistent progress each week. I can‚Äôt recommend Jay highly enough‚Äîwe‚Äôre truly grateful we chose him to help us with our baby!

I‚Äôd highly recommend Jay of Top Dog Training! He trained our 4-month old cavalier. He has been coming to our house to work with us and our dog and the results have been amazing. The training sessions are clear, effective, precise and tailored to our needs, and I love that everything is happening in our real home.  He is very patient and knowledgeable and only use positive reinforcement during training. He follows up with us and gave us tips on how to better take care of our dog and how to reinforce the commands that were taught during the training sessions. Our puppy is always excited to see him. Thank you for your patience and expertise in training our dog.

Kenny and his team at Top Notch is great! I did training sessions to with Kenny and my minor son did athletic training. Kenny is very knowledgeable and personable. He offers flexibility with scheduling and a variety of exercise options to achieve your goals. I highly recommend Top Notch Training!

Coach Kennedy is the best around, bar none. His ability to add fun into hard workouts is amazing. My 7yo son has been going to him every week for 6 months getting ready for football. Anyone who has a 7yo boy knows they can can tuff sometimes. Coach Kenny always finds a way a way to keep him motivated! Highly Highly recommend!

This program is truly life-changing! It goes beyond just physical workouts by incorporating mental well-being, helping me build confidence and resilience along the way. The workouts are challenging yet tailored to my needs, and I‚Äôve seen incredible progress in my strength and endurance. A huge shoutout to Kenny‚Äîhis expertise, motivation, and personalized approach make all the difference. If you‚Äôre looking for a results-driven program with an outstanding trainer, this is the one! Highly recommend!

Kenny has been a great fitness coach for my 12 year old son. Not only is he a good coach  he connects with his clients to make them feel comfortable and motivated to get the best out of them. My son always looks forward to going.

Kenny is very professional, very fun , knows exactly how to motivate & give the perfect workout . The bible was incorporated into our group work out with 20 of us. And i love the prayer before  & after working out. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

I really enjoy coming to this facility. The staff is super friendly, knowledgeable, and professional. Scheduling is really flexible, which is great when classes or work gets hectic. Thank you Total Health Care of Florida team.!!! Godbless your team and the healing services that you provide.

I really enjoy coming to this facility. The staff is very friendly, knowledgeable, and professional. The appointments are extremely flexible and I never had any issues changing times if I needed. Excellent service, great stuff. They are not only professionals but great spirit and wonderful atmosphere. All the girls and doctors make you feel like at home!!. After my accident. I have only improved and I‚Äôm healing little by little with their help.
Thank you Total Health Care of Florida  team.!!!

Dr Michael crohn is the coolest chiropractor I have been too. Makes me laugh and had a great vibe in the room every time. Always leave with a smile on my face and less pain. I would recommend him and this office if your looking for friendly staff and Drs.

Dating with Intention truly changed my life. It gave me the confidence to show up fully as myself and the clarity to define my boundaries and non-negotiables. Although no program can promise that your next first date will be your last, this one provides an invaluable roadmap for meaningful growth and guidance to find connection or love with purpose, patience, and self-respect.

My therapist is outstanding and goes beyond her established responsibilities and I‚Äôm forever grateful. Jeanette Urena is extremely skilled at her job as well as passionate and knowledgeable. I would recommend her over and over to anyone who is in need of support nd guidance in their journey to healing and mental wellbeing.
My therapist, Jeanette is amazing. It is easy to talk to her and I like having the ability to reach out to her whenever I need something.

I have had Angela Prather as a therapist for about a year now, and Dr. John as a financial advisor and the two of them have truly changed my life for the better. The advice and guidance I have received is honest and true, but still respectful and caring. Highly recommend them if you want to change your life around for the better

Total Health is an outstanding organization with helpful staff and affordable fees. Having Jermesa as my counselor was an uplifting and enjoyable experience, She understood the issues I faced dealing with alcohol and was patient and caring. She guided and encouraged my continuing efforts with recovery.

provider_name: Total Life Counseling Center Southwest Orland Counseling Services
review_text: Jim and the wonderful team at Total Life Counseling Center have changed my son's life. He started the high school social skills classes this year and within weeks he was making new friends at school left and right. His confidence grew and grew, his independence soared, and he's learned so many valuable social and conversation skills. Jim's laid back, natural style is very effective in helping kids with social skills deficits in a way that is fun and inclusive. Each class has a general theme, but generally it is the only social skills class I have ever been able to find that works with kids in a natural, "as it happens" kind of way. Every other social skills class I have researched was always a set number of sessions with a specific outline. This class is ongoing, pay as you go, come when you can and we love it. The added bonus is that my son is also making friends with all the kids in social skills class. We have gotten together for group outings and now us parents are becoming friends too! We have met some really wonderful people through this group, and it has been so fun and refreshing to get together and discuss with other parents what you've been through, what you've tried, what's worked, what hasn't and generally just be able to finally realize that we are not alone. All the things we thought we were the only ones that were experiencing? All these different trials and turbulations having a kid on the spectrum? Well, finds out we're not alone! In fact, at one event, I nearly spit soda out my nose I was laughing so hard when we realized that we've all been through the same crazy things. My son recently started his first job and we made sure to let Jim and his team know that we understand that they have played a big role in making this happen for him. I wouldn't have believed it if someone would have told me that my son would be working nearly full-time hours this summer in a job he loves, making friends at work, school and social skills class, having the confidence and independence to do all these things - on his own. It is truly remarkable, and we owe a lot of it to Jim and the team at Total Life Counseling Center.

provider_name: Total Life Counseling Center Southwest Orland Counseling Services
review_text: Jim West has been great. We took our son to him for an evaluation, and he was able to get him interacting right away. Jim seems to have a gift for helping kids, and getting through to them. He also gave us, as parents different tools, and techniques to use when communicating with our son. It‚Äôs always better when the whole family works together, rather than just put all the responsibility on the child. We would recommend Jim West for any family therapy.

provider_name: Total Life Counseling Center Southwest Orland Counseling Services
review_text:
Jim and his team have been a God send! Our son has been cared for and built up for the last two years and boy has he grown!

I recommend Jim and his Total Life Counseling team for all your needs, from overcoming ADHD, social skill needs, anger management, autism, etc.

I pray for their continued success in helping those in need! Blessings to you all!

provider_name: Total Life Counseling Center Southwest Orland Counseling Services
review_text: We've been taking our son here for a while now and it's really helping. He's a complex kid with a lot of thoughts and emotions. Jim has done a great job creating a relationship with him. He's doing so much better emotionally and behaviorally. His communication skills have really improved as well! Jim has also helped us understand him and find the best ways to communicate with him effectively. Our son is getting better and so are we. We have no plans to stop anytime soon and we are incredibly thankful!

provider_name: Total Life Counseling Center Southwest Orland Counseling Services
review_text: Valerie is a great counselor. She made me feel comfortable and relaxed during the exams. I was a little nervous and concerned about the results. I had been looking for some help for a long time. She was able to give me a good evaluation and put me on the path to improving my life. Her insight and attention to details helped me learn more about myself and how I can deal better with problems and others. Thank you.

I had an outstanding experience at Total MD and highly recommend their services. From the moment I walked in, the front desk staff was welcoming and efficient, making the entire process smooth. The urgent care team provided excellent, timely treatment, and the physical therapy and chiropractic care I received was top-notch. Every step of the way, I felt supported and well cared for. The staff is professional, knowledgeable, and truly dedicated to patient well-being. I am grateful for the exceptional care and would definitely return for any future needs. Highly recommend Total MD!

I came for an appointment today and had the best experience. Jessica, Alex, and Alexis greeted me professionally and friendly. Brenda and Katherine were great MAS and assisted me with professionalism. I definitely recommend total MD cypress creek.

Total MD was absolutely amazing! They were efficient, friendly, and the entire team worked together seamlessly. I truly appreciated the professionalism and teamwork‚Äîeverything ran so smoothly. 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for great care and service!

Had a great experience ladies in the front office were more than pleasant loved them  . All of them need raises. . Alexandra was above exceptions and I really  enjoy  my visits . If you‚Äôre looking for good quality and great customer service this is the spot for you .

I‚Äôve been coming to Total MD for physical therapy, and I‚Äôve had the pleasure of interacting with almost every staff member at the facility. I can confidently say that every experience has been outstanding, especially when compared to other places I‚Äôve been. From the front desk team to the physical therapists, chiropractor, and even the MRI and X-ray technicians, every individual has been welcoming, knowledgeable, and truly committed to my care. The team works seamlessly together to ensure that every visit is smooth, efficient, and personalized to my needs. I always leave feeling better than when I arrived. If you‚Äôre looking for a medical facility where you‚Äôre treated with care and respect, I highly recommend Total MD, Cypress Creek.

provider_name: Total Mental Wellness - Integrative Psychiatry - Fort Lauderdale
review_text: I've coordinated care with Dr. La Noce, and I can understand why her patients adore her! She is an absolute joy to work with as a colleague, and her clients have so much trust in her. Knowledgeable, kind, compassionate, goes above and beyond for her patients. I'm looking forward to working with her more in the future.

provider_name: Total Mental Wellness - Integrative Psychiatry - Fort Lauderdale
review_text: My experience with my therapist Elvan has been absolutely amazing!!!  She listens and gives great advice!  She helped me dealing with the passing of my mother.  I look forward to seeing her!!!!

provider_name: Total Mental Wellness - Integrative Psychiatry - Fort Lauderdale
review_text: Front Desk was wonderful but I did not have the best experience with Dr. Ashlee Amparan DO.  I had a child psychiatrist who treated me for years who was retiring and recommended for me to seek new physician. I had an initial visit with Dr. Ashlee Amparan DO. Unfortunately, upon my explanation of my prior trauma and diagnosis,  she immediately told me that my prior psychiatrist's diagnosis made 15 years earlier was wrong (Bipolar disorder) and that it was impossible for me to have bipolar if my manic symptoms did not last more than 7 days. I explained that I have gone through both medication treatment and talk therapies for over 15 years to address my diagnosis that has been proven effective which is why unlike most people I have a support group and have trained myself to note the symptoms before I spiral past a 3 day mark. She said well she just graduated medical school and per her textbook it has to be 7 days. At this point I realized it didn't matter to her what my prior treating physician said or what I said, that she thought I was self diagnosing. I just asked her what can she do to help me currently in my depression and she recommended an anti-seizure medication. I took her prescription called me old doctor who immediately told me to find another psychiatrist and not to take the medication she prescribed.  Maybe she is great with other patients but I had a bad experience.

provider_name: Total Mental Wellness - Integrative Psychiatry - Fort Lauderdale
review_text: My NP Jermilla Augustin has been supportive, understanding, and very thorough with me. It‚Äôs such a great thing when the psychiatry team helps their patient in a way that feels safe; never feeling uncertain or doubtful.

provider_name: Total Mental Wellness - Integrative Psychiatry - Fort Lauderdale
review_text: Decent psychiatry, but communication is lacking. I have had multiple issues with a lack of communication with the office and practitioners. From showing up to an appointment where the acupuncturist didn‚Äôt show up and everyone was working from home, to requesting a call from my doctor for three weeks to respond to a concern regarding my new medication. The services themselves when they happen have been pretty decent, though I did choose this practice for the integrative services they advertise and never received any integrative treatment, just regular psychiatric prescriptions. I have chosen to no longer use this provider.

Hoang is a very talented and thorough practitioner! He is unlike any other chiropractor I have ever seen. He goes above and beyond.He will make it better, I Guarantee. Plus, there are many other options to pamper yourself and feel great -that you can use while you wait or after you see Hoang. You cannot beat his price either.

my husband has been in discomfort for months. Went to an ortho that recommended Celebrex, which made another matter a mess. Thank goodness, my husband is open minded to seek total recovery his help and now he‚Äôs pain-free his hip, his back, swelling of his ankle it‚Äôs amazing.!!!

My husband went there on a patients referral and on the first visit my husband felt so much better, a brief evaluation and he got to work, next day I went with the rest of the family and he gave us a tour of the facility and treated us with so much kindness and friendlyness it didn't even feel like a chiropractord office I will recommend this office to everyone I know. It's worth every minute your in there. Thank u so much. By the way Charlie was a beauty ‚ò∫Ô∏è

I have seen Hoang at TRC For a month due to arthritis in my knee that got more inflamed after meniscus surgery.  Prior to coming here, I felt kind of doomed, like there was nothing that would help me. Slowly but surely I have built confidence in the treatment I have received from Hoang.  He has expanded upon my knee to other issues after my 60 years on the planet, from habits of my bad posture that have caught up to me.  I give Hoang and his staff at TRC a five star rating.  Thank you Hoang!

Hoang is good at adjusting and helping random pains, but he also does so by touching inappropriate parts of body, and for some reason has to go under the clothes to do so. I would not recommend for females especially young females.

Total therapy is the best therapy company by far. I was referred to them thru early steps and boy am I glad we were placed together. The staff is nothing but friendly and curious. My son is immune deficient and they were very good about respecting our wishes. My son was first assigned to Aeryn who is the most understanding, respectful and loving individual I have had the pleasure of meeting. We communicated beautiful very responsive to my concerns and most of all amazing at getting my son to warm up to her. Then  when she went on maternity leave it was such a smooth transition to Mrs Jenny. Another amazing individual she knew exactly what my son needed and how to get him to respond and cooperate a majority of the time. My son has trouble with new people and change but they both handled it like pros. They were always available to discuss any concerns or questions I may have had. Total therapy is amazing and they have a rock solid crew that is amazing and love what they do. It really shows that they do what they love and love what they do. If I ever had to recommend someone it would definitely be them.

Highly recommend! Total Therapy has provided my daughter with exceptional physical therapy care for the past 6 months. We had previously attended Johns Hopkins All Children's for PT (3 months) but were disappointed with the services considering the bill rate of $238/30 minutes. Total Therapy's  PTs (Whitney specifically) pushed my daughter to excel and we have seen amazing results; her gross motor skills have progressed exponentially!  Not to mention, they really do love the children and it feels like a family environment every time we attend.

My family had the pleasure of working with the Staff of Total Therapy through Early Steps, and I have to say, I wouldn‚Äôt have traded one second. We met Marlena, my sons speech therapist in January and we‚Äôre blessed with 10 months of love and and dedication to his development! At the beginning of our time together my two year old could speak less than a hand full of words, had a small amount of comprehension of phrases and seemed a little disconnected. As any parent would, I prayed for his development, not knowing what I was doing wrong, nor what difficulties he was facing, that I didn‚Äôt have the knowledge to tackle. From day one, with the vast knowledge Marlena translated effortlessly to us, my sons development exploded. It has been an emotional rollercoaster to say the least, as we never want anything but the best for our children, and to see it unfold before your eyes, so quickly was overwhelming in the best of ways. As Covid ran aggressively through the US only 3 months after our therapy started, I panicked at the thought of losing any part of what we had already built, and if I can speak as honestly as possible, Marlena fought through the changes beautifully and continued to do her thing, reporting tools as clearly and effectively even though our work continued only through screen time. I plead to any parent with a child either expected to be on the spectrum, or maybe just a few steps behind, call Early Steps, call Total Therapy, ask for Marlena, you won‚Äôt be disappointed. My bright eyed 3 year old can now sing more than 20 songs, can identify more than 20 animals along with what sounds they make, counts to 20 on his own, knows his ABCs, is saying 2 and 3 word phrases, responds to his name, will follow direction, it makes me emotional just writing this. Thank you Total Therapy for blessing us with Marlena, you have changed Bryce‚Äôs life forever, therefore you have changed mine, we are forever in debt to you! Love, a blessed Mama.

Total therapy employs professional, knowledgeable and friendly therapist who have a genuine concern for your child‚Äôs wellbeing and therapeutic growth. We have used them for a year and a half and are amazed at the progress our daughter has made.
Best PT ever! Friendly, professional staff. I highly recommend Total Therapy!

As a new patient I've had an excellent experience with this practice. This is where my primary care doctor Mary Butler, is located. She is amazing at explaining information. She is so patient and friendly and attentive. There is little wait and the office staff is friendly. BTW the office is quite beautiful and tranquil with large rose quartz throughout - Holistic and welcoming.

This was the worst experience ever. The chiropractor even asked me to remove my shirt. In just four minutes, he stretched my back and said I was fine. I had to wait a week to be seen. It wasn‚Äôt worth the $15 copay.

In my private sections, my chiropractor use to compare the highness of my rips, legs. It is all about a perfect adjustment because one vertebra up, may have unadjusted anything dow.

The way he did. This guy, doesn‚Äôt like his job.

Total Vitality is great! I was recently injured in a car accident and was referred here‚Äîand I‚Äôm glad I was. From the start, I received a thorough examination, quick scheduling for follow-up appointments, and consistent communication throughout my care. The staff is upbeat, professional, and well-coordinated, which made the entire experience smooth and reassuring. Overall, a great experience and highly recommended.

My husband and I have been with Total Vitality Group for over 6 years for our primary care and chiropractic needs. Excellent team! We‚Äôve always felt that they really listen and care for our needs. It‚Äôs always a positive experience.

I bring my friend here. She's very high on these people at this place. She's been trying to get back pain taken care of for months now and she says they do an excellent job there, for the first time in years she has relief.

We went for horses back riding. Was a great time,  the staff was nice and the horses were very well behaved. The trail was enjoyable, a 1 hour ride through the park.

Had my son and me ride in 2009 with u guys great experience. My son is 23 yrs old now. Great experience I live directly behind your stables at townhouse complex.. I walk my daughter's dog and frequently see you guys riding. Might book a reservation soon before October see u soon
Nice park, wasn‚Äôt very crowded the weekend we visited as the train and horse rides were closed. The children‚Äôs playground is very basic.

This is one of the most memorable experiences in my life! I would strongly recommend anyone who likes nature and animals to visit! The 1-hour guided horse trail riding is amazing! It is not like those commercial horses riding places. The park is very peaceful and not crowded at all even on the weekends. The horse riding experience was fantastic. Visit the Broward County website and follow the instructions to book! PS no photos and videos are allowed during the horse riding but you can do it briefly after the ride.

Transitions Recovery Program in Miami didn‚Äôt just help me get sober it gave me a life beyond my wildest dreams. I walked in lost, broken, and unsure if real change was even possible. What I found was a deeply compassionate and structured environment that not only supported my recovery, but challenged me to grow in ways I never thought I could.

The staff is incredible many of them are in recovery themselves, so they get it. They met me where I was without judgment, but also didn‚Äôt let me stay stuck in old patterns. The clinical team, the group sessions, the one-on-one therapy, and even the everyday accountability they all played a part in reshaping how I saw myself and the world around me.

What really sets Transitions apart is that they don‚Äôt just focus on staying sober they teach you how to build a meaningful, fulfilling life in recovery. They helped me reconnect with who I really am, helped me process trauma, build healthier relationships, and most importantly, believe in myself again.

I‚Äôll never be able to fully put into words how grateful I am for this place. Transitions helped me reclaim my life and then some. If you‚Äôre struggling, if you‚Äôre feeling hopeless, please know that change is possible. This program showed me that.

My experience at Transitions was a positive one. The staff was helpful and courteous.  The techs really make the difference Abraham the Housing Director was great & should be applauded for the techs he hired especially Will, Talia, Rob, Austin, Art and Janet. I would highly recommend giving this place a try.  The new Clinical Director, John was amazing therapist to me while I was there together with Nitza. My favorite group leader was hands down Dr. K. & Kitty. Thank you Transitions Family for all you‚Äôve done for me. God Bless.
Very great program, if you want to better your life, get on track mentally and physically, here is the place to go. Abraham is the best. Mark my words!!

My experience at Transitions was exceptional. The staff is truly one of a kind- the techs, the therapists, the facilitators, the case manager, the director, the clinical director- they are all amazing and truly care about every client and go above and beyond for everyone. I am so grateful for this place and everyone here and can‚Äôt say enough good things about it. It is life changing.

Transitions have saved my life,after other programs I was skeptical of coming to this recovery program. The clinical staff as well as Technicians are great. Intense groups that not only focus on the solutions to substance problems but also the underlying issues that cause one to pick up substances in the first place! Here there is always an open door policy.The residence is clean and comfortable with a staff that will make your transition a great experience.

I cannot recommend Trauma and Counseling Solutions. My experience with Chelie Byerly was marked by poor communication, hidden billing practices, and abrupt denial of care. Despite having a valid payment method on file and never receiving regular billing statements, my appointment was suddenly cancelled for a minor outstanding balance‚Äîwithout warning or clear policy shown to me in any paperwork. When I questioned these practices and asked for transparency, my emails were labeled ‚Äòabusive‚Äô and ‚Äòhostile,‚Äô even though I never threatened anyone or used inappropriate language. Instead of addressing my concerns or providing documentation, the provider terminated services and threatened me with legal language for sharing my negative experience.

Patients deserve honesty, consistency, and clear billing‚Äînot to be punished for asking fair questions about their care. If you value transparency and ethical treatment, look elsewhere.

I cannot tell you how much I adore Carrie. I am so thankful I found this practice and found her. She has changed my life, relationship, and brain. I know I still have a long way to go but she truly gave me the faith and confidence that things can get better and the inner work is worth it. Thank you so much, Carrie.

I have been trying to set up an appointment for 3 WEEKS now and still don‚Äôt have an appointment scheduled. I am in (dire) need of EMDR therapy and made that known, and this is the only place near me that offers this service and accepts my insurance. My current therapist sent me the names of a couple therapists at this office and said that ‚Äútexting/email is better than calling.‚Äù I emailed Jamie, who responded 3 days later (it was a weekend tho so I understood) and she told me she had availability the first week in July and said I could set something up and feel free to ask questions. So, I emailed her back - with questions - and never heard back. I gave it a couple more days, sent another email and STILL didn‚Äôt hear back. I then texted Chelie, after getting the hint that Jamie didn‚Äôt want to help me, and again, didn‚Äôt hear back for a few days. When she did text me back, she told me Jamie and an intern are the only 2 therapists who offer EMDR. Since Jamie had the most experience, I tried texting her this time, but had the same experience as when I emailed her! It‚Äôs so rude, irresponsible and absolutely RIDICULOUS!! I finally gave up on her, and went back to texting Chelie, asking for the contact info for the intern. No reply. I texted her again 24 hrs later. STILL no reply, and now we‚Äôre heading into yet another weekend!

I let Jamie know that I have CPTSD and I just recently lost my mother. My current therapist highly recommended that I get EMDR therapy ASAP. Even that info wasn‚Äôt enough to get her to help me or at least redirect me to the intern per my request.

It takes A LOT for a suffering person to reach out for help; and most trauma survivors have trust issues. Well, let me tell you, this is doing a number on me. Never in my life have I experienced treatment like this from mental health professionals!! I just would like an appointment with someone who is willing to help me!

*** UPDATE: Chelie responded very quickly to my initial review, and wasn‚Äôt just apologetic, she was sympathetic. She offered me an appointment, which I took and I‚Äôm so glad I did. I‚Äôve been meeting with Chelie weekly for about a month now (for EMDR) and I‚Äôm already blown away. Chelie is compassionate, empathetic, supportive - all of the things a good therapist ‚Äúshould‚Äù be. I‚Äôm so grateful to have been given this opportunity and so blessed to be under Chelie‚Äôs care. I look forward to continuing my healing journey, and to see what‚Äôs on the other side of my complex trauma!

I‚Äôve come so far in just a little over a year! So glad I found Chelie and have been working with her. She is so understanding and helps me work thru my issues. She has helped me through my PTSD and my anxiety issues. We have a long ways to go, but we have already come a long way as well and I am so thankful for her.

I have done many different versions of therapy for many years and nothing has shown faster results then working with Chelie. EDMR has by far been the best thing to happen to me. Chelie herself is an amazing and compassionate therapists. She genuinely cares and sets your mind at ease when working with you. I can‚Äôt say enough great things about her.

Yvette at Traveling Light Counseling is a kind, warm, and supportive professional. She works well in groups and has helped me build a sense of community in the mental health field. She works with adolescents and adults and specializes in helping families after divorce. I have always appreciated interacting with her and learning from her.

Yvette is a caring and compassionate counselor who knows how to balance making you feel heard with keeping it real and challenging you to change. I highly recommend her if you are tired of spinning your wheels in the same problem.
Yvette McDonald the owner and found of Traveling Light Counseling is dedicated and knowledgeable. Highly recommend.
WORST counseling I've ever been to! 3 visits, I felt humiliated and almost got divorced.

provider_name: Treasure Coast Health, Wellness & Injury Center
review_text: The sweetest and most hardworking staff. They've really been helping me on healing journey after my car accident. I'm very grateful for this place and I recommend it to anyone that experiences pain after an accident.

provider_name: Treasure Coast Health, Wellness & Injury Center
review_text: They are very very professional and caring, Doctor Corda and her amazing staff are doing wonders. I would say that they are not only professional but caring. I would recommend them without hesitation.  One love

provider_name: Treasure Coast Health, Wellness & Injury Center

review_text: Experienced and knowledgeable staff that offers beneficial physical therapy in a clean and professional environment. The team ensures that you are comfortable and receive the relief needed in an effort to promote and support wellness and recovery.

I had a great experience with TRIPT.  I had broken my collarbone and had surgery.  At first I was very reluctant with activities using my right shoulder.  JP was my therapist and he did a great job!  He made sure to give me the attention I needed and challenged me on my road to healing.  JP pushed me and helped me to see progress with exercises.  He also educated me on the recovery process.  I am fully recovered and am back to doing push ups.
The therapist and the exercises they came up with for my diagnosis were spot on. Very creative and made me work hard. I felt like I recovered from my injury 100%. Jeff and Ella make a great team.

We cannot thank TriPT enough! Thank you, Ed Dullmeyer‚Äîwe love Dr. Jordan‚Äîand Brooke at the front desk is an absolute gem!

Our situation was unusual: while one of our international co-workers from Kenya was visiting the country, he suffered a massive stroke. Long story short, Ed was incredibly kind and worked with us to ensure Patrick got the physical therapy he needed to recover enough to return home. Jordan was his PT, and she was absolutely wonderful. Patrick felt secure in her care and appreciated how she took the time to ensure he was understood.

The facilities are excellent. The waiting room is a comfortable place to sit and I was able to get work done while waiting for Patrick. Brooke at the front desk was always warm, kind, and welcoming.

For a situation that was extremely challenging and full of hurdles, TriPT was a bright spot. They made everything feel easy and smooth. While I hope no one ever needs PT due to an injury, if you do, I highly recommend this facility and its amazing staff. Truly good people work here!

I recently had a lot of left knee pain and went here for physical therapy. Jordan worked with me and gave me a lot of exercises to help strengthen my knee. She was great to work with, friendly,  helpful, and professional.

All of the staff at TriPT are amazing. Robbyn at the front desk is super friendly and helpful. Eric and Jeff are top notch PTs and I‚Äôd recommend them to anyone needing physical therapy. The facility is clean, organized, and they have all kinds of equipment/therapy devices to help with any injury you may be dealing with. I went recently with a hip injury from running. I was getting ready to try to push through the pain before a half marathon but figured I should get it looked at first. I came and saw Jeff and he was able to quickly identify the cause of the problem, correct it, and give me exercises to prevent the injury from recurring in the future. Next day I was able to run the half with zero pain and no problems! I can‚Äôt speak highly enough about the staff at TriPT!

review_text: I am very happy with my experience at Trident. Dr. Fulton spent over an hour reviewing my medical records and history with me. review_text: I‚Äôve been dealing with hip pain for years and tried a few different physical therapy places, but Triumph is hands down the best experience I‚Äôve had. review_text: I had been dealing with what I believed to be IT band syndrome for two years, doctors didn‚Äôt help at all. The very first visit he found the cause of my issue, which my doctors were unable to do. After that, each visit we attacked the problem together and Mark has got me back feeling normal again in just a few visits. He‚Äôs extremely knowledgeable on the body and is passionate about getting his patients back to living pain free. Highly recommend!

review_text: Went in to see Mark after suffering a calf strain while playing soccer. review_text: I highly recommend Mark‚Äôs physical therapy, it‚Äôs like working with Chiropractor and Physical Therapist in one. review_text:
If you're looking for a physical therapist who is not only incredibly skilled but also deeply compassionate, look no further than Mark. From the moment you meet him, it's clear that he genuinely cares about his patients‚Äô well-being. His approach is thoughtful, personalized, and incredibly effective.

Mark combines a deep knowledge of human anatomy with an intuitive understanding of movement and recovery.

What truly sets Mark apart is his positive energy and motivational spirit. He doesn‚Äôt just treat symptoms ‚Äî he empowers you to take control of your recovery.  I can‚Äôt recommend him highly enough!

I‚Äôve been working with Tropic Athlete for the last few months to address a back injury. Matt has been incredibly thorough in his diagnosis, treatment, and most of all education regarding the cause of my problem. I‚Äôve mastered better form and learned many stretches and exercises that have led to a significant improvement in my back pain‚Ä¶. I‚Äôm now ready to start lifting again, cautiously! Tropic Athlete came highly recommended by several friends at my gym and I couldn‚Äôt be happier!

I‚Äôm an active person and spend a lot of time in the gym, but over the past few months I‚Äôve been dealing with shoulder and back pain that really slowed down my progress. Working with Matt has been a game changer. He didn‚Äôt just focus on quick fixes‚Äîhe helped me build a foundation that will support me long-term, especially as I get older. He‚Äôs been great at addressing my posture, explaining the root of my pain, and giving me targeted workout programs that have made a real difference. Overall, it‚Äôs been an incredibly educational and helpful experience. Highly recommend him if you‚Äôre looking for someone who‚Äôs knowledgeable, thorough, and really invested in your recovery.

Dr. Matt is a true lifesaver! I came to him struggling with hip pain that made it impossible to work out, golf, or play pickleball. As someone who drives a lot for work, I found it excruciating to get out of the car due to the pain. In just two months under Dr. Matt‚Äôs care, I‚Äôm back to enjoying all three activities pain-free. I‚Äôm incredibly grateful for his expertise and highly recommend him to anyone seeking exceptional physical therapy. Thank you, Dr. Matt!

After nine months of persistent foot pain from an injury, I finally decided to seek help. Tropic Athlete came highly recommended by several friends in the community. Scheduling an appointment was quick and easy, with availability just a few days out.

Matt is extremely knowledgeable‚Äîhe quickly identified the root causes of my pain, developed a targeted treatment plan, and provided effective relief. The difference is night and day compared to before I started treatment at Tropic Athlete.

When I first came to Tropic Athlete Experience, I was dealing with a torn hamstring, very limited mobility, little to no strength, and a lot of pain. I honestly wasn‚Äôt sure how long it would take to get back on my feet. After just 5 weeks of working together weekly, I was already about 80% recovered, and by week 7 I had made a complete recovery‚Äîmuch faster than anyone, including myself, expected.

What stood out to me most was not only the knowledge and skill, but also the patience, encouragement, and genuine care throughout the process. Every session was focused on progress, building strength, and restoring confidence in my body. I can‚Äôt thank him enough for helping me get back stronger than ever. Truly great service, unmatched expertise, and someone you can fully trust with your recovery.

After 2 years and many Many MANY doctor‚Äôs visits, we finally found our pediatrician.  The staff is incredible there.  The name of the practice speaks for itself, they truly care. IT IS THE BEST BEHAVIOR AGENCY IN MIAMI, THEY HAVE A FIRST-RATE TEAM AND A KIND AND PERFECT TREATMENT FROM THE ENTIRE TEAM INCLUDING MR. ORACIO AND SOYUOANIS THE OWNERS, I AM GRATEFUL TO BE PART OF THEM.

Kim is a wealth of knowledge for both children and families.  As a teacher for years, she brings this experience to sessions, as well as art, making sessions fun and productive.  I highly recommend Kim if you're looking for child counselor.

Kim is absolutely amazing and so knowledgeable! She‚Äôs a great resource as a fellow counselor and I‚Äôd be lucky to have my child see her. I just wished we lived closer so we could collaborate more! Highly recommend!

I love the family-centered approach to their play therapy. They meet with parents/ guardians before each session to go over anything relevant. Kim helps us as parents better understand and our daughter who is a highly sensitive child.

I highly recommend Kim to families in need of help. Five stars isn't enough!

The very experienced  therapists are incredible and have limitless knowledge and compassion to share with families navigating the unique journey of raising special needs children.   They also offer a traditional clinic setting. Cristy and her staff are truly angels among us!  We are SO appreciative of everything they do for all of our uniquely amazing kids!   It is an honor to be a longtime True Blue family!

My sons on the spectrum and has been coming to True Blue from almost 2 years, the progress he‚Äôs made in & out the pool is amazing! I have a lot less anxiety and a lot more knowledge as a mother now also. 10/10 recommend ‚ò∫Ô∏è
