True blue therapy thank you for all the help and to all the professional therapists that threats my daughter with care and kind. Thank God for this wonderful place.
I don't know how anyone could give less than 5 stars for what these therapists do for children to improve their quality of independence.  Keep up the great work!

Dr. Pati√±o is sweet, caring, and truly professional. She‚Äôs helped several of my dogs and goats over the years with incredible results. Highly recommend her for anyone seeking a compassionate and skilled acupuncture vet!

My elder chihuahua Sandy is on fire after her very first visit for arthritis and collapsing trachea! After her session she took a 2 hour nap, ate dinner, demanded to go for a walk and came back home to eat a 2nd dinner ‚Ä¶ she was just giving me all the signs that she was super hungry! I started to play with her, and I noticed her barking at the toy was louder and stronger!!! Dr. Patino is a rare gem with such a kind heart - So tuned into exactly what my dog needed.

Dr. Pati√±o is incredibly knowledgeable, thorough, kind and has a great eye for detail. Many things that were missed by other vets she has caught and treated successfully. We trust her implicitly with all our pets and are incredibly grateful to her for her time and patience.

We truly feel we have witnessed a miracle. Dr. Pati√±o is an angel on earth! Our 13-year-old Weimaraner has severe hip dysplasia, skin issues, and was struggling with overnight incontinence. After just the very first acupuncture session, we saw a complete 360¬∞ change. He no longer pooped on his bed, started walking with ease, and even wanted to run again like a young puppy with what felt like a big smile on his face.

Just when we were losing hope, Dr. Patino showed up and worked her wonders. Thanks to her, our beloved senior dog has a new quality of life, and we now have peace of mind knowing he will enjoy his golden years with comfort and dignity. We are forever grateful!

We have such gratitude for Dr. Maria Patino of True Balance who has treated our sweet Wheaten Terrier Cassidy for over two years. We started with Dr. P. when Cassidy was 14 y.o. BEFORE she had any serious health issues. Cass did have allergies and some arthritis at that time. With daily supplements and regular acupuncture Dr. Patino managed and alleviated her symptoms giving Cassidy an amazing quality of life as she aged. Dr. P gave us exercises to strengthen Cassidy‚Äôs legs and taught us how to massage her body to keep her feeling well. As time progressed, so did Cassidy‚Äôs medical issues. Dr. Patino treated Cassidy‚Äôs incontinence with acupuncture and supplements and we saw immediate results. Dr. Patino is not just a true professional who lets you know when she will arrive at your home for the appointment and follows up to see how your pet is doing, she deeply loves animals and finds great joy in helping/healing them. She has a vast array of traditional and natural veterinary knowledge. Dr. Mar√≠a Patino has been an amazing blessing to Cassidy and our family. I cannot recommend her enough as a professional and a human! I also suggest if you‚Äôre thinking about using her services don‚Äôt wait, get started on the road to health and healing for your fur-baby with Dr. Maria Patino.

From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed and cared for. The staff is friendly, professional, and truly dedicated to patient wellness.

Thanks to Tukkos, my boys have grown in ways I never imagined. Their progress, confidence, and happiness are proof of the incredible work being done here. I will always be grateful for Stephanie and the entire Tukkos team. They‚Äôre not just a therapy center they‚Äôre family.

Turkey creek animal hospital from the moment you walk in the door is very clean and smells pleasant! They are an incredible team of professionals. They speak English, Portuguese and Spanish, and are always willing to help. The space is spacious and pleasant, and is situated in a very good location with easy access. My son and I are really very satisfied with the service provided.

I cannot express how grateful we are for Two hearts ABA therapy. Our daughter has been receiving therapy for many years now, and this is by far the best company we have worked with . The therapists are highly skilled, and their expertise in Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) therapy is evident in the progress our child has made so far. The whole team has been wonderful, professional, compassionate and always has our child‚Äôs best interests truly at heart ‚ô•Ô∏è.We have been receiving therapy at home and school. The school really likes working with our RBT and BCBA which is very important to us. We have been blessed with the best - Ms.Chelya, Ms.Dayana and Ms.Maria. We will forever be grateful for all the hard work you put in to help our daughter grow and become as independent as possible. Since starting therapy with Two Hearts ABA our daughter has improved so much with her ability to sit and learn , participating in activities and playing with her peers. Her communication skills are improving every day.
Thank you so much Two Hearts ABA üíï for everything you do! You are truly making a difference in our family. We highly recommend this company to everyone in need !

Gratitude for Exceptional Care at Two Hearts ABA Therapy

I recently had the privilege of observing the positive impact of Two Hearts ABA Therapy on my friend's child, and I feel compelled to share my experience. The dedication and support provided by the team, particularly by Day, have been truly remarkable.

Day's commitment to understanding and catering to the unique needs of children with autism were evident throughout my interactions with her. Her patience, compassion, and skillful approach have undoubtedly contributed to the positive strides that my friend's child has made under her care.

Two Hearts ABA Therapy, as a whole, impressed me with their commitment to creating a nurturing and inclusive environment for children with autism. The therapists exhibit a high level of professionalism and expertise, ensuring that each child receives tailored and effective interventions.

The progress I witnessed in my friend's child during their time with Two Hearts ABA Therapy is inspiring. It is clear that the individualized treatment plans and evidence-based practices implemented by the team are making a significant difference in the lives of the children they serve.

I wholeheartedly recommend Two Hearts ABA Therapy to any parent seeking top-notch care for their child with autism. The positive impact and growth I observed in my friend's child are a testament to the exceptional quality of service provided by this agency.

A big thank you to Two Hearts ABA Therapy and, specifically, to Day, for the invaluable support you have offered to my friend's family.

review_text: 6-12 month waitlist

I‚Äôve waited 6 months now for my son‚Äôs referral. We‚Äôve been trying to get in since he was 3 years old. I keep getting told ‚Äúwe‚Äôre waiting for the schedule to open up‚Äù then I was told their policy is they cannot schedule until 3-6 months after the referral has been placed. What type of place is this?! At the end of the day, UF Health is a business, it shouldn‚Äôt be like a socialized (communist) healthcare system waiting months for a doctors visit! I hate UF Health and their lack of competence. Here‚Äôs the kicker, they have VIP patients, they get top priority because their family member works or donated to the hospital‚Ä¶ if I knew it was a donation but really you‚Äôre buying priority list I‚Äôm sure more people would donate. This is non-sense!

Try having 50/50 custody of your step child, the mom is MEDICALLY Bipolar w rapid cycling and refuses to admit it to & have it added to the child family history. The "mom" won't tell us a thing! Won't respond to texts, calls, emails. Or even tell us when she schedules one.
We call today asking for clarification on a disturbing note in her chart & they REFUSED to give us information or basic answers on what is the next step. Wow! What a terrific mother & dr this poor kid has.

If I wasn't desperate about having my son tested and diagnosed with ASD I would 100% cancel all appointments. My first appointment was scheduled as in person. I took my son into the office only to be told 11mins after our scheduled appointment time that it would now be telehealth. My 4yr old special needs son had to entertain himself in a small room with nothing while I tried to have this meeting over zoom. To say myself and my son were frazzled is an understatement.
Our following appointment for the ADOS evaluation was canceled, rescheduled as telehealth, then I recieve two messages via MyChart that it is scheduled for in office. Confusing to say the least. I called and was told each time someone would get back to me. Here we are, evening before his appointment and I STILL don't know if it's in office or not. I am thoroughly disappointed in UF and how they are treating us, especially in this time of uncertainty and need.

My sons doctor here has literally changed our lives for the better. He is patient, listens and there to HELP your child. I can‚Äôt say enough good things about him. Mental health is so hard to treat and he has helped us when we felt hopeless.

If you want a doctor to dangerously put you on medication that is ONLY MEANT SHORT TERM and pawn you off  AS A MINOR with no warning this is the place! They don‚Äôt care nor have the competence knowing how to ween off benzodiazepines. They injured me at 17 and now at 25 I‚Äôm suffering all over again.
Thanks a lot

provider_name: UF Health Rehab Center for Kids - Magnolia Parke
review_text: It has been months now and I‚Äôve been waiting for an appointment to open up, I‚Äôve called and still haven‚Äôt gotten anything scheduled. Then I get a call today to let me know they‚Äôre still working on it‚Ä¶ what exactly are y‚Äôall working on because it isn‚Äôt scheduling an appointment.

provider_name: UF Health Rehab Center for Kids - Magnolia Parke
review_text: The staff here are all angels. Melanie at the front desk, is always kind and welcoming. Ms. Lo is an incredible therapist who you can truly tell has a passion for helping children. She is a gem. I have watched her collaborate with other therapist on the best course of care for my child and all the therapist have been helpful and kind. My daughter looks forward to her time with Ms. Lo. We also saw Ms. Kim for a tongue tie issue and she was the best. Very grateful for everyone here.

provider_name: UF Health Rehab Center for Kids - Magnolia Parke
review_text: My experience was not great. Front office staff were majority of the time great. My son was diagnosed Autistic by developmental pediatrician. We were sent for ST and OT. The wait list for speech is absolutely rediculous‚Ä¶ didn‚Äôt get into ST til over a year later! By then there was no point! The OT Naomi Rochelle Steele bullied my son who wasn‚Äôt even 2 yet into sitting at a table to eat. She would huff and puff and get annoyed because he would elope from the table. Her attitude towards me was rude and unprofessional. She never followed his care of plan which was to use a visual timer and weighted ball before eating. I stopped going for all of these reasons. Your staff needs to take classes that involve being around children. Especially children with different disabilities and different needs. And I‚Äôve helped my child more than they have in the few months they worked with him without ‚Äúplaying in his food‚Äù!  And the messages were just as rude! Do better! And find better employees!  And find employees that know how to communicate in sign language! At the time he started OT none of them did a single sign with him! He knew over 30 words in ASL!

provider_name: UF Health Rehab Center for Kids - Magnolia Parke
review_text:
We have been with Magnolia Park for almost 3 years.  Up until now we have been happy with our child's therapy.  We have missed our last 2 appointments due to scheduling.  My child has had the same therapy schedule for 3 years with minimal changes.  The last 2 we have missed due to lack of communication on there end.  I have never missed an appointment that I haven't canceled due to their cancelation policy.  This place has made me feel like a failure as a parent.  I will be looking for therapy services for my kid closer to our home.
We have been driving there about 2 hours up to three times a week and all of a sudden we are missing appointments without calling?  I don't think so

provider_name: UF Health Rehab Center for Kids - Magnolia Parke
review_text: So far I‚Äôve only talked to people about scheduling an appointment but already both ladies (Rhonda and Tanya) impressed me greatly! They went above and beyond to help me get information i needed to know whether getting on the waiting list here was the best plan for my family. It was so refreshing to get such personalized care right from the first phone call. They really listened to my needs and did their best to help. Thank you!

I have been seeing Alex for pelvic floor therapy during pregnancy and she is amazing! She is personable and always makes sure I‚Äôm comfortable with our session plan. She adjusts our sessions based on what I am needing that day/week. It took a few weeks between referral and my first session, but she had me schedule out a month at a time for appointments to ensure I was able to get in a good rhythm of sessions. Alex takes detailed notes during our sessions and she does a great job following up on things we discussed in prior sessions.
The front desk girls are amazing too! So sweet and helpful.

I had a great time at UF Health Rehabilitation-Emerson. My therapist Jack was awesome,I feel so much better. It was a great experience,the receptionists are very friendly.
Thank you
Sharon Ellis

I worked with Jackson to rehab from an Achilles partial tear.  I saw him for 2 months and he had me back on the tennis courts.  He used a combination of massage, graston technique and exercise strengthening to heal my injury.  He is an excellent therapist who was able to diagnose my injury and set a path to recovery that was effective.  I highly recommend him!

I had a great overall experience with the entire team at UF Health Physical Therapy (Rehabilitation) on Emerson. Amanda and Bob were fantastic and I was even able to AVOID shoulder surgery due to the great work they did with me. THANK YOU!!!

HIPAA VIOLATION! Your front office lady openly talks about the patients medical issues in front of the whole lobby of patients currently waiting to be seen.

If you need a translator to address a patients issue, you take them in a private room. I shouldn‚Äôt know that a women‚Äôs birth control isn‚Äôt working and that she needs her IUD fixed. This is the second instance where there is not patient confidentiality.

My boyfriend and I recently adopted our dog Daisy from here. It has been the best decision of our lives! She has brought our family joy and comfort. She is genuinely a shot of espresso. The adoption process was so smooth and you can tell the pets are really loved by the staff there.

I adopted my puppy 3 months ago.  He was in an excellent health condition, and he was given to me fully vaccinated, microchiped and neutered.  I hope people get conscious about pets and keep them in excellent condition as they are family members.

Amazing Shelter with a Heart for Cats and Small Dogs

I can‚Äôt say enough wonderful things about this shelter! The staff and volunteers are incredibly compassionate and dedicated to caring for every cat that comes through their doors. The facility is clean, well-maintained, and designed to make the cats feel safe and comfortable.

What sets this place apart is their no-kill policy and the genuine love they show to each animal. They take the time to match every cat with the perfect forever home and provide helpful advice on pet care and adoption.

It‚Äôs clear they truly care about the well-being of every cat and want to ensure each adoption is a success. I highly recommend visiting and supporting this shelter‚Äîwhether you‚Äôre looking to adopt, foster, or donate. They‚Äôre making a real difference!

This team makes so much effort and they need help....can't the community come together and get more cat cages with the bottom trays that slip out to be cleaned? The cleaning team needs to HUSTLE as obvious they have sanitation issues.  I volunteered cleaning for 20+ years part time in two cat shelters and yes it builds character . There were far too many kittens in confined spaces.  So sterilize your cats people!!! STOP dumping your pets/family members!  Also many precious dogs and one particular HIGH ENERGY dog who would be perfect for a runner! Adopt Don't shop! Rescue, Rescue, Rescue and Repeat often!

UFAR is such an amazing rescue. They are small and do so much for the unwanted or abused animals. They care so much for the animals and it is apparent when you go to meet an animal and they just want to be with their caretakers. I adopted an amazing little girl yesterday from UFAR and will be sending them photos of Athena as time passes. Please please go on their site to see their amazing little animals that just want love and a home of their own!! If you can, please adopt from them!! Make sure you can care for them for their lifetime!!!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

review_text: Great place for very special and important people!

My experience at USA Health and Therapy has been nothing but positive. From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed by the friendly staff and the warm, clean, and professional environment. The chiropractor is not only skilled but also very caring and attentive, taking the time to really listen to my concerns and explain everything clearly. I never felt rushed  instead, I felt valued and supported throughout my visit.

After my treatment, I noticed real improvement in my pain and overall comfort, and that has made a big difference in my daily life. It‚Äôs clear that everyone at USA Health and Therapy genuinely cares about their patients‚Äô well-being, and that kind of dedication is rare to find.

I truly appreciate the excellent care I‚Äôve received here and would recommend USA Health and Therapy to anyone looking for a trustworthy, compassionate, and effective chiropractor.‚Äù
Dr. Singer is an Amazing Chiropractor. It had been 15 years since I‚Äôve had such great posture. Thank you!

I can't express enough how much I adore USA Health Physical Therapy, especially with the incredible care provided by Dr. Singer. The warmth and passion they bring to their services are truly heartwarming. It's not just about physical therapy; it's an experience filled with positivity and genuine concern for your well-being. I wholeheartedly recommend them to anyone seeking not just treatment, but a journey of healing filled with love and care. Thank you, Dr. Singer and team, for making my recovery so special!

I have never been adjusted in my life. I finally decide to go in and see Dr. Singer. He is amazing doctor. He made me feel comfortable and he explained everything he was going to do before he did it. I definitely am going to keep coming back to him. Amazing experience.

Hands down the best chiropractor I‚Äôve been to in my life. I genuinely can‚Äôt speak more highly of Dr Singer. He fixed a stabbing pain I had for three years between my shoulders that no other chiropractor could fix, on the second visit! Wonderful personality and listens to patients, extremely non judgmental about different lifestyles. I‚Äôve spent a lot of my life with chronic back pain and found Dr Singer after I was in a car accident and he has greatly improved my overall mobility and quality of life. His hours are extremely flexible which is fantastic for me since I work in nightlife.

USA Sports Medicine Fort Lauderdale is the real deal. From the moment I walked in, the team made me feel heard, supported, and genuinely cared for. Cierra set the tone with a warm welcome and seamless check-in; she‚Äôs organized, upbeat, and kept my appointments running on time. Ricky was incredibly thorough in evaluating what was going on and explaining the ‚Äúwhy‚Äù behind each step of my treatment‚Äîclear, professional, and super knowledgeable. Brandon brought the perfect mix of encouragement and precision during sessions, always adjusting exercises and cues so I left feeling stronger and more confident.

The results speak for themselves: less pain, better mobility, and a clear plan for staying that way. The clinic is clean, well-equipped, and efficient, but it‚Äôs the people that make it exceptional. Huge thank you to Cierra, Ricky, and Brandon‚Äîyou turned a stressful situation into a genuinely positive experience. Highly recommend USA Sports Medicine Fort Lauderdale to anyone who wants expert care with outstanding service.

I have been coming to USA sports medicine for a long time for various injuries and it is a great facility,however, it is the people that work there that are knowledgeable and caring.  I am currently working with Dr. Darrell Harden who is very smart and experienced beyond other therapists in the area. Cierra is just as knowledgeable and caring and a great leader. They also don't use their facility as a training facility for private weight training but for physical therapy, like some other facilities in the area. They focus on patients getting better.

I have been seeing Dr. Cierra Smith since July 2024 for multiple health issues, and I could not be more grateful for the care I‚Äôve received. From the very beginning, Dr. Smith impressed me with her deep subject knowledge, professionalism, and ability to explain complex concepts in a clear, approachable way. She not only understands the science behind treatment but also has an exceptional gift for tailoring therapy to my unique needs.

The entire staff deserves recognition as well. Jasmine, Ricky, Brandon, and Darryl have all been consistently welcoming, supportive, and attentive, creating an environment conducive to recovery. Each visit has been a positive experience, and it‚Äôs clear that the whole team is dedicated to their patients‚Äô well-being.

I highly recommend Dr. Smith and her outstanding staff to anyone seeking skilled, compassionate, and knowledgeable physical therapy care.

I had a great experience at USA Sports Medicine in Fort Lauderdale. The facility is clean, well-organized, and easy to find, which made each visit smooth and stress-free. The staff is friendly and welcoming, creating a positive atmosphere from the moment you walk in.

I worked with Darrell, and he was fantastic‚Äîvery knowledgeable, patient, and clear with his instructions. Thanks to his guidance, my injury improved significantly in just a few sessions and is now almost pain-free.

Unfortunately, I have to travel for work for a few weeks, but if I‚Äôm not 100% by the time I return, I‚Äôll definitely be coming back to this location. I highly recommend USA Sports Medicine to anyone looking for effective and professional physical therapy.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Cierra and team at USA! Recovering from an Achilles tear is no small (feet) and can feel overwhelming at times but Cierra‚Äôs expertise, infectious high energy, and genuine care transformed my recovery into an incredible journey. She is very knowledgeable and I could see measurable progress week after week. Before I knew it, I was back to running and living my normal life. The office‚Äôs prime location near Las Olas makes it super convenient to get to, which was a huge bonus during my recovery. If you‚Äôre looking for a physical therapy gym that combines top-notch expertise with a motivating atmosphere, this is the place to go. Five stars all the way. Thank you, Cierra and team

USA Sports Medicine Miami Lakes is the best of the best. The entire team is elite and beyond that, they are all amazing people.

I tore my Achilles tendon 8 months ago and did 6 months of physical therapy/rehab at the Miami Lakes location. I worked primarily with Zach, Stefan, Morgan and Russ and they have helped me become a stronger, more explosive athlete post injury compared to pre injury. Their knowledge on the human body and care are second to none and they provide a positive, nurturing environment that amplifies one‚Äôs drive to be better. I am extremely thankful for the entire staff for helping me through this process!! I couldn‚Äôt have done it without them!!

I‚Äôve had an amazing experience with the guys from USA Sports ! Being a non-surgical Achilles rupture patient and knowing how long the road to recovery was the team really gave me high expectations of a full recovery and here i am 6months in and I‚Äôm almost back to 100% thanks to them.

I was involved in a car accident, which resulted in a patella fracture. After surgery, USA Sports was recommended by the surgeon. Zach was very professional and explained all the procedures and therapies needed to get back to 100%. I would recommend this facility 100%. I would also like to recommend Morgan, who was the person I worked with and who guided me through all aspects of the process. Great people, great environment. Thank you.

Absolutely stellar experience at USA Sports Medicine! From the moment I walked in, the vibe was welcoming and professional. The staff greeted me with warm smiles and made sure I felt comfortable. My physical therapist was a true pro ‚Äì knowledgeable, attentive, and super encouraging. Each session was tailored to my needs, and I genuinely felt like my recovery was their top priority. The facility itself was spotless and equipped with the latest gear to help me get back on my feet. I've made so much progress thanks to their dedicated team. Highly recommend to anyone needing a helping hand in their healing journey!

The entire team is exceptional! Their commitment to professionalism is evident while creating an inviting and welcoming environment. The facility is impressive and equipped with cutting-edge technology/equipment for rehabilitation or personal training!

I have been fortunate enough to work with my physical therapist, Zach, for a few years now, seeking treatment for various injuries. He is truly exceptional in his field of work. Zach created a welcoming environment during my physical therapy sessions, which made them enjoyable even though I faced challenges due to my ACL tear a year ago. He is not only highly skilled in his profession but also displays genuine compassion and concern for the well-being of his patients. He consistently motivates and encourages me to give my all during rehab sessions. I am incredibly grateful to him for fostering a positive and encouraging atmosphere throughout my recovery.

I highly recommend this facility for physical therapy or personal training! You can be assured that you will achieve all the progress you are working towards and surpass your expectations while being equipped with the ideal environment, support, and motivation!

Currently receiving PT after my total knee replacement. Nothing but the highest praise for the entire staff. They are friendly, helpful, supportive and highly qualified to provide the highest level of care. Here they actually care about the rehab experience and not about over booking clients for the extra dollar. Their quality care is unlike anyone else. They will be my first choice when it's time for my next surgery.
Thank you.

The atmosphere is great also my recovery has come along way. The workers here Josue Melanie Marco and Josue are great they always keep a conversation and make you feel as comfortable as possible. I will always recommend others to come here and check the place out.

I recently had a hip replacement and started therapy immediately the day following the surgery. As a nurse, I was quite worried about the possibility of receiving mediocre care here since facility was not referred by anyone I knew and have heard negative feedback about other places in my area.I will tell you that I am-very happy and impressed by the professional, caring and qualified staff. I am progressing well postoperatively thanks to the therapy and always look forward to attending since I feel much better afterwards. This team is the BEST!!! God bless you all! I am very blessed & grateful to have found you. Thank you!!!
Mel is great has made my visits always pleasant and works around my hectic schedule looking forward to my next visit and Marco is great too.

Everyone has been so personable and amazing their concern for their patients welfare and well being goes beyond excellence I recommend anyone who requires Physical Therapy to see Dr. Marcos, PTA Josue and staff is amazing!

When you're in pain and doing exercises that you'd rather not be doing, it's great to be in a positive environment with good people who are smiling and enjoying their work. Everyone there from the receptionists to the PTs are always smiling, which makes going back not feel like a chore, and rather an enjoyable part of the day.

I have a back injury, and the team at USA Sports has been super helpful in keeping me on track and getting me back in action üí™ Special thank you to Mathew and Eddie. We're still working on it, and I'm doing SO much better than 6 weeks ago when I started!

My husband and I were rear ended by a huge truck a few month ago. He has herniated & bulging discs and I had my shoulder dislocate which gave me tendon and ligament tears. Kevin, Alyssa, Madison, Cora, Munia and Alex have all been incredible throughout this whole ordeal. And all the reception staff are amazing too! Everyone has been so kind and supportive. As far as therapy goes, all the therapists & their assistants are so extremely knowledgeable and professional. They use cutting edge equipment and treatments and have helped us more than I can say. I‚Äôve been to other PT clinics before and USA Sports Therapy is just the best around. I can‚Äôt recommend them highly enough!!

I suffered intense shoulder pain for awhile, before arriving at USA Sports Therapy. Chiropractor Kessler fixed my shoulder pain completely in a series of targeted sessions. He gave me helpful exercises to do at home for posture improvement and injury prevention too. Highly recommend

When my orthopedic doctor first recommended physical therapy, I wasn't sure what to expect. However, I‚Äôm happy to say that the team at USA Sports Therapy has made me feel welcome from the very first day. From the friendly front desk staff to my physical therapist, Jessica, everyone is exceptional. Jessica is incredibly knowledgeable and takes the time to explain everything clearly. She actively seeks my input on my treatments, which makes me feel like an important part of my own care team.

USA Sports Medicine has been helping me recover from a major injury. All of the staff is very welcoming and friendly. I‚Äôve been working with Jessica and Cora who are great and have been very helpful in my recovery. I would highly recommend USA Sports Medicine.

USA Sports Therapy Coral Gables is top notch. Alex Renda and Bixie Lopez Castro are smart, attentive, and genuinely care about getting you better. They create rehab programs that are tailored to you and adjust them as you heal, which makes a real difference. They also break down complex medical concepts in a way that‚Äôs easy to understand, so you always know what‚Äôs happening and why. On top of that, it‚Äôs clear they hire for both expertise and personality. Jen and Diego at the front, along with the assistant PTs, are kind, hardworking, and incredibly capable. Their mix of skill and warmth sets the vibe and makes the whole place stand out. A true breath of fresh air in Miami. Highly recommend.

Alex and his team are A+. The facility is easy to get to and has great covered parking; very easy. Once you step inside, you are greeted by friendly smiles where the facility is kept very clean and they run on time. Alex has magic hands and is a true expert in his field. I never did the same routine twice. His knowledge base of the body is commendable. He truly brought me back to life after an ALIF with posterior pedicle screws (back surgery for lumbar fusion at L5/S1.) My good friend recommended me to Alex and I hope I can return the favor to someone else and pay it forward. 100% recommend.

I just wanted to take a moment to sincerely thank the team for the incredible care, support, and encouragement you've given me over the past few months since my Achilles surgery.
Recovery isn‚Äôt always easy, but your expertise, patience, and positive energy have made all the difference. Each session helped me regain strength and mobility and I'm truly grateful for everything you've done to help me get back on my feet!

The USA SPORTS THERAPY is a place for healing in a peaceful and professional environment.Their ability to quickly diagnose my issues and make a therapeutic program for my  pathway of feeling better was awesome. I was also given an exercise program to continue at home.
The Therapist are very focused on what you are
trying to accomplish.  I would highly recommend USA THERAPY IN CORAL GABLES to my family and friends and would not hesitate to return if I needed therapy.

Hands down then BEST physical therapy in Miami right next to Merrick Park in Coral Gables. I have been seeing Dr. Renda for years any time I‚Äôve had an injury from a sprained ankle while playing tennis or lower back sprain due to weight lifting. I have gone there almost in tears, barely able to walk and the following day I feel at least 80% recovered. Everyone who works there is god sent and I‚Äôm so happy they are 5 minutes from my home. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

Audrey and Lina are knowledgeable and caring physical therapists on Fisher Island.  I had a successful repair of my meniscus and chose them for rehabilitation to gain strength back in both my legs.  Over a period of 6 months they got me to approximately 90% of my former level of strength.  I will continue to use them for well visits to continue my progress after a summer break.  They made the process much more interesting and safer than it would have been if I had attempted the exercises on my own.  Lucille Zanghi
Audrey is an exceptional physical therapist and has helped me recover from multiple injuries. She has extensive knowledge and techniques for each situation. Highly recommend!

My experience with your team was absolutely amazing. The professionalism of your treatment and your ideas was outstanding. You both inspired me to be serious about following your suggestions and I look forward to progressing this Summer. I did a number of the exercises in NYC this morning and I certainly look forward to continuing with my PT sessions in the Fall. Thank you, Barry Goldin
Audrey and Lina are so professional and dedicated to their patient‚Äôs  They  work so  well together.  They helped me to heal and get stronger through two injuries.  I highly recommend them both.

My experience with Audrey brought my shoulder to a level I had never gotten to before with PT. Full range of motion with minimal pain. A million thanks for the care, the treatments and professionalism by Audrey and her assistant, Lina. Hope to see you in the fall for my knee problems.

Eric and the team are so professional, friendly and fun, it almost made up for the fact that I was injured!  Eric was highly recommended by a friend, and is genuinely caring.  He was very thorough and consistent guiding me through my personalized treatment.  I felt better almost immediately and I‚Äôm very grateful. Very dynamic team and active sporty crowd. Highly recommend!

Dr. Eric Havey is outstanding! I work out daily and had been struggling with shoulder pain for weeks. After just one visit, I felt significant relief and left with personalized exercises to help me strengthen and prevent future issues. He came highly recommended by friends who also had great results with various injuries, and now I can see why. I couldn‚Äôt recommend him more!

Monya is the best physical therapist I have ever been to.  She is extremely knowledgeable, caring and motivational.  Over the past few years, I have had issues with my back, arm and shoulder and she has been able to help me get back to playing racket sports and living my best life again.  Monya truly cares about her patients and will give you the attention and proper therapeutic routine to heal.

I first came to USA Sports Medicine‚Äôs Midtown Miami location for physical therapy after a leg injury, but I quickly realized this place would become a regular part of my routine. Their team has not only helped me recover but also continues to keep me moving at my best, addressing the inevitable aches and pains that come with an active lifestyle.

Dr. Monya Maleki stands out for her professionalism, expertise, and meticulous attention to detail‚Äîshe takes the time to really understand the issue and tailor treatment to what‚Äôs needed. Dr. Eric Havey has also been an excellent resource, bringing both knowledge and care to the process. And I can‚Äôt say enough about Eve, the office manager, who keeps everything running smoothly and makes every visit welcoming and stress-free.

I highly recommend USA Sports Medicine Midtown Miami to anyone looking for quality physical therapy and comprehensive care.

I‚Äôve known Eric and his team for many years, and he has consistently delivered outstanding care across multiple injuries I‚Äôve dealt with, including hamstring, knee, and wrist issues. His deep expertise, meticulous attention to detail, and hands-on approach have made a real difference in my recovery every time. I highly recommend him to anyone looking to bounce back from a sports injury.

From the moment that I called to inquire, I was treated like a VIP! My consultation with Bailey was so professional and comfortable , i really felt seen (and heard) !  Personal wellness can be somewhat uncomfortable as it is very private to people like me. I am so excited about our goals (feels like we‚Äôre in this together) ! I can‚Äôt wait to go to my next appointment !! I have already recommended to 3 people who are interested and I don‚Äôt do that very often !! These are clients of mine. I even got to meet the owner, who went out of her way to introduce herself to me ! I do feel a cohesive staff presentation, which is very important to me also.  I am ecstatic about my personal plan! Ready to do my part and enjoy the services here !  Highly recommend‚Ä¶.don‚Äôt hesitate !

Toning up is my goal , very nice staff i think iv been through all of them! Seen some results but it feels  great to pamper yourself every so often !! Helps with my back and leg pains , Love the massages ect! I still have a way to go but feeling good!!! Would recomend 100% .

Candy

I love going to Cryo and Recovery! The staff is always warm and welcoming. Having the body shaping is so relaxing I end up falling asleep on the table. It‚Äôs been a really great way to help me recover from my divorce and also, long standing injuries. I highly recommend it to everyone.

My first visit to have a Cyrofacial and I loved it.  The staff are all very knowledgeable and friendly.  I felt like I was in good hands from the beginning.  They listened to my concerns and made recommendations accordingly.  I purchased a multi-week package and am looking forward to the end result, as I could already see some improvement.

I have such wonderful experiences at Ultra Cryo & Recovery from the moment I walked into the Office. Excellent treatment and friendly staff. I get the best facial at this office. Come out stress free and skin looking great. Thanks to all the wonderful staff.
Great overall experience.   I feel like they were honest and did what was needed.  It was our 1st visit here and will likely become our pets new vet go to.

Every doctor, nurse and receptionist have been nothing more than kind! I feel so reassured Olive will be safe when I take her there.

Highly recommend!

All the folks at Underhill Animal Hospital are wonderful, caring people! I have only been taking my Yorkie, Buddy, there for several months and I never have a problem getting an appointment and the prices are very reasonable, plus me being a senior, I get a discount on services! Dr. Hill has been practicing there for over 50 years. They treat my dog with care. I highly recommend Underhill Animal Hospital!

Love this place! Out Titan boy has been treated, and cared for, by Underhill Animal Clinic since he was just a pup. The staff and doctors are wonderful! They always answer any and ALL questions I have each time we  visit, and take the best care of our fur babies. Just recently brought our newest member of the family, Aurora, in for a skin infection. Happy to say shes feeling much better! We will most definitely  continue our pet care with Underhill! Thank you!

Highly skilled and knowledgeable staff.  They did a thorough examination, made care recommendations for my senior dog, prescribed a medication to help with his arthritis and he has responded well to it.  He seems to be happier and pain free.  I highly recommend this veterinary office as they are truly professionals. I'm glad I found them.

provider_name: United Recovery Project - Luxury Rehab in Florida
review_text: This place has been an amazing part of my journey toward becoming the best version of myself. The techs, facilitators, and therapists genuinely care about everyone here and go above and beyond to help. My life has changed for the better because of them. I highly recommend this place for anyone seeking treatment

review_text: I enjoyed the housing, it was comfortable, well appointed, large, modern and updated. The pool was a plus. The groups were engaging, revealing, informative, and caused me to be introspective about my own journey. The staff and my therapist was fantastic. My therapist helped me open up and feel comfortable discussion past trauma. Nursing was helpful and empathetic. All the behavioral techs were awesome. C-Kwon groups allowed me to get a real prospective on my recovery journey.

Staff during my PHP program has been awesome. I love how it gets more into me and my recovery as the days go by.

The staff and cleanliness of the clinical building is great. Therapist, nurse and techs are really helping my needs. The intake was quick and painless.

provider_name: United Recovery Project - Luxury Rehab in Florida
review_text: I really enjoyed the interaction with clients and staff. I liked therapist and how easy it was to talk to him. The housing was exceptional and really comfortable. I would recommend this facility to anyone looking for help.
Dr Belleto is amazing.  He's very compassionate and an excellent physician.  They staff are super friendly and caring. Great vibes.  They keep me enjoying the things I like to

They are amazing, talk about communication and care‚Ä¶ from the greet to the gift, the receptionist smile and the staff‚Äôs concern‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs definitely worth the visit‚Ä¶ thanks y‚Äôall, much love from Tre‚Ä¶

A Absolute  pleasure to deal with everyone there. Not only do they make you feel good about being there they also are very informative. Best Chiropractor in Tallahassee

provider_name: University of Florida: Small Animal Clinical Sciences
review_text:
Probably going to be a long review.. From the time that we got there til We picked her up the following day. Everybody involved was so kind, so considerate and so compassionate.
We had taken Abby to a vet because something was wrong with her eye. They started us on drops 4 days later. It was worse. Took her to a different vet And they recommended coming here. When we arrived We were greeted And taken care of in a timely manner. Such a beautiful place Very clean we Had a great feeling immediately.
They took Abby back to see exactly what was wrong sadly, when they came back The doctor informed us because the first vet had not given us antibiotics and an infection had eaten a hole in Abby's eye. She did a great job at explaining everything to us in detail giving us three different options, The estimated price for each. Once we made our decision which was to have the eye removed, She informed us that there was probably other places that would be cheaper And that if we wanted to go That was our decision. I thought this was Great And we so appreciated it. But having said that we decided to stay here and I am so grateful we did because they took such good care of Abby. Juan is who we mainly dealt with He brought Abby out for us to tell her goodbye And was So compassionate and understanding This was devastating to us of course. So to sum everything up We chose to let her stay the night. They would do surgery the following morning. Juan called us later that evening to let us know that She was doing well and that she had gotten anxious being around The other dogs so they moved her to quieter part in the kennel. Her surgery was the next morning He called us to let us know that he was taking her down And then the doctor called after she had come out of Sedation said everything went fantastic And that we could pick her up at 4.
Of course there's more details than all this If I talked about it, there would be pages üòä.
Highly recommend coming here. We never thought we would have anything like this to deal with, But so thankful For the people that work here and their compassion And their love of animals.

provider_name: University of Florida: Small Animal Clinical Sciences
review_text: I have used them over the years.For many different departments, you do have to stay on the ball with call backs Im permanently disabled.I use cats and exotics as my service animals. They have been helping me aggressively with an issue.My great love of my life sphynx Andre is having and try to get things done asap

provider_name: University of Florida: Small Animal Clinical Sciences
review_text:
I can‚Äôt not recommend this place enough. I truly believe this establishment (like many pet care services) puts profits over pets. The fees you will be charged merely for a diagnostic test will likely financially ruin you if you live paycheck-to-paycheck. Don‚Äôt even get me started in the event you need an operation. I even had pet insurance and they wouldn‚Äôt work with me, forcing me to pay thousands upfront and out-of-pocket to care for my dog. At the end of the day, I learned that he was inoperable.

Additionally, I experienced rude staff who made my already bad experience even worse - and if you come through the ER, expect to wait hours upon hours to be serviced. I spent 7 hours there. Also be prepared for incompetent staff to further raise your anxiety levels. While they have full-time faculty, you will likely be interacting with students and residents in training. When your pet‚Äôs life is on the line, those are the last people you want to be dealing with.

provider_name: University of Florida: Small Animal Clinical Sciences
review_text: Love this hospital staff. They are good with dogs. A bit pricey but had a successful tumor removed for mybdog in December 2024. Great surgical team.

provider_name: University of Florida: Small Animal Clinical Sciences
review_text: This is an amazing place.   Great for pets and parents alike. They care about you and your pet like no other pet hospital.  If you need care for your pet, emergency or routine, make the trio to this hospital.   I could not recommend this place more.

I had the pleasure of meeting the owner, a trainer, and many of the support staff at Unleash Fido. Across the board, they are extremely knowledgeable, professional, and caring. In particular, I would like to recommend the trainer Macayla, who worked with me and my spirited mini Australian Shepherd. After only a handful of hour-long lessons, my dog was a completely different pup. By keeping up with Macayla‚Äôs instructions, my Aussie and I now enjoy a much calmer and happier life.

Macayla has been training for years and possesses a wealth of knowledge, but what really sets her apart is her friendly personality and her ability to ‚Äútrain‚Äù the owner as well. I highly recommend Unleash Fido and Macayla in particular!

We signed up our Giant Schnauzer puppy for the advanced training and we are pleased with the results! Dakota was extremely helpful with getting our crazy/high energetic puppy under control! He was also available to answer any questions we may have and if we ran into any issues with our puppy, Dakota was able to create a resolution by making up additional training we can do at home to fix it. The staff is also very friendly and accommodating! Looking forward to sign up our other dog for training (:

I would like to thank my puppy trainer Dakota for his hard work and dedication on training my Drogon. Drogon was not an easy assignment due to him coming to training at a young age but like the sign says Unleash can train any dog and I definitely stand with them on this statement. Dakota was nice, thorough with what was needed to keep Drogon in line with commands and boundaries. Drogon looks forward to seeing his uncle Dakota. Again thank you all for the work you do to make sure our babies are trained properly with love and care. This training was worth itüíó

Words can‚Äôt even describe or express how much Unleashed Fido has changed our lives and our fur baby! Dakota did an exceptional job with training (Floki), he was very informative, available to answer any questions and did the impossible!! I couldn‚Äôt believe how much well-mannered my dog has become at home and with our other pets! Ofc, training will always need to be reinforced but compared to when he was dropped off and graduation day, Floki is a completely different dog and my family and I are so impressed and forever grateful ü•π for the help and support of Unleashed Fido! Thank you for making us love our dog even more, it was a nightmare in the beginning, almost unbearable but now we are ready to start new adventures with Floki!! üß°ü§ó

I took my 4-month-old puppy, Kitana, for a free evaluation and had a fantastic experience. I never felt rushed, and Dakota provided a wealth of knowledge. The atmosphere was vibrant, and the establishment was impeccably clean. The staff was friendly and welcoming, making the visit enjoyable. I can't wait for Kitana to start her training; I know she‚Äôs going to become even more amazing than she already is!

Dr.Kolomeyer was amazing to work with. I was struggling with postpartum anxiety with my first child and she truly helped me navigate through this part of my life. She was always understanding, empathetic, and really listened when I shared how I was feeling. I used and will continue to use the strategies and tools she taught me. I honestly feel like I wouldn‚Äôt be where I am today without her. She helped me work on myself so I could be the best mommy to my little girl.

Dr. Kolomeyer helped me navigate the struggles of becoming a new mom. She gave me ways to cope with anxiety & deal with family dynamics. I saw significant improvements in the way I handle anxiety during our time together. She understood everything I was going through, and I really enjoyed talking to her.

If you are looking for a psychologist who has a wealth of knowledge about children and parenting, is a great listener who you can tell genuinely cares, and is passionate about helping you and your family, look no further. Dr. Ellen Kolomeyer is relatable, compassionate, and gives wonderful guidance.

My husband and I have three daughters. We have struggled with behavioral issues. Dr. Ellen Kolomeyer has guided us with several practical suggestions that we can incorporate into our daily lives to help strengthen our relationships and provide the support to our girls that is needed to encourage their healthy growth. Thank you, Ellen! We are grateful for your kind, research based, and family focused approach.

Dr. Ellen is a very knowledgeable and thoughtful psychologist. She really takes the time to get to know you and offers many suggestions and plans to address all of your concerns. My husband and I are considering starting a family and naturally have our own anxieties with the process, and Dr. Ellen has been absolutely wonderful in lending support during our planning process. She makes you feel completely comfortable and at ease, and we will be consulting her throughout our entire process from pregnancy to raising children. I cannot recommend her enough!

Dr. Kolomeyer is simply THE BEST! She meets you exactly where you are, knows the right questions to ask and provides the most effective strategies! She is so easy to talk to and pays attention to the little things! My favorite part about working with Dr. Kolomeyer is that she specializes in all things pregnancy, postpartum & parenthood‚Ä¶and she is a wife & mama herself! SHE GETS IT!!! Highly recommend working with Dr. Kolomeyer!

Look elsewhere except for STAR puppy. I've attended 5 classes with 2 different dogs and except for STAR puppy was extremely disappointed with the "teachers". Most are not trained teachers, just taught by each other so the club can make $$. I was in classes with one that when she was a student in another class I was in, constantly shamed and got angry with her dogs, then she became a teacher in Basic Obedience! No patience or caring or conversation about an issue you might need help with! She said very rude things about me and my dog on the final day. Just not a person with any dog training or personal interaction sense. They don't seem to know what a real trainer is and I've been going to trainings with my dogs for 33 years. USDOC was by far the worst experience. Their classes are way too big simply taught by members who belong to the club, I'm guessing to get their own dogs titled. Please don't waste your $$ on Basic Obedience there unless your dog is already well trained and you just need a certificate. It's a shame.

Excellent club with knowledgeable instructors! I started with my mini aussie in the Puppy Star class when he was around 6 months old and he is now 3 and we have been going to classes here ever since. We've taken a variety of classes from puppy, obedience, tricks, and agility. We've learned so much from the classes. We also love the occasional fun special events like Dog Olympics. Such a welcoming atmosphere and would recommend to anyone looking to train their dog from the basics to more advanced skills.

UPDATE:  Since I posted my review 3 years ago, so many amazing things have occurred at Upper Suncoast Dog Training Club.  The club has expanded their service dog training, Alliance of Therapy Dogs permitting our certified instructors to credential dogs as ATD qualified. This all volunteer club offers education from novice to expert in facets of training including Agility, Confirmation, Rally, along with club activities including 'Pack Walks' for better on leash and social behaviors, while having  many 'students' qualify for Westminster Agility, National Confirmation, AKC National Agility Invitational and others.  They have earned 501c3 status and have dogs in nursing homes and schools weekly.  Dental care is provided at discounted rates, and visiting experts participate in seminars in the bright, and updated club on Logan Street, Clearwater.
My story is how I brought two rescue Australian Cattle Dogs 9 years ago and never looked back.  They've both had major AKC Agility success. Many new friends, patient and excellent instructors   Remember- these are VOLUNTEERS, and when I read the occasional negative review I have to wonder if they attended the same Upper Suncoast DTC I do!  Be patient getting your new dog into any particular class, ask questions, and practice at home and you will enrich your experience with your new partner beyond your imagination.

Both of my dogs, Love training here! I have learned a lot, about being a calm and clear leader for my dogs, and I reap the awards every day. Whenever I tell my dogs today, you‚Äôre going to dog class they get very excited. The volunteers that run the classes here are wonderful, and knowledgeable. I very much appreciate the opportunity to experience training my dogs with these volunteers.
Both of my dogs have completed Obedience 1 training and are currently in obedience 2 training. I have one dog in agility class, currently in level two agility.
I love that my dogs now find it rewarding to listen to me, which is amazing!
I most definitely recommend the Upper Suncoast Dog Training Club to anybody that wants to strengthen their bond & communication with their dog.
Thank you to everyone at Upper Suncoast Dog Training Club!!

We have done puppy classes and conformation classes here. The atmosphere is very welcoming, my 7 year old daughter has been participating in classes regularly and everyone has been so supportive of her desire to learn how to work with dogs! She looks forward to the class every week.

Our puppy was initially fearful of strangers but after consistent training here he has made amazing progress. Coach Kerri who teaches the conformation drop in class is amazing.

To think I‚Äôll ever be leaving this review.. Our son attended this ABA center for four years. In the beginning, they gave us so much hope. The staff seemed to care and worked hard to help him grow. But as time went on and the center expanded, everything changed.

They slowly reduced his hours huge red flag! It became obvious they no longer had the capacity or desire to support him. It was heartbreaking to watch them give up on our child after years of trust and commitment.

We ultimately made the painful decision to pull him out. That experience set our son back in ways we‚Äôre still healing from. Thankfully, he‚Äôs now in a place where he‚Äôs finally receiving the care and attention he truly deserves.

Families deserve better. Our kids deserve better. We share this in hopes other families stay alert and always advocate for what their child deserves consistent, individualized care.

The Upward Trend Academy is by far the best option for my daughter.
They have worked with her on her strengths and built her weaknesses.
I do not know where I would be without them. As a parent, my biggest reason - to go to work is  knowing my kiddo is in a safe , caring environment with people who know how to work with her. For this I am blessed. Amy and Lindsay ( for me and my tribe) are the biggest contributions to this community.
They are building a successful foundation for our children to become successful adults.

The teacher  MissEmily was yelling in my son‚Äòs ear And other students told me about it Also, my son Was called racist names from another child and I was not notified about it, but the other parent was that I spoke with.Never felt a genuine conversation about my childs well-being. at that school their most concern is how will they get more money! We tried to start ABA therapy and they had him in regular Summer Camp  I‚Äôm not one to write reviews, but this needs to be known so it doesn‚Äôt happen to other parents and children.

We can't say enough good about UTA!  Our son who is autistic had been in and out of 3 different schools (public & private) before enrolling him with UTA.  Since then, he's greatly improved with his academics and his behavioral issues, mainly due to UTA's flexibility and creative ABA methodologies (with our collaboration).

In addition to the owners being highly experienced and credentialed, the school is very SAFE, well organized, clean, and all the staff share a love for the kids and helping them achieve their goals.  We're able to request conferences whenever we need and their always available to help.

Again, I could go on and on but the bottom line is we couldn't be happier and are thrilled to see our son's progress and for the first time, he "likes" going to school!!

Our son has been attending this school this year for the first time and it is the first time we do not get calls from the director/principal/teacher to come pick him up because of behavioral issues. They really are angels here and bring tears to my eyes on how much they help special needs and our community. We need more of these schools. We make the drive so he can attend and get the help he needs. They are so understanding and kind. I can‚Äôt rave about this school enough! We thank you upward trend for all you do and your compassion for our children who are very capable on having a great independent future. We are planning on staying with Upward Trend and even getting our youngest son who is also autistic the help he needs through their therapy. God bless you all! Don‚Äôt hesitate to contact Amy and the team! They will welcome you with loving arms and resources for your child!

All I can say is wow!!  We have been searching for a vet that we liked and was taking new patients since moving to this area 4 years ago. The clinic is beautiful,  clean, comfortable & warm. The office staff was amazing, and Dr. Dias was so wonderful and thorough. We found our new ‚Äúfur-ever‚Äù animal clinic, for our beloved dog, Kaine..
Run don‚Äôt walk to Urban Pawz!!!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Dr. Dias and her amazing team! She has been talking care of my 2 dogs and my cat for over 7 years now and I truly wouldn‚Äôt trust anyone else with their care.
Dr. Dias is not only knowledgeable and professional but also genuinely compassionate and attentive. She takes the time to explain everything clearly and always makes sure my pets and I feel comfortable and well cared for.
Now that she‚Äôs opened her own clinic, I‚Äôm even more impressed! The space is beautiful, clean and welcoming. You can tell how much heart and effort went into it!
The staff she‚Äôs brought on are just as wonderful, kind, friendly and clearly dedicated to providing the best care possible.
I‚Äôm beyond happy to continue with Dr.Dias at her new clinic and can‚Äôt recommend her highly enough!

Urban Pawz is awesome. New, modern space is clean hi-tech and spacious. Easy to get to location.
I have been going to Dr. Dias for years. She is friendly and personable and clearly has so much compassion with animals. I would highly recommend Urban Pawz for all your pet care needs

Dr. Dias-Appleblatt, DVM is a caring, insightful, and exceptionally knowledgeable veterinarian. She truly understands not only my pet‚Äôs needs but also my concerns as a pet parent. My dog Watson had several health issues, and throughout the process, Dr. Dias-Appleblatt took the time to listen, explain, and guide me with compassion and clarity. Her dedication and genuine concern gave me both confidence and comfort.

I‚Äôm incredibly grateful for her care and couldn‚Äôt be happier to congratulate her on the opening of her new practice. I would follow her anywhere‚Äîshe is truly one of a kind, and any pet would be lucky to be under her care.

The best vet care I‚Äôve ever experienced! From the moment you walk into the new clinic, you can feel the warmth and genuine care for both pets and their families. The facility is beautiful, modern, and welcoming, and the entire team goes above and beyond to make sure every fur baby receives the best treatment. Dr. Marcelle and Brian have truly created a space filled with compassion, professionalism, and love for our community‚Äôs pets. So grateful !

provider_name: Utter Brilliance Therapy Services - Krista M. Hadeed, MS, CCC-SLP, PA
review_text:
Krista at Utter Brilliance Therapy Services has been a true blessing for our family. She‚Äôs been working with my 2.5-year-old autistic, nonverbal son, and the progress he‚Äôs made in her care has been amazing. Krista is patient, kind, and deeply knowledgeable‚Äînot just about speech therapy, but about how to truly connect with a child on the spectrum.

One of the biggest turning points was when she introduced my son to his AAC device. Thanks to her guidance, he‚Äôs now starting to understand how to use it to express himself‚Äîand that‚Äôs opened a whole new world for him, and for us.

Krista celebrates every small win, and builds trust in a way that few can. My son lit up every time he saw her, and that bond meant everything. We‚Äôre so grateful to her!

provider_name: Utter Brilliance Therapy Services - Krista M. Hadeed, MS, CCC-SLP, PA
review_text:
As the owner of a pediatric Occupational Therapy practice, I‚Äôm very intentional about who I refer families to‚Äîand I can say without hesitation that this speech practice is truly exceptional. Their approach is deeply child-led, play-based, and grounded in compassion and expertise. They have a natural way of connecting with children and empowering families, making them feel supported and heard every step of the way.

I‚Äôve seen firsthand how effective their work is. The kids I refer to Utter Brilliance make beautiful progress‚Äînot just in their speech and language skills, but also in their confidence and ability to engage with the world around them. They collaborate so well with other professionals, and I always know the children I refer are in incredibly capable, caring hands.

If you‚Äôre looking for someone who blends clinical skill with heart and truly centers the child and family in everything they do, look no further!

provider_name: Utter Brilliance Therapy Services - Krista M. Hadeed, MS, CCC-SLP, PA
review_text: I‚Äôve been using Ms Krista for over 6 years for my autistic daughter . We have changed from traditional speech therapy to GLP child led therapy in last few years. We have also added Ms Cara to our team. I cannot praise them enough for the joy, laughter, love and fun they bring to Grace. Grace had an established relationship with Krista but loved Cara so much as well. She developed a different kind of dynamic and she is beyond excited for each session they come too. They are dedicated , always up for one of her games and true team players. They bring so much laughter and love and we are beyond thrilled with how much more our daughter communicates, how happy she is to try to communicate and her overall disposition for these ladies being around!

provider_name: Utter Brilliance Therapy Services - Krista M. Hadeed, MS, CCC-SLP, PA
review_text: My son's time with Utter Brilliance Therapy Services was life changing. Krista's patience and ability to connect with her students made the world of difference. As his speech improved, his confidence grew. He does not hesitate to participate in class and is no longer shy. Krista worked with us to get the right speech therapy goals and was flexible with our schedule. She is the absolute BEST!

provider_name: Utter Brilliance Therapy Services - Krista M. Hadeed, MS, CCC-SLP, PA
review_text:
I enthusiastically recommend Utter Brilliance to anyone in our area seeking speech therapy for their children. We feel incredibly fortunate to have found Ms. Krista, who has provided exceptional care for both of my kids, helping them blossom into chatterboxes. Ms. Krista and Ms. Cara are not just incredible professionals but also warm, loving individuals whom my children adore. They eagerly anticipate their sessions and are reluctant to leave afterward. It truly feels like they've become part of our extended family, and the day we no longer need their services will be a sad one for us.

Krista and Cara, thank you from the bottom of our hearts for everything you've done for my kiddos!

My dog was sick. Our old vet was not someone we trusted. I called VCA and they were able to get us in. My dog has a long list of things that need attention including being hypersensitive to other animals. They were so accommodating. I liked everyone I spoke to. The vet sat with us to take time to get to know Moki, I appreciated that. Moki liked her! I'm happy I got a vet so experienced. She knew what was wrong right off. What a relief! Thank-you Dr. Whetstone! The tech who ushered us in recognized the need of a larger room for him. We didn't have that at our other vet. Bobby was sensitive to Moki's needs and listened to what I had to say with regards to how he'd been handled at our previous vet. 10 stars! You made a difficult experience better! Thank you all so much. Moki's been resting all day, but with the medicine for his infection and the kindness you gave us today I'm sure it won't be long he will be running in the back yard again.

Great appointment. Dr. Whetstone and Vet Assistant Bobby were amazing with our Coconut. He is a stray cat that is sweet, but anxious at Vet. They were very gentle yet proactive in getting his nails clipped, ears cleaned, checked teeth, heart,  full examine all while being hissed at. Dr Whetstone then discussed with us the plan to get Coconut happy and healthy. We are very pleased with VCA office staff they were very informative and helpful . Also loved how they had a board welcoming their new patients with their names. So cute. ‚ù§Ô∏èüêæ

Overall, an enjoyable vet to go to. I ended up being 15 minutes late to my rescued kittens first check up but since it was my first ever visit they would still see us! I was definitely grateful for that.
Dr. Whetstone is amazing, she genuinely cared about my pet and is the main reason I'm giving them 5 stars! The ladies at the front desk were nice as well until the very end I got the impression that they didn't appreciate us as customers. As I was walking out the door I said "thank you all so much" two different times and didn't get any "you're welcome" or even a "goodbye" from them.. no big deal, just something that I noticed.

My older dog and I were down from Indiana and he had a problem with movement. They got us in, went over his history, got him what he needed. Price was good for an ER vet, cheaper than it would have been back home. Staff were super friendly and very caring. Highly recommend if you need an emergency vet.
It was expensive, but it was worth it. And we can't put a price tag on how much we love our animals

I do not recommend this vet. My dog was throwing up for 2 days and we brought him here which I regret. My dog was being treated for hookworms and had lost weight. The doctor comes in the room mentioning all these different diagnosis when she never even considered it may be the hookworms that was responsible for his symptoms. As a vet for however long she was, she should know hookworms causes the same symptoms my dog had. She never directly answered our questions about care unless it was about putting him down. I truly regret bringing him here. My dog was still jumping up, eating and drinking normally up until the night he threw up.  That doesn't sound like a dog with whatever diagnosis she was trying to scare us with. She wanted us to put our dog down.

When she began to hit a plateau,  Ms. Rena guided us in working with our health care team to receive additional diagnosis/ treatment to help with physical therapy effectiveness, and prevented the need for more invasive measures.

After two back surgeries ,I am now able walk almost standing up straight. It is all due to the work they put into their program. Of course, they make me do all the work!

Well, I am a repeat client. First time was a knee replacement, then a torn rotator cuff. Each time, I was greeted, assessed and given treatments that increased my mobility and strength. Elise always gets me scheduled and makes sure the place runs smooth and efficiently. What a great team. I recommend them if you need Physical Therapy.#Physicaltherapy

If I can give this place more than 5 stars, I would. Being treated here has exceeded my expectations as a patient. I had been recommended Visser‚Äôs PT clinic from a very close friend who had known my struggle with the first PT clinic I was treated at for ankle rehabilitation after a fracture. Rena was my physical therapist treating me and she is not only a good physical therapist, but an amazing person who truly cares for her patients. After losing hope that I will regain my range of motion and strength back, Rena helped me reach my goals to recover. Throughout my time at this clinic, Rena had listened to my concerns and was very patient with me.

Rena and her staff are amazing and I will continue to recommend everyone to go to her clinic after my experience.

If you are looking for a good clinic with good people that actually care about their patients, don‚Äôt hesitate to go to Visser‚Äôs.
Caring and professional therapy for kids!

This chiropractic care helps so many people find relief from daily pain, improve mobility & feel themselves again. I can honestly say the team here truly cares about each patients journey, if you‚Äôre looking for a place that combines professionalism with genuine compassion I‚Äôd definitely recommend this office.

They are amazing and makes you smile everyday you have an appointment. There treatments so far are helping my back and knee injury feel a whole lot better.its been a month for me and no complaints. The whole staff ‚öïÔ∏è is outstanding.

Well I dont know where to start to be exact. Viva health employees are awesome and I love to come here for my treatment. I've been dealing with lower back pain, neck pain. From the very first day, the team welcomed me in and made me feel like more than just a patient. I loved the positive energy they shared. This place and its staff are amazing. I 100% recommend them!

We‚Äôve had an incredible experience with Viva Therapy, thanks to Morgan! She has been working with our son as his speech therapist, and the progress we‚Äôve seen is truly amazing. Not only has he improved during their sessions, but we‚Äôve also noticed a big difference at home‚Äîhe‚Äôs more confident, trying new sounds, and things are finally starting to click for him.

Morgan is kind, patient, and so encouraging. She makes every session fun and engaging, and it‚Äôs clear how much she cares. We feel so lucky to have her as part of our child‚Äôs journey.
