My daughter has been receiving therapy with Viva for almost three years now.

She started physical therapy when she was just a few months old with Zoimelys Labrada who helped her reach all her milestones‚Äîincluding taking her first steps. Unfortunately, due to logistics, Zoimelys was no longer able to continue seeing Hope, but the care and progress she provided were incredible.Im still in contact with her and she periodically checks in to see how hope is doing.

Then she  began working with the extraordinary Dr. Cynthia Barrett‚Äîand I truly don‚Äôt have enough words to express how amazing she is. Dr. Barrett‚Äôs knowledge, patience, and genuine passion for helping children have made a world of difference for my daughter. She has played a critical role in helping Hope grow stronger and achieve physical milestones that once felt out of reach.Thanks to Dr. Barrett‚Äôs unwavering support and expert guidance, Hope is now climbing, running, kicking, and moving with more confidence every day.Her progress has been nothing short of incredible. Dr. Barrett has this unique ability to motivate and connect with her in such a special way, and because of that, she  absolutely adores her. I am beyond grateful for everything she‚Äôs done, and I truly hope that she can continue working with her for many years to come.

She  also been working with Diana for occupational therapy, and she has been absolutely wonderful. Diana has taught her so many important motor skills that have helped with her coordination, independence, and confidence.She truly has the patience of a saint and a special way of engaging children‚Äîher approach captures my daughters attention and keeps her motivated to keep trying, even when things are challenging. We‚Äôre so grateful for the progress she  has made with her support.

Overall, there simply aren‚Äôt enough words to express how deeply grateful I am for the unwavering dedication, compassion, and incredible work this company and their amazing therapists have poured into my daughter‚Äôs life. They have not only helped her grow physically stronger but have also lifted her spirit, built her confidence, and brought so much hope into our journey.

Every therapist we‚Äôve had the blessing of working with has shown a level of care and commitment that goes far beyond expectations. They‚Äôve treated my daughter like their own, celebrating her victories‚Äîbig and small‚Äîwith genuine joy and encouragement.

If you are looking for a team of therapists who will truly care about your child, believe in their potential, and walk alongside your family with heart and purpose, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to them. You will not regret it. They‚Äôve changed our lives, and I know they can do the same for yours.

I cannot recommend Laura Alvarez and the entire team at Viva Therapy highly enough! From our very first visit, I felt welcomed and supported in every way.
Laura is an exceptional pediatric physical therapist with a deep understanding of infant development. Their gentle, patient approach helped my baby feel at ease, and the personalized therapy plan led to noticeable improvements in his torticollis. She also took the time to educate me as parent, ensuring I could continue supporting my baby's progress at home. A special mention goes to Virginia, the incredible owner, who keeps everything running smoothly. She is always kind, organized, and ready to assist with any questions I had. Her warm and professional demeanor made every visit stress-free and enjoyable.
If you're looking for top-quality care for your baby, Viva Therapy is the place to go! We are so grateful for the outstanding support and expertise they provide.

I just started at viva therapy a couple weeks ago and every time is a pleasant experience. Everyone is so nice and helpful. The therapist tabata is very sweet and nurturing with my baby. My baby has come to like his sessions and I have already seen improvement in my babies movements in just a couple of sessions.

Viva therapy is a great therapy center for kids . Always very welcoming and caring for my son. Solsiree the Physical therapist and Melissa the occupational therapist are THE BEST!! Since my son started with them I‚Äôve seen alot of improvement.  They are always motivating him to do better, I can tell they love what they do . Daniel loves them

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Wilbert and Michelle.I trust them completely and always leave my dog in their care, whether it‚Äôs for training or their fantastic hotel service. They truly treat my dog like part of their family ‚Äî and my pup absolutely loves them! Every time I pick my dog up, I see how happy and well cared for he is. On top of that, the training results have been incredible. My dog‚Äôs behavior has improved so much, it‚Äôs like a whole new pup. I couldn‚Äôt be happier and highly recommend them to anyone looking for the best care and training for their furry family member!

My family has been using W&M for over 4 years and we wouldn‚Äôt trust anyone else with our beloved fur-babies. Our doggies/puppies have always been so excited to go to boarding and we are at ease knowing they are in good hands. W&M send updates to let us know they are doing well! They have accommodated our needs in emergency care situations and have always remained professional and courteous throughout the years. Our loyalty to W&M is reciprocated with amazing care for our babies and absolute trust. 10/10! ‚ù§Ô∏è

Wilberg & Michelle are the most wonderful humans I‚Äôve encountered. Wilberg absolutely loves what he does and truly pours his heart into his work. He will not quit until he is satisfied. Our fur baby came in for 3 weeks and was extremely hypersensitive. Wilberg worked tirelessly with him to make sure that he made a significant change in his behavior. Watson has made a huge change all thanks to Wilberg and his determination. Will forever be thankful for the work Wilberg did and the change in Watson‚Äôs behavior and for the blessing of being able to keep him in our home. Thank you for everything!!!! We love you!!
Best dog trainer ever, Wilber is 100 % recommended to train your dog. My puppy loves him and learned basic obedience and no pipi and poop inside the house.  Thank you

Highly recommend them for their dog training and boarding services. They send me periodic updates and videos with what my dog is doing whenever I‚Äôm out of town. I don‚Äôt think you can ask for a better service. Very responsive and easy to talk to. A+++!

Upon walking into Wags, we were warmly greeted by Kira and Keyonna. We browsed and asked questions. Then, we were able to sit in a cozy secure area to hold puppies one at a time. We checked out the male Morkies and the female Yorkie. The store was super clean and the puppy cribs were free of all pee/poo. As we sat visiting with puppies, the ladies continually greeted customers with smiles and hellos.
Keyonna  explained all the paperwork and initial care and tips for our Yorkie! She invited us to call with any questions or concerns. Kira followed up with checkup calls.
We must say the customer service is the best! Thank you ladies for making our experience with Wag's About Us so great. ü•∞

We got our little puppy from Wags About You in November 2024. Our experience with Wags @ Boca was nothing but EXCEPTIONAL!! The staff‚Äôs friendliness and extensive knowledge solidified our decision in getting our puppy from them. We worked with the staff for a month and throughout the whole time they were extremely understanding and flexible to our needs. Specifically Bob , who checked back with us multiple times to make sure we got exactly what we wanted. The 2 girls there were absolutely wonderful and let us take all the time we needed when choosing our puppy. There just isn‚Äôt enough great things to say about them. Our puppy is a happy healthy girl, and if we ever are looking to get another we will be back!

We got our mini golden doodle here just under 2 years ago now. They have a vet that they work with that makes sure all of the puppies are healthy and the store is always clean and the puppies well looked after. The owner is a super nice guy and they welcome people in just to play with the puppies but I guarantee you'll end up going back and wanting to bring one home. I bring my son in as a treat from time to time and to get my baby puppy fix. When we got our doodle we were originally planning to adopt from a shelter but we were repeatedly denied due to having a toddler at home. We already had 2 other dogs at home we had adopted from shelters and our at the time 2 year old son was calm and gentle with them and always supervised. We own our home, have a fenced in yard, had vet references and had taught both of our dogs and our toddler how to be calm and respectful of each other but shelter policies denied us. Our doodle is now our son's best friend and our other dog's playmate. We couldn't be happier!

DO NOT BUY a puppy from this pet store. We bought a $3000 Cavalier that didn‚Äôt appear to be sick until we got it home that evening. Had a wellness appointment immediately that was part of the purchase with Wags About You and the doctor put our puppy on antibiotics.
However, the antibiotics weren‚Äôt strong enough didn‚Äôt do the job the dog wound up getting  PNEUMONIA!
Had to make  an emergency appointment as my Puppy  was having a hard time breathing. Wound up taking chest X-rays, additional stronger  antibiotics, along with a second antiviral prescription and nebulizer for three weeks straight. This illness was all connected to the original vet  visit that wags about you covered, but they refuse to cover any medical bills connected to this illness after that..
3 weeks after purchasing puppy $700 later and poor little guy was SICK FROM DAY ONE!
Money making cheap owners of this store can‚Äôt even help cover part of the vet bill they are responsible for. They don‚Äôt care about the puppies just the sales.

This is a horrible institution.  3-4 puppies per crate.  So many puppies have yellow stains from their urine and not being washed off after that.  $3,000-$4,000 dollars for a puppy.  This is just awful.  I wished they'd ban breeding for several years.  The Humane shelters are all full.  Go rescue and stop this breeding ridiculousness!

I can‚Äôt speak more highly of Chris, Samantha, and the whole team at Warrior Wellness. Their program provides life changing, alternative therapies to veterans and their families free of charge. These services are vital to the health and wellbeing of our nation‚Äôs heroes. I highly encourage you to stop by for a tour to see for yourself! üôåüèº
Beautiful private location. Staff is very kind and friendly and knowledgeable. The program is deeply relaxing and life-changing.
What a great facility and opportunity for soldiers. Grateful this place is here to help our nation's heroes.

One of the best massages I have ever had. A great shop for oils and make you feel
good stuff. Darling gifts. Chiefs gear amd fun items. Worth the short 15 min drive from Overland Park. So worth it.

The hotel.. the Team House.. the team..  the mindful exercises.. ART therapy.. the bird sanctuary.. music on the beach.. the sponge docks.. yoga.. potluck cookout.. all the food!.. the never-ending coffee.. Grit and Norman.. all the volunteers.. the comradery.. and most importantly, the staff.. in beautiful Holiday, Florida.. ALL are reasons to come here! Words can only begin to describe what a life changing opportunity they provide. If you want help, they want you! ANY Veteran! Make the call!.

Dr. Cox has cared for my Cocker Spaniel since he was just two months old, and I couldn't be more grateful. She's an excellent professional, always attentive and caring toward my little dog. I also want to give a shout-out to all the assistants and staff at the vet, who are equally kind and dedicated. I feel very satisfied and at peace trusting my pet's health in her hands.

The crew here is always fantastic. The times I‚Äôve had to come. They‚Äôre very caring, efficient and professional. I recommend them 100% and my dog Solomon loves them. Jennifer was great so was the other tech and the female vet. I recommend 100% in the event of an emergency. It‚Äôs worth the drive and the expense is not that bad.

I brought my 3 dogs here last year for their annual shots and other shots needed to stay at a pet resort and saw Dr. Patel. He was very knowledgeable and kind. During that visit he left an impression on me that he truly loves what he does and does it to help the pets.

This year our older dog collapsed and we rushed her to the closest hospital to use due to us moving a hour away. They diagnosed her and gave her fluids letting us know she will need emergency surgery. I did not feel comfortable with that doctor so I called Waterford Lakes animal hospital.

The staff was understanding and requested her labs as soon as possible to help guide us in the right direction. I spoke to Dr. Patel that night and he informed me if what they are saying to be true he will need to see her. Once we arrived the next morning he ran labs and did X-rays letting us know she does need the surgery. We agreed and he performed her surgery and everything went fine.

Dr. Patel made sure to be very clear with us about everything and was super kind, honest and knowledgeable.

Everyone at this animal hospital are all so nice and I wouldn‚Äôt ever hesitate telling anyone to bring their pets here.

They were willing to see our lab in an emergency when our vet said they had no openings.  We had to put him to sleep and Waterford Lakes Animal Hospital was the most caring and compassionate staff I have ever dealt with.  Needless to say we had the records for our other dog transferred and are now a very happy customer at Waterford Lakes.

Several weeks ago, we took our 16-year-old Shih Tzu, Izzy, to the vet because she seemed to be in pain. Long story short, Dr. Rick patiently explained the procedure he had done to take care of the pain. Right away Izzy seemed better and after a few days on her medication our little Izzy was back to old self. We took her back in yesterday for a follow up along with her yearly shots and again Dr. Rick answered our zillion questions with the utmost patient. My husband and I are so glad that we changed doctors to Dr. Rick as we know he has Izzy's best interest.
Amy is one of my favorite people, she is very compassionate, makes you feel comfortable, very good listener. She's a Godsend

provider_name: Watson Clinic Center for Specialized Rehabilitation
review_text: Dr Jalen Banks is an amazing Chiropractor. He has helped me when I was ready to give up and accept a life of pain and limitations. Without his help, all the surgery and pain management I had done would not have been enough to live a more comfortable life. Never will I be able to thank him enough for all he has done. He is the icing on the top of my cake.  I highly recommend him and the wonderful specialized care program he has set up. Please allow this branch of health care to grow. I am sure more Chiropractors in this office could help so many more Watson Clinic patients have better health outcomes with less hard drugs.  Dr Banks, Thanks for all you and your wonderful staff do for us.

provider_name: Watson Clinic Center for Specialized Rehabilitation
review_text: I am so happy I met Dr. Banks. I was referred to him by a pain specialist. I had gone to another chiropractor for many years and got nowhere. I was so appreciative that he understood from the beginning my need and is so professional and his communication I am so glad that I am on the road to recovery, Dr. Banks is an understanding asset to the Chiropractic community. We are lucky to have him. Sincerely, Deborah Carkonen.

provider_name: Watson Clinic Center for Specialized Rehabilitation
review_text: When I first started seeing Dr. Banks I had excruciating back pain, it was very difficult to lay on my back and I couldn‚Äôt get a good nights sleep. After a few months of working with Dr. Banks my back pain became more manageable and I can now sleep through the night without pain. Dr. Banks is very compassionate and has a great bedside manner, I would highly recommend him to any of my friends and family! Thank you Dr. Banks!

provider_name: Watson Clinic Center for Specialized Rehabilitation
review_text: My primary care doctor sent me to Dr Jalen Banks for chronic headaches back in December. Since seeing Dr Banks my headaches have disappeared entirely!! He is so nice and such a great, personable, doctor! 10/10 recommend him! So thankful for him.

provider_name: Watson Clinic Center for Specialized Rehabilitation
review_text: Dr Banks is a great chiropractor. He‚Äôs positive, professional and tailors his technique to meet the unique needs of his patients. He also works closely with physical therapists and it‚Äôs nice to have access to multiple treatment modalities in one location. Highly recommend.

I use the Highlands Watson Clinic and have always had great treatment from my PCP, my dermatologist, the labs and radiology, and physical therapy. They caring compassionate and expert on their fields. They listen and ask questions willingly. Never had to wait very long at all for my appointments or at Express Care. I highly recommend the Highlands Watson Clinic. It's exciting to know they are going to be part of the Orlando Health facility too.So great for South Lakeland and Bartow.

I come to this Watson Clinic location every few months for appointments and it‚Äôs been a good experience every time! And I‚Äôm talking years worth of appointments at this point.

The staff is normally friendly and helpful, there‚Äôs valet if you really desire and the security guards are always friendly if you need helping finding which floor & desk to go to.

This is not the closest clinic to me, but it‚Äôs the one I choose to go to because it‚Äôs such a better and pleasant experience. The ExpressCare attached to the back is also much better for an urgent care as well.

Maybe the only bad thing is getting in and out of the clinic- it‚Äôs on one of the only steep inclines in Lakeland along the busy 540A so that can get a little tricky.

I came to this office for a Dexa bone density exam today. The woman who ran the exam was quite unfriendly and curt, and I didn't really understand why. She didn't make eye contact and made no effort to make me feel comfortable during the visit. When it was over, she said, "you can GET OUT this way...". I really tried to ignore the obvious inflection and undertones in her statement... But it was quite obvious that she was being rude (but in a manner that could be denied). This is the second bad experience I've had at this location. This location is 2 minutes from my house, but I won't be visiting again, ever.

I have been seeing Jean Kanidis, APRN and her team for a few years now. Check in is always easy and I usually don‚Äôt wait more than 5-7 minutes in the waiting room before being called back. Care Team Member, Myrlaine P. is always very helpful in person and through messages in the patient portal. She never leaves my questions unanswered or concerns unaddressed and is always so quick to get back to me.
Jean takes the time to listen to what is going on and is always able to help me out when my health isn‚Äôt the best. This is a great team and I highly recommend making an appointment with her.

I visited this urgent care facility last week, and the triage team was quick and friendly. I saw Dr. Giovaninna De La Cruz, who was knowledgeable and kind, and she addressed all of my concerns. I was very pleased with the care I received. Keep up the good work, everyone!

provider_name: Watson Clinic Physical Therapy & Sports Medicine
review_text: Ladies!  This is not a topic discussed much, but needs to be.  Pelvic floor physical therapy.  I am so grateful to my gynecologist who recommended this after my hysterectomy. Ashley, my physical therapist, was fantastic, encouraging and supportive throughout the process.  Ashley explained that pelvic floor physical therapy can also help with stress incontinence, prolapse, and other problems associated with menopause or even childbirth.  Ladies - don't be shy- it is YOUR health and well being.  Make that call!

I am extremely satisfied with this agency! My twins have been at Watson‚Äôs Way and they have grown so much. They absolutely love Dr
Heard.
Dr. heard also created a lecture surviving supervising sabatoge during one of the most challenging times of the company, we are so happy to have someone like this in the field still fighting for our population!
Also speaking on behalf of a friend who also has her son there, they were so inclusive and aware of their diverse clientele. Watson's Way is so great in providing very helpful resources in Spanish! They have Spanish speaking staff at both levels and they always make sure to review any document thoroughly in Spanish before signing!
It is a very comfortable environment! I highly, highly recommend!

My family and I are truly grateful to the staff at Watson‚Äôs Way ABA. The progress my son has made is incredible. Having Spanish speaking staff members not only made him feel more comfortable, but it also helped him communicate and work with my mother (his abuela). I am beyond grateful that Watson‚Äôs Way provides services to the Hispanic community. Seeing the additional Spanish speaking staff members made me happy. I love the staff. I see the dedication and commitment they have to their children.

The dedication Dr. Heard has for this field is admirable. Her lecture on Surviving Supervising Sabatoge showed me just how committed she is to paving the way for our children. I couldn‚Äôt ask for a better provider for my son. I highly recommend this program.

My son started when Watson's Way was first opened. I always felt that the company strived to continue to improve his growth and appreciated their dedication and partnership. We only left due to a change with insurance, and I would recommend Watson's Way to other parents.

I attended a conference in Grand Rapids Michigan last week. Dr. Heard was very inspiring. Her book and workshops are very helpful and educational for parents and educators. I learned some helpful tips to help my grandchildren learn and thrive. I strongly recommend you purchase the book and workbook, entitled James and his wish for cars stars and goldfish.

I can't say enough amazing things about the CEO, Elaina Watson. She changed our lives, and my son's life, 6 years ago. At the time, we had the pleasure of having Elaina as our BCBA, and she truly became like family. She genuinely cares about helping kiddos and their families, and it‚Äôs clear that this passion drives everything she does.

Even after she left her position to pursue her dream of opening her own clinic, we still stayed in touch, and she's continued to be an incredible resource for our family. Even though I'm all the way in Michigan. I honestly don‚Äôt know what we would have done without her.

Over the years, we‚Äôve worked with other ABA providers and BCBAs, but none of them compared to the level of care Elaina gave. She gave me so much parent training that often, I felt like I knew more than most technicians! Her support was invaluable, and I‚Äôll forever be grateful for the impact she made on us.

If you‚Äôre looking for an ABA provider who truly cares about the families she works with, Elaina Watson and Watsons Way is the one you want.

We Absolutely Love Waves Behavior Solutions!  üåä My son has Autism, and has gone to this center for more than two years. The staff has been phenomenal, very supportive, knowledgeable, and helpful. Highly recommend this establishment to any family who may need help with their children‚Äôs needs. The owners are AmAzInG and will go above and beyond to make things happen! Every RBT we have had has been amazing! The staff truly cares and have a deep passion for what they do. 10 stars for sure!

I have purchased 2 cats from Amy, a few years apart. They are both gorgeous and healthy as can be, my calico girls is nearly 20 pounds! I like the fact that she vettes buyers to make sure the cats are going to good homes. If you see anyone pouting because she wouldn't sell them a cat, you can be sure there was a good reason for the denial.
We just got our second kitten from WeBeCoons. Amy is a wonderful and responsible breeder and highly recommend this cattery. We love our kittens so much!

We got our Maine Coon cats from Amy in 2004. Diesel and Charlie Girl are still in great health and are loving family members. They get along well with guests coming into the house and with our Doberman. They have wonderful temperaments. Both cats did animal assisted therapy work for over 9 years and still make visits by special request. Amy raises well adjusted kittens in  a home environment and we would definitely recommend her!

Totally forgot to leave a review for Amy so I am doing that now! We got our little pea Blaze back in June of this year and he is an absolute sweetheart. We are forever grateful that we got him from Amy. She herself is such a sweet and caring person and INCREDIBLY knowledgeable. I absolutely LOVED Amy and the way she was with everyone who was picking up their kitties and with the kitties too. Such a gentle and wonderful person. Here are some pictures of little pea!‚ù§Ô∏è

I have wanted a MaineCoon forever and I was so relieved when I found WeBeCoons. I was able to talk to the breeder and face time  with her and my now precious baby girl. The entire process was amazing she sent me regular messages with pictures just to let me know how the kitten was doing. I have had my kitten no for almost 2 weeks and I am still in contact with her just to ask questions and show her pictures of my baby  I know that if I ever need anything or am worried about anything I can reach out and she will get back to me quickly.

I have no hesitation recommending Weeks Wellness to absolutely everyone I know. I was experiencing symptoms 12 weeks postpartum that I knew could be improved but did not have the tools or knowledge to fix myself. Melissa Kate was extremely thorough in identifying exactly what was causing my symptoms and laid out a clear plan that she was confident would solve the issues I was experiencing. She went above and beyond to repair my pelvic floor and educate me on my own body, equipping me to help myself when our time was done. She successfully solved the issues I came to her with and more. This is certainly an investment but it is WORTH IT! The office is comfortable, welcoming, and truly for the benefit of the women they serve!

I saw Melissa for a pelvic floor session and for a stemwave treatment. In both sessions, she was so thorough and attentive to my concerns. I felt very cared for and heard. Melissa was able to pinpoint areas that have bothered me for years. I will definitely be recommending her to friends and family.

Melissa Urrutia helped me solve a leaky bladder problem I developed after having kids. This issue had been going on for 18 years and I did not realize it could be üíØ% resolved through PT! Melissa was professional, knowledgeable and able to answer all my questions. She curtailed my therapy to my needs and was very attentive which enabled her to properly diagnose my problems and prescribe the right therapy. I just wish I had done this sooner!

Everything about Weeks Wellness is wonderful, from first appointment booking by attentive and gracious Carrie Ann, through 3 months of weekly appointments with Dr. Urrutia. Dr. Urrutia's holistic approach meant she focused on root causes driving my need for PT, and she always took plenty of time to consult on my condition week to week. Highly recommend !!!
Melissa Harris is awesome and very versatile.  It only did she expertly do nerve manipulation on my arm but she saved my hips and back from prolonged pain & stiffness. Thank you, Melissa!üíï

provider_name: WellCome OM Integral Healing & Education Center
review_text: Choosing this location for our event was definitely one of the best decisions we could have made! The venue is not only stunning, but the staff is absolutely wonderful as well. From beginning to end, we had a fantastic experience. Lenora was always on top of everything and didn‚Äôt miss a beat. On the day of the event, Kathy was incredible. We couldn't have asked for anything more! I've already referred a few people and will keep recommending this venue to anyone who's looking.

provider_name: WellCome OM Integral Healing & Education Center
review_text: We had a beautiful baby shower for my daughter in July.  Truly, a beautiful venue. Lenora was fabulous to work with. She stayed in contact and replied quickly to messages.  Pricing was very reasonable; however, we weren't told until the final walk through and planning that we needed event insurance.  No problem, totally understandable, but let the potential customer know up front when booking.

provider_name: WellCome OM Integral Healing & Education Center
review_text:
I was there for an event sponsored by The Hernando Sun a weekly newspaper at their event center. This is one of the ugliest buildings I have seen from the outside but what a difference on the inside. This event center has some pink sidewall lighting and the inside is huge but nice. The food was served in a
nice lobby.

The outside area has some very pretty landscaping and there is plenty of parking some of it shaded. There is a doctor office in front of the event center

provider_name: WellCome OM Integral Healing & Education Center
review_text: Absolutely wonderful concert! The musicians are incredibly talented. We enjoyed every moment of the evening. Amazing music in a great intimate venue!

provider_name: WellCome OM Integral Healing & Education Center
review_text: This is my favorite place to spend time at when I am visiting friends! The staff and experiences make you feel at home. Pat at the front desk is always super friendly, informative, and open to answer any questions you may have! The property is beautiful,  the services are invigorating, and fulfilling.  This is my go to stop for self-care and relaxation. What a hidden gem this place is!

WellPack Pharmacy is fast becoming a favorite place of mine, not just for the always friendly customer service, but the professional efficiency and the entire atmosphere. The look, feel, and smell of this quaint pharmacy is always refreshing and relaxing. I‚Äôve never gone in there without feeling better as I left because of some kind word or interaction with staff. They are such a blessing!

Wellpack staff are the best. Great customer service, timely, and efficient. Only once was there a slight issue with a prescription (as can sometimes happen), and they immediately corrected the issue. It was so refreshing to have a pharmacy make things right quickly. Always kind and helpful.

I had good experiences with WellPack until I moved recently. I updated my address with WellPack, my prescriber, and everything else. I successfully received prescriptions delivered to the new address. Then, WellPack randomly sent a prescription to my old address.

At first, I called them. The person who answered said they would escalate to someone who could help. I said okay. They said they would call me back. No one ever called back.

Eventually I made my way to the store in-person. They apologized and said they would make it right. They refunded me. They said they had to contact my prescriber to try to get a replacement prescription first. I said okay.

I get a message later that my prescriber has ‚Äúdenied a refill request‚Äù. I called my prescriber and they said WellPack just asked for a refill on the medication, and did not own up to their mistake to the provider like they did with me. Obviously this caused confusion, as it‚Äôs not always appropriate to refill a medication 2 months later without a follow up appointment.

This pharmacy has been exhausting to deal with. It wasn‚Äôt even a controlled substance. It was an antifungal.

Nick performed a true miracle concerning a very expensive Rx my husband takes for his diabetes. He was faced with temporarily losing his health insurance due to changing jobs and Nick came to the rescue and worked it out where we were able to fill enough of the meds to last till his other coverage kicks in. Thanks for being a lifesaver, Nick! We appreciate you going the extra mile for us! We will be loyal customers to this pharmacy even though it's a bit out of the way. The excellent service is worth the drive.

Best pharmacy EVER!!!!!!  I have my favorite people who work the front desk (Sherona and Averee) and Dr. Jay are amazing people!  They are super fast, know their customers, and clean, pleasant environment.  They help you when your insurance changes‚Ä¶.they have easy access in and out of their location makes it a breeze!  Highest recommendation ever!

Everyone, Staff and Members, are extremely pleasant and kind.
The place is immaculate, spacious, not too loud.
The pools are pristine and lovely to have natural light in that and most areas. But the dimly lit rooms are perfect for yoga and some other session.  Just designed so intelligently, and run so well.  Thank you, WellWay ... I honestly believe you are saving my life.

Hello
Recently toured the Wellway location in Cape Coral. I can‚Äôt wait to join! The staff is amazing and the gym is the perfect atmosphere for total body workouts. The scheduled fitness classes are challenging but welcomes all levels. Sometimes in today‚Äôs society people really are out line with negative comments. Thank you Wellway!

Saturday 8/2/25 Aqua Aerobics, 18 people in the pool waiting for class to start‚Ä¶ NO instructor, NO back up plan, no manager to be found anywhere. 18 people angry! NO cancellations. Not the first time this has happened.

Overall this is a great place to come and exercise with the classes they offer and machine etc. BUT the only thing they need to fix is the air conditioning some areas it works great other areas not so well. The area that they have the treadmills and machines they have no fans for circulation. Would love to see that improvement for us.

The daycare is so good with my 2 year old daughter, she begs me to go to the gym every morning. When we get there, she runs to the ladies that work in there. When I go pick her up, she‚Äôs always having fun playing with them and she always tells them ‚ÄúI love you!‚Äù When we leave. They have become her family.

Michael and his team are absolutely amazing!! Extremely professional, friendly and caring! They listen and pay attention to every small detail while creating a personal treatment plan. I am deeply grateful for improving my Mom's mobility and making her look forward to coming to each session. One of a kind place!!

I was feeling a lot of pain down my right leg and my spinal area. My doctor authorized 12 PT sessions.  I was 90% in pain but now I'm feeling so much better after a few sessions! Thank you Wellcare Team ! I recommend anyone who has any physical problems to seek care at Wellcare Rehab I Hallandale Beach !

Michael and his team are amazing! They are extremely knowledgeable, empathetic and positive.  I was pushed to succeed at every visit. They gave me the confidence to do the necessary exercises to get walking again after my trimalleolar ankle fracture. I trusted them every step of the way. Now, just a few months later, I am implementing their home exercise plan with a goal of running with my grandkids soon!  I highly recommend Wellcare Rehabilitation & Wellness!!!

I have been ailing with pain in my hip for quite a while; I started physical therapy less than a month ago and it has been an amazing result; I am practically pain free.  I believe that the treatment I‚Äôve had at WellCare rehab has been successful due to the wonderful staff. Everyone is extremely supportive and I feel they have my care in mind and they are extremely knowledgeable.  I highly recommend them.

I have gone to Wellcare many times over the last 15 years due to injuries to both my legs.  Mike is an awesome person whose professional experience and care show each time he has worked on me.  His staff are just as professional and caring as he is. I would not go anywhere else!  I recommend him highly.

The Wellspring team is amazing. They have always been there for my daughter and helped her recover and healed from her sports injury. Marcus, Christine and their whole family are so lovely and we are so blessed to have found them. Their staff are so nice, welcoming and knowledgeable from the minute you step into their office and check out. If you haven't booked your visit, you're missing out.

I had heard about Wellspring from a friend and I finally got a chance to go today the athletic trainer Gracy and Dr. Jessica where amazing I walked in feeling like complete tightness and leaving there I feel like I can move again they treated me with different modalities and left there feeling relieved, supported, heard and treated with care!

I‚Äôm looking forward to my next appointment and I üíØ feel I will finally get my life back so I can continue on my journey to a healthy and active life!

Highly recommended WELLSPRING!

Thank you so much !

If you are broken, come here!!! I cannot rave about this team enough. So many services to choose from. Dr. Marcus is amazing, hilarious, and extremely intelligent. He cares so much about what is going on with me. He takes the time to know his patients. He takes new problems very seriously and addresses them immediately. The ARISE/recovery team is also amazing. I love seeing every single one of them. They are all so intuitive and they use their skills and knowledge of different modalities to make you feel like a million bucks. I highly recommend every one on this team. It's hard to find a group of people that truly want to fix you and help you thrive. Plus, the amount of new technology and modalities this practice has speaks for how much they care about helping their patients. They have perfectly integrated manual work plus pain relieving machines to work on whatever issue you have or may have. Love this place!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Dr. Marcus and his entire team. From the moment you walk through the door, you‚Äôre greeted with warmth, professionalism, and a genuine sense of care. Dr. Marcus is not only an outstanding chiropractor, but also an excellent communicator. He takes the time to explain every adjustment, what he‚Äôs doing, and‚Äîmost importantly‚Äîwhy. This level of transparency really builds trust and makes you feel confident and comfortable throughout your treatment.

What sets Dr. Marcus apart is his personalized approach. He doesn‚Äôt just treat symptoms‚Äîhe takes the time to understand your lifestyle, your concerns, and your goals. Each visit feels like a step forward in your health journey, not just a quick fix.

His entire team is just as incredible. Everyone is attentive, kind, and truly committed to your well-being. It‚Äôs rare to find such a cohesive, caring, and knowledgeable group of professionals all in one place.

If you‚Äôre looking for a chiropractor who genuinely cares and delivers outstanding results, look no further than Dr. Marcus. Highly recommend!

We had a great experience at Wellspring. Dr. Marcus and his team helped my son to be able to get back on the field and feeling good. We are forever grateful for the team and their tremendous knowledge and attitudes to help my son. We highly recommend this practice !

I received physical therapy in the past at this clinic, at a time when my body needed lots of mental and physical healing. As a Physical Therapist myself I found Leslie and her assistant Tanya to be beyond wonderful. They helped me heal physically after pregnancy loss. The sessions helped motivate me to continue on my own physical healing journey, which helped to contribute to a successful pregnancy and birth this past spring. I would highly recommend their services, as they have a holistic approach that‚Äôs centered around you the patient.

My wife and I can‚Äôt thank Dr. Leslie enough for everything she‚Äôs done for us. Before starting therapy, we were going through a difficult time that affected not just health, but also our everyday life as a couple. Thanks to her care and dedication, things have completely changed for the better.

Dr. Leslie is not only highly skilled, but also incredibly kind and understanding. She guided us with patience and genuine care, and that made the whole journey so much easier. Today, we feel happier, stronger, and more at peace  , and we truly owe that to her. We‚Äôll always be grateful for the positive impact she‚Äôs had on our lives.

I cannot say enough amazing things about Dr. Leslie! She has truly changed my life. From the very first visit, she was professional, kind, and extremely knowledgeable. She took the time to really understand my pain and came up with a treatment plan that actually worked.
The SoftWave shockwave therapy she uses is incredible ‚Äî it took away my inflammation and addressed scar tissue pain that no other doctor was able to help me with. After working with Dr. Leslie, I honestly feel like I‚Äôm 19 again! The relief I‚Äôve experienced is worth every penny and more.
If you‚Äôre struggling with pain, don‚Äôt waste time anywhere else. Dr. Leslie is the only doctor who was able to remove my pain and give me my mobility and quality of life back. I highly, highly recommend her services!

I have had the pleasure of working with both Dr. Leslie and Tanya who were both incredibly knowledgeable and always made me feel super comfortable. They both took the time every week to listen to my complaints/updates and tailored the care they provided to fit my needs. Highly recommend Wellsprings health if you‚Äôre in need of PT.

I recently had the pleasure of working with Leslie, and I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful for the experience. From the moment we met, Leslie‚Äôs warmth and genuine care put me at ease. Her unique blend of pelvic floor expertise, knowledge of Chinese healing, and myofascial techniques worked wonders for me. Each session felt like a step toward not just physical healing, but also a deeper sense of well-being. I‚Äôm so thankful for Leslie‚Äôs holistic approach and heartfelt dedication. Highly recommend!

What an amazing group of people!  I came to meet them through a friend.  There was a stray dog at our office who was sweet but scared. We captured her, and I brought her to Wellswood. The staff fawned over her, Dr. Gustavo was attentive and listened. AND 3 days later, Dr. Gustavo reached out personally to check to see how she was doing. Remarkable!  Thank you!

From the very first time I walked into the clinic, I knew I was in the right place. Everyone was kind, sweet, and attentive. The team is proactive in providing any information or documents. The veterinarians are wonderful, informative, and communicative, and the assistants are just as amazing. We truly love them all! I‚Äôm definitely not going anywhere else, and neither are my friends with furry babies. I recommend this clinic to everyone!

Absolutely the best veterinarian facility I've been too. When you walk in the door the staff greets you, the are very nice and professional. Waiting time in lobby was minimal. The waiting time in room was minimal and aain the staff and veterinarian were so kind and caring with my dog. They are absolutely the best!

I love Dr. Gustavo and his staff. They are always very attentive and caring toward our pet Maxi. On our last visit, we were able to see the new facilities, which are very clean and extremely comfortable. The always smiling staff takes care of every detail. I recently needed a last-minute appointment for my pet, and they made room for me despite not having any available space. The details of a family business‚ù§Ô∏è. With complete confidence , the care of my pets are in the hands of Wellswood Midtown Animal Hospital!

Dr. Gustavo and the entire team at Wellswood Animal Hospital went above and beyond to help my wife and me bring our dogs from Tampa to St. Vincent. Angela and the front office staff were incredibly organized and supportive, seamlessly coordinating our appointments and handling all the pet import paperwork with precision.

When we had to call from the foreign animal health department, their continued assistance made a world of difference‚Äîwe truly felt like we weren‚Äôt navigating the process alone.

There‚Äôs a reason so many people trust Wellswood with their beloved pets: they combine expertise with genuine compassion, making sure every pet‚Äîand every owner‚Äîfeels cared for and confident throughout the journey

I really loved seeing Wende. She was honest with me and always kept me honest with myself and helped me in a gentle way. Her staff has always been friendly and discreet. I've lived in a few states (military hubby) and by far she's helped the most.
Wende Anderson is a kind, gentle and compassionate person. I had a wonderful experience assisting a family member in need of her services.
She is great üëç, Help me with my VA compensation, and achieve the results I need to get approved for 70 percentage PTSD, help alot.
Dr. Wendy is very through and extremely professional, I recommend her highly if you really want to get to the root of your situation. She is an angle that's tough on mental issues.

Dr. Thomas is the vet I wish I‚Äôd known from the beginning of owning my dog! I first went to WDV for my dog‚Äôs grass allergies since we just moved to Florida from AZ. The vet we first saw was not the best fit personally, and after letting the front desk know they went out of their way to have the manager call me and make sure that my next visit with a better fit (Dr. Thomas) matched our needs. The actual visit with Dr. Thomas was phenomenal and I feel like the treatment plan we made for Fraya‚Äôs dysplasia is better than I‚Äôve ever had. I cannot say enough about the professionalism, warmth, fear-free handling (!), and extensive knowledge the team has. Thank you WDV!!!

I can‚Äôt say enough wonderful things about this veterinary clinic and especially Dr. Melanie Thomas. She has been taking care of my dogs since they were puppies, always with the greatest professionalism, kindness, and genuine love for animals.

Recently, one of my dogs needed a dental cleaning and unfortunately had to have some teeth removed. Dr. Thomas and her team made the whole process smooth and reassuring. They explained everything clearly, treated my dog with so much care, and provided excellent follow-up instructions.

I truly trust Dr. Thomas with my pets‚Äô health and feel grateful to have found such a compassionate and knowledgeable veterinarian. Highly recommended!

I was very nervous finding a new vet for my dog's teeth cleanings but West Delray Veterinarian  put my mind at ease.
Everyone there was so thoughtful and friendly.  From the receptionists & techs to the Dr's as well.
They consistently kept me updated on the surgeries as well as checking on them post surgeries.  Dr. Thomas did a great job explaining everything to me.
Their rates are a little higher that normal it seems.
I would recommend them to anyone who needs a caring and knowledgeable vet.

The team here is absolutely incredible. Their customer service is unmatched, and they‚Äôre incredibly thorough in every aspect of care for our dog, Addison. For the past year and a half, we‚Äôve been driving an hour from Miami just to come here ‚Äî that‚Äôs how much we trust and value them. Addison was recently spayed, and once again, they went above and beyond. Their communication is excellent, they follow up consistently, and they even make it easy to reach out via text with any questions. Thank you West Delray Vet!

I love West Delray Vet! All of their staff really care about animals and it‚Äôs just such a wonderful experience! Dr. Thomas and Dr. Block are both really amazing doctors. If you are looking for a holistic approach combined with a more traditional approach to health care for your pet‚Ä¶ they can provide all of the above!

I can't thank Phil Smith enough for the fantastic job he did to help relieve my back issues.  His services and advice were spot on when others were telling me to go for surgery.  I listened to Phil and now I am feeling 100% better and have my life back.  I will refer Phil to my friends and family.

provider_name: West Florida Orthopedic Rehabilitation, Inc - Humphrey St
review_text:
I chose West Florida Orthopedics after a total knee replacement, mainly due to their proximity to my home (I got lucky on this one) and excellent reviews.
I am so grateful I did!
The staff is both professional and personal, helping me achieve my goals and keeping me from panicking over the many concerns I had, due to lack of knowledge...
I worked with Phil, he had me attending on a regular schedule, and changed up the routine to keep me involved and to challenge me more and more.
I always felt encouraged and positive that I was going to come through this okay! AND I did!
The office staff also did a great job at communicating with my doctor and insurance company, to make sure everyone was on the same page, and my needs were being met!
Thank you West Florida Orthopedic Rehabilitation!
I strongly recommend their services to anyone needing help!

provider_name: West Florida Orthopedic Rehabilitation, Inc - Humphrey St
review_text: I was referred to West Florida Ortho Rehab following ACL and Meniscus surgery. Phil has been amazing helping me regain my strength, mobility and most importantly, my confidence so that I can return to activities that I did pre-surgery. Phil makes you feel welcoming and a priority. I went expecting PT and in returned I gained a friend. West Florida Ortho Rehab makes you feel like family. Also, Laura at the front desk is absolutely charming and so positive. If your having an off day, she will make your day better as you enter the door.

provider_name: West Florida Orthopedic Rehabilitation, Inc - Humphrey St
review_text:
Very thankful that my  pain in my knee went away.  Mr. Philip Smith done an amazing job working with my knee and neck.  I always feel better after my therapy sessions. I highly recommend  the West Florida Orthopedic Rehabilitation  clinic.. Excellent place and very nice staff!

- Judith M

provider_name: West Florida Orthopedic Rehabilitation, Inc - Humphrey St
review_text: I have trusted Phil with my numerous  problems areas.  He understands the problems veterans face.  I‚Äôve never felt rushed or ignored and have requested West Florida Orthopedic each time I have a new problem area to work on.

provider_name: West Florida Orthopedic Rehabilitation, Inc - Humphrey St
review_text: Phil is an excellent PT provider.  He is very experienced and genuinely caring for his patients.  Facility is clean and spacious.  Plenty of parking space too.

provider_name: West Melbourne Health and Rehabilitation Center
review_text:
My sister Gloria came here after being in the hospital. We were worried at first but after couple of days stay and met the staff, we felt at ease. They were all very helpful and always there for her, very friendly and wonderful. To mention some of the staff like Debbie, Scott, Bill, Barbara, Pam and others who she cannot remember the names. She said they were all very caring, very hard workers. She is very thankful to the CNA who gave her a shower, she cannot remember the name.
She was very satisfied with the meals served at the Rehab.
With regards to the Business Office Staff, I can say they were very approachable, coordinated and willing to help the family to ease with the paper works necessary. To mention the staff, we met like Marsha, Linda, Kristin.
I will recommend West Melbourne Health and Rehabilitation Center to anybody who needs the services you offer.
Thank you for everything you have done to my sister.

provider_name: West Melbourne Health and Rehabilitation Center
review_text:
The CNA's and nurses are so attentive. The ones standing out are Sandy, Marie and Alexis. They always went the extra mile. The first night after coming from "Palm Bay, nightmare of a Hospital", I was starving. Marie brought me a pband j sandwich , ice cream and Graham crackers. I didn't even have to ask. Sandy always had my hot coffee ready in the am.
Alexis made clear it was her job to take good care of me. All the nurses are attentive and the therapy staff do their best to get u well. Janice. The kitchen manager came to visit me 3 times. She wanted to know if I was happy with the food and if I had any special requests. All and all. I'm very happy with my stay here. Oh... this is Sharon Webb in room C29 A xoxo

provider_name: West Melbourne Health and Rehabilitation Center
