From the owner to the nurses and their various assistants, they're all very kind and you can feel it in the atmosphere and in the way they treat each family equally. If you're looking for a place, don't hesitate to visit them.

provider_name: WooF Dogs - Dog Training & Canine Behavior Consultants
review_text:
We love our dog Zeke and he loves us, but he hasn‚Äôt always been friendly to guests in our home, and that‚Äôs saying it nicely. We decided to get some training beyond the basics.

Zeke first stayed at Woof dogs to get his training kick started and when we picked him up, we were so impressed with what we saw him doing. We had grins from ear to ear.  We were excited to continue to reinforce what we all learn. Thankfully we signed up for the in home sessions and Charles was there to further our training with Zeke.

Charles was excellent at getting to know Zeke and really tailoring what his and our training needs were for us to be able to enjoy Zeke even more. We saw a big swing in how Zeke behaved pretty quickly and couldn‚Äôt be happier with the outcome. Grateful for Woof Dogs and Charles.

provider_name: WooF Dogs - Dog Training & Canine Behavior Consultants
review_text:
This review is Long overdue
We turned to Woof Dogs in Loxahatchee when we added a 9 week old golden retriever puppy to our family.
We wanted to be confident that our 2 year old golden retriever knew all his training commands & manners.
We had the pleasure of consulting with Shay about our concerns.
He then selected Tomas for our 6 weeks of training at our home.
What a great match it was!
Our pup Louie absolutely LOVED Tomas
On training days Louie looked forward to spending his session with Tomas.
Tomas is the BEST & he did indeed confirm for us that our dog knew all his commands but he just needed the proper communication from us. It worked & he listens every time
Tomas was very patient with us humans.
He is kind & soft spoken but still firm.
He really knows dogs & his business.
We‚Äôve invested in our pup & tried a few different trainers‚Ä¶‚Ä¶never again
Now we know about Woof Dogs & Tomas
Thanks to Melissa for setting everything up
Thanks to Tomas for making it so easy.
Louie is PERFECT & our new little one is learning everything from her big brother Lou.
God forbid we need some more training we will not hesitate to call Woof Dogs.

provider_name: WooF Dogs - Dog Training & Canine Behavior Consultants
review_text: I cannot say enough good things about this place!!!! After trying multiple trainers that didn‚Äôt understand how to train puppy Marshall, we found woof dogs and they really do speak your dogs language! We chose to do the two week training session where we were able to pick Marshall up every day so he was only there from 9 to 3. Tomas, by far, the best trainer we have ever used. Marshall was so excited to see Tomas everyday and they really bonded so well. Tomas understood Marshall in a way that no other trainer could, and because of that, had such a successful training experience. Such a sweet man and very reassuring and calming to dogs and owners alike. Highly recommend

provider_name: WooF Dogs - Dog Training & Canine Behavior Consultants
review_text:
Woof dogs was just what I needed for my puppy, Cooper.
Tomas was very knowledgeable, patient, and kind.
He is amazing!
After 10 weeks of in home training, I can confidently say that I have the tools needed to navigate my new journey as a pet mom.

provider_name: WooF Dogs - Dog Training & Canine Behavior Consultants
review_text: Tomas was amazing. Professional, knowledgeable, patient and most of all kind! He built a trusting bond with my dog Charlie and was able to effectively train him. He was kenneled here for 2 weeks for his boot camp obedience training and it was so comfortable knowing they spent hours everyday with your dog and that he wasn‚Äôt alone like in a normal kennel. Charlie‚Äôs walking away a better dog!

Words can‚Äôt express the gratitude we have for the staff at Woof Tang - especially Dana and Lexi. Our Maya is a rescue and was basically terrified anytime she wasn‚Äôt in our home. We enrolled her in the 3 week board and train puppy program. Although hesitant at first, Woof Tang has EXCEEDED our expectations! Maya has become so confident and her quality of life has improved dramatically. We really enjoy walking her now without constant pulling to come inside! She learned so much, including coping skills like sitting and laying down to self regulate if she becomes overwhelmed. The staff spent 2 hours with us upon pickup to teach us everything she learned and have been there for us when we have questions since being home! We also got a report card almost every day telling us about Maya‚Äôs progress which was awesome. I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Woof Tang. Well worth the investment!

20/10 stars

Back in December I was seriously concerned that my little, goofy Loki would get in big trouble if he got out of my home because he was sure to bite someone. Then I have Rogue who barked all damn day uncontrollably. They both were extremely impulsive and  had other concerning behaviors that I was just not getting through with by my training. I wanted my dogs to live a free and full life and that means they needed to be trained and obedient. After months of trying on my own, the day came where Loki almost bit a city official. That was it, I needed to get serious training.

Choosing a trainer is a difficult process. There are so many options with various opinions and views, but how do you find one that will be effective. Board and train is not a cheap endeavor and the last thing you want is to waste your money. So I called around, spoke to several potential trainers, and did some research.

Ultimately, I reached out to Lexie at Woof Tang K9 and she immediately made time to meet my dogs. I already knew their issues were serious enough to need board and train. She worked with me on the price and got my dogs in immediately.

After 4 weeks of training, the dogs (who I now call my scholars) returned from boarding school. I have had them home for two weeks now and I can say that EVERY penny I spent was worth it! The incessant barking has more than significantly diminished and I am no longer in fear that Loki will bite someone.

Yes, it is up to me continue their training at home and not allow back into bad habits. When O have questions, I text Lexie and she is always responsive. If i need a home training visit- she is willing. I literally have my dogs safely off leash in my yard and I am 100% confident that when I call they will come. Loki isnt running at the neighbors. Neither of them is ignoring my commands. My dogs are free and they are happy because they are so well trained.

I will forever be grateful to Lexie and her team at Woof Tang for giving me the ability to ensure my dogs have a free and safe life!!

The absolute best! Sent my high activity pup for board and train and can't begin to describe the difference! Add the fact that the team truly goes above and beyond and cares for the dogs like they are their own. I was skeptical about them being able to help with Ruby, due to her energy and fears, but I wish we had done it sooner. Such a great business with even better people!

We have used Woof Tang for daycare for our dog Reese, which she absolutely loves! Recently, we enrolled Reese in their Board and Train program. The team at Woof Tang is so loving and attentive to each dog's specific needs, and they truly work to achieve the goals of the whole family.

Picking up our sweet Reese from training was such a blessing. While she‚Äôs always been a sweet pup, she used to be reactive on the leash whenever we encountered other dogs, which made family outings challenging. As a family that loves going out with our dog, we knew we needed expert help.

When we picked Reese up, she was overjoyed to be reunited with us‚Äîand thanks to the training, she now has the skills (and we have the tools) for successful walks and outings. We couldn‚Äôt be happier and are so grateful to the Woof Tang team and I know Reese is looking forward to her next Daycare visit!

I bring my dogs here every other week for grooming, and the service is consistently excellent. The staff creates a welcoming environment, and my dogs actually look forward to their visits. They always leave looking well-groomed and smelling fresh. I have not yet used the boarding services, but based on my experience, this will be my first choice when the time comes.

World Children‚Äôs Therapy Center is truly an outstanding place for children‚Äôs care and development. From the moment you walk in, you can feel the warmth and dedication of the staff. They go above and beyond to create a nurturing and supportive environment where every child receives individualized attention and the highest quality of care.

The therapists are incredibly skilled, patient, and compassionate, always making sure that each child feels comfortable and engaged in their therapy sessions. They take the time to understand every child‚Äôs unique needs and tailor their approach accordingly, which makes a huge difference in their progress.

Not only do they prioritize the well-being and development of the children, but they also foster a positive and collaborative work environment for their staff. It‚Äôs clear that everyone here is passionate about what they do, and that love and dedication shine through in every interaction.

If you‚Äôre looking for a therapy center that truly cares about your child‚Äôs growth and happiness, World Children‚Äôs Therapy Center is the place to be. I highly recommend them to any parent seeking a supportive and professional team that will help their child thrive!
They have an Amazing team working at a beautiful Center!  200% recommended by my family

As parents, we feel very supported by the team at World Children's Therapy Center. They keep us informed about our son's progress and give us clear recommendations on how we can continue supporting his development at home. This kind of open communication has been invaluable to us. I highly recommend them. Thank you, thank you, World Children's Therapy Center!

World Children‚Äôs Therapy Center has been an exceptional experience for our family. From the first contact, the agency was incredibly quick and efficient in the process so that our son could receive ABA services without unnecessary delays. Their commitment to the well-being and development of children is evident in every detail, from the quality of their therapies to the welcoming and supportive environment they provide.

The team of therapists are highly professional, dedicated and truly passionate about helping each child reach their full potential. We have noticed significant progress in our son's development, especially in his communication and behavioral skills, thanks to the personalized and effective approaches they implement.

Additionally, the support they provide to parents is invaluable. We have felt accompanied every step of the way, receiving guidance, advice and the peace of mind of knowing that our son is in the best hands. Not only do they work with children, but they also empower families to continue reinforcing learning at home.

We are deeply grateful to World Children‚Äôs Therapy Center for their dedication and professionalism. Without a doubt, we recommend this center to any family looking for a place committed to the optimal development of their children.

Excellent attention to children and families. Well-prepared and attentive professionals. A very welcoming, pleasant place with all the necessary tools for children to receive ABA services efficiently. Thank you for your services. I recommend them 100 percent.
If you need PT, this is the spot!  I had an ACL tear and repair surgery.   These guys are on their game!  Knowledgeable, thorough and professional.  I highly recommend XL physical therapy!

Tom and the XL Physical Team have been fantastic during my ACL recovery. I‚Äôve been coming for about 8 months and have made great progress. They push me hard while ensuring I am maintaining good form and not risking injury again. 10/10 recommend using them for any of your physical rehab needs!!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about XL Physical Therapy! They put so much time and expertise into rehabbing my shoulder after an injury, tailoring every session to my specific needs with incredible attention and care. The positive energy here is contagious, and the entire team is amazing‚ÄîEbony, Ana, Megan,  and my primary therapist, Kat are all fantastic. They made my entire PT experience completely stress-free, incredibly positive, and I looked forward to every visit. I highly recommend XL PT for anyone seeking truly personalized and expert care!

XL Physical Therapy is outstanding!! I‚Äôm continuing treatment on my rotator cuff repair surgery which I began in NY. I am super impressed by the level of care. Tom is an amazing physical therapist. I‚Äôm ending my second week here and am grateful that Tom fully explains the process and provides details about the exercises themselves. It helps to understand the process of healing and related expectations for the future. Also, Ebony and the therapy aides are genuinely caring and work hard! I am forever grateful. Joe F.

I‚Äôve been to a lot of physical therapy over the years, and I have to say‚ÄîJack at XL Physical Therapy & Sports Rehab is hands down the best. I felt relief after just my first session, which is incredibly rare. Jack not only addressed the root of my discomfort, but he also gave me a clear timeline for my recovery, which gave me so much peace of mind. I‚Äôm truly grateful I found this place‚Äîbefore coming here, I was ready to give up and just live with the discomfort. Now, I finally feel hopeful again.

I have only had one session here at XL and was extremely impressed. Although I did not have an appointment which I forgot to make Marla did not send me home. She went above and beyond to find someone to take me for my PT session and that was Shelby who is extremely Wonderfull!
They made me feel extremely comfortable and the exercises that they gave me to do strengthen my arm and it feels so much better. Thank you!

Marla is an outstanding Physical Therapist! She is making my recovery from a total knee replacement go so smoothly! She challenges me more and more each visit and I am rapidly progressing. So much room to workout, clean, and everyone is super friendly and always willing to help. I highly recommend Marla as a Physical Therapist, for anyone who wants to heal with a smile! A very happy and satisfied patient!

Extremely knowledgeable and friendly. Zach diagnosed by lower back pain immediately and had me back to 100% in no time. Definitely a hands-on treatment center providing outstanding care.

Im very satisfied with the results i have after my injuries as a professional athlete i would recommend anyone who needs physical therapy or any help with your injuries.

The team at XPE is awesome! I had a back injury from boxing and these guys did a whole combination of different treatments to address all the problems. Looking forward to them fixing my team mates too before their fights !
Great facility and physiotherapy. Excellent service from the front desk and physios. Super helpful with my injury with a couple sessions while in town. High recommend!

Top notch dog training! When I first rescued my pup Winston, he had really bad leash reactivity, to the point that I would get anxious going on walks. With just one private training session, I was taught how to monitor and handle those situations while we worked on his leash manners. Now we can go on walks and get muuuuch closer to other dogs, even walk past them on larger sidewalks.

On top of that behavior issue, we learned a lot in their obedience classes and had fun doing rally and agility. The staff is so knowledgeable and friendly as well. It really takes a village and with the staff at ZR St. Pete in our village, we made amazing progress!

Plus, all the special events that they do (like holiday parties) are so sweet! If you‚Äôre considering going here for training, I say go for it, 100%!

We are really happy with our experience at the Zoom Room. Alexis is a great trainer and we learn something new at each visit. She helped our girl earn her AKC Star Puppy award and now we are working towards earning the Canine Good Citizen award. Thanks, Alexis!

Clementine loves going to the Zoom Room and we love that she‚Äôs learning so much and so fast. They work with us to get the best results. The class sizes are small and we get one-on-one training each time we go. We couldn‚Äôt be happier. Here‚Äôs a picture of her on her first day of class ü•∞

Sadie and I are treated like family and we both love our time with the Zoom Room crew. What a wonderful workout. Two paws up!

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Zoom Room! We‚Äôve been bringing our dog Dal√≠, for training, and it‚Äôs been such a positive experience. Highly Recommend!!

I have to say, enrolling Raelyn at Zoom Room Coral Springs has been one of the best decisions I‚Äôve made. She‚Äôs already made tremendous progress in just a handful of classes ‚Äî all thanks to her favorite trainer, Shay!

From puppy training to various levels of obedience and agility, Zoom Room of Coral Springs has it all and we are excited to finally see a positive reinforcement training facility in the area!
